book.p: Matthew
Tur Gewasin Kikirum
Roube’aten Ana Tur
Tur gewasin Matthew ebi’obaiyit Jesu i Baiyawasenayan ana omatanen, I isan Buk Atamaninamaim God sabuw isah eomatan sinaf yabin matar.

Iti tur gewasin i men Jew sabuw o iyabowat nati Jesu tufuw ra’at ma’am akisih isahimih, baise tafaram tutufin etei isah. Matthew ana tur hamenam nutitiy gewas. Jesu tutufuwaka busuruf, mi’itube baipataito naatu arar yan routobon baib naatu God ana bowabow Galilee wanawanan busuruf bibinan, i’obaibiyih naatu iyayawasih. Iti ufunamaim Matthew mi’itube Jesu Galilee ine tit remor in Jerusalem rur naatu fur yomanin abistanawat isan namamatar, yomanin ana gagamin ea’easa’ub i ana morob onaf afe’en naatu ana mimisir maiye etei eo kirum.

Iti tur gewasin tit eorerereb Jesu i bai’obaibiyen ana orot gagamin, I ana fair ema’am, karam God ana Ofafar naatu sabuw iyab God ana Aiwob isah tibi’obaibiyen karam boro nakubuna naya’abun gewas hinanowar. Ana bai’obaibiyen abistanawat sinaf mamatar etei bow na yasiben matah etei uman roun.

(1) Oyawemaim ma bi’obaibiyih, nati i sabuw hai yawas ana itinin, hai bowabow mi’itube hinabowabow, sisinaf etei gewasin naatu roufamenamaim Mar ana aiwob run ma isan (teten 5-7); (2) Bai’ufnunenayah nah 12 hai obaiyunen ef tit bow isan (teten 10); (3) Mar ana aiwob ana’oroubon (teten 13); (4) Bai’ufunun yabih ana bai’obaiyen (teten 18) naatu (5) Boun ma ana yomanin naatu mar ana aiwob nanan i ana bai’obaiyen (teten 24-25).
Fef Wanawanan Tur Iti Na’atube Hi’asgidigid
Aneika na in Jesu Keriso Tutufuw (1.1–2.23)
John Baptist ana bowabow (3.1-12)
Jesu ana bapataito naatu ana routobon (3.13–4.11)
Galilee wanawanan Jesu rererebamaim bowabow (4.12–18.35)
Galilee ine in Jerusalem titit (19.1–20.34)
Jesu ana ma fufun fur nati Jerusalem wanawanan naatu sisibinamaim (21.1–27.66)
Jesu morobone mimisir naatu ana bairerereb (28.1-20)

1.1 Gen 22.18; 1Ch 17.11Iti i Jesu ana’a’agir wabih, aiwob ana efane i David ana rara’ane tufuw naatu omatanenane i Abraham ana rara’ane tufuw. Naatu iti i hai gin anayimih. Abraham natun i Isaac, naatu Isaac natun i Jacob, Jacob natun i Judah, Judah i taitin tuwahinah bairi hitufuw.
1.3 Gen 38.29-30; Rut 4.18-22Naatu Judah natunatun i Perez tain Zerah hairi hitufuw, hinah wabin Tamar. Naatu Perez natun i Hezron, Hezron natun i Ram, Ram natun i Aminadab, Aminadab natun i Nashon, Nashon natun i Salmon.
1.5 Rut 4.13-17Naatu Salmon natun i Boaz, hinah wabin Rahab, naatu Boaz natun i Obed, hinah wabin Ruth, naatu Obed natun i Jesse.
1.6 2Sa 12.24Jesse natun i David, aiwob orot. David natun i Solomon, naatu Solomon hinah i orot Uriah ana kwafur.

Solomon natun i Rehoboam, Rehoboam natun i Abaijah, Abaijah natun i Asa, Asa natun i Jehosafat, Jehosafat natun i Jehoram, Jehoram natun i Uzaiah, Uzaiah natun i Jotham, Jotham natun i Ahaz, Ahaz natun i Hezekiah. Naatu Hezekiah natun i Manasseh, Manasseh natun i Amon, Amon natun i Josiah,
1.11 2Ki 22–24; 2Ch 36.10; Jer 27.20Josiah natun i Jeconiah, Jeconiah taitin tuwahinah bairi hibitutufuw ana veya’amaim baiyow matar Babilon sabuw hina hibuwih hire hin Babilonamaim hima.

1.12 Ezr 3.2Babilonane himatabir maiye hinan ufunamaim Jeconiah natun i Shealtiel, naatu Shealtiel natun i Zerubbabel, Zerubbabel natun i Abiud, naatu Abiud natun i Eliakim, Eliakim natun i Azor, Azor natun i Zadok naatu Zadok natun i Akim, Akim natun i Eliud, Eliud natun i Eleazar, Eleazar natun i Mathan, Mathan natun i Jacob, Jacob natun i Joseph, Joseph aawan i Mary, naatu Mary natun i Jesu, it isan Keriso tarouw ta’o. Imih Abraham ana veya’amaim busuruf re na David ana veya’amaim titit, agi’agir kwerekweren etei 14, naatu David ana veya’amaim re na hin Babilon hima’ama i 14, naatu Babilon hima’am imaim busuruf na Keriso ana veya’amaim titit i na’atube 14. 1.17 Keriso Greek fanahimaim Roubininenayan o Tafan hiof nowah

1.18 Luk 1.27, 35Jesu Keriso ana tufuw an i iti na’atube busuruf. Jesu hinah Mary i orot Joseph bai’awanin isan ana rum hi’o, baise hairi nanabin hima’am ana veya, Mary Anun Kakafiyin re targabuw yan wanawanan rara bobokafuf i so’ob. Naatu Joseph i orot gewasin, imih men kok boro bebeyanamaim Mary tibiya’uhuw; imih wa’iwa’iramaim Mary kwahirin isan bogaigiwas.

Baise ma binotanot tasinafumih, Regah ana tounamatar kakafiyin mimumaim tit eo, “Joseph, David ana agir, Mary bai na bai’awanin isan men inabirumih, anayabin iti i God Anunin Kakafiyinane yan matar.
1.21 Luk 1.31; 2.21I boro kek orot nayai, o wabin Jesu iniwab, anayabin i boro ana sabuw hai bowabow kakafihine niyawasih.” 1.21 Jesu Greek fanahimaim Joshua, anayabin i baiyawasenayan

Sawar iti etei himamatar i abisa God ana dinab orot wanawananamaim eo Buk Atamaninamaim kikirum i na iturobe.
1.23 Isa 7.14m “Babin biyan numin boro yan namatar, nataub kek orot nayai wabin Immanuel hiniwab” anayabin God it biyatamaim. Joseph matan nuw mimisir ufunamaim, Regah ana tounamatar biyun na’atube Mary bai i’awan hairi hin ana bar.
1.25 Luk 2.21Baise Joseph i Mary hairi inu’e hima hin Mary taub kek orot yai, naatu Joseph kek bai wabin Jesu iwab eaf.

Judea wanawanan Herod bi’aiwob ana veya’amaim, merar bar ta wabin Bethlehem imaim Jesu tufuw. Nati’imaim orot so’obayah afa daman baiyabayah veya yeninane hina Jerusalem hitit,
2.2 Num 24.17naatu sabuw hibatiyih, “Jew hai aiwob kek tutufuw i menamaim inu’in? Aki ana daman veya yeninane yey a’itin imih kwafirinamih ana.” wise men one pointing to starcn01627b.tifMat 2.1-2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Orot so’obayah ta daman isan uaman iuti’ut2.1-2

Aiwob orot Herod iti tur nonowar i ana not kasiy, naatu Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw etei’imak auman hai not kasiy. Basit firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah etei eaf hina ibatiyih, “Keriso i boro menamaim natufuw?” Hiya’afut hio, “Judea wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Bethlehemamaim. Anayabin dinab orot iti na’atube Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum,
book.q: 2.6 Mic 5.2; Jn 7.42 ‘Judah tafaram wanawanan, bar merar etei hai aiwob wanawanahimaim,
O Bethlehem wab boro nara’at,
anayabin one boro nabatanenayan orot natufuw,
ayu au sabuw Israel nabonawiyih.’”
book.p: Imaibo Herod veya yenin nanawan hina hima’am eaf hirun wa’iwa’iramaim ibatiyih, kok taso’ob veya abistanamaim daman yey hi’itin. Naatu au Bethlehem biyafarih i’uwih eo, “Kwanan kek kwananuwih gewas kwana’itin naatu kwanamatabir au tur kwana’owen, saise ayu’ubo anan anakwafir.”

Aiwob orot iti na’atube eo hinonowar ufunamaim hitit hin, naatu daman ta’imon veya yeninane hi’itin hinan au nah i’iyon na kek inu’in tafanamaim nutanub bat. Nati daman hi’i’itin ana veya hiyasisir naatu hikawasa men kafaita.
2.11 Psa 72.10-15; Isa 60.6Bar wanawanan hirun kek hinah Mary hairi hi’itih, suh hiyowen kek hikwafir. Imaibo hai kaukufet hirufamen hai siwar gold, frankincense, naatu myrrh hibotaiten kek hisiwar. Naatu matabir maiye Herod biyan titamih hio’o, baise fai hai mimumaim God imatnuwih, naatu ef ta hibai hin hai tafaram hitit.

Nanawan orot hinan ufunamaim, Regah ana tounamatar Joseph ana mimumaim tit iu, “Kumisir kek hinah hairi kubuwih kwabihir kwan Egypt imaim kwanama’am boro ana’obo kwanatit, anayabin Herod i kek asabuninamih ana ef enunuwet.”

Basit Joseph misir kek hinah hairi buwih gugumin wanawanan hibihir hin Egypt hitit,
2.15 Hos 11.1nati’imaim hima’am Herod morob. Imih sawar iti himamatar i abisa Regah ana dinab orot iwan Buk Atamaninamaim kikirum i na i turobe, “Egyptane ayu Natu abotait tit.”

Herod veya yenin nanawan hai baifuwen titita’ur ana veya, yan so’ar gagamat bufut naatu orotokek nati Bethlehem wanawanan naatu bar merar nati sisibinamaim iyabowat hai kwamur rou’ab au babe re’er etei asabunuw isan ana baiyowayah iyunih hitit. Iti na’atube eo biyunih anayabin i veya abisa’amaim nanawan daman hi’itin hio nonowar imaim sinaf. Naatu abisa dinab orot Jeremiah eo kikirum i na yabin matar.
book.q: 2.18 Gen 35.19; Jer 31.15 “Ramah bar meraramaim yuwen atubob gagamin maiyow re’er hinowar,
tibikirir naatu tererey,
Rachel natunatun isah erererey
men ekokok hini’awafut,
anayabin ana kek etei himorob sawar.”
book.p: Herod momorob ufunamaim, Joseph Egypt ma’ama Regah ana tounamatar Joseph ana mimumaim tit iu, “Kumisir kek hinah hairi kubuwih kwamatabir maiye kwan au Israel, anayabin sabuw iyab kek asabuninamih hi’o i himoroboka.”

Basit Joseph matan nuw misir, Jesu hinah hairi buwih himatabir maiye hina Israel hitit. Baise Arselaus tamah Herod ana efan bai, Judea wanawanan ma bi’aiwob Joseph ana tur nowar, naatu imaim na ma’amih bir. Mimumaim auman God imatanuw, imih i au Galilee na’at na,
2.23 Isa 11.1; 53.2; Luk 2.39; Jn 1.45bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim bar wowab ma, saise abisa dinab oro’orot Buk Atamaninamaim hi’o hikikirum i na yabin matar, “Jesu isan boro hinao i Nazareth matuwan”.

Kwamur bai’ab na’atube sawar ufunamaim, John Baptist Judea arar yan tit busuruf binan
3.2 Mat 4.17; Mak 1.15eo, “Bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwanihamiyen, anayabin mar ana aiwob i na iyubin.”
3.3 Isa 40.3Dinab orot Isaiah, Buk Atamaninamaim John isan kikirum iti na’atube eo,
book.q: “Orot ta arar yan tit bat eafa’af, Regah ana ef kwayabuna, naatu ana ef kwaimutufur.”
book.p: 3.4 2Ki 1.8John ana faifuw i camel bunibuninamaim sakir iyoun, ana kikir i bobaituw ta kanabinamaim naiwan kik, ana bay i sisik naatu kaiyar tafu. Jerusalem wanawanan, Judea wanawanan bar merar etei naatu sabuw nati Jordan harew sisibin hima’am etei ikwei hina. Hai bowabow kakafih hi’e’en, Jordan harewamaim John bapataito itih.

3.7 Mat 12.34; 23.33Baise i wanawanahimaim Pharisee naatu Sadducee maumurih na’in bapataito bainamih hinan itih eo, “Kwa i kokobe aso’ob hira’at! Yait eo kwanowar God ana baimakiy nabiyafar boro wan kwanabibir? Turobe kakafihine dogor baikitabir kwanabaib i boro a yawas gewasinamaim ni’obaiyi, kwa i anababatun dogor baikitabir matar.
3.9 Jn 8.33, 39; Rom 4.12Men kwananot kwanao, ‘Abraham i aki ai agir,’ baise a tur ao’owen, God karam kabay iti boro nabow nasinaf Abraham wawawan hinamatar.
3.10 Mat 7.19; Luk 13.6-9God ana kariwak i wan iur, ai an wairoronika tarinamih yai inu’in, ai menatan ebiw ro’on men gewasin boro natar nare wairaf wan nayara’ah na’arah.

3.11 Jn 1.26-27, 33; Act 1.5 “Ayu i dogor baikitabiren ana bapataito harewamaim abit. Baise orot ayu ufu’umaim enan ana fair i ra’at ayu natabiru, an ana sumasum ayu men karam boro ana’abar. I boro Anun Kakafiyin naatu wairafamaim bapataito nit. I umanamaim i raububuna’en ana fok ema’am, imaim boro rice narab narububunai ani’anin korom nayai, naatu hain wairaf aidahin in etoto’ab wan nayara’ah na’arah.”
Nati ana veya’amaim, Jesu Galilee ine tit na Jordan tit, John bapataito baitinin isan. Baise John rutawiy eo, “O i karam boro ayu bapataito ititu, baise aisim ayu isou kunan?”
Jesu iya’afut eo, “Boun abisa au’uwi i kusinaf, anayabin ef iti’imaim God ana kok gewasin isan yayakitifuw boro tanasinaf yabih hinamatar.” Naatu John ibasit Jesu bapataito itin.

3.16 Jn 1.32Jesu bapataito baib ufunamaim matabir yen tafan bat. Nati ana maramaim mar botawiy God Anunin Kakafiyin itin mamu imak na’atube rob re na Jesu tar gabuw, naatu tafanamaim marakaw. dove descending on JesusCN01656b.TIFMat 3.16-17©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu tafanamaim mamu imak re etatagabuw3.16-17
3.17 Psa 2.7; Isa 42.1; Mat 12.18; 17.5; Luk 9.35Mar wanawanan Orot fanan hinowar eo, “Iti kek i ayu Natu ta’imon, au yabow, I isan ayu abiyasisir.”

4.1 Hib 2.18; 4.15Imaibo Anun Kakafiyin Jesu nawiy hin arar yan imaim Demon kakafin routubunin isan.
4.2 Exo 34.28Auyit 40 gugumin 40 na’atube bay en ma yoyoyoban ufunamaim bayumih morob. Basit Demon Mowan na Jesu biyan tit eo, “O God Natun na’at, kabay iti ku’uwih tebotabiren rafiy tematar ku’aa.”

4.4 Deu 8.3Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum i iti na’atube eo, ‘Orot boro men bay akisin niyawasimih, baise God awanamaim tur abisa etitit boro i niyawasih.’” Naatu Demon Mowan Jesu nawiy hin Jerusalem hitit, Tafaror Bar afe’en hiyen tafantoro’ot bat.
4.6 Psa 91.11-12Jesu iu, “O God Natun na’at, kukununuw kure. Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo,
book.q: ‘God ana tounamatar boro o isa niyafarih, umah yanamaim inare hinabuwi, naatu kabay boro men a natakakirimih.’”
book.p: 4.7 Deu 6.16Jesu iya’afut eo, “Baise Buk Atamaninamaim iban eo maiye, ‘Regah a God men routobonamaim inanawiyimih.’”
Naatu Demon Mowan iban Jesu nawiy maiye hiyen hin oyaw manin tafantoro’ot bat, tafaram tutufin ana gewasin etei ana aiwob auman i’obaiy eo, “Su inayowen ayu inakwafiru, sawar iti etei boro o anit”.
4.10 Deu 6.13Jesu iya’afut iu eo, “Demon Mowan na kutabaratait! Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo, ‘Regah a God akisinamo inakwafir isan inabow.’”
Imaibo Demon Mowan nati’imaim Jesu ihamiy tabaratait, naatu God ana tounamatar hina Jesu hitafafar hinawiy bairi hin.
book.s: Jesu Ana Bowabow Galilee Imaim Busuruf
book.p: 4.12 Mat 14.3; Mak 6.17; Luk 3.19-20John dibur bar ma’am Jesu ana tur nowar, basit matabir na Galilee tit, naatu Nazareth ihamiy na Capernaum imaim ma, harew kukuf sisibin Naphtali, Zeburun wawawan hai me’emaim, saise tur abisa dinab orot Isaiah wanawananamaim titit i na iturobe.
book.q: 4.15-16 Isa 9.1-2 “Zeburun ana me, Naphtali ana me, ef yan in tor re’ere,
Jordan harew rounane,
Galilee wanawanan Eteni Sabuw hai me’emaim,
sabuw gugumin ma’ayah boro marakaw hina’itin;
naatu sabuw iyab morob kakafin ana me’emaim gugumin wanawanan tema’am
marakaw boro isah nakusisiar narun.”
book.p: 4.17 Mat 3.2; 19.27Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu busuruf binan eo, “Bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwanihamiyen, anayabin mar ana aiwob ina iyubin”.
book.s: Orot Siy Bowayah Nah Kwafe’en Jesu Eafih
book.p: Jesu Galilee tor rewarewan remor inan orot ainuf hairi itih, Simon wabin ta Peter, tain Andrew hairi tor yan siy bowamih buwat hiya’ay. Jesu eaf eo, “Kwana kwai’ufnunu bairit tan boro ani’obaiyi orot isah kwanaway”. Mar ta’imonamo hai buwat hitumar Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.

Hin kafa’imo, orot rou’ababo ainuf hairi itih, James tain John hairi, Zebedee natunatun. Tamah bairi wa tafan hima hai buwat hitatar futifut, Jesu bai’ufnunin isan ea’afih ana veya, mar ta’imonamo wa hihamiy naatu tamah auman wa tafan hihamiy ma, i hairi Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.

4.23 Mat 9.35; Mak 1.39; Act 10.38Galilee wanawanan Jesu runtit Jew hai Kou’ay Bar 4.23 synagogue gidigidihimaim mar ana aiwob isan tur gewasin binan, naatu sabuw yarug yumatah ta ta, sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am etei iyawasih.
4.24 Mak 6.55Jesu ana tur ra’at in Syria tafaram wanawanan etei hinowar, basit sabuw sawusawuwih, ah umah kafikafirih, rara ani’anih, kokom ani’anih, koko’aw, mayamayay naatu sabuw afa hai sawow yumatah ta ta etei hiteten hina Jesu iyawasih. 4.25 Mak 3.7-8Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow Galilee’ine naatu Bar Merar Etei Umat Rororon wanawanahimaim naatu Jerusalem, Judea naatu Jordan wanawanan auman sabuw etei Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.

Jesu sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hinan itih, basit heher yen in koun yan mare ana bai’ufununayah hina sisibinamaim himarir. Naatu busuruf i’obaibiyih eo, sermon on mountCN01700B.TIFMat 5.2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu Oyaw tafan ma ebi’obiyih5.2
book.q: 5.3 Isa 57.15 “Sabuw iyab ayubih ana’amorob tebaib boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin mar ana aiwob boro ninowah hinab. 5.3 Romans 4.13
5.4 Isa 61.2-3; Rev 7.17Sabuw iyab hiyababan tererey God boro ni’afutih baigegewasin nitih.
5.5 Psa 37.11Sabuw iyab taiyuwih teyayara’iyih boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin me tafaram boro ninowah hinab.
5.6 Isa 55.1-2Sabuw iyab gewasin sinaf isan hi’amorob sikah emamamah boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro nitih hinab nasusuwih.
Sabuw iyab tekakabeber boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro nakabibirih.
Sabuw iyab dogoroh uhew boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro hina’itin.
Sabuw iyab tufuw ma gewas isan tebowabow boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro natunatumih nabuwih.
5.10 1Pit 3.14Sabuw iyab gewasin tisisinaf isan hirouw tibi’a’akirih boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin mar ana aiwob boro hinab.
book.p:
5.11 1Pit 4.14 “Kwabi’ufununu isan sabuw boro tur kakafin hina’uwi, hinarabi hini’a’a’akiri naatu baifuwenamaim tur kakafih maiyow hina’u’uwi isan, baigegewasin boro kwanab.
5.12 2Ch 36.16; Act 7.52Kwaniyasisir naatu kwanakawasa, anayabin a siwar gagamin na’in auyom maramaim inu’in boro kwanab. Ef ta’imon nati na’atube marasika dinab oro’orot hirouw hi’a’a’akirih.

“Kwa i riy na’atube sabuw etei isah. Baise riy naniyan nabi’en na’at boro men karam hiniwa’an naniyan namatar maiye’emih, naatu sawar isan ana gewasin boro men ta nama, imih boro hinisaroun haw nare, sabuw tafan hinawas kamakamar hinaremor.

5.14 Jn 8.12; 9.5 “Kwa i tafaram ana marakaw. Bar merar gagamin oyaw wan hiwowab ebatabat boro men karam hinibun wa’irimih.
5.15 Mak 4.21; Luk 8.16; 11.33Na’atube orot babin men ta ramef ito’ab noukwat wanawanan tarafut inumih. Baise ana sisikofamaim boro nasikof bar wanawanan etei namarakaw kawin hinama.
5.16 Eph 5.8-9; 1Pit 2.12Ef ta’imon nati na’atube a marakaw sabuw etei matahimaim kwanabotawiy, saise abisa gewasin kwabowabow hina’itin 5.16 Titus 2.14 naatu Tamat maramaim wabin hinabora’ara’ah. 5.16 Matthew 9.8

5.17 Rom 3.31 “Ayu anan men kwananot Moses ana ofafar naatu dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen baihamiyen isan ao’omih. Ayu men i kouseiren isan anamih, baise sinaf yabih matar isan. 5.17 John 10.34, 35
5.18 Luk 16.17; 21.33Anababatun a tur a’owen, mar tafaram ema’am wanawananamaim kirum kikimin maiyow hikikirum, naatu pen wanamaim abisa hikukuyowan boro men ta anakusairimih, baise etei boro anasinaf yabih hinamatar.
5.19 Jas 2.10Orot yait ofafar kikimin maiyow itin yabin en rouw eastu’ub naatu sabuw afa i’obaiyih nati na’atube tisisinaf, mar ana aiwobomaim ibo boro hina’itfuruw, anayabin en hinarouw hinao, baise orot yait iti ofafar ia’ait naatu sabuw afa ebi’obaiyih mar ana aiwobomaim i boro orot gagamin. A tur ao’owen o yait abosunusunub nara’at Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah inananatabirih na’at, o i nuhinafot mar ana aiwobomaim i kurur.

5.21 Exo 20.13; Deu 5.17 “Tur marasika hio uwatanah hinonowar i hio kwanowar, men sabuw kwana’asbunuw, naatu orot yait sabuw ea’asbunuwih boro ofafar nafatum hinibatiy.
5.22 1Jn 3.15Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait taintuwan isan yan nasoso’ar boro ofafar nafatum hinibatiy, naatu orot yait taintuwan isan fudirin en narouw nao’o, i boro kaniser hinibatiy. Baise orot yait taintuwan na’oraraf anayabin en nao, nati orot i enan kakafin ana wairaf wan nayenamih.

5.23 Mak 11.25 “Isan imih gem kakafiyin tafamaim o a siwar ya’inamih ibai kuyey, naatu nati’imaim o nuhi nataseb, tai ta o isa i yan esoso’ar. Basit a siwar nati gem tafanamaim inihamiy na’in, o inamatabir maiye inan tai airi kwanao gewas uma kwanabow kwanitonuw, imaibo inamatabir inan a siwar God initin.

“Ofafar ta ina’astu’ub taituwa baibatiyihimih nabuwi kwanan, airi kwanao gewas kwanitonuw, veya kikimin nama’am na’at, imaibo inan baibatiyenamaim inarun, anayabin nati’imaim tura boro nabuwi baibatiyenayan orot gagamin umanamaim naya’i, naatu baibatiyenayan orot boro nabuwi furisiman nitih hinabuwi kwanan dibur bar hinayaruyi. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati’imaim o boro inama kabay hio na’atube inatubuni, imaibo boro hinabotait inatit.

5.27 Exo 20.14; Deu 5.18 “Tur hio uwatanah hibi’obaibiy i hio kwanowar, turanah a’aawah ufuh men kwanan. Naatu boun a tur ao’owen orot yait matanawat nuw babin itin ana notamaim hairi baiwa’anamih enotanot ana notamaim hairi hiwa’anaka.
5.29 Mat 18.9; Mak 9.47Imih o mata asukwafune nuw kwaneyan, o in bowabow kakafin kusisinaf, kukubai kwisaroun, men basit mata ta’imon ana kakafinamaim o biya etei tan wairaf wan tayen ta’arah.
5.30 Mat 18.8; Mak 9.43Na’atube uma asukwafune eof kwaneyan, ku’afuw kwisaroun men basit uma ta’imon ana of kwanekwanemaim o biya etei tan wairaf wan tayen ta’arah.
(Matthew 19.9; Mark 10.11-12; Luke 16.18)

5.31 Deu 24.1-4; Mak 10.4 “Moses ana ofafaramaim eo, ‘Orot yait aawan nakwakwahir gewasin kwahikwahiren ana fef nakirum babin nitin nab auman nan.’
5.32 1Cor 7.10-11Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait nibobowen aawan nakwahir nan orot ta ni’awan, hairi hinabiwa’an i men babin ana ubar, baise orot ana ubar anayabin i kok imih babin esisinaf, naatu orot yait nati babin bai bi’awan auman bowabow kakafin esisinaf.

5.33 Lev 19.12; Num 30.2; Deu 23.21 “Tur marasika hio uwatanah hinonowar i hio kwanowar, ‘A omatanen men kwana’astu’ub, baise sinafumih God kwao’omatan i kwanasinaf.’
5.34 Isa 66.1; Mat 23.22; Jas 5.12Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, God wabinamaim men asir kwanao kwanifaro’omih, na’atube auyom mar isan, anayabin nati i God ana ma’ama efan.
5.35 Psa 48.2; Isa 66.1Me yan auman men isan kwanifaro, anayabin nati i God an ana baibiyarir efan, Jerusalem auman, anayabin nati i ata aiwob gagamin God ana tafaram. Naatu o taiyuw auman men arib isan inao baifaro’omih, anayabin o men karam boro arib ta inab inau nikwes o nafurum. Imih inakwahir o inarufut, anayabin abisa awamaim iya’abar i’o etitit i Demon Kakafin biyanane enan.

5.38 Exo 21.24; Lev 24.20; Deu 19.21 “Marasika ana tur hio kwanowar, ‘Orot yait mata nakubai, ibo matan kukubai, naatu orot yait wa nimarir, ibo wan kwimarir.’ Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait isa nasisinaf kakaf men wan inay, rebareb rounane nifafar inatatabir rounane’ebo nifafar. Naatu orot yait niyaso’ar baibatiyimih nabuwi kwananan, a biya baibiyon baban nikiya’ub nabaib, a biya baibiyon tafan auman inikiya’ub initin. Baiyowayan orot ta nan nakwarari ana hafoy abarin veya ta’imon airi namih nao, ina’abar veya rou’ab airi kwanan. Orot babin ta isa sawaramih nafefeyani kwitin, naatu orot babin ta a sawar bai na mar kafai imaim bowamih nao, kwitin ebai en.

5.43 Lev 19.18 “Marasika ana tur hio a’a’agir hinonowar i hio kwanowar, ‘Taituwa kwaniyabuwih naatu a kamabiy sabuw kwanimat gigigirih.’
5.44 Exo 23.4-5; Luk 23.34; Act 7.60; Rom 12.14, 20Baise boun a tur ao’owen, a kamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih naatu sabuw iyab terurukoukuwi isah kwanayoyoban. Saise kwa boro Tamat auyom maramaim natunatumih nabuwi, anayabin God sinaf sabuw gewasih kakafih etei tafahimaim veya erararan, sabuw iyab gewasin tisisinaf naatu kakafin tisisinaf etei God taun ebitih. Sabuw kabay o’onayah tisisinaf na’atube kwanasinaf sabuw iyabowat isa tibiyabowawat isah kwanabiyabow, God boro men ana siwar gewasin ta nitimih. Naatu Eteni Sabuw taih tuwah akisih hai merar tiyiy na’atube kwanasinaf taituwa akisih hai merar kwanayiyi, ana gewasin boro men kwanabaimih.
5.48 Lev 19.2; Deu 18.13A yawas uhew bitan kwanama, Tamat auyom maramaim ana yawas uhew bitan ema’am na’atube.
6.1 Mat 23.5 “Yate nanub, men iti baifa’i isan a bowabow gewasih sabuw nahimaim kwanabowamih, nati na’atube kwanasisinaf na’at, Tamat maramaim boro men a baiyan nitimih.

“Imih veya ta akir wairafin sawar inabitin men inakurereb sabuw etei hinanowaramih, men sabuw wanawanah rerekabih Kou’ay Bar wanawanan, naatu ef gagamih yahimaim sabuw itih baifa’ih isan tisisinafube kwanasinafumih, anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati sabuw i boro men hai siwar ta God nitihimih. Isan imih akir wairafin inabibais, wa’iwa’iramaim inibais, saise a’of iti sisib ema’am men naso’ob o abisa kusisinaf. Iti sawar i wa’iwa’iramaim inasinaf, saise Tamat maramaim o abisa wa’iwa’iramaim isisinaf na’iti boro a baiyan nit.

6.5 Mat 23.5; Luk 18.10-14 “Naatu yoyobanamih men wanawanah rerekabih tisisinafube, kwanasinafumih, anayabin i tekokok Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hinabat hinayoyoban, o ef na’ih awah kaukusebamaim hinabat hinayoyoban, saise sabuw hina’itih, baise anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati sabuw hai baiyan i hibaika. Baise o yoyobanamih a bar inarun, etawan inahir, Tamat wa’iwa’iramaim ema’am isan inayoyoban, naatu Tamat abisa wa’iwa’iramaim isinaf i’itin boro a baiyan nit.
6.7 1Ki 18.26-29Naatu yoyobanamih men a tur nidun namomonamih, Eteni Sabuw iyab God men hisusu’ub i na’atube tisisinaf. Tenotanot yoyoban manin hinayoyoban God boro hai yoyoban nanowar.
6.8 Mat 6.32Men i hai sinaf kwani’u’ur, anayabin abisa inotanot Tamat i so’obabo o kubifefeyan. Imih iti na’atube kwanayoyoban,

O wab i kakafiyin.

tafaramamaim a kok atasinaf,
maramaim tisisinaf na’atube,
Biyai ana fair isan mar etei ai bay initi.

taituwai hai kakafin anonotawiyen na’atube.

baise kakafihine inatar fafari, a aiwob, a fair, a marakaw nama wanatowan, Amen.’
book.p: 6.14 Mak 11.25-26 “Taituwa o isa bowabow kakafin hisisinaf inanotawiyen, Tamat maramaim o a kakafih auman boro nanotawiyen. Baise hai kakafih men inanotanotwiyen na’at, o a kakafin auman Tamat boro men nanotawiyen.

6.16 Isa 58.5-9 “Kwanayoyohar 6.16 bay kwanabitafutaf ana veya men sabuw wanawanah rerekabih kwani’u’urih, anayabin nati na’atube teyoyohar, saise taituwah hina’itih yoharayah hinarouw hinifa’ih isan. Anababatun a tur ao’owen nati sabuw hai baiyan i hibaika. Baise kwanayoyohar ana veya yumat kwanasouwen arib raiy kwanay kwanisuwar, saise sabuw afa boro men hina so’ob kwa i kwayoyohar, baise Tamat wa’iwa’iramaim ema’ama, o abisa akisimo isinaf i’itin boro a baiyan nit.

6.19 Jas 5.1-3 “A sawar gewasih iti tafaramamaim inaya inatototo, ganidor boro na’aan fufur naatu simur boro na’arah, naatu bainowah auman boro a bar hinakwib hinarun a sawar hinabain.
6.20 Mat 19.21; Luk 18.22Imih a sawar etei maramaim inaya inatoto, saise ganidor boro men hina’aan, naatu simur boro men na’arah, naatu bainowah boro men a bar hinakwib hinarun hina bainuwihimih. A toto abuyoy menamaim kuya’aya, o dogor boro imaim mar etei nama.
“Matat i biyat ana hinow, matat gewasin, biyat etei boro marakawin. Baise matat kakafin, biyat tutufin etei boro gugumin kakafin, naatu nati gugumin i wanu’umin kakafin.
“Orot ta’imon men karam boro orot gagamih rou’ab isah nabow, ana gewasin orot ta i boro nakwahir, naatu orot ta isan niyabow, orot ta ana tur i boro nanowar naatu orot ta boro nifutuw.

6.25 Php 4.6; 1Tim 6.6-8; 1Pit 5.7 “Isan imih a tur ao’owen, ayawas isan men kwaniyababan, a tom isan, biya isan, naatu ar faifuw isan. Kwanotanot yawas i sawar gagamin ar faifuw naatu a tom hairi natabirih?
6.26 Mat 10.29-31; Luk 12.6-7Kwanuw mamu kwa’itah, men masaw tebob naatu men masaw tefafour, na’atube aurih bay ana korom en 6.26 bay ya’aya ana bar baise Tamat maramaim kaifih bay ebitih. Imih kwa i men mamu ekakaifih na’atube ekakaifimih. Imih yababan men karam boro a yawas nakumanin kwanama’amih 6.27 nara’at, nawarorom

“Naatu aisim ar faifuw isah kwabiyababan? Sigar beran kwanuw kwa’itih, men kafai hibow raro’oh ebababan, o biyah isan ar faifuw tesasakiramih.
6.29 1Ki 10.4-7; 2Ch 9.3-6Baise a tur ao’owen, aiwob orot Solomon toto buyoy wairafin, ana faifuw eo’osen i men ta iti beran ana gewasinabe’emih. God kaiyar fotan ebi’osen wainih kwana’itin, fotan iti boun natasasar, maras boro nakimow nare wairaf wan hinayara’aten hina’arah. Baise kwa i Tamat God uman yanamaim ekakaifi, aisim men kwabitumitum? Imih men kwaniyababan kwanao, au ar au faifuw boro menamaim anabow ana’osen, naatu bay boro menamaim anabow ana, harew menamaim anahun anatom?
6.32 Mat 6.8Eteni Sabuw i sawar iti isah tibiyababan, naatu Tamat maramaim kwa a yababan etei i so’ob.
6.33 1Ki 3.11-14; Psa 37.4, 25; Rom 14.17Baise wan i mar ana aiwob naatu ma gewasin 6.33 yawas mutufurin, ef mutufurin kwananuwih kwanab, naatu sawar iti etei boro tafan naya’abar nit kwanabow. Isan imih maras isan men kwaniyababan, anayabin maras ibo akisin ana yababan. Na’atube veya ta’ita’imon hai yababan men inabo’ay inanot a yababan nara’atamih.

7.1 Rom 2.1; 1Cor 4.5; Jas 4.11-12 “Taituwa hai kakafin men ina’itin inibibatiyih, God boro nibatiyi.
7.2 Mak 4.24Anayabin God boro ef ta’imon taituwa ibibatiyih na’atube, o boro nibatiy, naatu fufun ta’imon taituwa ifufufunihimaim, o boro nafufuni.

“Aisim taituwa matah mutusukwar i’itin kikin ku’o naatu o mata ahay gagamin yi ebatabat men kui’itin. O taituwa isan boro mi’itube awa fariniwa’an inao, ‘Aro nekuna mata mutusukwar abosair.’ Naatu baise o mar etei i matan ahay yi ebatabat. Wanawan rerekabih, mat o taiyuw mata a’ahay ina’uy, saise boro inanuw gewas taituwa matan ana ahay ina’uy.
“Abisa kakafiyin men haru aninamih kwanitih, boro hinatatabir hinayubi. Naatu a nugunug men for nahimaim kwanarub nare, boro tafan hinayen hinawasu’uru’um.

7.7 Mak 11.24; Jn 14.13; 15.7; 16.23-24 “Inafefeyan boro inab, inanuwet boro inatita’ur, naatu inarukikitar etawan boro isa nabotawiy.
7.8 1Jn 3.22; 5.14-15Anayabin orot yait efefeyan boro nab, orot yait enunuwet boro natita’ur naatu orot yait erurukikitar etawan boro isan nabotawiy.

“O yait natu, wahimih fefeyan kabay ibai itin ean? Na’atube siyamih rererey kok ibai itin ean?
7.11 Jas 1.17En baise Kwa i bowabow kakafih sinafuyah, baise kwaso’ob natunat boro siwar gewasih kwanitih, imih Tamat maramaim i ma tainin erubirub orot yait efefeyan boro siwar gewasin nitin.
7.12 Mat 22.39-40; Luk 6.31; Rom 13.8-10Imih sawar etei taituwa isah inabow, o kukok isa tebowabow na’atube, anayabin Moses ana ofafar naatu dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen an anababatun i iti’imaim ku’ay inu’in.

“Etawan awan kukurinamaim kwanarun kwan, anayabin etawan awan gagamin, naatu ef awan hahabin inarun inanan yomaninamaim i gurugurusen ema’am naatu sabuw moumurih na’in imaim tenan. Baise etawan awan kukurin naatu ef awan tuwafutin inarun inanan yomaninamaim i yawas ema’am, naatu sabuw matan ta’amo imaim tenan.

7.15 Mat 24.24; Act 20.29; 2Pit 2.1 “Mata to niwa’an dinab baifufuwenayah hinanan kwana’itih, anayabin hinanan ufuhine ana itinin boro sheep na’atube, baise dogoroh wanawanan ana itinin i haru tuwetuwenih. 7.15 fox
7.16 Gal 5.19-22; Jas 3.12Hai bowabowamaim boro kwana’inanih, agor ro’on boro men kiw tafanamaim inima’ub, naatu wanob ro’on boro men kiw tafanamaim inima’ub? 7.16 grape naatu fig ro’oro’oh i murab afamagamagar kiw. Ai gewasin boro niw gewas, baise ai wanawanan kour nabiw ro’on boro nukunukuwin. Ai gewasin boro men ro’on nukunukuwin nayai, na’atube ai kakafin boro men ro’on gewasin nayai.
7.19 Mat 3.10; Luk 3.9; Jn 15.6Ai menatan men ebiw gewas boro natar nare nab nan wairaf wan nayara’ah na’arah.
7.20 Mat 12.33Imih dinab baifufuwenayah boro hai bowabowamaim kwana’inanih.

7.21 Luk 6.46; Jas 1.25 “Men sabuw etei ayu wabu hisu’ub teo, ‘Regah, Regah’ boro mar ana aiwobomaim hinarun, baise sabuw iyabowat ayu Tamai ana kok tisisinafuwat boro hinarun. Baibatebat ana veya nanan, sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinao, Regah, Regah, o wabimaim aki tur abai aorereb, o wabimaim aki demon kakafih anunih hibihir, naatu o wabimaim aki ina’inan moumurih na’in asinaf.
7.23 Psa 6.8; 2Tim 2.19Imaibo ayu boro anauwih anao, Ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab. Biyau’umaim kwatit sa’ab kwan, bowabow kakafih sinafuyah.

“Isan imih orot yait au tur nowar ebobosiyasiyar, 7.24 sinafumaim yai ebi’a’it i orot not wairafin ana bar to tafan wowab batabat na’atube. Taun gagamin yar, harew tit, naatu wowog tit bar babin, baise bar men ufar re’emih, anayabin bar ana bubu an i to wanawanan rouw re wowab. Baise orot yait au tur nowar naatu men ebobosiyasiyar, i orot aurin not en bar ana bubu dones yan rouw wowowab na’atube. Taun yar, harew tit, naatu wowog babin, bar babinakouw, naatu nati bar re’ere i ra’iy tagurugurus sawar.”

Jesu iti tur eo in sasawar ufunamaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in Jesu binan hinonowar isan hifofofor men kafaita.
7.29 Mak 1.22; Luk 4.32Anayabin bi’obaiyih ana itinin i roubabaruwen ana fair isan ma’am na’atube, men Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah na’atube’emih.

Jesu oyaw wanane re nan ana veya’amaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hi’ufunun bairi hin. Naatu orot ta biyan kokom ani’anin na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Regah inakokok na’at basit biyou iniwa’an nigewasin.”

Jesu uman ru’atayan orot biyan butubun eo, “Ayu akokok, biya igewasin.” Mar ta’imonamo orot biyan kokom etei hihururuw hire orot biyan igewasin.
8.4 Lev 14.1-32; Mat 9.30; Luk 17.14Naatu Jesu orot iu, “Men orot babin ta ana tur inaowenamih, baise mutufor kwen firis biya enutitiy naatu Moses ana obaiyunen tur eo na’atube, sibor inayai sabuw etei matahimaim hina’itin o biya igewasin.”
book.s: Roman Baiyowayan Orot Ukwarin Ana Baitumatum
book.p: Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu na Capernaum titit, basit Roman baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin na baibais isan Jesu ifefeyan. “Regah, ayu au bowayan orot ta i sawow, an uman himorob, baremaim inu’in, misir isan men karam, biyan ebababan kwanekwan.”
Basit Jesu eo, “Boro anan a orot aniyawas.”

Baiyowayan orot ukwarin Jesu iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu men orot gewasu boro inan au bar wanawanan inarun, baise turawat kuo au bowayan orot eyawas. Anayabin ayu i roubabaruwen ana fair biyau’umaim ema’am, naatu baiyowayah etei ayu bab’umaim tema’am, imih baiyowayan orot ta isan anao, ‘Ni’imaim kwen,’ i boro nan, naatu orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti imaim kuna,’ i boro nan, naatu au bowayan orot ta isan anao, iti kusinaf, i boro nasinaf, imih turawat kuo au orot boro nayawas.”

Jesu iti tur nonowar ifofofor men kafaita, naatu sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan tatabir isah eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, Israel wanawanan men kafa’imo orot ta ana baitumatum gagamin iti na’atube bitumatum atita’urimih.
8.11 Luk 13.29A tur ao’owen, sabuw moumurih boro veya yeninane naatu veya ra’iyinane hinan mar ana aiwobomaim hina run, gem sisibinamaim hai efan hinabow Abraham, Isaac, naatu Jacob bairi hiniyasisir.
8.12 Mat 22.13; 25.30; Luk 13.28Baise sabuw iyab mar ana aiwobomaim hitarur i boro maramaim hinabow hinarauw hinare gugumin wanawanan hinarun. Nati’imaim hinama hinarerey wah hinanib kakikak hiniwa’an.”
Imaibo Jesu baiyowayan orot ukwarin iu, “Aubar kwen, naatu abisa kubitumatum i boro namatar.” Naatu nati ana veya’amaim akir wairafin bar sawow inu’in yawas.
Naatu Jesu na Peter ana bar titit, Peter rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab inu’in itin. Basit Jesu babin uman baib ana veya’amaim, ana sawow i en misir bay bogaigiwas.

Birabirab sabuw wagabur kouh hiyen hima’am hibow hina Jesu biyan hitit, naatu awanawat eaf eo wagabur hibihir hititit, naatu sabuw afa hisawow hibow hinan auman etei iyawasih.
8.17 Isa 53.4Sawar iti himamatar i dinab orot Isaiah eo kikirum na iturobe,
book.q: “I akisinamo it ata sawow ata biyababan ebobosairen.”
book.p: Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiruru’ay Jesu itih, basit ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Kwabobuna tarabon harew kukuf rewan rounane.” Naatu ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot ta na Jesu isan eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, ayu o menamaim kwenan ayu boro imaim airit tanan.”
8.20 2Cor 8.9Jesu iya’afut eo, “Sigarafor i hai batar tema’am, naatu mamu hai batar tema’am imaim ti’inu’in, baise Orot Natun inure in biyan tubaiwa’an isan aurin efan en.”
8.21 1Ki 19.20Bai’ufununayah orot tabo na Jesu isan eo, “Regah karam wan itihamiyu atan tamai momorob atayai’ibo atan ati’uf nuni airit tanan?”
Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu kwi’ufnunu tan, iyab himomorob taiyuwih boro hinaya’ih.” 8.22 anunihimaim himomorob, kwihamiyih taiyuwih teya’ih, anayabin men tebitumatum.
book.s: Jesu Yabat Gagamin Eotan Nuwarob Eafuw
book.p:
Naatu Jesu wa isra’at ana bai’ufununayah hiyen bairi hiboy hirabon.
8.24 Psa 4.8Naniyan meyemeye yabat gagamin misir wan kikiy yen wa iwanasum. Baise Jesu wa uranane nuhin bur inu’in ufu’ufut. Bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibunibun hio, “Regah, iniyawasi, wa iu’unun kafa’imo tana morob.”

8.26 Mat 14.31; Psa 89.9Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa aisim kwabirubir? A not men nakabom, 8.26 a baitumatum aisim ebikikimin ayu kwanitutumu boro men kwanamorobomih.” Imaibo misir kwarar yabat kotar eotanih mar ta’imon nuwarob eafuw.
Ana bai’ufununayah hifofor hio, “Iti orot i abi orot? Karam yabat naatu kotar boro fanan hinab hinanutanub.”
book.s: Orot Rou’ab Wagabur Kouh Hiyey Jesu Iyawasih
book.p:
Naatu hirabon hina harew kukuf rewan rounane tafaram wabin Gadara hititit ana veya, orot rou’ab marasika wagabur kouh hito hirun rah yanamaim hima’ama hitit, hai itinin i birubir naatu nati efanamaim men yait ta reremoramih, anayabin hibirubir orot rou’ab isah. Baise Jesu nati’imaim titit ana veya, hairi hina Jesu biyan hitit.
8.29 Mak 1.24; Luk 4.41Hiwow hio, “God Natun, aki isai mi’itube inasinafumih kunan? Aki baimakiy initi’imih, bo aki ai baimakiy ana veya binatit.”
Naatu nati’imaim for i men ef yok hima hi’u’ufar. Imih wagabur Jesu hifefeyan hio, “Aki inanuni ana titit akokok iniyuni anan for wanawanah ana run.”

Jesu eo, “Kwatit kwan.” Hirouwatait hinunuw hin for wanawanah hirun, for himisir fan hinunuw hire hin harew kukuf yan hire hi’aa tomatom himorob. Orot nati for hima’uten hima’am himisir hibihir hin bar merar hitit, abisa’awat himamatar hai tur hi’owen naatu orot rou’ab isah abisa mamatar auman hai tur hi’owen. Imaibo sabuw nati bar merar hima’am etei hitit hina Jesu bairi hitar naatu hi’i’itin ana veya hifefeyan hiu hai tafaram ihamiy tit.
book.s: Jesu Orot An Uman Murubin Iyawas
book.p: 9.1 Mat 4.13Jesu wa afe’en yen naatu matabir maiye rabon na ana bar ana meraramaim tit. Nati’imaim sabuw afa orot ta an uman murubin emo’emomaim hiwan hi’abar hina Jesu biyan hitit, naatu Jesu sabuw hai baitumatum itin, basit orot an uman murubin isan eo, “Natu men iniyababan, o a bowabow kakafih i anotanotawiyen.”
Naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot i tur kakafin maiyow eo God ebi’ib.”

9.4 Luk 9.47; Jn 2.25Jesu abisa hinotanot itin naatu eo, “Kwa aisim dogor wanawanan not kakafih kwanotanot? Ef menatan i hamehamen, orot ana kakafih notawiyen isan anao i hamehamen ai anau namisir nabat nareremor i hamehamen?
9.6 Jn 17.2Baise kwakakasiy, imih ani’obaiyi kwana’itin, orot Natun i tafaramamaim fair bai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.” Naatu orot an uman murubin isan eo, “Kumisir a ir kunuw kubai a ubar kwen.” Orot misir ana ir nuw bai ana ubar in. Sabuw iti na’atube matar hi’i’itin ana mar hai hibir ra’at 9.7 hifofofor men kafai ta naatu God wabin hibora’ara’ah fair iti na’atube orot bitih isan.
Jesu efan nati ihamiy remor inan auman, kabay o’onayan wabin Matthew ana bowabow efanamaim ma’am itin naatu iu, “Kumisir kwi’ufnunu.” Matthew ma’am misir Jesu iufunun hairi hin.

Jesu Matthew ana baremaim ma bay hi’au, ana maramaim kabay o’onayah naatu bowabow kakafih sinafuyah moumurih maiyow hina Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hikofanih bay aa ana efanamaim himare.
9.11 Luk 15.2
9.11 Luk 15.2Naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hi’itih ana maramaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiyih, “Aisim kwa a bai’obaiyenayan kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw kakafih bairi hima bay te’aa?”

Jesu hio nowar naatu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw aurih sawow en adanafur orot boro men hinakok, baise sabuw iyab sawusawuwih boro adanafur orot hinakok.
9.13 Hos 6.6; Mat 12.7Kwa Buk Atamaninamaim kwabiyab tur yabin kwa’itin? ‘Ayu i akokok kabeber, men sibor.’”
9.14 Luk 18.12Naatu John Baptist ana bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibatiy hio, “Aisim aki naatu ofafar bai’ufununayah bairi mar etei ayoyohar naatu o a bai’ufununayah i en?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Men karam sabuw orot boubun tatatabin ana yasisir isan hitaruru’ay, hitama orot yawasin hitabotouw, baise mar boro nanan orot boro hinabosair naatu nati ana veya’amaim imaibo hinifoufur hinirowarow. Na’atube faifuw atamanin boro men karam hinab faifuw boubun hinafitimih, anayabin faifuw boubun hinasasauw ana veya boro nakaro’om natakweb mahar nara’at. Na’atube men yait ta wine boubun ebai wine ana kibub atamaninamaim eriririmih, anayabin wine boubun boro nara’at naatu kibub natafofor wine nasuwa na re, imih wine boubun i boro wine ana kibub boubunamaim hinarir, saise hairi boro gewasih hinabat.”
book.s: Babitai Murubin Naatu Babin Jesu Ana Faifuw Bubutubun
book.p: Iti na’atube eo auman Tafaror Bar kaifenayan orot ta na Jesu biyan tit nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Ayu natu babitai i veya boun morob, baise akokok inan umawat inabutubun nayawas.” Basit Jesu misir ana bai’ufununayah bairi orot hi’ufunun hin.

Naatu babin ta ana faifuwamaim rara bota’ar ma’am kwamur etei 12 sasawar, na Jesu ufunane tit,
9.21 Mat 14.36ana notamaim eo, “Jesu ana faifuw tainin ana butubun boro ana yawas.” Naatu ana faifuw tainin butubun.
Jesu tatabir babin itin eo, “Natu men iniyababan, abai tumatumamaim kubigewasin.” Iti na’at eo ana veya’amaim, mar ta’imonamo babin igewasin.

Imaibo Jesu na Kou’ay Bar kaifenayan orot ana bar wanawanan run. Sabuw hiru’ay hima hirerey itih, naatu rerey ana fik hibababin nowar. Jesu eo, “Iti kek babitai i matan fot inu’in, men morobomih, kwamisir ufun kwatit.” Baise sabuw isan himarib, anayabin i hiso’ob kek i morob. Basit sabuw etei himisir ufun hitit sawar, imaibo Jesu run in kek inu’in ana efanamaim tit, naatu babitai uman bai imisiruw yawas misir. Iti sisinaf ana tur ra’at tasasar in nati tafaram hima’am ana fofonin etei hinowar.
book.s: Jesu Orot Rou’ab Matah Fim Iyawasih
book.p: 9.27 Mat 20.29-34Jesu efan nati itumar tit remor inan, orot rou’ab matah fim hitit hi’ufunun hin hi’af hio, “David uwan, kwiwanbabani.”

Jesu na bar wanawanan run naatu orot rou’ab hina biyan hitit, Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Kwabitumatum ayu boro aniyawasi?” Hairi hiya’afut hio, “Regah abitumitum.” Basit Jesu hairi matah botobonen eo, “Kwabitumatum na’atube isa namatar.”
9.30 Mat 8.4Hairi matah higewasin hinuw naatu Jesu eofafarih eo, “Men yait ta ana tur kwana’owen.” Baise hairi hitit hin Jesu ana tur hibosemor ra’at, nati tafaram hima’am ana fofonin etei hinowar.

Orot rou’ab hinan ufut sabuw afa orot ta yoyom hirab awan igug ma’am hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit.
9.33 Mak 2.12Naatu Jesu yoyom mowan nun tit orot busuruf tur eo sabuw etei hifofor hio, “Sawar iti na’atube Israel wanawananamaim men ta i’itin bounabo ta’i’itin.”
9.34 Mat 12.24; Mak 3.22; Luk 11.15Baise Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hio, “Iti i Demon Hai Ukwarin fair itin imih demon nunih titit.”

9.35 Mat 4.23; Mak 1.39Jesu bar awan awan run tit sabuw inanawanih bar merar hai Kou’ay Baremaim sabuw i’obaibiyih, mar ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin eo hinowar naatu sabuw hai sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hinan etei iyayawasih.
9.36 Num 27.17; 1Ki 22.17; Zec 10.2; Mat 14.14; Mak 6.34Jesu iti rou’ay gagamin maiyow hinan itih yan baban, anayabin hai not kwaris naatu aurih baibais en, ana itinin i sheep na’atube aurih nabatanenayan orot en.
9.37 Luk 10.2Basit ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “Masaw i gagamin na’in baise ana fourayah i men moumurih. Imih masaw matuwan isan kwanayoyoban saise bowayah afa niyafarih hinan bay hinafour, anayabin bay i hiyamur.”
10.1 Mak 6.7; Luk 9.1Jesu ana bai’ufununayah etei 12 eaf ayuwih hina, sawow yumatah ta ta, feher yumatah ta ta, sabuw biyahimaim baiyawasih isan fair itih naatu igegewasinih.

Naatu iti i bai’ufununayah nah 12 wabih, wantoro’ot i Simon wabin ta Peter tufuturan Andrew hairi, James tufuturan John hairi, orot Zebedee natunatun. Philip, Bartholomew hairi, kabay onayan wabin Matthew i Thomas hairi, naatu Alpheus natun James i Thaddeus hairi, tafaram kafafarayan orot wabin Simon. Jesu ana yanuwayan orot Judas Iscariot hairi.
book.s: Jesu Ana Bai’ufununayah 12 Tit Na Bowamih Iuwih
book.p:
Orot nah 12 Jesu iyunih hititit iuwih eo, “Ufun Sabuw 10.5 Gentile hai tafaramamaim men kwanan naatu Samaria sabuw hai bar hai meraramaim men kwanarun.
10.6 Jer 50.6Baise kwanan Israel sabuw bobaituw na’atube hikasiy tema’am biyahimaim kwanarun kwaniyawasih.
10.7 Mat 3.2; 4.17; Luk 10.9, 11Kwanan iti tur i kwanabinan, Mar ana aiwob i na iyubinaka. Sawusawuwih kwaniyawasih, murumurubih kwanao hinamisir, sabuw iyab biyah kokom ani’anih kwaniyawasih naatu demon kakafih kwananunih hinatit. Sawar ana baiyan en kwabaib, imih kwanabow ana baiyan en.
10.9 Luk 10.4Men kabay ta kwanab a koukut kwaniwan, 10.9 gold, silver, copper naiw a kikiramaim kwanarobere auman kwananamih.
10.10 Luk 10.7; 1Cor 9.14Remor isan men hafoy ta kwanab, men biya baibiyon ta, a baibiyon ta, tu ta, kwanabow auman kwananamih. 10.10 a sawar men rouru’ab kwanabowamih. anayabin bowayah abis kikimin tibitin boro nakaram.

“Kwanan bar merar kikimin o bar merar gagamin kwanarur, sabuw iyab merarayow wairafih kwananuwihih, naatu i hai baremaim kwanama, a bowabow kwanisawar imaibo kwihamiyih kwanan.
10.12 Luk 10.5-6Naatu bar runamih sabuw a merarayow kwanitih. 10.12 sabuw isah kwanao, Tufuw isa nama. Naatu sabuw bar wanawanan tufuw ana merarayow hinabaib, basit a merarayow kwanihamiy nati baremaim nama, baise men hinabaib a tufuw ana merarayow kwanabosair kwanab maiye.
10.14 Luk 10.10-12; Act 13.51Orot babin yait a merar men nay naatu a tur men nanonowar, kwanamisir ura kwanarutatab efan nati kwanihamiy kwanan efan ta.
10.15 Mat 11.24; Jud 7Anababatun a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana veya God Sodom, Gomorah sabuw boro nakabibirih, baise nati bar merar sabuw hai baimakiy i boro God tafan nayara’ah gagamin na’in hinab.
10.16 Luk 10.3; Rom 16.19 “Kwananowar, kwa i bobaituw sheep na’atube haru fairih wanawanahimaim abiyuni kwanatit kwananamih, imih kok na’atube kwanakakaf naatu mamu imak na’atube kwananutanub.

10.17-20 Mak 13.9-11; Luk 12.11-12; 21.12-15 “Mata toniwa’an sabuw isah, anayabin boro hinabuw hinafatumi kwanan kanisel nahimaim hibabatiy, naatu Kou’ay Baremaim boro hinaborabirabi. Ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan boro aiwob sabuw naatu gawan orot gagamih na’atube Ufun Sabuw nahimaim Tur Gewasin kurereb nowar isan boro hinarab hinataini. Baise hinafatum hinabuw baibabatiyimih kwanan men kwaniyababan tur isan, o tur o isan, hinabibatiy ana veya’amaim tur boro imaim natit kwanao.
10.20 Jn 14.26Anayabin nati tur i men o a notamaim tit kuo’omih, baise Tamat Anunin o iwani awa rukirir kuo.

10.21 Mic 7.6; Mat 10.35; Mak 13.12; Luk 21.16 “Orot ain boro tain baban nao namorob, regah boro natun nifa’ifa’i baban nao namorob, na’atube kek boro hinah tamah hinifa’ifa’ih babah hinao hinamorob. Ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan sabuw boro hinifa’ifa’i, baise orot yait nabat kikin nabowabow yomaninamaim boro yawas natita’ur. Bar merar ta’amaim hinarukoukuw kwanabia’akir, kwanabihir kwanan bar merar ta, anababatun a tur ao’owen, Israel wanawanan bar merar etei boro men kwanabow kwanisawaribo Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanamih.

10.24 Luk 6.40; Jn 13.16; 15.20 “Kirum kek boro men ana bai’obaiyen orot na natabirimih, na’atube akir wairafin boro men ana orot ukwarin na natabirimih.
10.25 Mat 9.34; 12.24; Mak 3.22; Luk 11.15Baise kirum kek na kok ana bai’obaiyen orot na’atube mataramih, basit i ukwarin na rerekab na kirum gewas, na’atube akir wairafin nabow gewas ana orot ukwarin boro nayara’ah ibe namatar, baise bar matuwan orot isan Beelzebul hinarouw hinao na’at, i ana akir wairafin isah boro tur kakafin maiyow hina’uwih wabih hini’a’afiy.

10.26 Mak 4.22; Luk 8.17 “Baise sabuw isah men kwanabir, anayabin abisa sum wanawanan wa’iwa’irin inu’in boro hina botait nirereb, naatu sawar baibunuwenamaim ti’inu’in etei boro hinatit hinibebeyan sabuw etei hinaso’ob. Abisa wa’iwa’iramaim ao kwanonowar sabuw etei nahimaim kwanao hinanowar, naatu abisa akisimo ao kwanonowar, kwanayen gem tafahimaim kwanabat kwanabinan sabuw etei hinanowar.
10.28 Rom 8.31; Jas 4.12Sabuw biya te’a’asabun isan men kwanabirumih, anayabin anun boro men hina’asabunimih, baise God isan i kwanabir, anayabin i boro biya naatu anun hairi’ika na’asbunuwen hinamorob. Mamu kwikwik rou’ab hai baiyan i one toea’maim boro inatubun, baise mamu ta boro men Tamat so’oba’e namorob haw nare’emih. Naatu kwa ukwarimaim arib i etei God iyab sawar.
10.31 Mat 6.26Imih men kwanabir, Tamat ana yabow kwa isa i ra’at men mamu kwikwik na’atube’emih.

“Orot yait sabuw etei nahimaim ayu isou eo’orereb, ayu auman boro maramaim na’atube ana sinaf Tamai nanamaim.
10.33 Mak 8.38; Luk 9.26; 2Tim 2.12Baise orot babin yait sabuw etei nahimaim ayu ekwakwahiru, ayu auman mar Tamai nanamaim boro ibo anakwahir.

“Men kwananot ayu i tufuw abai tafaramamaim anan, En. Ayu i men tufuw abai ananamih, baise kauseb abai anan.
10.35-36 Mic 7.6Ayu anan anayabin
book.q: ‘Kek orot boro tamah hairi hinagam,
babitai boro hinah hairi hinagam,
babine boro rawan babin hairi hinagam.
Imih orot ana kamabiy anababatun i boro i taiyuwin ana rara.’
book.p:
“Orot yait ana yabow ayu isou ikikimin naatu hinah tamah isah ebiyabow kwanekwan i men karam boro ni’ufnunu, na’atube orot yait ana yabow ayu isou ikikimin naatu i natun orot naatu babitai isah ebiyabow kwanekwan, i men karam boro ni’ufnunu.
10.38-39 Mat 16.24-25; Mak 8.34-35; Luk 9.23-24; 17.33; Jn 12.25Naatu orot babin yait ana onaf men na’abar ayu nabi’ufnunu i men karam boro ayu airi ani’of. Orot babin yait taiyuwin ana yawas enunuwih boro ana yawas nikasiy, baise orot babin yait ana yawas isou ebi’inuw boro natita’ur.
(Mark 9.41)

10.40 Mak 9.37; Luk 10.16; Jn 13.20 “Orot yait kwa a merar eyiyi, ayu au merar eyiyi, naatu orot yait ayu au merar eyiyi, i orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana merar eyiyi. Orot babin yait dinab orot 10.41 God ana tur abarayan ana merar eyiyi, anayabin i dinab orot, nati orot boro dinab orot ana baiyan turin nab. Naatu orot yait, orot ana yawas mutufurin ana merar eyiy, anayabin i orot ana yawas mutufurin boro orot ana yawas mutufurin ana baiyan turin nab. Naatu orot babin yait kek kikimin harewawat hun itin etomatom, anayabin i ayu au bai’ufununayan, anababatun a tur ao’owen i ana baiyan boro nab.”
book.s: John Baptist, Jesu Isan Tur Iyafar
book.p: Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 roube’aten tur bitih ufunamaim efan nati itumar naatu na Galilee wanawanan bar merar afa imaim sabuw i’obaibiyih naatu binan.

John Baptist dibur bar ma’am Jesu bowabow bigan nowar, basit ana bai’ufununayah orot afa iyunih hin Jesu hibatiy. “Ku’o anowar, John isa eo anonowaraban o iti ina, ai aki boro orot tabo isan anama anakaif?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwamatabir kwan abisa kwa’i’itin naatu kwanonowar i John ana tur kwana’owen.
11.5 Isa 35.5-6; 61.1Matah fim higewasin, ah kafikafirih higewasin hibat tereremor, sabuw biyah kokom ani’anih etei higewasin, tainih gugurih tur tenonowar, murumurubih hiyawas maiye timimisir, naatu Tur Gewasin i yababan sabuw isah tibibinan. Orot yait ayu asisinaf isan erekasiy auman ebitumatum, i boro men baigegewasin nab.”

John ana bai’ufununayah hinan ufut, Jesu sabuw ibatiyih, “Arar yan kwatit kwanan John abisa sisinaf itinamih kwanot kwan? Kotar wadar i’inuwas inu’in itinamih kwan? Ai abisa itinamih kwan? Orot eabur gewas batabat itinamih kwan? Baise sabuw hai abur gewasin i bar gewasihimaim tema’am. Kwa’o anowar, abisa itinamih kwan, dinab orot? Turobe, baise a tur ao’owen iti orot i dinab etei natabirih.
11.10 Mal 3.1; Luk 1.76Anayabin iti orot John isan i Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum.
book.q: ‘Ayu au kob abarayan boro wan o namaim aniyun nan,
i boro o a ef nayabuna.’
book.p:
“Anababatun a tur ao’owen John Baptist baibin hitatoub wanawanahimaim i orot gagamin ta hitoub hiyai. Baise orot yait mar ana aiwobomaim ebikek boro John nan natabir.
11.12-13 Luk 16.16John Baptist bibinan ana veya na iti boun titit, sabuw fairih i mar ana aiwob bain isan hai fairamaim hibiturafef. Anayabin Dinab oro’orot naatu ofafar bukamaim hikikirum i hima hio inan John natit.
11.14 Mal 4.5; Mat 17.10-13; Mak 9.11-13Imih iti tur inanowar bainamih inakokok na’at basit kubai, anayabin dinab orot Elijah matabir maiye namih hio kikirum, i John ana efan bai na titika. Imih o yait tain nama’am na’at tur inanowar.
“Itinin boro abisa’amaim iti boun ana sabuw isah anao kwanowar, sabuw iti boun hai itinin i kek gidigidih ahar efanamaim tema, hai ofonah bairi fafowamih tibi’afa’afa na’atube.
book.q: ‘Aki tabin ana ew atatabor,
baise kwa men kwabenaben,
naatu morob ana ew atatabor
baise kwa men kwarerey.’
book.p:
“John nan ana veya’amaim i yohar naatu harew fokarih men tom, naatu sabuw etei hio, iti orot i yoyom koun hiyen ema’am.
11.19 Mat 9.14Baise Orot Natun nan i bay eaa, harew fokarin tom, sabuw etei hio, ’Iti orot kwa’itin, anaa, anatom kakafin! Kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah bairi hiof tema’am.’ Baise God ana so’ob i turobe sinafumaim tit yabin emamatar.”
book.s: Bar Merar Afa Sabuw Men Tibitumatum
book.p:
Bar merar moumurih maiyow Jesu ina’inanen moumurih na’in sinaf, baise sabuw men hikokok boro hai kakafihine hisisinaf dogor baikitabir hitab, imih Jesu yan so’ar iuwih eo.
11.21-22 Isa 23; Ezk 26-28; Jol 3.4-8; Amo 1.9-10; Zec 9.2-4 “Kwa Chorazin sabuw bai’akir kakafin boro kwanab, naatu kwa Bethsaida sabuw bai’akir kakafin boro kwanab! Iti ina’inan kwa biyamaim asisinaf, Taiya sabuw naatu Sidon sabuw wanawanahimaim atasisinaf na’at, marasika boro ar faifuw kakafih hita’osen, yuh wah gao hitarab, hai kakafihine dogor baikitabir hitabaika. Baise a tur aowen, baibatebat ana veya’amaim Taiya sabuw naatu Sidon sabuw hai baikwatutunen i boro ana fofonin, baise kwa abai kwatutunen boro tafan hiya’abar kwanab.
11.23 Gen 19.24-28; Isa 14.13-15Naatu kwa Capernaum sabuw wab yen maramaim inu’in boro nare moroboyah hai efanamaim na’in. Ina’inan iti boun kwa biyamaim asisinaf marasika Sodom sabuw biyahimaim ata sisinaf na’at, iti boun ana veya i boro tama.
11.24 Mat 10.15; Luk 10.12Baise a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana veya, Sodom sabuw hai baikwatutunen i boro ana fofonin, baise kwa a baikwatutunen boro tafan hiya’abar kwanab.”

11.25 1Cor 1.26-29Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu yoyoban eo, “Tamai mar tafaram ana Regah a merar ayiyi, anayabin not gewasih sabuw so’oso’obayah hai notamaim ibun wa’ir ma’am natunat bereberefiy biyahimaim iwa’an ebirerereb. Turobe Tamai, abisa kokokomaim isinaf temamatar imih gewasin.

11.27 Mat 28.18; Jn 1.18; 3.35; 10.15; 17.2 “Sawar etei’imak i ayu Tamai itu. Men yait ta so’ob ayu i God Natun, naatu men yait ta so’ob God i ayu Tamai, imih sabuw iyab ayu arurubinih boro ani’obaiyih i auman hiso’ob God i ayu Tamai.

11.28 Jer 31.25 “Kwa iyabowat bit kwa’abar tun rarabi, kwana ayu biyau, ayu boro efan anit kwaniyarir. Ayu au bai’obaiyen hamehamen kwanab kwani’ufunun, anayabin ayu i taiyuwu ayara’iyu anutanub, imih kwanan ayu biyu’umaim boro biya tuniwa’an.
11.30 1Jn 5.3Anayabin ayu au bai’obaiyen i kiririn imih an bi’obaiyi i boro hamehamen.”

12.1 Deu 23.25Veya bai’ab na’atube sawar ufunamaim, Jesu Baiyarir Ana Veya sanabey wanawanah remor inan ana bai’ufununayah a himorob, basit sanabey afa hirut hikeb ro’oro’oh hibow hi’aa.
12.2 Exo 20.10Naatu ofafar bai’obaibiyenayah hi’itih basit Jesu hi’u, “A bai’ufununayah ku’itih, abis tisisinaf i ata ofafar te’a’a’stu’utu’ub, anayabin boun i Baiyarir ana veya.

12.3-4 Lev 24.5-9; 1Sa 21.1-6Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana sabuw bairi aa himomorob ana maramaim, David God ana bar wanawanan run, rafiy God isan hisibor hi’inu’in, bow ana sabuw bairi hi’aa, Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin? Nati i ofafar hi’astu’ub, anayabin nati sibor i hi’ofafar firis akisihimo hinabow hina, men David ana sabuw o men yait ta’aamih.
12.5 Num 28.9-10Naatu Moses ana ofafar ta kwaiyab kwa’itin? Baiyarir ana veya firis terun Tafaror Bar teyayabuna men ofafar te’a’astu’ub? En.
12.6 Mat 12.41-42Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, sawar gagamin anababatun i na tit, men iti Tafaror Bar na’atube’emih.
12.7 Hos 6.6; Mat 9.13Buk Atamaninamaim i iti na’atube eo, ‘Kabeber i akokok men sibor.’ Kwa iti sawar yabin anababatun kwatasoso’ob na’at sabuw gewasih boro men kwatakusairih. Anayabin Orot Natun i Baiyarir Tamah anababatun.”

Jesu nati efan itumar na hai Kou’ay Bar ta wananwanan run,
12.10 Luk 14.3orot ta uman murubin ma’ama’amaim, naatu sabuw afa nati’imaim hima’am i ef hinunuwet Jesu gamin uwin isan, imih Jesu hibatiy hio, “It ata ofafaramaim Baiyarir ana veya orot babin boro taniyawas ai en?”
12.11-12 Luk 14.5Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo o orot ta a sheep Baiyarir ana veya hub tare’er, boro itatain tayen o itihamiy ta’in tamorob? Orot ana yawas i ra’at kwanekwan men for na’atube’emih. Isan imih Baiyarir ana veya orot babin tanabibais i men tasisinaf kakaf ofafar ta’a’astu’ubimih.”

Imaibo orot uman murubin isan eo, “Uma ku’otofair a’itin.” Naatu orot uman otofair naatu uman igewasin uman rounane na’atube matar.
12.14 Jn 5.16Basit Pharisee Jesu hihamiy hitit ufun, rabin morob isan hiyakitifuw.

Jesu rabinamih hiyayanuw tur nowar naatu efan nati ihamiy sa’ab in, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hi’itin hi’ufunun bairi hinan, iyabowat hisawow hinan etei iyawasih.
12.16 Mat 8.4; Mak 3.12Naatu eo fafarih eo, “Sabuw afa hai tur men kwana’owenamih. Iti i abisa dinab orot Isaiah ana bukamaim kikirum na iturobe.
book.q: 12.18-21 Isa 42.1-412.18 Mat 3.17 ‘Iti orot i ayu isau bowamih arubin,
ayu au yabow orot, i isan ayu abiyasisir,
Ayu Anunu boro anitin,
naatu i boro ma gewas isan sabuw tutufin etei isah naorerereb.
I boro men nagam naatu boro men fanan aumetawat niwow;
Fanan boro men ef gagamin yanamaim hinanowar.
Sawasaw ririmih hikimow tere’er boro men na’abar faifiyen,
na’atube ana marakaw kikimin etoto’ab boro men nihamiy, baise boro nihamiy nato’ab nanan ma gewas ana fair nara’at.
Naatu sabuw etei hai not hai baitumatum i biyanamaim hinayai.’”
book.p: Imaibo sabuw afa orot ta matan fim naatu demon awan gugin toun bububur ma’am hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit iyawas naatu misir tur eo naatu matan igewasin nuw. Sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in Jesu abisa iwa’an hi’i’itin hai hikasiy ra’at hio, “Iti orotom David uwan ta?”
12.24 Mat 9.34; 10.25Baise Pharisees hinonowar hio, “Iti orot demon enununih, anayabin demon hai ukwarin wabin Beelzebul fair itin, nati esisinaf.”

Jesu abisa hinotanot so’ob, naatu uwih eo, “Tafaram ta’imon hinakusib rou’ab namatar hinabiyow boro men manin hiniyowamih, naatu bar meraramaim o ain uf rara’amaim hinakusib hinabiyow hai ma boro hini’afiy. Imih Demon Ana Aiwob wanawananamaim hinakusib taiyuwih hinabiyow, i ana aiwob wanawanan ana fair boro naririm. Naatu kwa i ayu Beelzebul fair baitu demon nunih kwarouw kwa’o. Bo kwa a bai’ufununayah i yait ana fairamaim demon tenununih? Isan imih kwa taiyuw abai’ufununayah hai sinafumaim ebi’obaiyi God ana baibatiyen i wan kwamara’at.
12.28 Act 10.38; 1Jn 3.8Baise ayu i God Anunin Kakafiyin ana fairamaim demon anununih, imih nati ebi’obaiyit mar ana aiwob i na tit kwa wanawananamaim.
“Orot fairin ana bar boro men asir hinarun ana sawar hinabainomih, baise wantoro’ot orot hinab hinafatum nabat, imaibo ana sawar hinabainuw.

12.30 Mak 9.40; Luk 9.50 “Orot yait ayu airi men abita’imon i ayu au wosai, naatu orot yait men ayu ibaisu airi bobaituw abigenamih, nati orot i wasgeyayan.
12.31 Hib 6.4-6Ana’an nati isan imih a tur ao’owen, bowabow kakafih ta ta naatu bai’ib tur ta ta God boro nanotawiyen, baise orot yait Anun Kakafiyin ni’ib isan tur kakafin na’o, i ana bowabow kakafih boro men nanotawiyimih. Naatu orot yait Orot Natun isan tur kakafin na’o nabigigim boro ana bowabow kakafin nanotawiyen, baise orot yait God Anun Kakafiyin isan na’o nabi’iyab, i boro tafaramamaim men nanotawiy na’atube maramaim.

12.33 Mat 7.16-20 “A ai inakaif gewas boro ro’on gewasin inab, a ai men inakaif gewas ro’on boro kakafin inab, anayabin ai i boro ro’onamaim ina’inan.
12.34 Mat 3.7; 15.18; Luk 3.7; 6.45Kwa i tuwamorob foufuh, dogor wanawanan kakafin ema’am boro mi’itube tur gewasih kwana’o. Anayabin abisa dogor wanawanan ema’am i awamaim etitit. Orot gewasin ana bar wanawanan sawar gewasih ya ti’inu’in boro nabow naya taiten, naatu orot kakafin ana bar wanawanan sawar kakafih ya ti’inu’in boro naya taiten. Imih a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana maramaim sabuw etei awahimaim tur abisa hi’o boro God ana tur hina’owen aisim nati tur hi’o. Naatu o taiyuw a tur io’omaim God boro nibatiyi, naatu o taiyuw a turamaim boro naorereb o i gewas o kakaf.”
12.38 Mat 16.1; Luk 11.16; Jn 6.30Imaibo Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa himisir hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki akokok ina’inan ta iniwa’an ana’itin.”

12.39 Mat 16.4; Mak 8.12Baise Jesu iyafut eo, “Kwa iti mar boun nan ana sabuw a fanasair ra’at, ina’inan itinamih kwa’o. Baise ina’inan boro men ta kwana’itinamih, ina’inan ta’imon nati dinab orot Jonah biyanamaim kwa’itinika.
12.40 Jon 1.17Jonah siy gagamin tonan yan wanawanan in fai tounu auyit tounu na’atube, Orot Natun boro fai tounu auyit tounu me wanawanan na’in.
12.41 Jon 3.5Jonah binan Nineveh sabuw hinonowar ufunamaim hai bowabow kakafih hisisinaf etei hihamiyen, imih baibatebat ana veya boro hinamisir kwa kwabiwa’an kakaf isan boro hina’uwi, anayabin binan iti boun abit i men marasika Jonah bibinan na’atube’emih!
12.42 1Ki 10.1-10Na’atube tafaram Sheba hai aiwob babin Solomon ana binan gewasin nowaramih ana tafaram ef yok na’in ihamiy na tur nowar, imih baibatebat ana veya boro namisir, kwabiwa’an kakaf isan na’uwi, anayabin Solomon bibinan i men boun ayu abibinan na’atube’emih!

“Demon kakafin orot biyanamaim ema’am tenun etit i boro watu owararinamaim ma baiyarir isan ana efan nanuwet, naatu efan men natitita’ur na’at, i boro na’o, ‘Ayu boro anamatabir maiye au ubar anan.’ Naatu namatabir nan ana bar natitit, ana bar wanawanan i owararin naatu hirereb hiyabuna inu’in boro na’itin.
12.45 2Pit 2.20Imaibo boro namatabir maiye demon kakafih anababatun etei seven nanawiyih bairi hinan nati bar hinasusuw hinama. Naatu nati orot i boro na’af narauwabon men marasika ma’am na’atube’emih. Imih iti sabuw boun hima kakafih tesisinaf boro isah na’atube namatar.”

Jesu eo, sabuw hima hinonowar ana tur baisawarina’e, hinah taitin hina hitit ufun hibat hi’o, “Aki akokok Jesu bairi ana’o.” Basit orot ta run Jesu iu, “Hinat taiti hina ufun tebatabat, tekokok bairi kwana’o.” 12.47 hanef 47 buk afa men ema’am

Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu hinai naatu taitu anababatun ana’o inanowar.” Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah isah uman fufunih eo, “Ayu hinai naatu taitu i iti tema’am ku’itih.
12.50 Rom 8.29Orot yait ayu Tamai maramaim eo na’atube fanan bai esisinaf i ayu taiu, ayu rubu naatu ayu hinai.”

Nati veya ta’imon Jesu bar itumar tit na harew kukuf sisibinamaim sabuw bai’obaiyih isan mara’iy.
13.2 Luk 5.1-3Naatu sabuw moumurih maiyow hiru’ay hi’ar bebera’uh itih, basit wa bai inatait tafan mare, sabuw baise dones yan himarir hima. Imaibo ma sawar moumurih na’in oroubonamaim eo hima hinowar. Naatu ana oroubon ta i iti na’atube eo, “Ana veya ta orot masaw bowayan ana ub tanumamih tit in. Ana ub afa tata’asiyen i ef yanamaim hire, naatu mamu hire hibow hi’aa, Ana ub afa i to’ato yan hire’ere ana kamar men gagamin imih saisewat hikubounih hiyen. Anayabin kamar baban i fokarin. Baise veya yey ana mar wabuburinamaim ub etei hi’arat, naatu hikimow hire anayabin wairoroh men babanika hire. Ub afa kokor wanawanan hire, naatu kokor ana fafa’amaim isuken. Naatu ub afa i me gewasin yan hire hikuboubunih hiyen gewas ro’oro’oh hiya, afa hibiw 100 na’atube, afa i 60 na’atube, afa i 30 na’atube. Imih o yait tain nama’am tur inanowar.”
Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina hibatiy hi’o, “Aisim oroubonamaim sabuw kubi’obaiyih?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orereb ana so’ob wa’iwa’irin mar ana aiwob isan i God kwa it, men iti sabuw itihimih.
13.12 Mat 25.29; Mak 4.25; Luk 8.18; 19.26Imih orot yait orereb ana so’ob biyan ema’am, God boro tafan naya’abar nitin ana so’ob nara’at, baise orot yait nati so’ob men biyan ema’am naatu ana so’ob kikimin nati biyanamaim ema’am God boro nabosair. Ana’an nati ayu oroubonamaim sabuw abi’obaiyih.
book.q: Sabuw matah ema’am baise boro men hina’itin,
Tainih ema’am baise boro men hinanowar naniyan hinab.
book.p: 13.14-15 Isa 6.9-10; Jn 12.40; Act 28.26-27Dinab orot Isaiah ana Bukamaim eo kikirum i na ibiturobe.
book.q: ‘Iti sabuw tur hinanowar, baise boro men naniyan hinabaimih
matah ema’am baise boro men hina’itinimih.
Anayabin ukwarih fokar,
tainih higibud,
matah hibofafaren.
Sawar iti men hitasinaf,
karam tur boro hitanowar,
abis emamatar hita’itin hai not takusib,
tur naniyan hitab, kakafih hitihamiyen,
hita’intabir ayu atiyawasih.’
book.p: 13.16-17 Luk 10.23-24Baise Kwa i kwabiyasisir, anayabin matayan kwa’i’itin naatu tain yan tur kwanonowar. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab orot moumurih na’in naatu sabuw gewasih hikok kwanekwan, kwa abisa kwa’i’itin i hita’itin naatu abisa kwanonowar i hitanowar. Baise nati ana maramaim sawar men matar boro hita’itin.”

“Tain kwanarub ub tanumayan ana oroubon ao kwananowar naniyan kwanab, yabin kwanaso’ob. Sabuw iyab mar ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin ao tenonowar naatu naniyan men tabaib i ub ef yanamaim orot ta’asiy re’er na’atube, Tur Gewasin tenonowar ana maramaim demon kakafin ena hai not ebikwaris. Naatu orot ana ub afa to yan hire’ere ana itinin i sabuw iyab tur tenonowar ana maramaim i tibiyasisir. Baise dogoroh wanawanan nati ub wairoron i men re eof barur, imih Tur Gewasin isan hina’uwih hinarurukaukuwih boro mar ta’imonamo hai baitumatum hinihamiy.
13.22 Luk 12.16-21; 1Tim 6.9-10, 17Naatu orot ana ub afa fotan wanawanan hire’er ana itinin i sabuw iyab tur tenonowar, baise iti tafaram ana yasisir isan tibiyababan naatu totobuyoy hai not ebikwaris imih tur ana ro’on men emamatar. Baise orot ana ub me gewasin yan ta’asiy hire’ere ana itinin i sabuw iyab Tur Gewasin tenowar naatu naniyan tabai tiw tehahamu, afa ro’oh 100, afa 60, afa 30.”

Jesu oroubon tabo iti na’atube eo, “Mar ana aiwob i iti na’atube, ana veya ta orot ana ub bow in ana masawamaim tanum. Baise gugumin sabuw etei hi’inu’in ufut, orot ana rakit mowan fotan kakafih bow na sanabey wanawanah tanum naatu bihir. Sanabey hikuboubunih hiyey wanawanahimaim fotan kakafih auman hikubounih bairi hiyen.
“Orot ana bowayah hina hio, ‘Regah, o ub gewasih a masawamaim itanum, baise aisim fotan kakafih auman hikuboubunih teyey?’
“Orot iyafutih eo, ‘Rakit sabuw afa hisinaf.’ Naatu akir wairafih hibatiy hio, ‘Bo kukokok anan fotan ana uyarir?’

“Orot iyafutih eo, ‘En. Fotan kakafih kwana’u’uyarir boro sanabey afa auman kwana’uyarir. Imih kwaihamiyih bairi hinayen hiniw naatu tarin ana veya boro tarayah aniyafarih hinan, fotan wan hinatar hinafatum hinabow hinan hina’afusar, imaibo sanabey hinatar hinabow hinan bar hinaya.’”

Jesu ana oroubon tabo eo, “Mar ana aiwob ana itinin ta i iti na’atube, orot ana ai momor ro’on kikimin maiyow bai in ana masaw yan tanum. Iti ai ro’on i men ai ro’on afa gagamih na’atube’emih, baise tanum kuboun yey ana veya’amaim ra’at ai gagamin na’in matar naatu mamu hina famefamenamaim hibatar hima.”
Jesu iban oroubon tabo eo maiye, “Mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube. Babin yeast ebai ana faraw wanawanan eyai ekamat inu’in era’at eyey na’atube.”

Jesu sawar iti etei isah i oroubonamaim eo sabuw rou’ay gagamin bi’obaiyih; ana bai’obaiyenamaim i mar etei oroubonamaim sabuw bi’obaiyih.
13.35 Psa 78.2Iti na’atube sisinaf anayabin abisa dinab orot eo kikirum tan titurobe isan.
book.q: “Ayu i boro oroubonamaim anao sabuw hinowar,
naatu tafaram mamatar ana buriburin men hisoso’ob etei anao hinanowar.”
book.s: Jesu Fotan Kakafin Isan Kubuna Hinowar
book.p: Jesu sabuw rou’ay ihamiyih naatu na bar wanawanan run, ana bai’ufununayah ufun hina hirun hibatiy hio, “Masaw yan fotan kakafin ana oroubon i kukubuna anowar.”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot ub gewasih tatanum i Orot Natun. Masaw ana itinin i tafaram, naatu ub gewasin i sabuw iyab mar ana aiwob isan tebowabow, naatu ub kakafin i Demon Kakafin natunatun. Naatu rakit orot ub kakafin bai na masaw yan tatanum i Demon Mowan. Naatu masaw biyamur i mar yomanin na’atube, masaw fourayah i God ana tounamatar.

13.40 Jn 15.6 “Imih mar yomanin iti ub kakafih hi’uyarir hifatum hibow hin hi’a’afusar na’atube boro namatar.
13.41 Mat 24.31; 25.31; Mak 13.27Orot Natun boro ana tounamatar niyafarih hinatit, sinaf kakafih naatu sabuw iyab bowabow kakafin kura’ahih hima kakafih tisisinaf etei i ana aiwob wanawananamaim boro fotan kakafin na’atube hinatar hinafatum.
13.42 Mat 8.12Naatu hinabow hinan wairaf wan hinaya hina’afusar, nati’imaim boro na’arahih wah takitak niwa’an hina’in hinarerey.
13.43 Dan 12.3Imaibo God ana sabuw gewasih nabow mar ana aiwobomaim hinarun veya na’atube hinararan. Imih o yait tain nama’am iti tur inanowar.

“Mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube, orot ta nugunug hibun inu’in itin bai, naatu me nati nugunug titita’urimaim kair maiye ibun, naatu yasisir auman in ana sawar etei sabuw hitobon naatu matabir maiye na nati me tutubun na’atube.

“Naatu mar ana aiwob itinin tabo iti na’atube. Orot sawar tobonayan wakek enunuwet na’atube. Wakek nuwet inan wakek ta gewasin ana baiyan gagamin na’in tita’ur, naatu na ana sawar etei yataiten hitobon kabay bai in nati wakek tutubun na’atube.

“Iban maiye mar ana aiwob i buwat na’atube. Orot siy bowayan ana buwat eya ema’am siy i yumatah ta ta te’ona’on. Naatu buwat awan ekakaratan ana veya etab erun dones yan ema siy gewasih ikiyarir fetan iwan, naatu kakafih ikiyarir ebow ebis rouruwen na’atube. Imih mar yomanin nanan itinin i boro nati na’atube. God boro ana tounamatar niyafarih hinatit hinan sabuw gewasih wanawanahimaim sabuw kakafih hinabow
13.50 Mat 13.42; Luk 13.28wairaf wan hiyara’aten na’arahih hina’in hina rerey wah takitak niwa’an.”

Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Oroubon iti ao’oban naniyah kwabow?” Ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hio, “Naniyah abow.” Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Isan imih, ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot yait mar ana aiwob isan bai’obaiyen hibitin i bar matuwan matar, imih nati bar wanawanan ana sawar boubuh naatu atamanih etei boro nayataiten.”
book.s: Dinab Orot Taiyuwin Ana Sabuw Hikwahir
book.p:
Jesu iti oroubon eo hinonowar ufunamaim nati efan itumar,
13.54 Jn 7.15naatu remor na i ana bar meraramaim tit Kou’ay Bar ta wanawanan run, busuruf sabuw i’obaibiyih. Naatu sabuw hima hinonowar hifofor hio, “Iti orot ana ukwar rerekab naatu ina’inanen sinaf isan ana fair i menamaim bow?
13.55 Jn 6.42Iti orot tamah i bar wowabayan naatu hinah i Mary naatu James, Joseph, Simon, Judas i taitin. Naatu taitin baibitar auman bairit iti tama’am, imih iti sawar etei i menamaim bow?”
13.57 Jn 4.44Iti na’atube hio hina’ufut hin. Jesu iuwih eo, “Dinab orot tafaram afa’amaim i tekakafiy, baise i ana bar meraramaim naatu i tain tuwan i men tekakafiy.”
Naatu nati’imaim men ina’inan moumurih sinafumih, anayabin nati sabuw aurih baitumatum en.

Nati ana veya’amaim Herod tafaram Galilee ana kaifayan orot Jesu bowabow ana tur nowar. Naatu ana orot ukwarih hai tur eowen eo, “Ni’i orot i John Baptist, morobone yawas maiye, imih fair bai nati ina’inan isisinaf.”

14.3-4 Lev 18.16; 20.21; Luk 3.19-20Herod i John Baptist bai fatum in dibur yari’iy aawan Herodias baiyasisirin isan. John tur fokarin maiyow Herod Herodias i tain Philip aawan bai bi’aawan isan gam iu, “O i ofafar iastu’ub tai aawan ibai i’awan.” Tur fokarin iti eo isan Herod yan bai dibur yari’iy.
14.5 Mat 21.26Herod kok i John ta’asabun, baise Jew sabuw isah bir, anayabin John hi’i’itin i dinab orot ta na’atube.

Naatu Herod ana tufuw isan hibiyasisir ana veya’amaim, Herodias natun babitai run sabuw rou’ay gagamin nahimaim benaben, Herod itin iyasisir gagamin maiyow. Naatu taiyuwin isan eo baifaro babitai eomatan eo, “Abisa kukokok boro anit?” Naatu babitai hinah ana turamaim na eo, “Ayu akokok boun John Baptist ukwarin tew yan iniwan inab inan initu.” Aiwob orot iti tur nonowar i uwan yi, baise sabuw rou’ay gagamin matahimaim eomatan, imih ana baiyowayah orot iuwih babitai ana kokok hisinaf. John dibur bar wanawananamaim ma’am hin sikan hi’afuw, ukwarin tew yan hiwan hibai hina babitai hitin, bai in hinah itin (so’ob John i morob). John ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hibai hin hiyai, imaibo hin Jesu ana tur hiowen.

Jesu John ana tur nonowar ufunamaim, wa bai akisinamo efan nautanubinamaim in. Baise sabuw menamaim inan i ana tur hinowar, ababawat bar merar ta ta hirun hitit hi’ufunun hin. Jesu wa biyut ana veya nuwanuw sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow i’itih iyababan, naatu hai sabuw sawusawuwih hibow hinan etei iyayawasih. Veya re birabirab auman Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hin hiu, “Veya i re sawar. Igewasin sabuw iniyafarih hinan bar merar yubinamaim bay hinatobon hinaa hinayawas.” (Anayabin iti efan i arar yan sabuw en).”
Jesu iyafutih eo, “Men karam asir ana’uwih hinan. Gewasin, kwa a efanamaim bay kwana’itin kwanitih hina hinayawas.”
Baise hiya’afut hio, “Aki ai efanamaim rafiy fafar etei umat roun naatu siy rou’ab na’atumo ti’inu’in, men karam boro iti sabuw rou’ay gagamin anituwih.”

Jesu eo, “Kwabow kwana kwaitu.”
14.19 Mat 15.35-39; Mak 8.6-10Naatu sabuw iuwih fotan yan himare, imaibo Jesu rafiy fafar umat roun, siy rou’ab auman bow au mar nuw ra’at, God ana merar yi sawar, basit rafiy imseseb ana bai’ufununayah itih, naatu ana bai’ufununayah hibow sabuw hifaramih hi’aa. Sabuw etei hi’aa yah iw, naatu ana bai’ufununayah bay rebareb hi’aa hi’inu’in hibow hibiwan sakasak etei 12 hiwan foten. Orot iti bay hi’aa hibiyab etei 5,000 kek babin men auman hiyabamih.

Jesu matan kabiy ana bai’ufununayah iuwih wa hibai wan hirabon hin harew kukuf rewan rounane na’at. Naatu Jesu ma sabuw iyafarih hai au bar hin.
14.23 Luk 6.12; 9.28Sabuw iyafarih hinan ufut akisinamo yen in oyawamaim yoyoban isan. Naatu nati’imaim, akisinamo ma’am mar bu’u’um. Iti ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah i hire hin hikukuyowen ana veya yabat misir wa rab naatu kotar nahine na kufutih.

Mar sibisib auman Jesu riy tafanamaim bat ana bai’ufununayah isah remor na.
14.26 Luk 24.37Riy tafan bat remor nan ana bai’ufununayah hi’i’itin ana maramaim, hai bir ra’at hio, “Iti i wagabur mowan.” Hikirir hirerey.
Baise Jesu mar ta’imon eaf eo, “Men kwanabir, ayu anan.”
Naatu Peter iya’afut eo, “Anababatun o na’at, basit ku’uwu riy tafan abat ana biya atit.”

Jesu eo, “Kuna.” Peter wa afe’en isure riy tafan bat in Jesu biyan tit. Baise kotar gagamin bababin naniyan bai, ana bir ra’at, basit busuruf unun re, re’ere auman Regah isan ererey eaf eo, “Regah kwiyawasu.”

14.31 Mat 8.26; Mak 4.39Jesu mar ta’imon eof nunuw uman bai iu eo, “A baitumatum men nikikimin, aisim kukakasiy.” Jesus reaching out to Petercn01722B.tifMat 14.31©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu eofere Peter uman ebaib14.31
Naatu hairi wa tafan hiyey ana veya kotar bababin nutanub. Imaibo bai’ufununayah wa tafan hima’am Jesu hibora’ah hio, “O i anababatun God Natun!”

Hirabon hina rewan rounane hitit naatu hin Genesaret, imaim hai wa hitain yen. Naatu nati’imaim sabuw Jesu hi’i’inan ana veya, tur hiyafar nati tafaram wanawanan bar merar gidigidihimaim, sabuw sawusawuwih etei hibow hina Jesu biyan hitit.
14.36 Mat 9.20-21Naatu ana faifuw taininawat butubunin isan hifefeyan, naatu sabuw iyab ana faifuwawat hibubutubun i etei hiyawas.

Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa Jerusalemane hina Jesu hibatiy hio, “Aisim o a bai’ufununayah, bai’obaiyen ata a agir hibitit men tebobosiyasiyar, naatu umah sauwena’e ere kato auman bay te’au?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo kwa aisim God ana obaiyunen tur kwa’astu’ub uwatanah hai binanakwar kwabi’ufunun?
15.4 Exo 20.12; 21.17; Deu 5.16Anayabin God eo, ‘Hinat tamat kwanakakafiyih’ naatu ‘yait hinah tamah isan tur kakafin na’u’uwih i boro hina’asabun namorob.’ Baise kwa a bai’obaiyenamaim, orot ta boro hinat tamat isah iti na’atube inao, ‘Sawar iti o atabibaisi i God ana siwaramih ayai, imih boro men karam anibaisi.’ Sinaf iti na’atube’eban hinat tamat kwakakafiyih? En! Baise, kwa asinaf iti’imaim God ana obaiyunen tur kwayara’iy kwa taiyuw abai’obaiyen kwabi’ufunun. Wanawan rerekabih! Isaiah i tur anababatunamaim kwa isa eo kirum,
book.q: 15.8-9 Isa 29.13‘Iti sabuw ufurihiwat ayu tirursagiyu, baise hai notamaim i ef yok na’in tema’am.
Hai kwafiren ayu isou i wanawanan nikuwat; men basit orot hai notamaim ofafar hikikirum sabuw kwati’obaiyih hiti’ufunun.’”
book.s: Sawar Abisa I Orot Babin Ebi’afiy
book.p:
Imaibo Jesu rou’ay eaf ayuwih iuwih eo, “Abisa ao kwananutanub kwananowar naatu kwanasinaftobon yabin kwanab.
15.11 Mat 12.34Abisa orot awanamaim erur i men biyan ebobokarit, baise abisa orot awanamaim etitit i biyan ebobokarit.”
Imaibo bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibatiy, “Pharisee abisa i’o isan hai naniyan ibi’afiy iso’ob?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ai menatan ayu Tamai maramaim men tatanum i boro an wairoron etei na’uy ra’ah.
15.14 Luk 6.39; Rom 2.19Nati Pharisee biyahimaim kwanahaiw, anayabin i matah fim na’atube sabuw afa matah fim tibi’unawiyih, naatu boro etei hinan hub hinare.”
Peter eo, “Oroubon anayabin kuo anowar.”

Naatu Jesu uwih eo, “Kwa auman boro’ika tur hai yabih men kwaso’obamih? Abistan awatamaim erur i en kabutitamaim etit naatu en uratane ere’er i kwaso’ob ai en? Baise abisa awatamaim etitit i dogor wanawananane etitit, naatu i boun orot biyan ebobokarit. Anayabin abisa orot dogoromaim etitit i not kakafin, sabuw rauw morob, turanah a’aawah ufuh na, baiwa’an kwanekwan, bain, baifufuwen, naatu yanuw koutabitabir. Iti sawar i boun orot babin ebi’afiy, baise uma sauwena’e ere kato bay ina’aa boro men ni’afiyimih.”

Jesu nati efan ihamiy naatu in tafaram Taiya Sidon hairi wanawanahimaim bar merar afa imaim tit. Canaan babin nati’imaim ma’ama na Jesu isan rerey eo, “Regah, David uwan, kukabibiru; ayu natu babitai i demon kakafih wanawanan hirun hiforatoun hibonawiy bai’akir kakafin maiyow ebaib.”
Baise Jesu men babin isan tur ta eo. Imih ana bai’ufununayah hina hifefeyan hio, “Babin ku’u sa’ab en, rerey ufut enan.”
15.24 Mat 10.6Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Orot Natun nan i Israel sabuw sheep na’atube hikasiy hima’am akisih isah na.”
Baise babin na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Regah Jesu kwibaisu.”
Jesu eo, “Kek hai bay men karam boro tanarouw nare haru hina’aan.”
Babin iya’afut eo, “Turobe Regah, baise bay momosarih tamah ana gemane tere’ere haru tebow te’aa.”
Imaibo Jesu eo, “Babin o a baitumatum i ra’at kwanekwan, imih abisa kukokok i namatar.” Naatu nati ana maramaim natun babitai yawas.

Jesu efan nati ihamiy naatu Galilee harew kukuf rewarewan remor in, imaibo oyaw ta sisibinamaim yen in tafan mare. Sabuw moumurih maiyow hai sabuw ah kafikafirih, matah fim, ah umah murumurubih, awah gugih naatu sawusawuwih afa moumurih maiyow auman hibow hina Jesu nanamaim hiya, naatu etei’imak iyawasih. blind and lame come to JesusCN01785b.TIFMat 15.30©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Sabuw matah fim ah umah murubih hina Jesu biyan titit15.30
15.31 Mak 7.37Awah gugih tur hio, ah umah murubih higewasin, ah kafikafirih hibat hiremor, naatu matah fim higewasin hinuw sawar hi’itah isan, sabuw hifofofor men kafaita. Naatu Israel hai God wabin hibora’ara’ah.

15.32 Mat 14.14Jesu ana bai’ufununayah eaf hina biyan hitit naatu iuwih eo, “Ayu sabuw aitih abiyababan anayabin hina bairi ama’ama veya tounu sawar naatu boun hai efanamaim men abisa ta ema’am boro hina’aan. Ayu men akokok a murumurubih aniyafarih hai ubar hinan. Hinanan boro efamaim bayumih hinigagamat.”disciples distributing breadCN01718B.TIFspanMat 15.32-38©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu masaw yanamaim eyoyoyoban15.32-38
Naatu ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hio, “Iti arar yan bay boro menamaim tanab nakaram iti rakit gagamin tana’afuwagiy?”
Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa rafiy bai’ab kwabobotanen?” Hiya’afut hio,
“Rafiy fafar etei seven, naatu siy gidigidih kwafur ta.”

Basit Jesu sabuw iuwih me yan himarir. Jesu rafiy fafar seven naatu siy auman bow God ana a merar yiy, naatu imseseb ana bai’ufununayah itih hibow sabuw hifaramih. Hi’aa etei yah iw, naatu bai’ufununayah bay sabuw hi’aa rebarebah hibiwanen sakasak etei seven hiwanfoten. Sabuw etei 4000 na’atube bay hi’aa, kek baibin men auman hiyabamih. Imaibo Jesu sabuw iyafarih hinan ufunamaim, wa bai rabon na tafaram wabin Magadan imaim tit.
book.s: Sabuw Ukwa’ukwarih Jesu Hifefeyan Ina’inan Isan
book.p: 16.1 Mat 12.38; Luk 11.16Pharisee naatu Sadducees afa hikok i Jesu hitikubibiruw, imih hina hio, “Aki akokok ina’inan ta marane ini’obaiyi saise anaso’ob o i anababatun God ana fair ibai.”

Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “Rabirab mar ebiwuwun kwa’i’itin, boro kwanao, maras boro veya gewasin nayen. Naatu mar auman gagub niwuwun naatu turin nafufurum kwana’itin boro kwanao, boun boro nayar. Kwa i gagub akisin ana itinin kwaso’ob boro kwanao, baise abisa iti boun temamatar hai yabih men karam boro kwanaso’ob. 16.3 hanef 2, 3 hairi tur afa’amaim Jesu ana tur iti i men tema’am.
16.4 Mat 12.39; Luk 11.29Mar iti boun ana sabuw hai fanasair naatu hai tafa’asar i ra’at, ina’inan isah tinunuwet. En! Baise ina’inan ta’imon ebi’obaiyi i Jonah ana i’inan.” Basit Jesu sabuw nati’imaim ihamiyih hima i sa’ab in.
book.s: Pharisee Naatu Sadducees Hai Yeast Ana Bai’obaiyen
book.p:
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah harew kukuf hirabon hina rewan rounane hiyey ana maramaim, nuhih taseb hio, “It rafiy men ta tabai auman tarabonamih.”
16.6 Luk 12.1Jesu iten ya’ih eo, “Mata to niwa’an kwanakaifi gewas, Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai yeast isan.”
Naatu bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hibabatiy hio, “It rafiy baina’e tanan isan ma eo?”
