Jesu abisa isan hio i naniyan bai, imih ibatiyih, “Aisim rafiy ta baina’e tanan isan taiyuw kwakasiy kwama kwabibabatiyi? Kwa a baitumatum i kikimin anababatun.
16.9 Mat 14.17-21A not boro’ika kwarisin ema’am. Sabuw etei 5, 000 rafiy fafar faive’imo imaim abituwih isan nuhi bur? naatu kwaso’ob sakasak etei bai’ab kwaiwanfoten?
16.10 Mat 15.34-38Na’atube rafiy sevenimo sabuw 4, 000 abituwih sakasak etei bai’ab kwaiwanfoten? Aisim a not boro’ika hikwaris ayu rafiy isan ao kwararouw, en baise Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai yeast isan kwanakaifi gewasomih ao.” Imaibo bai’ufununayah naniyan hibai, Jesu i men yeast maiyow rafiy wanawanan teyai’iyai isan matah toniwa’anamih, baise Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai bai’obaiyen isan matah toniwa’an.
Jesu na Caesarea Philipi wanawananamaim titit ana veya, ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Sabuw Orot Natun isan mi’itube teo kwanonowar?”
16.14 Mat 14.1-2; Mak 6.14-15; Luk 9.7-8Hiya’afut hio, “Sabuw afa i teo John Baptist, afa Elijah, afa i Jeremiah, naatu afa teo i dinab orot ta.”
Ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih eo, “Bo kwa ayu isau i mi’itube kwa’o?”
16.16 Jn 6.69Simon Peter iya’afut eo, “O i God Tafa eof nowah 16.16 Roubinen teten 20 tur ta’imon inu’in God ma’ama wanatowanin Natun.”

16.17 Gal 1.15-16Jesu iya’afut eo, “Simon, Jonah natun abigegewasini. Anayabin nati tur anababatun i men orot ta biyanane na irererebamih, baise marane Tamai mutufor o it.
16.18 Jn 1.42; Eph 2.20Imih a tur ao’owen o i Peter. 16.18 Peter anayabin kabay, Iti kabay tafanamaim ayu boro au ekaleisia anawowab. Naatu morob ana fair boro men kafa’imo natafufur nare’emih.
16.19 Mat 18.18; Jn 20.23Ayu boro mar ana tufatan anit; abisa iti tafaramamaim kututufatan, maramaim boro ana tufatan. Naatu abisa iti tafaramamaim kururufam, maramaim boro ana rufam.” Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah awah bofot eo, “Ayu i Tafau hi’of nowah 16.20 Raubininenayan imih men yait ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”

Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu busuruf ana bai’ufununayah isah tur mutufor iuwih eo, “Ayu i anan Jerusalem ana tit biyababan gagamin maiyow boro anab, orot ai’in 16.21 ukwarih biyahine, Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah biyahine, hina’asabunu ana morob. Baise veya tounu ufunamaim morobone boro anamisir maiye.”
Peter bai hin nabinamaim eo, “Regah, iti na’atube men akokok isa namatar”.
Jesu tatabir Peter kwarar iu, “Au’uf kwen, Satan! O i kabay kiru nou kuyayare, anayabin o a not i men God enotanot na’atube kunotanotamih. O i orot babin hai notabe kunotanot.”

16.24 Mat 10.38; Luk 14.27Imaibo Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “O yait inakok ayu airit namih, taiyuw ina kwahiri a onaf ina’abar ini’ufnunu airit tanan.
16.25 Mat 10.39; Luk 17.33; Jn 12.25Anayabin orot yait taiyuwin ana yawas isan ebowabow boro nikasiy. 16.25 men natita’urimih Baise orot yait ana yawas ayu isau ebi’inuw boro natita’ur.
16.26 Mat 4.8-9Tafaram wanawanan sawar tutufin etei ibai aur karam, baise inamomorob ana veya ana gewasin boro inab? En anababatun. Boro men kafa’imo nati sawaramaim a yawas inatubun inab maiye’emih.
16.27 Psa 62.12; Pro 24.12; Mat 25.31; Rom 2.6; Rev 22.12Anayabin Orot Natun i Tamah ana fair ana bonamanamarinamaim nan, ana tounamatar kakafiyih bairi, imaibo nati ana maramaim i boro orot babin hibowabow ana fofoninamaim hai baiyan nitih. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, sabuw afa iti kwama tur kwanonowar boro morobo’e kwanama’am Orot Natun ni’aiwob maramaim nanan kwana’itin.”

Veya etei six sasawar ufunamaim Peter naatu James tain John hairi Jesu buwih bairi akisimo nawiyih hiyen hin oyaw gagamin tafantoro’ot hitit.
17.2 2Pet 1.16-18Naatu nati’imaim matah yan hi’itin Jesu ana yumat botabir, ana itinin i veya’abe matar, ana faifuw i hikwes anababatun marakaw ta na’atube. TransfigurationCN01728B.TIFMat 17.2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu, Moses, Elijah yate oyaw tafan, naatu ana bai’ufununayah babanane tema’am17.2 Imaibo, Moses Elijah hairi hitit Jesu bairi hio ana bai’ufununayah hi’itih.
Peter Jesu isan eo, “Regah, gewasin aki iti ama’ama, o ina kokok na’at ayu boro sis tounu ana wowab ta o isa, ta Moses isan, naatu ta Elijah isan.”

17.5 Deu 18.15; Psa 2.7; Isa 42.1; Mat 3.17; Mak 1.11; Luk 3.22Baise iti na’at bat eo auman, sakuk ana marakawin auman na tar gabuwih, naatu sakuk wanawanan orot fanan hinowar eo, “Iti kek i ayu Natu, au yabow anababatun, i isan ayu abiyasisir, tain kwanarub nao’o kwananowar.”

Bai’ufununayah iti orot fanawat hinonowar ana maramaim hai bir ra’at yumatah au babe me yan hira’iy. Baise Jesu na butubunih eo, “Kwamisir, men kwanabirumih.” Imaibo nah hitara’ah hinunuw ra’at men yait ta hi’itin, baise Jesu akisinamo batabat hi’itin.
Oyaw wanane hire hinan basit Jesu awah bofot eo, “Abisa oyaw wan kwa’i’itin men yait ta ana tur kwana’owen. Kwanama, Orot Natun morobone namisiribo.”
17.10 Mal 4.5Naatu bai’ufununayah Jesu hibatiy hio, “Bo aisim Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah teo Elijah i boro mat nan.”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Tur anababatun. Elijah i boro mat nan sawar etei nayabuna.
17.12 Mat 11.14Baise a tur a’owen, Elijah i na titaka, baise sabuw men hi’inan, imih hai kokomaim sawar kakafih isan hisinaf. Ef nati ta’imon Orot Natun boro na’atube isan hinasinaf umahimaim ni’akir.”
17.13 Luk 1.17Imaibo bai’ufununayah naniyan hibai, Jesu i John Baptist isan hai tur eo’owen.
book.s: Demon Kek Hitounbubur Ma’am Jesu Iyawas
book.p: Hire hina sabuw rau’ay gagamin biyah hititit ana maramaim, orot ta na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Regah au kek kwiwanbaban, au kek i sawow kakafin bai ebimamayay, mar etei en wairaf wan eyey, naatu harew yan ere’er. Ayu abai ana a bai’ufununayah isah, baise i men karam boro hitiyawas.”

Jesu eawar foten eo, “Kwa sabuw isa i baitumatum en naatu a ef i kwasa’ir. Kwanotanot ayu boro bairi maninaka tanama? Naatu kwanotanot abit boro maninaka ana’abar bairi tanan? Kek kwabai kwana a’itin.” Jesu demon kakafin kwarar tatab naatu kek ihamiy bihir tit. Nati ana maramaim kek mar ta’imon yawas.
17.19 Mat 10.1Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina akisinamo biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Aisim aki demon kakafin men anun tit?”

17.20 Mat 21.21; Mak 11.23; Luk 17.6; 1Cor 13.2Jesu iuwih eo, “Anayabin, kwa a baitumatum i kikimin maiyow. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, a baitumatum iti ai momor ro’on na’atube nama’am na’at, iti oyaw isan boro kwanao, ‘Iti’imaim kwen ni’imaim kubat.’ Karam boro namatar, boro men abisa ta isa nafokaramih.
17.21 Hanef 21 i sabuw kirumayah tafan hiya’abar hikirum Sawar iti na’atube i yoyoban naatu yoharamaim boro hinamatar men abisa ta’amaim.”

17.22 Mat 16.21Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina Galilee hibita’imon ana maramaim iuwih eo, “Orot Natun boro baban hinao hinab gawan sabuw umahimaim hinayai. Nati sabuw boro hina’asabun namorob, veya tounu ufunamaim boro morobone na misir maiye.” Ana bai’ufununayah hai yababan ra’at.
17.24 Exo 30.13; 38.26Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hina Capernaum hititit ana maramaim, Tafaror Bar ana kabay o’onayah hina Peter hibatiy hio, “O a bai’obaiyenayan Tafaror Bar isan kabay ebibaiyan?”
Peter iyafutih eo, “Jesu i Tafaror Bar isan kabay ebibaiyan.”

Peter na bar wanawanan rur ana maramaim Jesu i wan awan tara’ah eo, “Peter o kunotanot sawar etitit naatu erur na’atube orot ta’ita’imon ana kabay aiwob isan i yait ebibaiyan, bar matuwan o nanawan sabuw?”
Peter iya’afut eo, “Nanawan sabuw.”

Iti na’atube eo imaibo Jesu eo, “Tur anababatun bar matuwan i asir tema’am kwanekwan. Baise men basit sabuw isah tanasinaf kakaf, kabay o’onayah yah naso’ar, imih inan harew kukufamaim initokar siy wan inatatain awan inabohai’i kabay inab inan airit isat inibaiyan.”
18.1 Luk 22.24Nati ana maramaim bai’ufununayah hina Jesu biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Mar ana aiwobomaim yait i orot gagamin?”

Jesu kek kikimin eaf na nahimaim bat.
18.3 Mat 19.14; Mak 10.15; Luk 18.17Imaibo eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, o yait ayawas men inabotabir inan iti kek gidigidih na’atube mar ana aiwobomaim boro men inarun. Isan imih orot yait taiyuwin yare iti kek kikiminabe emamatar mar ana aiwobomaim i orot gagamin.

18.5 Mat 10.40; Luk 10.16; Jn 13.20“Naatu orot yait kek kikimin iti na’atube ayu wabu’umaim ana merar eyiy, i ayu au merar eyiy. Baise orot yait iti kek kikimin ayu bitutumu eoraraf in bowabow kakafin esisinaf, gewasin nati orot i boro sikan aumor hina’utan taiy yan hinitaiy nare na’atomatom namorob.

“Tafaram i kakafin wanawanan run, imih nati sawaramaim sabuw bonawiyih bowabow kakafin tisisinaf. Sawar kakafih nati na’atube i boro hinamatar, baise orot yait biyanamaim iti sawar temamatar i boro kakafin anababatun nab.
18.8 Mat 5.29-30O yait uma o a nabonawiy kakafin inasisinaf na’at, ku’afuw kwisaroun, saise a uma duboduboh inan ma’ama wanatowan inarun. Men basit a uma hai ubaramaim o biya etei itan wairaf wan itayen ta’arahi. Naatu mata nuw kwanekwan kakafin kusisinaf, kukubai kwisaroun. Mata rounawat saise inan ma’ama wanatowan inarun, men basit mata ta’imon ana ubaramaim mata rou’abaka inan wairaf wan inayen na’arahi.

18.10 Hib 1.14“Abisa kusisinaf i inaso’ob men kek gidigidih inanuw furuwih, a tur ao’owen anayabin kek gidigidih hai tounamatar mar etei maramaim Tamai nan tebatabat.
18.11 Luk 19.10Orot Natun nan ana’an i sabuw kasikasiyih bow baiyawasih isan na.

“Orot ana bobaituw 100 hitama’am ta’imon takakasiy isan a not i mi’itube kwanotanot? Ana bobaituw 99 tihamiyen oyaw wan hitama, i tare tan ta’imon kakasiy tanuwih ai en? Naatu ana bobaituw tatita’ur tabaib ana maramaim, a tur ao’owen ana for ta’imon isan boro tiyasisir men kafaita, men 99 isah ebiyasisir na’atube anayabin i men hikasiy. Imih ef ta’imon nati na’atube Tamat maramaim men ekokok boro ana kek kikimin ta nakasiy.
book.s: Tai Bowabow Kakafin Nasisinaf Mi’itube Inibais
book.p:
18.15 Luk 17.3; Gal 6.1“O taituwa ta wanawanamaim isa bowabow kakafin nasisinaf na’at wa’iwa’iramaim inan biyan ana kakafin matanamaim ini’obaiy. Inao fana nanonowar na’at i boro airi kwanitafen tutur.
18.16 Deu 19.15; Jn 8.17Baise inao men nanonowar, orot ta’imon o rou’ab inabuwih bairi kwanan, saise o abisa’awat inao orot rou’ab boro sif hinaruboun. Buk Atamaninamaim hio na’atube. Baise hinao men nanonowar na’at, basit ekaleisia matahimaim kwanakurereb kwanao, naatu ekaleisia hinao men nanowar na’at, basit kwanihamiy eteni orot na’atube nama o tax o’onayan na’atube nama.
18.18 Mat 16.19; Jn 20.23“Anababatun a tur ao’owen, abisa iti tafaramamaim ku’a’uh maramaim boro ana’uh. Naatu abisa iti tafaramamaim kururufam maramaim boro anarufam.

18.19 Mak 11.24; Jn 15.7“Iban ao maiye, orot rou’ab iti tafaramamaim abisa isan hairi hibasit tefefeyan, Tamai maramaim boro isah nasinaf. Orot rou’ab o tounu ayu wabu’umaim tekuku’ay, ayu i nati wanawanahimaim bairi.”
Imaibo Peter na Jesu biyan tit ibatiy, “Regah, ayu taiu isau mar etei bowabow kakafih nasisinaf mar boro bai’ab ana kakafih ana notawiyen? Ana kakafih ana notawiyen nayen seven nanatabir?”
18.22 Luk 17.4Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men seven, baise mar etei 70 tafanamaim seven auman. 18.22 mar etei 77 notawiyen men ana hanef ema’am

“Anayabin aiwob maramaim ana itinin i aiwob orot ana akir wairafih hai bowabow nunutitiy na’atube. Nuteteyan ana bowabow busuruf ana veya aiwob orot kabay million na’atube orot ta bai ma bowabow hibai hina hirun. Naatu nati akir wairafin aiwob orot ana kabay wan yin isan aurin men karam. Imih aiwob orot iuwih orot aawan, natunatun naatu ana sawar etei hitabow hitan sabuw afa hitatobon hai akir wairafihimih hitabow, saise nati kabayamaim aiwob orot ana kabay wan tab isan eo.

“Baise akir wairafin aiwob orot nanamaim sun yowen fefeyan eo, ‘Regah a kokok yate nanub naatu ayu boro ana sinaftobon a sawar etei wah anayow anit.’ Aiwob orot ana akir wairafin itin yan baban naatu ana kabay wan yin isan auman ibagun naatu iu tit ana ubar in.
“Baise nati akir wairafin tit in naatu ana kabay bai’abamo bowayan turan biyanamaim bai ma’am biyan tit, eof sikan bai eo, ‘Au kabay o biya inu’in boun wan inay initu.’
“Bow turan orot nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan eo, ‘Yate nanub mar kafai ayu boro a kabay wan anay anit.’

“Baise orot men kok boro turan fanan tanowar, imih bai furisiman itih hibai hin dibur bar hiya’ariy. Naatu orot turan iu, ‘Iti’imaim inama au kabay wan inay initu imaibo inatit.’ Akir wairafih afa iti sawar matar hi’itin men hiyasisir, imih hin abisa’awat himamatar isan aiwob orot ana tur hiowen.

“Imaibo aiwob orot ana akir wairafin eaf na iu eo, ‘O i anababatun orot kakaf. Ayu au kabay gagamin maiyow o biyamaim ma’am i asafam, anayabin ayu ifefeyanu. Gewasin bow tura itakabibir o akakabibiri na’atube.’
18.34 Mat 5.25-26Aiwob orot yan so’ar tatabir ana dibur kaifenayah iuwih hifatum dibur hiya’ariy naatu iu, ‘Iti’imaim inama’am au kabay wan inay initu imaibo inatit.’”
18.35 Mat 6.15; Mak 11.25; Eph 4.32; Col 3.13“Ef ta’imon ayu Tamai maramaim kwa ta’ita’imon isa boro iti na’atube nasinaf, o yait taituwa ana kakafin men dogor tutufin etei inanotanotawiy na’at.”
Jesu iti tur eo in sawar ufunamaim, Galilee ihamiy in Judea wanawananamaim tit, Jordan harew rewan rounane. Sabuw rou’ay gagamin hi’ufunun hinan etei iyawasih.
Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hina Jesu an hitain hibatiy hio, “Orot aawan nasisinaf kakaf isan karam boro nakwahir, naatu na kwakwahir i ofafar e’astu’ub ai en?”

19.4 Gen 1.27; 5.2Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo aneika God orot babin hairi sinafih himamatar isan Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwaitin?”
19.5 Gen 2.24; Eph 5.31Tur an i nati imih God eo, “Orot boro hinah tamah nihamiyih, aawan hairi hinita’imon biyah rou’ab, baise hairi hinita’imon biyah ta’imon namatar. Imih hairi men biyah rou’ab baise ta’imon. Abisa God bita’imon men yait ta natarbounih.”
19.7 Deu 24.1-4; Mat 5.31Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hibatiy maiye hio, “Bo aisim Moses ana ofafar ta kirum eo, ‘Orot aawan kwahirinamih, kwahikwahiren ana fef nakirum babin nitin nab nan.’”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa a tafa’asaramaim, imih Moses ibasit baibin kwahiren isan eo, baise aneika i men iti na’atube ma’ama’amih.
19.9 Mat 5.32; 1Cor 7.10-11Anababatun a tur ao’owen, orot yait aawan anayabin en asir nakwahir, naatu nare babin ta ufun nan hairi hinibiwa’an i bowabow kakafin esisinaf.”
Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiy hio, “Orot babin hairi hai ma kakaf nati na’atube tama’am, gewasin men hitatabin, monok baibitar hitama.”

Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Men orot etei boro iti bai’obaiyen hini’ufununimih, baise iyabowat God rurubinihiwat boro hini’ufunun. Ef hai yabih moumurih na’in, imih orot men tetatabinamih, afa men tetatabin anayabin afa i yahoh fim, orot afa i yahoh tebowabow, naatu afa i God ana bowabow isan tenotanot, imih men tetatabin. Orot yait iti bai’obaiyen bainamih nakok, basit nab i akisin.”
Sabuw afa kek gidigidih Jesu uman tafah tayara’aten yoyoban isan hibow hinan, ana bai’ufununayah sabuw hikwararih hiotanih.

19.14 Mat 18.2-3Baise Jesu eo, “Kek kwaihamiyih tena biyau tetit, men kwana’otanih. Anayabin sabuw iyab iti kek hai baitumatum na’atube God ana aiwobomaim tema’am.” Basit Jesu kek tafah yara’aten isah yoyoban sawar, imaibo ihamiyih in.
Ana veya ta orot ta na Jesu ibatiy eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, sawar menatan gewasin anasinaf boro ma’ama wanatowan anab?”
19.17 Lev 18.5; Luk 10.28Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Aisim sawar gewasin isan ayu kubibatiyu? God akisinamo i orot gewasin. O inakok ma’ama wanatowan bain ma’amih, basit ofafar ini’ufunun.”

19.18 Exo 20.13-16; Deu 5.17-20Orot Jesu ibatiy eo, “Ofafar i menatan?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men tura ina’asabun, turanah a’aawah bairi men kwaniwa’an, men inabain, men orot babin afa isah inayanuw,
19.19 Exo 20.12; Lev 19.18
19.19 Exo 20.12; Lev 19.18hinat tamat inakakafiyih 19.19 Exodus 20.13-16; Deuterenomy 5.16-20 naatu o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube taituwa isah iniyabow.”
Orot iya’afut eo, “Iti ofafar etei asinaf sawar, abisa’awat tema’am boro anasinaf?”

Jesu iu eo, “O inakok a yawas baigewasinamih. Basit inan a sawar etei sabuw hai sawaramih initih hinatobon, naatu kabay inab yababan wairafih initih. O inan ini’ufununu, nati na’atube inasinaf maramaim o boro isa sawar nakaram.”
Orot iti tur nonowar ana maramaim yababan auman ana ubar in, anayabin i aurin sawar etei karam.

Naatu Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Tur anababatun au’uwi. Orot sawar wairafin i men karam mar ana aiwobomaim narun, boro isan nafokar. Au’uwi maiye camel sou’umaim sorabon isan i fokar, anayabin koun butun gagamin. Ef ta’imon nati na’atube orot sawar wairafin i men karam mar ana aiwobomaim narun, boro isan nafokar.”
Bai’ufununayah iti tur hinonowar ana maramaim hifofofor men kafaita. Naatu hio, “Yait i boro yawas nab?”
19.26 Job 42.2Jesu mutufor nuw itih eo, “Sawar etei orot isah i hifokar, baise God isan sawar etei i men fokarihimih.”
Basit Peter misir eo, “Kwi’iti, aki ai sawar etei ai hamiyen o abi’ufununi abisa boro anab?”

19.28 Mat 25.31; Luk 22.30; Rev 3.21Jesu iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Tafaram nabobotabir ana maramaim, Orot Natun boro ana urama’ama bonamanamarinamaim namare. Naatu kwa ayu au bai’ufununayah na 12 auman boro urama’amamaim kwanamare Israel sabuw hai big etei 12 kwanakaifih kwanama. Sabuw iyab ayu wabu’umaim hai bar hai me, taituwah, ruburubuh, hinahinah tamahinah hihamiyen ayu tibi’ufununu boro hai yawas tafan ana ya’abar anitih. Naatu yawas wanatowan auman anitih hinab.
19.30 Mat 20.16; Luk 13.30Baise sabuw iyab boun wan hi’iyon tenan boro hinan hini’uf naatu sabuw iyab hi’uf tenan boro hinan wan hini’iyon. Imih sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim orot gagamih tema’am maramaim boro aurih efan en. Baise sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim God isan tibi’akir maramaim boro orot gagamih hinama.”

“God nabi’aiwob ana maramaim i boro iti na’atube. Ana veya ta orot masaw matuwan, sabuw afa tobon ana masawamaim bowamih tit na. Bowayah bow naatu veya ta’imon ana baiyan isan bairi hio hibibasit ufunamaim iyafarih hin grape ana masawamaim 20.2 vineyard hibow.

“Nine korok na’atube tit maiye na ahar efanamaim. Orot afa hai bowabow en asir hibatabat itih. Basit eo, ‘Igewasin kwa auman boro kwanan au masawamaim kwanabow, naatu kwa a baiyan boro etei anafofonin anit.’ Naatu bowamih hin. Auyit naatu three korok hairi tit inan i bowabow ta’imon sinaf sabuw asir hibatabat itih naatu uwih hin ana masaw hibow. Naatu veya re five korok na’atube, orot tit na maiye, ahar efanamaim titit. Sabuw afa’abo hibatabat itih eo, ‘Kwa aisim asir kwabatabat veya re?’
“Hiya’afut hio, ‘Men yait ta tubuni.’
“Basit orot eo, ‘Kwanan au masawamaim kwabow.’ Naatu ana masaw bowamih hin.

20.8 Lev 19.13; Deu 24.15“Veya re birabirab auman, masaw matuwan ana orot ukwarin eaf na iu, ‘Sabuw ina’afih hinan hai baiyan initih, uf hinan hai baiyan wan initih naatu wan hinan uf initih,’ basit eafih hina hirun sawar.

“Imaibo orot iyab five korok hibusuruf hibowabow, hai baiyan itih, veya ta’imon ana fofonin. Orot mat hina hibowabow, hai biyan bainamih hinan i hinotanot boro hai baiyan gagamin hitab, baise i auman baiyan ta’imon hibai, veya ta’imon ana fofonin. “Hai kabay hibai sawar hitit hibat. Basit higam masaw matuwan hiu, ‘Iti sabuw i veya re’er auman hina men manin hibag, baise aki bairi ai baiyan ta’imon iti. Aki ai baiyan i boro gagamin atab, anayabin aki mar auman ana a bow in veya re.’

“Masaw matuwan misir orot ta isan eo, ‘Au begon inaso’ob. Ayu men asinaf kakafemih. Anayabin kwa i kwaibasit veya ta’imon ana baiyan isan, imih kwabow in veya re ana fofonin ait. Abisa abit i kwabai a ubar kwan. Iti oro’orot uf hinan i ayu arubinih hina, imih hai kabay abitih i kwa bairi a baiyan ta’imon. Anayabin ayu au sawar, au kokomaim au kabay mi’itube anim, ayu akisu. Men orot babin ta isan anasisinaf gewas isan ya naso’aramih.’”

20.16 Mat 19.30; Mak 10.31Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “Sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim orot gagamih tema’am boro maramaim aurih efan en. Baise sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim God isan tibi’akir maramaim boro orot gagamih hinama.”
book.s: Jesu Mar Baitaunin Ana Morob Isan Eo
book.p:
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi au Jerusalem hinan efamaim buwih nabin akisihimo hai tur eowen eo,
20.18 Mat 16.21; 17.22-23“Tanan Jerusalemamaim Orot Natun boro sabuw hinab. Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hinitih rabin asabunin morobomih hinao. Naatu hinab Eteni Sabuw hinitih, hina’u hi’i’iyab hinarab hina’onaf namorob. Baise veya baitonin ufunamaim boro namisir maiye.”
book.s: Hinah Ana Fefeyan James, John Hairi Isan
book.p: Imaibo Zebedee aawan natunatun rou’ab bairi Jesu baifefeyanimih hina nanamaim sun yowen natunatun rou’ab isah fefeyan baibaisinamih eo.
20.21 Mat 19.28; Luk 22.30Jesu ibatiy eo, “Abisa kukokok?” Babin iya’afut eo, “Ayu akokok inao matanu o ina bi’aiwob ana maramaim, ayu natunatu hairi sisib roun roun hinamare bairi kwani’aiwob.”
20.22 Mat 26.39; Jn 18.11Jesu iya’afut eo, “Kwa men kwaso’ob abisa isan kwafefeyanu. Karam ayu au harew ana tomatom turin boro kwanatom?” Tufuturan hairi hiya’afut hio, “Aki karam.”
Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu harew atomatom boro kwanatom, baise ta au asukwafune mare ta au beyawane mare. Ayu men karam boro anarubin. Nati efan i sabuw iyab ayu Tamai isah bobogaigiwas i hai efan.”

Bai’ufununayah etei ten iti tur hinonowar orot tufuturan hairi isan yah so’ar.
20.25 Luk 22.25-26Baise Jesu etei eaf ayuwih i’uwih eo, “Kwanaso’ob orot iyab Eteni Sabuw tekakaifih i God men tebitumitum, imih i taiyuwih hai fairamaim sabuw tibiruwih fanah tebai tibi’ufununih.
20.26 Mat 23.11; Mak 9.35Baise kwa wanawanamaim men iti na’atube nama’amih. O yait inakok bai’ukwarinamih, basit taituwa isah inabow ini’akir. Naatu O yait inakok wan bai’iyon bai’ukwarinamih, basit taituwa isah ini’akir.
20.28 Luk 22.27; Php 2.7Iti na’atube kwanasinaf, anayabin Orot Natun nan i men sabuw isan bowamih namih, baise nabow ana yawas sabuw isah ni’inuw saise i ana yawasamaim sabuw niyawasih.”
book.s: Jesu Orot Rou’ab Matah Fim Iyawasih
book.p: Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi tafaram Jericho hitumar hitit, basit sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit hi’ufunun bairi hin. Hinan efamaim orot rou’ab matah fim hima’am Jesu ana tur hinowar, basit hi’af Jesu hifefeyan hio, “David uwan kwiwanbabani.”
Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hinan orot rou’ab hikwararih awah fotamih hi’uwih, baise hairi awah aumetawat hi’af hio, “Regah David uwan kwiwanbabani.”
Jesu inan bat naatu hairi eafih hina ibatiyih eo, “Kwakokok abisa isa anasinaf?”
Orot rou’ab hiya’afut hio, “Regah aki akokok matai hinigewasin ananuw.”
Jesu hairi itih iyababan basit matah bobotobonen ana maramaim mar ta’imonamo hairi matah higewasin himisir Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
book.s: Jesu Wow Atubob Auman Au Jerusalem Run
book.p: Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi au Jerusalem hirun hinan, hina bar merar ta wabin Bethage hitit, Olive Oyawemaim 21.1 anayabin olive imaim burut tebatabat, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah rou’ab wan iyunih eo, “Kwanan bar merar nati namaim kwanatitit boro donkey hi’utan ebatabat kwana’itin naatu donkey boubun auman sisibinamaim ebatabat. Hairi kwanarufamen kwanabow kwanan. Orot ta nati’imaim nabibatiyi ana tur kwana’owen, ‘Regah ekokok naatu boro nihamiyen kwanabow kwanan.’ Baise ana tur kwana’owen boro niyafarih hinamatabir maiye.”
Iti sawar himamatar abisa God ana dinab orot eo kikirum ina i turobe.
book.q: 21.5 Zec 9.9“Jerusalem sabuw hai tur kwana’owen, a aiwob enan kwa’itin, taiyuwin yare donkey afe’en mara’at enan, ana donkey boubun tafanamaim mara’at enan.”
book.p:
Basit Jesu ana bai’ufununayah eo baimanih na’at hin hisinaf.
Donkey hibai hina hai faifuw tafah hibosairen hiyabar afa rabod rourih hi’afuw ef yan hiyabar. Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hai faifuw hibosairen hiyabar afa ai raurih hi’afuw hiyabar.
21.9 Psa 118.25-26Sabuw Jesu nanane hinan, naatu ufunane hinan fanah sib hiwow hio,
book.q: “David natun tanabora’ara’ah God nigegewasin Regah wabinamaim enan God tanabora’ara’ah!”
book.p: Jesu na Jerusalem rur, kawasa ra’at uruw giririf retenafut, sabuw hibatebat hio, “Iti orot yait?”
Rou’ay gagamin hiyafutih hio, “God ana dinab orot wabin Jesu, Galilee wanawananamaim tafaram Nazareth orot.”

Naatu Jesu na Tafaror Bar run. Sabuw iyab nati hima hai sawar hitotobon rauw nunih hai urama’ama, hai gemogem bora’aten, kabay hisuwa hire, urama’ama afe’eh hima mamu imak hitotobon bow israuwen ufun hitit.
21.13 Isa 56.7; Jer 7.11Naatu iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim God eo hikikirum i iti na’atube eo, ‘Ayu au Tafaror Bar i yoyoban ana bar,’ baise kwa abisa kwasisinaf i kwabotabir bainowah hai watu matar.”

Sabuw matah fim naatu ah umah kakafih hina Tafaror Bar hirun Jesu etei iyawasih. Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah Jesu sawar gewasih sisinaf hi’itin yah so’ar. Kek auman Tafaror Bar wanawanan fanah sib Jesu hibora’ara’ah hio, “Orokaiwa David natun, ensairen.”
21.16 Psa 8.2Jesu hiu, “Iti kek teo kunonowar?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anonowar. Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum kwaiyab kwa’itin, mi’itube hikirum?
book.q: ‘Kek gidigidih naatu kek sosof ini’obaiyih merarayow gewasin anababatun baitinin isan.’”
book.p: Naatu nati’imaim ihamiyih hima i tit in Bethany bar merar imaim mar fo in.

Mar auman Jesu au merar gagamin matabir inan, basit bayumih morob. Naatu ef rewanamaim ai fafou batabat itin, basit na ai an tit, baise men ro’on ta itin, raurinawat. Basit ai isan eo, “O i boro men iniw.” Mar ta’imonamo ai fenem.
Ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin hifofor men kafaita, naatu hio, “Ai fafou mi’itube’emih mar ta’imon fenem?”

21.21 Mat 17.20; Luk 17.6; Jn 14.12; 1Cor 13.2Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Men erekasiy auman kwanasinafumih, baise kwanitumatum. Karam abis iti boun ai fafou isan asisinaf boro kwanasinaf namatar. Baise men iti akisin. Karam oyaw isan kwanao, kumisir kwen riy yan kubat boro namatar.
21.22 Mat 7.7-11; 18.19Initumatum abisa isan kuyoyoban boro inab.”

Jesu matabir maiye Tafaror Baremaim run bat bi’obaibiyih. Basit Firis ukwarih naatu Jew hai orot ukwarih hina Jesu biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “O yait fair it iti sawar kusisinaf, naatu yait ibasit ina kubowabow?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu auman au baibat ta’imon kwa anibatiyi kwanao ananowar, imaibo ayu boro anao kwananowar, ayu fair menamaim abai abowabow. John ana fair menane bai sabuw bapataito itih Godane bai, ai orot maiyow biyahine bai?” Hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Mi’itube tanao? Godane tanao’o i boro nao bo aisim John men kwaitumitum.
21.26 Mat 14.5Baise it orot biyanane fair bain tanao, sabuw isah tabirubir anayabin sabuw etei tebitumatum John i God ana dinab orot ta.”
Imih sabuw Jesu isan hiya’afut hio, “Aki men aso’ob.” Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu auman boro men anao kwananowar, baibasit menane abai iti sawar asisinaf.
“Kwa mi’itube kwanotanot? Ana veya ta orot natunatun bairi hima’am basit orot natun ain isan eo, ‘Aro ayu akokok boun inan grape ana masaw inabow.’
“Naatu kek tamah iya’afut eo, ‘Ayu men akokok.’ Baise ma kafai ana not botabir re in masaw bow.
“Naatu orot na maiye natun uf isan tit tur i ta’imonaban eo, naatu kek rufut eo, ‘Basit, Regah boro anan.’ Baise kwahir bar ma men in masaw bowamih. Naatu kek menatan i tamah fanan bai?”

Hima’am hio, “Kek ain.” Jesu uwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Kwa kabay o’onayah naatu sagasagadiy i sabuw kakafih kwarouw kwao, baise i boro wan hini’iyon hinan mar ana aiwob hinab.
21.32 Luk 3.12; 7.29-30Anayabin John Baptist na ef gewasin bai’ufnunin isan bi’obaiyi, kwa men kwaitumitumimih, baise kabay o’onayah, naatu sagasagadiy hitumitum, sawar i kwa’itin, baise men kafa’imo a not uf kwabotabir kwaitumitumimih.”

21.33 Isa 5.1-2Jesu eo maiye, “Oroubon tabo kwananowar. Orot me matuwan ana veya ta masaw bo grape tanum, fur ear ituwafut naatu Wine bunubunuw ana hub bai naatu ana masaw sabuw bowayah uwih hima’uh hima i tafaram afa bai nanawanamih in. Naatu grape hiyamur bairuhin ana veya kakabom, basit orot ana akir wairafih iyafarih hina bowayah biyah ibo au nowahine ai ro’oh bairut isan.

“Baise bowayah himisir orot ana akir wairafih hibow, ta hibai hirab, ta hi’asabun morob, naatu ta kabayamaim hirab. Orot ana akir wairafih afa’abo iyafarih hina, moumurihika men marasika biyafarih na’atube’emih, baise bowayah himisir akir wairafih hibow, wan hinan isah hisisinaf na’atube hisinaf hibow hirouw. Uftoro’ot i natun iyun na bowayah isah, not eo, ‘Sabuw boro natu hinakakafiy.’

21.38 Mat 27.18“Baise bowayah orot natun nan hi’itin hio, ‘Iti orot masaw matuwan natun enan kwanatabai tarab emorob, saise iti sawar etei boro it ata sawaramih tanabow.’
21.39 Hib 13.12Hina kek hibai fur ufunane hirouw re hitit hibai hi’asabun morob.”
Naatu Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Masaw matuwan namatabir nanan iti sabuw bowayah isah boro mi’itube nasinaf?”
Hiya’afut hio, “Nati orot bowayah etei boro narauw hinamorob, naatu masaw boro nab sabuw afa nitih hinama hinakaif, saise ai ro’oh hinabiyamur bowayah boro hinirut ibo au nowan hinitin.”
21.42 Psa 118.22-23; Rom 9.33; 1Pit 2.6-8Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin.
book.q: ‘Kabay nati bar wowabayah hi’itin kakafin hirouw hikwakwahir, I botabir na taf ana wabat matar, iti sawar i Regah sinaf, ana itinin gewasin maiyow ta’i’itin.’
book.p: “Isan imih a tur ao’owen. Mar ana aiwob kwa biyamaim tema’am boro nabosairen sabuw iyab ub gewasih hitanum teyey boro i nitih.
“Orot yait iti agim afe’en nare narabirab i boro natarsisib, baise agim nare orot babin narabirab boro mutufor nifofob.”

Firis hai ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah Jesu ana oroubon eo hinowar hitatam. Imih bain fatuminamih himisir, baise sabuw rou’ay hina hima’ama isah hibir. Anayabin sabuw etei Jesu hi’i’itin i God ana dinab orot ta.

Naatu Jesu iban maiye oroubon tabo sabuw hai tur eowen eo, “Mar ana Aiwob ana itinin i boro iti na’atube. Ana veya ta aiwob orot natun tabin isan ana hiyuw bogaigiwas. Naatu ana akir wairafih iyunih kob hin sabuw iyabowat hiyuw aamih hibowabow isah, baise etei’imak hikwahir hima.

“Imih aiwob orot iban maiye ana akir wairafih afa’abo iyunih eo, ‘Kwanan sabuw iyabowat na hiyuw aamih au’uwih hai tur kwana’owen, masanuw etei arauw hitab, naatu hiyuw etei abogaigiwas sawar, imih kwanan tabin ana hiyuw tanaa.’

“Baise hin hi’o, sabuw hiyuw aayah tur men hinowar, hai kokomaim hire nanabin hin. Orot ta au masaw in, orot ta re ana sitow bowamih in.
22.6 Mat 21.35Naatu sabuw afa akir wairafih hibow hirouw, afa hi’asbunubunuw himorob. Aiwob orot anababatun yan so’ar, basit ana baiyowayah iyafarih hin sabuw ana akir wairafih hi’asbunubunuw etei hibow hirouw himorob naatu hai bar etei hi’afusar.

“Imaibo aiwob orot ana akir wairafih afa’abo eaf hina iuwih eo, ‘Tabin ana hiyuw i abogaigiwas sawar, baise sabuw au’uwih men yait ta namih. Imih kwanatit kwanan ef gagamih yahimaim sabuw kwana’i’itih etei kwana’uwih hinan tabin ana hiyuwamaim hinarun.’ Basit akir wairafih hitit hin ef gagamih yahimaim orot babin hi’itih etei hibow, kakafin, gewasin etei hiteten hinatabin ana efanamaim hitit.

“Aiwob orot na nanawan hai merar yi ibabatiyih inan, basit orot ta tabin ana faifuw usina’e na ma’am itin. Naatu ibatiy eo, ‘Au begon, o mi’itube’emih tabin ana faifuw usina’e ina irun kuma’am, etawan menane irun?’ Baise orot men tur ta eo.
22.13 Mat 8.12; 25.30; Luk 13.28“Basit aiwob orot ana akir wairafih iuwih eo, ‘Orot an uman kwafatum kwabai kwan ufun kwaisaroun ere gugumin wanawanan nama, narerey wan nitarfofor naso’ob.’”
Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “Sabuw moumurih na’in God ea’afih, baise matan ta’amo boro narubinih.”

22.15 Mak 3.6Basit Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa hin sa’ab akisihimo hiku’ay Jesu baikubibiruwin isan hiyakitifuw. Imaibo hai bai’ufununayah afa naatu Herod ana kou’ay sabuw afa hin Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki aso’ob. O i anababatun turamaim kuo, God ana sabuw isah abisa ekokokomaim kubi’obaiyih, abisa sabuw tenotanot isan men kubiyababan, anayabin o men orot babin ufuhine ku’i’itin. Imih kuo anowar. Caesar isan kabay tanabibaiyan boro ata ofafar tana’astu’ub, ai en? O mi’itube kunotanot?”

Jesu mar ta’imon hio hai tur naniyan bai uwih eo, “Kwa i wanawan rerekabih! Aisim ayu kwabikubibiruwu? Kabay kwabai kwana kwai’obaiyu aitin.” Naatu kabay hibai hina hitin. Itin sawar imaibo eo, “Iti kabayamaim i yait ayubin naatu wabin tema’am?”
22.21 Rom 13.7Hiya’afut hio, “Caesar.” Basit Jesu iuwih eo, “Abisa Caesar nowan Caesar kwanitin, naatu abisa God nowan God kwanitin.”
Iti na’at eo hinonowar ana maramaim hifofor men kafaita. Naatu hihamiy himatabir maiye hin.
book.s: Morobone Misir Maiye Isan Ana Baibat
book.p:
22.23 Act 23.8Nati veya ta’imon kau’ay ta wabin Sadducee hai sabuw afa hina Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Sabuw morobone boro men hinayawas maiye.”
22.24 Deu 25.5Naatu hio maiye, “Bai’obaiyenayan Moses eo tautabin orot ain natun en namomorob tain boro tuwah ana kwafur ni’aawan, saise hairi hina’in kek hinatufuw tuwah efanin. Imih marasika orot, ain uf nah etei seven hima’am, basit orot ain tabin naatu kek en morob. Ana kwafur tain i’aawan. I auman kek en morob. Naatu tain ta bo kwafur i’aawan maiye. Kek en morob ef ta’imon na’atube hisinaf re in yomanin hi’asa’ub. Uf toro’ot, babin morob. Orot etei i babin ta’imon hi’aawan, imih ana maramaim morobone hinamimisir maiye, babin i boro menatan ni’aawan?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa i a not hikwaris. Anayabin Buk Atamanin men kwaso’ob, naatu God ana fair auman men kwaso’ob. Anayabin morobone hinamimisir ana veya tounamatar maramaim tabina’e tema’am na’atube bairi boro hinama. Naatu morobone hinamisir maiye isan God eo Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin ei en? God iti na’atube eo,
22.32 Exo 3.6; Mat 8.11‘Ayu i Abraham ana God, Isaac ana God, naatu Jacob ana God.’ Nati God i sabuw yawasih hai God men sabuw murubih hai Godamih.” Sabuw rou’ay gagamin iti tur hinonowar, hifofor men kafaita, anayabin abisa bi’obaiyih i tur anababatun.

Jesu tur eo Sadducee sabuw hai tur etei rabirab ana maramaim Pharisee sabuw hi’itin. Basit etei hina hita’imon. Wanawanahimaim ofafar so’obayan orot ta na Jesu ikubibiruw eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, obaiyunen tur menatan i gagamin ofafar etei wanawanahimaim?”

22.37 Deu 6.5Jesu iya’afut eo, “Regah, a God isan dogor tutufin etei, a not tutufin etei, naatu biya tutufin etei iniyabuw. Iti ofafar i gagamin naatu ofafar ana ukwarin.
22.39 Lev 19.18; Mat 7.12Naatu ofafar bairou’abin i iti. ‘Taituwa isah iniyabow o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube.’
22.40 Rom 13.10; Gal 5.14Moses ana ofafar tutufin etei naatu God ana dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen etei i iti ofafar rou’ab tebi’ukwarih.”

Pharisee sabuw hiru’ay hita’imon, basit Jesu ibatiyih
22.42 Jn 7.42eo, “Kwa a notamaim Keriso isan mi’itube kwanotanot? I boro orot yait natun?” Naatu i hiya’afut hio, “Keriso i boro David ana agirane nan.”
Naatu Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Bo aisim Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim David iwanasum, Regah isan eo,
book.q: 22.44 Psa 110.1; Mat 26.64‘Regah au Regah isan eo, Umau au asukwafune kumare inama’am. Ana maramaim ayu boro anatit a kamabiy sabuw anabow babamaim anaya.’
book.p: “David Roubininenayan orot isan i ana Regah rauw eo, imih men karam Roubininenayan orot i David ana agir narauw nao.” Men yait ta Jesu ana tur wan yimih. Nati ana veya’amaim men yait ta baibat afa bow na Jesu ibatiyimih.

Imaibo Jesu sabuw rou’ay gagamin naatu i ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee i Moses ana ofafar etei hisora’ub.
23.3 Mal 2.7-8Imih abistan tibi’obaiyi i kwanabosiyasiyar, baise men kwani’u’urih. Anayabin abisa teo i men na’atube tisisinafumih. Ofafar fokarih maiyow sabuw tuwabuh hiyara’ah hi’abar tibi’akir, naatu i men kafa’imo boro umah hina’ofere hinibaisih bit nakereremih.

23.5 Exo 13.9; Num 15.38-39; Deu 6.8; Mat 6.1“Sawar etei bebeyanamaim tisisinaf sabuw itihimih. God ana Tur ai kanabihimaim hikirum, ukwarih, umah, hai faifuwamaim hikubabaren sabuw itihimih. Hiyuw hai mar tekokok efan gewasih hinabow hinamare hinama, naatu Kou’ay Bar wanawanan tekokok efan gewasih imaim hinama. Hai kok gagamin i ahar efanamaim sabuw hinakakafiyih, hai merar hinay hinabora’ara’ahih bai’obaiyenayah gewasih hinarouw.

“Baise kwa men bai’obaiyenayah hinarauw hina’omih. Anayabin kwa etei i ain uf, naatu a Bai’obaiyenayan i ta’imon. Men yait ta iti tafaramamaim Tamat kwana’omih, anayabin kwa Tamat i ta’imonamo maramaim ema’am. Naatu men yait ta kwa isa bai’obaiyenayah narouw nao, anayabin kwa A Bai’obaiyenayan i ta’imon Keriso akisin.
23.11 Mat 20.26; Mak 9.35; Luk 22.26Orot gagamin kwa wanawananamaim i orot yait taintuwan isah ebi’akir.
23.12 Job 22.29; Pro 29.23; Luk 14.11; 18.14Orot yait taiyuwin ebobora’ah God boro nayare, naatu orot yait taiyuwin eyayare God boro nabora’ah orot gagamin namatar.

“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanah rerekabih! Sabuw mar ana aiwobomaim run isan hai etawan kwahir, naatu kwa run isan kwakwahir, sabuw afa runamih tisisinaftobon baise kwa men kwabibasit boro hinarun. Yababan boro kanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawan rerekabih! Kwafur baibin kwai’a’afiyih hai sawar kwabowabow, naatu iti baifa’i isan kwai’o’orot yoyoban manimanih kwayoyoyoban

“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanan rerekabih! Tafaram, tafaram un boy kwabai sabuw dogoroh baikitabirin a kou’ayomaim run isan kwa’u’uwih, naatu orot ta’imon kwabai a kou’ayomaim erur i ana kakafin tafan kwaya’abar kwai’afiy kakafin natun matar kwa bairi kwanan kwani’akiramih.

23.16 Mat 15.14“Yababan boro kwanab! Mata fimih! A bai’obaiyenamaim sabuw kwai’obaiyih kwao, ‘Orot yait Tafaror Bar isan na’obaifaro, nati ana’obaifaro yabin en, baise orot yait Tafaror Bar wanawanan gold isan na’obaifaro, nati anao matanen i nakakafiy.’ Mata hifim kwabobosa! Sawar menatan i gagamin, gold o Tafaror Bar? Baise Tafaror Bar i gagamin anayabin i wanawananamaim gold i kakafiyih himatar ti’inu’in. Iban maiye sabuw kwai’obaiyih kwao, ‘Orot yait sibor ana gem kakafiyin isan nao’obaifaro, nati anao baifaro i yabin en, baise gem kakafiyin afe’enamaim siwar isan na’obaifaro nati ana’obaifaro i nakakafiy.’ Mata hifim kwabobosa! Sawar menatan i gagamin, siwar o sibor ana gem kakafiyin tafanamaim siwar tena kakafiyin kakafiyin temamatar i gagamin? Isan imih orot yait sibor ana gem kakafiyin isan eobaifaro, sawar etei nati gem tafaramamaim ti’inu’in auman isah eobaifaro. Na’atube orot yait Tafaror Bar isan eobaifaro, i God nati wanawananamaim ema’am auman isan eobaifaro.
23.22 Isa 66.1; Mat 5.34Naatu orot yait mar isan eobaifaro i God ana urama’ama efan isan eobaifaro, anayabin nati i God ana ma’ama efan.

23.23 Lev 27.30; Mic 6.8“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanan rerekabih! Kwa i fiyow yamurih gewasih, bay hai momon, bay matah haibaib gewasih i roumukur kwayai God kwabitin, baise ofafar gagamih ma gewas isan, kabeber, bosunusunub isan eo i kwakwahiren. Ofafar iti i gagamih, gewasin i kwatabosiyasiyar ofafar afa auman. Bonawiyenayah mata fim! Ofafar rimiyafof totomar i kwarurububuna, baise camel koun butun i kwatotonan.

23.25 Mak 7.4“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu Pharisee wanawanan rerekabih! A kerowas naatu a tew ufuhine i kwasasouwen, baise wanawanah i kato rabirabih, bain, bai’o’orot, kabat, gamin baiyow awan karatan inu’in. Mata hifim kwabobosa Pharisee! Gewasin a tew naatu a kerowas wanawanahine wan kwanasouwen, saise ufuhine auman boro hinigewasih.

23.27 Act 23.3“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee. wanawan rerekabih! Kwa a’itinin i rah ufunane tewowab gewas ebatabat na’atube, baise wanawanan i orot babin hai rarik awan karatan masin kakafin.
23.28 Luk 16.15Imih kwa ayumat i nati na’atube, ufunane sabuw matahimaim a’itinin i gewasin, baise wanawananamaim a kakafin naatu a tafasar i ra’at.

“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu Pharisee, wanawan rerekabih! dinab oro’orot hai yawas gewasih naatu sabuw hai yawas mutufurih himomorob hai rah i kwabobuna’en kwama kwabi’aburen. Naatu kwao, aki ai a’agir hima’am hai veya’amaim bairi ata ma’am aki boro men dinab oro’orot ata rauw hitamorobomih.
23.31 Act 7.52Imih nati turamaim kwa taiyuw kwao’orereb kwa uwatanah i dinab oro’orot hi’asbunubunuw himorob. Imih abisa uwatanah hibubusuruf hisisinaf i kwaisawar nuhi efot.

23.33 Mat 3.7; 12.34; Luk 3.7“Kok hai yumat! naatu kok natunatun! God ana baimakiy boro kwanahaiw? Isan imih a tur ao’owen, dinab oro’orot, bai’obaiyenayah naatu orot not wairafih boro aniyafarih hinan. Baise boro kwanabow kwanarauw hinamorob, afa boro kwana’onafih, naatu boro kwanarouw hinamorob, afa boro Kou’ay bar wanawanan kwanawabirih, naatu bar merar ta ta’amaim kwaninunih kwanaremor.
23.35 Gen 4.8; 2Ch 24.20-21Sinaf ana an nati isan, sabuw gewasih himorob hai rara susuwa anabit etei boro kwa tafa nayen baimakiy kwanab. Abel orot gewasin momorob ana veya’ika re na Berakiah natun Zechariah, iti Tafaror Bar naatu sibor kakafiyin hai founamaim kwarab momorob i ana veya’amaim tit. Imih tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, Sabuw himorob hai rara re’er hai bit etei kwa iti boun yawasih kwama’am boro kwanab.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! dinab oro’orot etei i’asbunuw himorob, naatu kob abarayah hiyunih hinan etei kabayamaim irauw himorob. Mar etei a kok kwanekwan umau’umaim natunat atabuwih hitan ta’imon hitamatar. Kokorere natunatun ita’imonih ebaba’afuwih na’atube, baise o men kafa’imo baibasit itu.
23.38 1Ki 9.7-8; Jer 22.5Isan imih a bar a merar boro hinakwahir naowarar.
23.39 Psa 118.26A tur ao’owen ayu boro men kwana’itu maiye’emih. Ana maramaim kwanao, ‘Yait Regah wabinamaim enan boro baigegewasin nab.’”
book.s: Jesu Tafaror Bar Gagamin Nabihururuw Isan Eo
book.p:
Jesu Tafaror Bar gagamin ihamiy tit inan auman, ana bai’ufununayah hina hiu, “Tafaror bar kwi’itin gewasin maiyow.”
24.2 Luk 19.44Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sawar iti kwa’i’itan, a tur ao’owen, kabay etei boro natafofor nare naatu kabay ta boro men ana efanamaim na’inu’in kwana’itinimih.”

Jesu yen Olive Oyaw tafan mare, ana bai’ufununayah wa’iwa’iramaim hina biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Kuo anowar mar i boro biy iti sawar hinamatar? Naatu o inanan ina’inanen boro abisa ana’itin anaso’ob. Naatu mar yomanin nakakabon boro mi’itube ana so’ob?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Matato niwa’an, men sabuw hinan hinifufuwimih.
24.5 Mat 24.23-24; 1Jn 2.18Sabuw moumurih na’in boro ayu wabu’umaim hinan hinao, ‘Ayu i Keriso’ naatu sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinifufuwih. Baiyow ana tur boro kwananowar, naatu baiyow isan ana tur boro kwananowar, baise men kwanabir. Sawar yumatah ta ta boro hinamatar, baise nati i men mar yomanin. Tafaram ta boro tafaram ta hairi hiniyow, na’atube bar merar ta boro bar merar ta ana aiwob hairi hiniyow. Baimar kakafin, iriyoy boro tafaram awan nakaratan. Sawar iti etei hinamatar i kek tufuwamih ebobotukwar na’atube.

24.9 Mat 10.22“Sabuw boro hinafatumi hinabuw kwanan hini’a’akir, hina’asbuni kwanamorob, ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan. Nati ana veya’amaim baitumatumayah boro hai baitumatum hinihamiy, naatu turahinah babah hinao, taiyuwih turahinah hinifa’ifa’ih,
24.11 Mat 24.5, 24; 1Jn 4.1dinab baifufuwenayah moumurih na’in boro hinatit sabuw moumurih na’in hinifufuwih. Tafa’asar boro nara’at natasasar sabuw momurih na’in hai yabow boro wan natutum.
24.13 Mat 10.22Baise yait nabukikin nan yomanin natitit i boro yawas nab.
24.14 Mat 28.19Tur Gewasin, mar ana aiwob isan, i boro tafaram wanawanan etei hinabinan sabuw etei hinanowar, imaibo mar yomanin boro nan natit.

24.15 Dan 9.27; 11.31; 12.11“Biya’ohow Ana Sawar Kakafin boro efan kakafiyinamaim nabatabat kwana’itin, dinab orot Daniel eo na’atube. Baiyabayan orot iti tur nabiyab naniyan nab gewas. Sabuw iyab Judea wanawananamaim tema’ama boro hinabihir hinan oyaw wan hinayen.
24.17 Luk 17.31Orot yait ana bar faifiy wan ema’am boro men nare ana sawar bar wanawanan nabowamih, veya en. Orot yait masaw ebowabow boro men namatabir ana biya baibiyon bar nabaimih. Nati ana veya’amaim baibin iyab siasiar tema’ama naatu baibin iyab kek tibitotoman boro hini’akir yababan hinab. God isan kwanayoyoban, saise men rarab kokou ana veya’amaim o Sabbath ana veya’amaim namataramih.
24.21 Dan 12.1Nati ana veya’amaim boro yababan kakafin men marasika anamaim o boro namamatar na’atube namataramih. God nati veya narurukabum na’at sabuw boro yawas men hinab. Baise ana sabuw rurubiniyih isah enotanot, imih veya boro narukabum.

24.23 Mat 24.5“Nati ana veya sabuw afa hinan hina’uwi, ‘Keriso’oban iti!’ o ‘Iban ni’i!’ men kwanitumatum.
24.24 Deu 13.1-3; 2Th 2.8-9; Rev 13.13-14Anayabin Keriso na’atube naatu dinab baifufuwenayah boro hinan ina’inan fokarih hinasinaf God ana rourubinen sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinabow. Imih abimatuwibo sawar hinamatar.

24.26 Luk 17.23-24“Sabuw a tur hinaowen hinao, ‘Iban nati arar yan ema’am,’ men imaim kwanan kwananuwih. O hinao, ‘Nati nanawan bar wanawanan wa’ir ema’am,’ men kwanitumatum.
24.27 Mat 24.37-39Veya yeninane namanamar ebowabow veya ra’iyinane uman emamarakaw, Orot Natun nanan ana marakaw boro nati na’atube.
24.28 Luk 17.37Menamaim orot babin biyan murubin inu’in mamu ikou boro etei imaim hinaru’ay.
24.29 Isa 13.10; 34.4; Ezk 32.7; Jol 2.10, 31; 2Pit 3.10; Rev 6.12-13“Yababan iti hinamamatar ufunamaim
book.q: ‘Veya boro matan nagugum,
sumar boro men nakaw,
daman boro hinihururuw hinare.
mar wanawanan sawar ti’inu’in etei boro hai efan hinasairen.’
book.p:
24.30 Dan 7.13; Zec 12.10; Rev 1.7“Imaibo Orot Natun maramaim boro natit, tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei orot Natun ana fair ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman natit sakuk wanawanan nanan hina’itin hinama hinarerey.
24.31 1Cor 15.52; 1Th 4.16Ana tounamatar boro taur douduf auman hinatit tafaram tutufin wanawanan umasusun kwafe’en etei God ana sabuw rurubinih hinabow hinita’ay.

“Ai fofou raurihimaim ebi’obaiyih kwanaso’ob, ai raurih boubuh tititit kwa kwaso’ob, ai hai buwayan ana veya i natit. Bai’obaiyen i ta’imon, sawar iti na’atube hinamamatar kwa boro kwanaso’ob, veya i nakabom etawan awanamaim ebatabat.
24.34 Mat 16.28Anababatun a tur ao’owen, sabuw iti boun yawas kwama’am boro iti sawar namatar kwana’itinibo kwanamorob.
24.35 Mat 5.18Mar tafaram i boro nasawar, baise ayu au tur boro men nasawar.
book.s: Men Yait Ta Jesu Ana Na Ana Veya So’obamih
book.p:
24.42 Mat 25.13“Isan imih mata to niwa’an, anayabin men kwaso’ob mar biy boro a Regah nan.
24.43 Luk 12.39-40; Rev 16.15Baise tur iti ao i naniyan kwanab. Orot bar matuwan bainowan hai veya nasoso’ob, boro matan nanuw nama’am nanunih hinabihir, ana bar boro men hinakwib hinabainuwimih. Imih mar etei mata to niwa’an kwanabobuna kwanama, anayabin Orot Natun boro men o veya kunotanotamaim natitamih.

“Akir wairafin bosunusunubayan naatu not wairafin ana orot ukwarin boro nayara’ah akir wairafih afa nakaifih hai bay ana veya’amaim nitih. Naatu ana orot ukwarin namatabir nanan bowabow gewasin nabowabow na’itin boro niyasisir.
24.47 Mat 25.21, 23A tur ao’owen nati akir wairafin boro nayara’ah sawar etei nakaifen. Baise akir wairafin nitafasar nao, ‘Au orot ukwarin men saise matabir enanamih.’ Naatu natatabir akir wairafih afa narauw ni’a’afiyih bay naa, harew tomayah bairi hinaa hinatom hinabikoko’aw wanawanan veya naatu sumar so’oba’e nama’am kwanekwan ana orot ukwarin namatabir nan natit. Naatu orot ukwarin nati ana akir wairafin boro nab narab ufun narauwatait, sabuw afa wanawanah rerekabih bairi baimakiy kakafin hinab hinama hinarerey wah takitak niwa’an.

25.1 Luk 12.35; Rev 19.7“Nati ana veya’amaim mar ana aiwob itinin i boro baibitar nah ten biyah numin tabin boubun itinamih hai ramef hibow hinan na’atube. Baibitar five i not wairafih, naatu baibitar five i men not wairafih. Baibitar men not wairafih hai ramef hibow, baise karisin men ta hirirabar hibaimih. Baibitar five not wairafih hai ramef hibow naatu kibubumaim karisin hirirbaren hibow auman hin. Tabin boubun ana orot men saise na, baibitar isan hima hikakaif matah fot hi’inurir hi’in.”
“Fainaiwan sabuw fanah sibisib hinowar, ‘Tabin boubun ana orot enan kwana kwa’itin.’”

“Imaibo baibitar ten hi’inu’in himisir, hai ramef matah hibobaituturen naatu hito’aben. Baibitar men not wairafih turahinah not wairafih isah hio, ‘A karisin turin kwaibaisi, aki ai ramef temomorob.’”
“Baise baibitar five not wairafih hiyafutih hio, ‘Men karam boro kwa turin anit naatu aki turin anab. Gewasin boro kwanan sabuw biyahimaim kwabo isa kwanatobon.’”
“Basit baibitar karisin tobonamih hinan ufut, tabin boubun ana orot natit, baibitar five hibobuna hima’am bairi hin tabin ana yasisir wanawanan hirun etawan hitufabon.”
25.11 Luk 13.25-27“Men manin baibitar five hina hitit hi’afririy ‘Regah, Regah, etawan kubotawiy arun!’”
25.12 Mat 7.23“Baise orot efatait eo, ‘Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab.’”
25.13 Mat 24.42“Isan imih mata to niwa’an kwanama, anayabin veya o sumar men kwa so’ob, mar biy boro iti sawar hinamatar.”

“Maramaim mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube. Orot ef yok bainanawan isan bobobunabuna ana veya; ana akir wairafih e’afih hina ana sawar kaifen isan faramih.
25.15 Rom 12.6Hai so’ob ana fofoninamaim orot ta ana kabay 5,000 itin, orot ta 2,000, orot ta 1,000. Imaibo i ana nanawan busuruf in. Akir wairafin 5,000 baib in banikamaim yari’iy in bowabow, 5,000 tafan hiya’abar bai. Akir wairafin bairou’abin i na’atube sinaf. Kabay 2,000 bai in imaim ma bikukumiyaw 2,000 tafan hiya’abar bai. Baise akir wairafin ta ana kabay 1,000 baib i mutufor in hub bai regah ana kabay hub iwan taunafut in.

“Hima manin maiyow, imaibo akir wairafih hai orot ukwarin matabir na tit, naatu hai bowabow nuteteyan itah. Naatu akir wairafin kabay 5,000 baib na run ana regah nanamaim eo, ‘Regah o 5,000 itu, baise ayu abowabow tafanamaim 5,000 abaib i iti kubai.’”

25.21 Mat 24.45-47; Luk 16.10“Regah iya’afut eo, ‘A merar ayiy, o i bowayan orot gewas naatu bosunusunubayan, bowabow gidigidih ibosunusunub kukakaifen gewas, imih boro anayara’ahi inayen sawar gagamih inakaifen. Kuna kurun au yasisir turin kubai!’
“Naatu akir wairafin bairou’abin kabay 2,000 baib na run eo, ‘Regah o a kabay 2,000 ibitu i iti, naatu abowabow tafanamaim 2,000 abaib i iti kubai.’

“Regah eo, ‘A merar ayiyi, o i bowayan orot gewas naatu bosunusunubayan, sawar matan ta ibosunusunub kukakaifen gewas. Imih boro anayara’ahi inayen sawar moumurihika inakaifen. Kuna kurun au yasisir turin kubai.’

“Imaibo akir wairafin baitonin kabay 1,000 baib na run eo, ‘Regah ayu aso’ob, o i a tur fokarin, turanah hai masaw o aribe kufafaur naatu turanah nowah o kutatanumabe kutaratar. Imih ayu o isa abir. A kabay abai an hub agais aibun inu’in, iti abai ana abit maiye kwitin.’

“Ana Regah iya’afut eo, ‘O i orot kakaf nokonokow anababatun! O iso’ob, ayu i tebob nonowatih afafour naatu tetatanum nonowatih ataratar. Gewasin au kabay banikamaim itayi ta’in tabowabow, ayu atanan, saise tafan hitaya’abar auman hitutu atab.’

“Naatu orot ukwarin eo, ‘Kabay iti orot umanamaim kwabosair kwabai kwan akir wairafin kabay 10,000 baib i kwaitin.
25.29 Mat 13.12; Mak 4.25; Luk 8.18Anayabin orot yait uman ebi’e’etaw boro sawar tafan hinaya’abar moumurihika nabow isan nakaram. Baise orot yait uman nutanub ema’am biyanamaim sawar etei’imak boro hinabosairen.
25.30 Mat 8.12; Luk 13.28Imih iti akir wairafin nukunukuwin kwabai kwan kwarauw ufun gugumin wanawanan ere, nati imaim nama narerey wan nayob nitafofofor.’

25.31 Mat 16.27; 19.28“Orot Natun ni’aiwob nanan ana maramaim ana tounamatar kakafiyih boro bairi hinan ana urama’am bonamanamarin tafan namare.
25.32 Ezk 34.17; Rev 20.11-13Naatu tafaram wanawanan sabuw tutufin etei boro hinaru’ay Jesu nanamaim hinabat. Imaibo i boro sabuw nakusib rou’ab hinamatar, nabatanenayan sheep naatu goat bairi ekukusibih na’atube.
Sheep i boro uman ana asukwafune hinabat naatu goat boro uman ana beyawane hinabat.”

“Imaibo aiwob orot boro sabuw uman ana asukwafune isah nao, ‘Kwa i Tamai ebigegewasini, kwana mar ana aiwob nowamih kwabai. Anayabin tafaram matara’e ana veya God kwa isa yabuna.
25.35 Isa 58.7Ayu bayumih amomorob bay kwaitu, sikau mamamah harew kwaitu atom, abinanawan au merar kwayi a baremaim ama ra’at ama. Segar ama’am faifuw kwaitu aus, asawow ainu’in, kwakaifu naatu dibur bar ama’am kwana kwainanawanu.’”

“Sabuw gewasih boro hiniya’afut hinao, ‘Regah mar biyika bayumih imomorob ai’it bay ait, o sika mamamah harew ait itom? Naatu biyika inanawan inan ai’it a merar ayiy abuwi ai sebomaim imara’at? O segar ima’am faifuw ait ius? Naatu mar biyika isawow inu’in akaifi, o dibur bar ima’ama ainanawani?’”
25.40 Pro 19.17; Mat 10.42; Mak 9.41“Aiwob orot boro niyafutih nao, ‘Anababatun au’uwi, nati ana veya’amaim ayu taitu gidigidih isah kwasisinaf, i ayu isau kwasinaf.’”

25.41 Mat 7.23“Imaibo sabuw ana beyawane hinabatabat isah boro nao, ‘Biyau’umaim kwatit sa’ab kwan. Kwa i orarafen wanawanan kwarun, Demon Mowan ana tounamatar bairi isah wairaf wanatowan hibobogaigiwas kwan imaim kwarun bairi e’arahi. Ayu aa amomorob, men abisa ta kwaitu aan, sikau mamamah harew men kwaitu atom. Ai nanawan anan men au merar kwayi a sebomaim amara’at. Segar ama’am faifuw men kwaitu ausimih, a sawow ainu’in, o dibur baremaim ama’am men kwana kwainanawanu.’”
“Naatu i boro hiniya’afut hinao, ‘Regah, mar biyika o aa imomorob, o harewamih sika mamamah, o ibinanawan, o segar ima’am, o isawow inu’in, o dibur bar ima’am men aibaisimih?’”
“Imaibo i boro niyafutih nao, ‘Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu taitu gidigidih men kwabibaisih, nati i men kwakok ayu kwatibaisu.’”
25.46 Dan 12.2; Jn 5.29“Naatu nati sabuw i boro hinan ma’ama wanatowan ana baimakiy hinab. Baise sabuw gewasih boro hinan yawas ma’ama wanatowan hinab hinama hiniyasisir.”
book.s: Firis Hai Ukwarih Jesu Rabin Isan Hiyakitifuw
book.p:
Jesu bi’obaibiyih ufunamaim, ana bai’ufununayah isah eo,
26.2 Exo 12.1-27; Mat 20.18“Kwanaso’ob veya rou’ab ufunamaim Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw enan. Nati ana veya’amaim Orot Natun boro hinab rakit sabuw umahimaim hinayai hina’onaf.”

Imaibo Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in etei firis gagamin Kaiafas ana baremaim hiru’ay. Naatu Jesu wa’iwa’iramaim fatumin bain asabunin isan hiyakitifuw. Baise hio, “Men hiyuw tanabowabow wanawananamaim, anayabin rakit boro tanaku’ub was hinagiy.”

Jesu na Bethany orot Simon biyan kokom ani’anin ana baremaim tit,
26.7 Luk 7.37-38mare ma bay eaa auman babin ta kibub kikimin kabay wabin alabaster imaim hikwak raiy ana baiyan gagamin hisuwai batabat bai na run Jesu aribun yan isuwai re.
Ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin yah so’ar hio, “Iti sawar i yabin en asir esisinaf. Igewasin iti raiy ana baiyan tatayara’ah hitatubun kabay tatab, sabuw yababan wairafih tatitih.”

Baise Jesu so’ob abisa hio, imih iuwih eo, “Babin men yumatanamaim kwana’umih. Anayabin sawar gewasin maiyow ayu isau esisinaf.
26.11 Deu 15.11Sabuw yababan wairafih boro mar etei bairi kwanama kwanibaisih, baise ayu i boro men mar etei bairi tanama’amih. Iti babin ayu biyau raiy erabirab i ayu au morob isan eyayabuna. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, tafaram wanawananamaim iti Tur Gewasin hinabibinan ana maramaim abisa gewasin iti babin sisinaf boro kik owe’owen na’atube auman hinabinan.”

Imaibo bai’ufununayah nah 12 wanawanahimaim orot wabin Judas Iscariot tit in firis ukwarih biyah tit,
26.15 Zec 11.12; Jn 11.57naatu ibatiyih, “Ayu Jesu anab kwa anabit boro abisa ayu kwanitu?” Naatu matanamaim kabay hibotait hiyab in 30 na’atube hiya’asair. Nati ana veya’amaim Judas ef ana gewasin nuwet Jesu batih isan.
26.17 Exo 12.14-20Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw veya wantoro’ot bubusuruf, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina hio, “Menamaim kukokok Tar Nowaten ana bay anabogaigiwas?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanan Jerusalem bar merar kwanatit orot iti ana tur kwana’owen kwanao, ‘Bai’obaiyenayan eo, ayu au veya i natit, akokok au bai’ufununayah bairi boro o abaremaim Tar nowaten ana hiyuw anaa aniyasisir.’” Bai’ufununayah Jesu eobaimanih na’atube hisinaf, Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw hibogaigiwas.
Naatu nati rabirab bai’ufununayah etei 12 Jesu bairi himare hibusuruf bay hiaa. Bay hiaa wanawananamaim Jesu eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, kwa wanawanamaim orot ta boro babau inao anamorob.”
Ana bai’ufununayah hai yababan ra’at, naatu ta’ita’imon hibusuruf Jesu hibabatiy hio, “Regah, nati i men ayu’umih?”

26.23 Psa 41.9Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot menatan ayu airi tew wanawanan ai rafiy anabubutu’ub, nati orot i boro ayu babau nao. Orot Natun i boro namorob Bukamaim hikirum hio na’atube. Baise orot yait ayu babau nao, nati orot i boro yababan gagamin na’in nab. Gewasin nati orot tafaramamaim men tatufuwamih!”
Judas yanuwayan Jesu ibatiy eo, “Regah, o kunotanot i men ayu’umih?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “O wai.”
Bay hia wanawanan Jesu rafiy bai, i gegewasin sawar, imasib, ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Iti i ayu biyau kwabai naatu kwa’aan.”

Imaibo wine kerowasamaim hisuwai batabat bai God ana merar yi sawar, itih eo, “Kwa etei’imak iti kwanatom.
26.28 Exo 24.8; Jer 31.31-34; Zec 9.11; 1Cor 10.16Iti i ayu au rara, au Obaibasit Boubun abisuwai sabuw moumurih hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan. A tur ao’owen, ayu iti wine boro men anatom, anama’am nati ana veya’amaim wine boubun kwa bairit Tamai ana aiwobomaim tanatom.”
26.30 Luk 22.39; Jn 18.1Naatu himisir ew ta hitabor hitit hin Olive Oyawamaim hitit.
26.31 Zec 13.7; Jn 16.32Imaibo Jesu hai tur eowen eo, “Iti boun gugumin kwa etei boro kwanabihir ayu kwanihamiyu, Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube,
book.q: ‘Ayu nabatanenayan
orot boro ana’asabun,
naatu bobaituw etei boro na’abaragiy nanabin hinan.’
book.p: 26.32 Mat 28.7, 16Baise ayu morobone anamimisir ufunamaim boro au na ani’iyon wan anan Galilee anatit.”
Peter iya’afut eo, “Turau’unah boro hinabihir, baise ayu boro men anabihir o anihamiyimih.”
26.34 Mat 26.69-75Jesu Peter iu, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, boun gugumin o boro ayu inayaubu mar tounu, naatu i ufunamaim kokorere boro nao’o inanowar.”
Peter raro’on rab eo, “Ayu boro men kafa’imo tur nati ana’omih, morobomih na’at airit tanamorob.” Naatu bai’ufununayah etei tur ta’imon hio.

Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hitit hin Gethsemane hitit naatu iuwih eo, “Iti imaim kwamare kwama, ayu anan auweyane anayoyoban.” Peter naatu Zebedee natunatun rou’ab buwih bairi hin, ana not kwaris naatu dogoron wanawanan ana yababan ra’at
26.38 Jn 12.27iuwih eo, “Dogorou wanawanan au yababan i ra’at kwanekwan dogorou emama’afut. Imih iti’imaim kwamare mata nanuw bairit tanama.”

Jesu akisinamo nabinamaim in yumatan au babe ra’iy yoyoban eo, “Tamai, karam iti biyababan ana kerowas ayu biyau’umaim itabosair, baise men ayu au kok, o a kok.” Jesus praying in gardencn01810B.tifMat 26.39©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Bai’ufununayah bay hibow tefafaram26.39

Naatu matabir maiye na ana bai’ufununayah nah tounu hi’inu’in itih, Peter isan eo, “Anayabin aisim nataunu’uka mata hifot kwa’inu’in, karam one hour na’atube mata tanuw bairit tatama? Mata to iwa’an kwayoyoban, saise men routobon kwanabaimih. Anun i ekokok yoyoban, baise biya i himorob.”
Mar bairou’abin Jesu in maiye yoyoban eo, “Tamai, iti biyababan ana kerowas bosairin isan ana ef men nama’am na’at, basit anatom, saise a kokok anasinaf namatar.”
Matabir maiye nan matah kou bit hi’in yugaranih inan itih. Naatu ihamiyih hi’in i mar baitonin matabir in tur ta’imon eo yoyoban maiye.

Imaibo matabir na ana bai’ufununayah biyah tit eo, “Kwa boro’ika kwa’in kwabiyarir? Mata tinuw, kwamisir, Orot Natun ana veya i natit, sabuw kakafih umahimaim eyey.
26.46 Jn 14.31Kwamisir tan! Orot yanuwayanaban iti enan kwa’i’itin.”

Jesu eo ana tur sawara’e, bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta, wabin Judas, sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in, firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in hibiyafarih nawiyih kaiy, kefat, mis hiteten auman bairi hina hitit. Orot yanuwayan sabuw eobaimanih eo, “Orot menatan anamamamay orotoban nati kwanab kwanafatum.” Judas mutufor in Jesu biyan tit eo, “Tufuw isa nama Bai’obaiyenayan!” 26.49 Rabbi naatu mamay.

Jesu iya’afut eo, “Au begon, abisa isan inot inan saife kusinaf.” Imaibo sabuw hibatabat hitit Jesu uman hibai hibukikin.
26.51 Jn 18.26Bai’ufununayan orot ta ana kaiy bora’ah, firis gagamin ana akir wairafin tainin roun eafuw.

26.52 Gen 9.6; Rev 13.10Naatu Jesu iu, “A kaiy ana efanamaim kwiwan maiye, anayabin sabuw iyab umahimaim kaiy tema’am boro kaiyomaim hinamorob. O men iso’obamih, ayu Tamai isan atabifefeyan boro mar ta’imon tounamatar sibisib na’atube tiyafarih ayu hitawasfafaru. Baise nati na’atube anasinaf, Buk Atamaninamaim mataramih hi’o hikikirum boro men niturobe’emih.”

26.55 Luk 19.47; 21.37Naatu tatabir sabuw isah eo, “Ana itinin ayu bainowan mowan na’atube, imih kaiy kefat kwaiteten ayu yuwu rabu’umih kwanan. Mar etei Tafaror Bar wanawananamaim ama sabuw abi’obaiyih aisim men imaim kwatafatumu? Baise abisa God ana dinab oro’orot Buk Atamaninamaim hio hikikirum emamatar saife nan niturobe.” Nati’imaim ana bai’ufununayah etei hihamiy hibihir.

Sabuw Jesu hibai hifatum hibai hin firis gagamin wabin Kaiafas ana baremaim hitit, nati’imaim Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in hiru’ay hima’am. Baise Peter yokaika Jesu i’ufunun bairi hina, firis gagamin ana bar sebosebomaim hitit naatu run ma’utenayan oro’orot bairi himare abisa tamamatar ta’itin isan.

Firis gagamin naatu kaniser ana kau’ay etei hiru’ay nuhinot tur hitabow hitit hitifufuwen Jesu tamorob isan. Baise nuhinot tur hinunuwet men ta hibai. Sabuw moumurih maiyow hitit Jesu morobomih hibifufuwen hai tur naniyan en.

Yomaninamaim orot rou’ab hitit,
26.61 Jn 2.19-21hiorereb hio “Iti orot eo, ‘Ayu i karam God ana Tafaror bar anagurus nare, naatu veya tounu wanawanan boro anawowab efanin namatar.’”

Imaibo Firis gagamin misir Jesu isan eo, “O boro men tur ta inao? Orot hairi o a tur isan hio’orereb inonowar boro tur ta inao ai en?”
26.63 Isa 53.7; Mat 27.12Baise Jesu awanamaim men tur ta titamih.
Naatu Firis gagamin eo maiye, “God wanatowan ma’anin wabinamaim aobaifaro, o God ana Roubinen orot na’at basit kuo anowar.”

26.64 Psa 110.1; Dan 7.13; Mat 24.30Jesu iya’afut eo, “Tur i nati kuo, baise kwa etei a tur ao’owen. Mar boro nanan orot Natun boro God uman ana asukwafune nabat mar ana rofom wanawanan nanan kwana’itin.”

26.65 Mat 9.3; Jn 10.33Firis gagamin iti tur nonowar ana veya ana faifuw bai sib eo, “Iti orot i tur kakafin maiyow eo God ebi’ib! Aisim boro tanama sif rubonayah afa’abo tananuwet? Kwa taiyuw bai’ib tur eo kwanowar,
26.66 Lev 24.16; Jn 19.7kwa a not i mi’itube?” Etei hiya’afut hio, “I bowabow kakafin sinaf imih namorob!”
26.67 Isa 50.6; 53.5Imaibo yumatan hikwaitututur, hiborabirab naatu sabuw afa hiboborabirab, hio, “Keriso, o God ana dinab orot na’at kuo anowar! Yait o rab?”
Peter ufun bar ana seboseb wanawanan mare ma’am, Firis Gagamin ana bowayan babitai tit iu, “O auman i Galilee orot Jesu ana of ta.”
Baise Peter sabuw etei nahimaim yaub eo, “Ayu o a tur kuo yabin men aso’ob.”
Naatu misir tit in bar ana etawan awanamaim tit, nati’imaim bowayan babitai ta itin naatu oro’orot nati’imaim hibatabat hai tur eowen eo, “Iti orot i Jesu Nazareth mowan ana of ta.”
Peter iban maiye yaub naatu ifaro eo, “Ayu nati orot men aso’ob.”
Hima kafa’imo orot afa nati’imaim hibatabat hina Peter biyan hitit hio, “O i anababatun ni’i orot ana of ta, anayabin a tur kuo ana nowarin naatu a sawar io’osen ana itinin i ta’imon.”

Imaibo Peter ifaro eo, “Ana bifufuwen na’at God ana orarafen anab, tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu iti orot men aso’ob.” Mar ta’imon kokorere eo.
26.75 Mat 26.34Basit Peter nuhin taseb Jesu eo not, “O boro mar tounu ayu inayaubu, imaibo kokorere boro nao.” Naatu Peter tit in ufun rerey igagagamat.
Maraumanika Firis ukwarih etei naatu regaregah ai’in bairi Jesu morob isan hio hiyabunai sawar. Basit uman hifatum hibai hitit Roman hai gawan Pilate umanamaim hiyai.

Judas, yanuwayan Jesu kakafinamaim hiya’iyai i’itin ana veya dogoron rusib, kabay 30 bai matabir na Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in nahimaim tit, eo “Ayu asinaf kakaf orot gewasin baban ao emomorob.” Hiya’afut hio, “Nati o a yababan, o akisimo ina’itin inayabunai.”

27.5 Mat 26.14-15; Act 1.18-19Judas kabay nati Tafaror Bar kabay teya’aya’amaim itaiy re naatu ihamiyih tit in sikan warasa yai morob. Judas throwing money downcn01832b.tifMat 27.5©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Judas kabay bai na rouw ere’er27.5

Firis ukwarih kabay hibai hio, “Iti i rara ana kabay, ata ofafar men ebibasit boro Tafaror Bar ana kabay ya’aya’amaim tanayai na’in.” Etei’imak hio hibibasit ufunamaim, kabay hibai noukwat bu’urayan ana kamar hitubun, saise nah touman sabuw hai rah ana efan namatar. Ana’an nati isan kamar wabin “Rara ana Kamar” hibiwab in na iti boun ana veya tit.
27.9-10 Zec 11.12-13Naatu abistan dinab orot Jeremiah eo ina iturobe.
book.q: “Israel sabuw orot ana baiyan
baitinin isan kabay etei 30 hibibasit. Noukwat bu’urayan ana kamar hitubun Regah ayu iu’uwu na’atube.” 27.10 Jer 32.6-9
book.p: Jesu Roman gawan nanamaim bat, naatu gawan Jesu ibatiy, “O Jews sabuw hai aiwob?” Jesu iya’afut eo. “Nati kuo, ayu boro abi tur anao.”

27.12 Isa 53.7Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in Jesu ubar hitin tur kakafin isan hio men kafa’imo iyafutimih. Basit Pilate Jesu iu, “Sabuw kakafih isan ubar hit teo’orereb kunonowar?” Baise Jesu men kafa’imo awanamaim tur ta tit, naatu Gawan orot ana kasiy ra’at ifofofor men kafaita.

Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya, gawan hai binanakwar eo na’atube, mar etei dibur barane sabuw hai kok orot menatan tirurubin i ebobotait. Nati ana veya orot wabin gagamin Jesu Barabas dibur ma’am. Naatu sabuw hiru’ay sawar, basit Pilate ibatiyih, “Orot menatan kwakokok diburune anabotait, Jesu Barabas o Jesu Keriso?”
27.18 Jn 11.47-48; 12.19Anayabin sabuw bobowenamaim Jesu hibai Pilate umanamaim hiya’iyai i so’ob.
Pilate baibabatiyen ana efanamaim ma’am, aawan tur iyafar na eo, “Orot nati gewasin isan men abisa ta inasinaf, anayabin fai ayu mim fokarin maiyow isan amim au not ekakasiy”
Baise firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in sabuw tafah fair hiyai, Barabas botaitin naatu Jesu asabunin isan Pilate hiokikin.
Pilate sabuw ibatiyih, “Orot i rou’ab, imih orot menatan kwakokok ana botait?” Etei’imak hiya’afut hio, “Barabas!”
Pilate sabuw ibatiyih, “Bo Jesu wabin Keriso isan boro mi’itube anasinaf?” Etei’imak hiya’afut hio, “Ku’onaf!”

Pilate ibatiyih, “Abisa kakafin sinaf?” Baise sabuw hitar koukuw hio, “Ku’onaf!” Jesus placed before crowdCN01822b.tifMat 27.23©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Sabuw rou’ay gagamin nahimaim Pilate Jesu ibatiy27.23

27.24 Deu 21.6-9Pilate naniyan bai men karam boro ef ta tasinaf, naatu sabuw auman kougeyagey hibusuruf, imih harew bai sabuw etei nahimaim uman sauwen eo, “Ayu iti orot namomorob isan men ana ubar anabaimih. Nati i kwa akis a ubar.”
27.25 Act 5.28Sabuw etei hiya’afut hio, “I namomorob ana ubar i aki anab naatu natunatu auman ana ubar hinab.”
Imaibo Pilate Barabas botait, naatu Jesu wabir ana baiyowayah iuwih, onafin isan hibai hin.

Imaibo Pilate ana baiyowayah Jesu hibai hin gawan ana bar hitit, nati’imaim baiyowayah etei hiru’ay hibebera’uh.
27.28 Luk 23.11Ana faifuw hi’oromen, faifuw namar hibai hi’us, kokor hififin ukwarin ana raramamih hiyara’ah, uman ana asukwafune tu hitin, nanamaim suh hiyowen hi’i’iyab hio, “Jews hai aiwob tanabora’ara’ah.”
27.30 Isa 50.6Yumatan hikwaitututur, uman tu hibosair ukwarinamaim hiborabirab. Hibi’i’iyab ufunamaim, faifuw hi’us ma’am hibosair ana faifuw hibow hina hi’us, imaibo hibai hin onafin isan.

Hitit hinan efamaim Sairini orot wabin Simon bairi hitar naatu baiyowayah hi’ukikin Jesu ana onaf bai e’abar. Hina efan wabin Golgotha imaim hitit, nati efan hibiwab yabin efan ana itinin i orot ukwarin ana gifow na’atube.
27.34 Psa 69.21Nati’imaim wine harew tenakuyakuy 27.34 vinegar auman hisartabir Jesu tomanih hitin bai kakartubun ufunamaim kwahir.
27.35 Psa 22.18Naatu hi’o’onaf ana veya arowamaim ana faifuw hikusib hifaram hibow. Imaibo nati’imaim himarir Jesu hima’uh hima. Naatu tafanamaim ubar hibitin ana tur hikirum hikubar, “ITI I JESU, JEW SABUW HAI AIWOB.”
27.38 Isa 53.12Naatu bainowan orot rou’ab Jesu bairi hi’onafih, ta ana beyawane ta ana asukwafune.
27.39 Psa 22.7; 109.25Sabuw nanane hinan ukwarih hita’asi’asiy ubar hitin tur kakafih maiyow Jesu hi’i’iyab hio,
27.40 Mat 26.61; Jn 2.19“Tafaror bar tarabounin veya tounu wanawananamaim wowabin sawaramih io! Bo o God Natun na’at kwiyawasi cross afe’enane kure’eban a’it?”

Ef ta’imon firis ukwarih, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in auman Jesu hi’i’iyab hio, “Sabuw afa iyawasih, baise i taiyuwin men karam boro niyawas, Israel sabuw hai aiwob! Bo cross afe’enane boun nare tana itin boro tanitumitum.
27.43 Psa 22.8God i bitumitum, bo God boun iyawasiban ta’itin, anayabin i taiyuwin i God Natun rouw eo.” Ef ta’imon bainowah orot rou’ab Jesu bairi hi’onafih hi’inu’in ubar hitin tur kakafih hi’u.

Veya yen tafat yan tafaram etei gugum inu’in veya botabir re 3 korok bai.
27.46 Psa 22.1Veya 3 korok na’atube, Jesu fanan aumetawat rerey eo, “Eloi, Eloi Lema Sabachthani?” Anayabin, “Au God, au God, aisim ihamiyu?”
Sabuw afa nati’imaim hibatabat hinowar hio, “Elijah isan eafa’af kwanowar.”
27.48 Psa 69.21Naatu orot ta nunuw in sawar ta biyan sou’usau bai, wine tenakuyakuy butu’ub, eot ra’ah Jesu awanamaim yai tomamih. Baise sabuw afa hio, “Kubat, Elijah nan nabiyawas tana’itin!”
Jesu iban maiye fanan aumetawat rerey, naatu ayubin tabaratait.

27.51 Exo 26.31-33; Hib 10.19-20Faifuw Tafaror Bar wanawanan hita’iy re efan kakafiyin hirafut inu’in yate rusib re in uran tit rou’ab himatar, iriyoy tit kabay hitaseseb. Rah awah hiha’e, sabuw kakafiyih moumurih na’in marasika himorob hi’inu’in etei hiyawas himisir. Hai rah hitumaren hitit, Jesu morobone mimisir ufunamaim, murumurubih etei hitit hin Jerusalem hitit, sabuw moumurih na’in hi’itih.
Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarih naatu baiyowayah afa bairi nati’imaim Jesu hima’uh hima’am iriyoy hitatam, naatu abisa’awat himamatar hi’itah hai bir ra’at hio, “Turobe iti orot i anababatun God Natun!”

27.55 Luk 8.2-3Nati’imaim baibin moumurih na’in hina ef yokaika hibat abisa’awat himamatar hi’itah. Iti baibin i Galilee’ine Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hina hibibais. Baibin wanawanahimaim i Mary Magdalene, Mary, James, Joseph hairi hinah naatu Zebedee aawan.

Birabirab auman orot sawar wairafin, wabin Joseph ana tafaram Arimathea’ane na tit. Iti orot i Jesu ana bai’ufununayan ta, baise wa’iwa’iramaim bi’ufununun. temple veil being torn downCN01843B.TIFMat 27.57©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Tafaror bar wanawanan faifuw taseb ro’ab himatar27.57
27.58 Deu 21.22-23Joseph na Pilate nanamaim tit, Jesu biyan bai na ya’in isan fefeyan, naatu Pilate ana baiyowayah uwih Jesu biyan hibai hitin. Joseph, Jesu biyan bai faifuw boubunamaim sum
27.60 Isa 53.9bai in hub boubun i isan iti boro’omo to naiwanamaim bai inu’in, imaim Jesu yai naatu kabay ifururuw na sou hir naatu ana ubar in. Mary Magdalene naatu Mary, James, Joseph hairi hinah i rah rewan rounane himare hima hi’itin.

Mar natot i boro Sabbath ana veya, imih Firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee hina Pilate nanamaim hitit
27.63 Mat 12.40; 16.21; Mak 9.31; 10.33-34; Luk 9.22; 18.31-33; Jn 2.19-21hio, “Regah ni’i orot baifufuwenayan yawasin ma’am eo, ‘Ayu boro veya tounu ufunamaim morobone anamisir.’ Iti na’atube eo i aki anotanot. Isan imih akokok baiyowayah afa iniyafarih hinan rah hinama’uh hinama veya tounu, saise ana bai’ufununayah boro men hinan biyan hinabain hinabihir, naatu morobone misir maiye hinarouw hinao sabuw hinifuwihimih. Anayabin baifuwen iti boun natitit boro kakafin anababatun men wan anabifuwen na’atube’emih.”

Pilate iyafutih eo, “Ma’utenayah orot kwa aso’obamaim kwanabuwih naatu kwana’uwih matah toniwa’an rah hinama’uh gewas hinama.” Basit hitit hin rah ana etawan kabay tafanamaim kwah hiyai, naatu ma’utenayah orot nati’imaim rah hima’uh hima. soldiers guarding tombcn01849b.tifMat 27.66©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Mautenayah rah awan hibat firis bairi teo27.66
Sabbath ufunamaim, Sunday yasi’uw Mary Magdalene naatu Mary ta hairi rah fahiwinamih hin.

Naniyan meyemeye iriyoy gagamin na’in hitatam, Regah ana tounamatar marane re na agim ifururuw tit naatu afe’en mara’at ma. Ana itinin i namanamar ebowabow na’atube, ana faifuw hibikwes itinin i wakasakas na’atube. Orot rah hima’uh hima’am hai bir ra’at, ah umah duduwar rab hire himamayay hi’in.

Baise tounamatar baibin hairi isah eo, “Men kwanabir, ayu aso’ob kwa i Jesu hio’onaf momorob kwanunuwih.
28.6 Mat 12.40; 16.21Baise i morobone misir maiye, eo kwanonowar na’atube, kwarun inu’in ana efan kwa’i’itin. Saise kwanamatabir kwan ana bai’ufununayah hai tur kwana’owen, ‘Jesu i morobone misir maiye, naatu mat au Galilee enan, imaim boro kwana’itin.’ Abisa asoso’ob iti a tur ao’owen.”

Basit baibin rah hitumar, hai bir ra’at, baise erekawasa auman hinunuw hin ana bai’ufununayah hai tur owenamih. Naniyan meyemeye Jesu nahine nan bairi hitar naatu iuwih eo, “Tufuw isa nama.” Hinunuw hina nanamaim suh hiyowen hire an hibutubun hikwafir.
28.10 Mat 26.32Jesu iuwih eo, “Men kwanabir, kwan taitu hai tur kwana’owen hinan Galilee imaim boro ayu hina’itu.”

Baibin hairi himatabir efamaim hinan, baiyowayah orot afa rah hima’uh hima’ama himatabir hin Jerusalem hitit, naatu abisa’awat himamatar firis ukwarih hai tur hi’owen. Naatu nati’imaim firis hai ukwarih orot gagamih bairi hiku’ay hai not hiyabuna sawar, imaibo agim gagamin na’in baiyowayah hitih naatu hi’uwih, sabuw hai tur kwana’owen, “Aki ainu’in ufut Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hibai hibihir. Saise gawan orot iti tur nanonowar aki boro kwa isa anakubuna gewas nanowar naatu boro men abisa ta isa nasinaf.” Basit baiyowayah agim hibai hiobe’atih na’atube hisinaf. Imih iti boun ana veya’amaim iti tur i ra’at tasasar tit, Jews wanawanahimaim etei hiso’ob.

28.16 Mat 26.32Imaibo bai’ufununayah nah 11 Jesu iu’uwih na’atube hina Galilee oyawamaim hitit, nati’imaim hi’i’itin ana weya hikwafir, baise bai’ufununayah afa i erehikasiy auman.
28.18 Jn 13.3; Eph 1.20-22Jesu na sisibihimaim bat eo, “Mar naatu tafaram ana roubabaruwen fair etei God ayu itu.
28.19 Mak 16.15-16; Act 1.8Isan imih kwanatit kwanan tafaram wanawananamaim sabuw kwanabow au bai’ufununayah hinamatar, naatu God Tamah, God Natun, God Anunin Kakafiyin wabihimaim babataito kwanitih. Naatu au obaiyunen tur etei kwani’obaiyih hinabosiyasiyar. Naatu kwanaso’ob ayu i mar etei nati biyamaim boro bairi tanama tanan mar yomanin tanatit.”

book.p: Mark
Tur Gewasin Kikirum
Roube’aten Ana Tur

Mark ana busuruf Tur Gewasin kirum eo i “Nati Jesu Keriso i Tur Gewasin naatu i God Natun.” Jesu ana itinin bobotait i sinaf ana orot naatu ana fair auman. I ana fair i bai’obaiyenamaim hi’itin, demon hai fair bisnowaten naatu sabuw hai kakafih nonotawiyen. Jesu taiyuwin isan eo, i Orot Natun, i na ana yawas sabuw baitih bowabow kakafihine koubunih tit isan.

Mark ana turamaim Jesu isan bidudur i mutufor eo idudur, anababatun tafafar ef gewasinamaim bat sinaf, abistan Jesu sisinaf gagaminaka isan eo baise men i ana tur naatu ana bai’obaiyen. Iti ufunamaim John Baptist naatu Jesu ana bapataito naatu ana routobon isah butubunen eo, imaibo mataik rabon Jesu ana baiyawasen naatu ana bai’obaibiyen botaiten i dudur. Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah imaibo hamen hamen hina hisu’ub gewas, baise sabuw iyab Jesu isan kouh hibitin anababatun ana rakit himatar.
Tur gewasin yomanih rou’ab, ina’inan iti na’atube imaim rufut, ebi’obaiyit i orot ta kirum men iti buk Mark kikirum i kirumimih.
Fef wanawanan tur iti na’atube hi’asgidigid.
Tur Gewasin ana busurufin (1.1-13)
Jesu ana bowabow Galilee wanawanan (1.14–9.50)
Galilee ine tit in Jerusalem rur (10.1-52)
Jesu ana mafufun fur Jerusalem sisibin naatu wanawananamaim ma’am (11.1–15.47)
Jesu ana misir maiye (16.1-8)
Regah Jesu ana bairerereb naatu au mar yey (16.9-20)
Iti i Tur Gewasin ana busurufin i Jesu Keriso God Natun isan.
1.2 Mal 3.1Ana tur i dinab orot Isaiah kikirum imaim busuruf eo.
book.q: “‘Ayu boro au tur abarayan o namaim aniyun nan,

i boro o a ef nayabuna.’
1.3 Isa 40.3Orot ta fanan arar yanamaim eafa’af,
‘Regah ana ef kwanayabuna
ana ef kwanimutufur imaim naremor!’”
book.p:
1.4 Act 13.24; 19.4John arar yanane tit na dogor baikitabir bapataito bain, saise God bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan binan. Judea bar merar tutufin etei naatu Jerusalem sabuw tutufin etei hitit hin biyan hitit. Hai kakafih hi’e’en naatu Jordan harewamaim bapataito itih.
1.6 2Ki 1.8; Mat 11.8John ana faifuw i camel bunibunin sakir iyoun, naatu ana kikir i bobaituw ta kanabin e’afuw naiwan kik, ana bay i sisik naatu kutor tafu.
1.7 Act 13.25Ana tur i iti binan, “Orot ta ayu ufu’umaim enan ana fair i ra’at ayu natabiru, an ana sumasum ayu men karam boro ana kwafure anarufam. John the baptistCN01653b.tifMrk 1.7©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.John Baptist ebibinan1.7-8 Ayu i harewamaim bapataito abit, baise i boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito nit.”

Nati ana veya’amaim tafaram gagamin Galilee wanawanan bar merar Nazarethane Jesu na Jordan harewamaim John bapataito itin. Jesu harewane yey ana maramaim, mar botawiy, Anun Kakafiyin mamu imak na’atube re na tafan yey itin.
1.11 Psa 2.7; Isa 42.1; Mat 12.18; Mak 9.7Naatu maramaim orot fanan tit eo, “O i ayu Natu, ayu Natu au yabow, o isa ayu abiyasisir.”

Mar ta’imonamo Anun Kakafiyin iunawiy arar yan tit.
1.13 Psa 91.11-13Veya 40 na’atube imaim ma, Satan routobon itin. Sigarafor yumatah ta ta wanawanahimaim, naatu tounamatar nati’imaim i hina hitatafafar.

1.14 Mak 6.17John dibur hiyayari’iy ufunamaim Jesu na Galilee tit, naatu God ana tur gewasin binan eo,
1.15 Mat 3.2“Veya anababatun i na tit, God ana aiwob i na iyubin, bowabow kakafin kwasisinaf i kwanihamiyen kwanamatabir tur gewasin kwanitumitum!”

Naatu Jesu harew Galilee kukuf dones yan remor inan, siy bowayah orot rou’ab itih, Simon Peter tain Andrew hairi buwatamaim siy hibowabow. Jesu iuwih eo, “Kwai’ufnunu bairi tan ayu boro ani’obaiyi sabuw kwanabow.” Mar ta’imonamo hai buwat hihamiyen naatu hi’ufunun bairi hin.

In kikiminamo orot rou’ab itih, James tain John hairi, orot Zebedee natunatun, hai wa wanawanan hima hai buwat hiyayabuna. Jesu e’afa’af ana veya hairi matah kabiy himisir tamah Zebedee ana bowabow sabuw bairi wa afe’en hihamiyih hima, i Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hina tafaram Capernaum hitit, naatu Baiyarir ana veya na Kou’ay Bar run naatu busuruf i’obaiyih eo.
1.22 Mat 7.28-29Sabuw hinonowar hifofofor men kafaita. Anayabin bai’obaiyen bitih ana itinin i roubabaruwen ana fairamaim bi’obaiyih, men Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah na’atube’emih. Men yok afiy kakafin 1.23 katokato’iy, afiy katokato’iy teten 26, 27 auman ema’am orot iwanasum ma’am na Kou’ay Bar run ikirir eo,
1.24 Mak 5.7“Jesu Nazareth mowan, aki biyai’imaim o abisa sinafumih kukokok? O kukokok aki inagurusi’imih? Ayu aso’ob o i yait, O i God ana Orot Kakafiyin!”

Jesu afiy kakafin kwarar iu, “Awa efot orot biyanamaim kutit!”
1.26 Mak 9.26Afiy kakafin orot iyuwiyuw naatu fanan auman bihir tit.

Sabuw etei hifofofor men kafaita naatu taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti anayabin i abisa? Bai’obaiyen boubun roubabaruwen ana fair auman, anayabin afiy kakafih eo biyunih i fanan tebaib!”
1.28 Mat 4.24Naatu Jesu ana tur saisewat tasasar tit tafaram Galilee ana uman men sanet hima’am eretei tur hinowar.

Kou’ay Bar hibihamiy ufunamaim James, John hairi mutufor hin Simon Andrew hairi hai bar hitit. Simon rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab inu’in Jesu na titit ana veya ana tur hi’owen, Naatu na biyan tit uman bai ibais misir, nati’imaim sawow ihamiy busuruf bow. 1.31 bay eafusar itab hi’aa

Nati rabirab veya re’er auman sabuw sawusawuwih naatu afa demon hitarsumih hima’am hibuwih hina Jesu isan. Sabuw nati bar merar hima’am etei hiru’ay nati bar nanamaim,
1.34 Mak 3.10-12Jesu sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hinan etei iyawasih naatu demon moumurih nunih hitit, men ibasit boro demon tihamiyih tur hitao, anayabin i hiso’ob i yait.

1.35 Mat 14.23; Mak 6.46Mar tomih ana gugumin iu’ufiy auman Jesu misir bar ihamiy tit remor in bar merar gagamin natabir na efan noutanubinamaim tit imaim ma yoyoban. Baise Simon ana ofonah bairi hitit hinuwih hin. Naatu hititita’urih ana veya hi’u, “Sabuw o tenunuwihi.”

Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “It tanan bar merar afa iti bar merar gagamin sisibinamaim auman isah anabinan, anayabin nati isan ayu ana.”
1.39 Mat 4.23; 9.35Imih Galilee wanawanan etei remor hai Kou’ay Baremaim binan naatu demon kakafih nunih hitit.
Orot biyan kokom ani’anin na Jesu nanamaim tit sun yowen baibaisin isan ifefeyan eo, “Inakokok na’at basit iniwa’an anigewasin.”
