15.36 Psa 69.21Orot ta nunuw in harew sususub tainen bai wine tenakuyakuy butu’ub naatu isik yomaninamaim iyouw, eot ra’ah Jesu susubinamih, baise orot ta eo, “Kwabat! Elijah nan onafane nab nayayare tana’itin!” Jesu ibanak maiye fanan aumetawat na’in itarakouw rerey, basit ayubin tabaratait naatu morob. Tafaror Bar wanawanan efan kakafiyin awan faifuw hitenafut in rorore tafantoro’ot taseb re uran tit rou’ab himatar. Baiyowayan orot ukwarin nati onaf nanamaim batabat, Jesu mi’itube momorob itin naatu eo, “Turobe iti orot i anababatun God Natun!”
15.40 Luk 8.2-3Nati’imaim i baibin afa auman, ef yokaika hibat hinuwanuw. Baibin wanawanahimaim i Mary Magdalin, Mary kek James boubun naatu Joseph hairi hinah naatu Salome. Iti baibin i Galilee’imaim Jesu hi’ufunun baibais hitin bairi hibowabow i hina. Naatu baibin maumurih maiyow bairi hina Jerusalem hititit i auman nati’imaim hibatabat.

Veya re irabirab, naatu nati rabirab i yabunabuna ana veya, anayabin mar natoto i Baiyarir ana veya. Imih Joseph Arimathea’ane na tit. Iti orot i kaniser ana kou’ay orot ta. God ana aiwob isan ma kakakaf. Joseph Jesu biyan bain isan itafofor na Pilate nanamaim tit ifefeyan. Naatu Pilate Jesu momorob ana tur men so’ob, imih baiyowayah ukwarin isan e’af na ibatiy. Baiyowayah ukwarin eo nonowar ufunamaim Pilate ibasit Joseph Jesu biyan bain isan. Naatu bairahiya ana faifuw bai na Jesu bu’ub yare sum, bai in to naiwanamaim tar inu’in imaim yai, kabay gagamin ifururuw na hub awan hir. Mary Magdalin naatu Mary Joseph hinah hairi Jesu biyan menamaim hiya’iy i hi’itin.

Baiyarir ana veya sasawar ufunamaim, Mary Magdalin, Mary, James hinah naatu Salome, spices hitobon hibow hin Jesu biyan hitarab isan. Fur ebubusuruf i anamaim maraumanika, baibin hin rahemaim hitit. Hinan efamaim taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Hub awanamaim kabay gagamin hihirafut inu’in boro yait nifururuw natit?” Baise baibin nah hitara’ah hinuwanuw nahimaim hub awanamaim kabay gagamin i hifururuw au sisibin titaka batabat. Naatu baibin mutufor hin hub wanawanan hirun, hinuwanuw hai asukwafune orot boubun ana faifuw kwes us ma’am hi’itin naatu yah birubir fafar. Baise orot eo, “Men kwanabir, ayu aso’ob kwa i Jesu Nasaret mowan hi’onaf momorob i kwanunuwih, i morobone misir, naatu men iti’imaim ema’ama. Ana efan iti kwa’itin en.
16.7 Mat 26.32; Mak 14.28Baise kwanan ana bai’ufununayah hai tur kwana’owen, Peter auman ana tur kwana’owen, Jesu i mat enan au Galilee. Kwa boro imaim kwana’itin marasika iu’uwi na’atube.’” Baibin hikasiy naatu ah umah duduwar rab, rah hihamiy hitit naatu hibihir hin. Abistanawat mamatar men yait ta ana tur hi’owen anayabin hibir.

Jesu morobone mimisir ufunamaim, fur bubusuruf i anamaim maraumanika wantoro’ot i Mary Magdalin isan irerereb, nati babin Mary biyanamaim wagabur etei seven nunih hitit. Etei hima hiyababan hirererey, Mary na hai tur eowen, baise Jesu yawas maiye misir matan yan itin na eo hinonowar men hitumitum.
book.s: Jesu Irerereb Ana Bai’ufununayah Rou’ab Isah
book.p: Nati ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah rou’ab masaw bar hinan efamaim Jesu nah touman hai itinin na’atube isah irerereb. Hi’intabir hina hai ofonah afa hai tur hi’owen baise men kafa’imo hitumatum.

16.14 1Cor 15.5Uftoro’ot bai’ufununayah nah 11 hima bay hi’aau Jesu isah irerereb, naatu men hibitumatum naatu dogoroh fofokar isan gam iuwih, anayabin sabuw iyab i morobone misir isah birerereb hi’itin hina hai tur hi’o’owen men hitumatum.
16.15 Act 1.8Jesu iuwih eo, “Tafaram wanawanan etei kwanaremor naatu Tur Gewasin kwanabinan tafaram tutufin etei isah.
16.16 Act 2.38Yait nitumatum bapataito kwanabitin boro yawas nab; baise yait men nabitumatum ana yawas boro nikasiy.
16.17 Act 2.4; 8.7Naatu ina’inan iti boro iyab ayu tibitutumu biyahimaim nakwah auman hinatit, ayu wabu hinasu’ub wagabur kakafih boro hinabihir; menah nabotabir tur afa boubuh hina’o.
16.18 Luk 10.19; Act 28.3-6Kok hinabowabow boro men hinayubih, moromorob harew hinatomatom boro men hinamorob. Sabuw hinasawow hina’inu’in umah biyahimaim hinayara’aten boro hinayawas.”

16.19 Act 1.9-11; 2.33-34Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo sasawar ufunamaim, earura’ah yen au mar Tamah God ana asumaiyowane mara’iy. Jesus talking to disciples on mountainCN01881B.TIFMrk 16.19©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu ana bai’ufununayah ebigegewasimih16.19

book.p: Luke
Tur Gewasin Kikirum
Roube’aten Ana Tur

Luke Tur gewasin eo’orereb Jesu i Israel sabuw hai Baiyawasenayan naatu sabuw iyab iti tafaramaim tema’am hai Baiyawasenayan hairi’ika na’atube eomatanih. Luke kikirum i Regah ana Anun Kakafiyin Jesu iyun “Tur Gewasin binan sabuw hai sawar meyemeye bai’akirayah isah” naatu iti Tur Gewasin ana tit gagamin i sabuw yababan wairafih hai kok ta ta rumutufuren isan eo’o. Yasisir ana tur, Luke gagaminika eo kirum, tur bobotawiy teten anamaim, nati i Jesu ana na isan kurerereb naatu iban maiye tur ana yomanin Jesu ana maramaim au mar nayey. Kirisiyan sabuw ra’at yeye naatu baitumatum hibubukikin, Jesu au mar yey ufunamaim ana binanakwar kirumayan i orot ta’imon eo kirum Tur Abarayah Hai Bowabow (Acts) buk wanawanan.

Bairu’abin turin naatu umat roun ta’imon babe kirum hiya ti’inu’in kwana’itin tur abistanawat hi’o hikikirum iti Tur Gewasin wanawanan i akisinamo boro kwaniyab kwana’itin, na’atube tounamatar hai ew, sheep kaifenayah Jesu Tutufuw hin hibinanawan, Jesu kek kikimin in Jerusalem Tafaror Bar run ma’am, Samaria Orot Gewasin ana oroubon naatu orot natun kakasiy. Tur Gewasin wanawanan tur fokarih afa i yoyoban isan, Anun Kakafiyin, Jesu ana bowabow wanawanan baibin hibowabow naatu God ana notanotawiyen kakafih isah.
Buk wanawanan ana inu
Wanawanan Ebi’obaiyit (1.1-4)
John Baptist naatu Jesu hairi hai tufuw naatu hai ra’at. (1.5–2.52)
John Baptist ana bowabow (3.1-20)
Jesu ana bapataito naatu ana routobon (3.21–4.13)
Jesu ana bowabow Galilee imaim busuruf (4.14–9.50)
Jesu Galilee ine tit in Jerusalem (9.51–19.27)
Jesu ana mafufun fur Jerusalem wanawanan naatu sisibinamaim ma’am (19.28–23.56)
Regah Jesu ana misir, ana bairerereb naatu au mar anayen (24.1-53)
1.1 Act 1.1Are Theophilus,

Sabuw maumurih na’in abisa iti biyatamaim mamatar isan hisinaftobon ana tur etei’imak bukamaim hikirumen. Abisa hikikirum i sabuw iyab iti sawar matar matah yan hi’itin hio hinonowar i hikirum, naatu sabuw iyab iti tur isan hibow hibibinan i hio hinowar hikirum. Isan imih Theophilus o i gewas maiyow, ayu iti sawar himamatar isan kiruminamih anot, imih sawar no aneika anutitiy, sabuw ai babatiyih hai an abow gewas, naatu akubaitutur o isa iti a kikirum, saise o boro inaso’ob sawar iti etei o hibi’obaiyi i turobe.

Judea wanawanan Herod bi’aiwob ana maramaim, firis wabin Zechariah i Abaijah ana kou’ay wanawanan ma firis ana bowabow bowabow, naatu aawan Elizabeth ana tufuw an i Aaron ana rara’ane na tufuw. Iti orot aawan hairi God matanamaim hai yawas i gewasin, God ana ofafar naatu ana tur etei hibosiyasiyar hibi’ufunun. Baise hairi natunatuh en hima hin hiregah hibabine, anayabin Elizabeth i a’arin.

Veya ta Jerusalem Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan firis ana bowabow isan matan fufur tebowabow na’atube, Zechariah ibo ana veya na tit Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana bowabow isan run.
1.9 Exo 30.7Firis hai binanakwaramaim eo na’atube, gem kakafiyin tafanamaim fi’ufiu afunin isan hibi’arow Zechariah wabin tit, basit na Regah ana Tafaror Bar wanawanan run. Naatu Tafaror Bar wanawanan fi’ufiu Zechariah ea’afun ana veya’amaim, sabuw etei i bar ufunane hibat hiyoyoyoban.

Regah ana tounamatar, gem kakafiyin tainin asukwafune fi’ufiu ea’afunimaim tit irerereb bat. Zechariah tounamatar tit batabat itin yan hamu iwa’an ana bir ra’at, baise tounamatar eo, “Zechariah men inabir! God a yoyoban nowar. O aaw Elizabeth boro yan namatar naatu nataub kek orot nayai o wabin John iniwab. Nati kek orot natutufuw ana veya o ya wanawanan boro yasisir kawasa awan nakaratan, na’atube sabuw moumurih maiyow auman boro hiniyasisir,
1.15 Num 6.2-3anayabin Regah matanamaim i boro orot gagamin ta. Iti kek wine o harew fokarih men natom, naatu God Anunin Kakafiyin boro niwanasum auman 1.15 hinah yan wanawanan nama’ama natufuw. I boro Israel sabuw maumurih na’in nabow hinamatabir maiye Regah hai God isan.
1.17 Mal 3.1; 4.5-6; Mat 17.11-13Naatu God ana dinab orot Elijah ana fair baib na’atube boro nab Regah aunan ni’iyon nan, kek tamahinah bairi dogoroh nikitabir hinan hinita’imon maiye; sabuw baifanasairayah dogoroh nikitabir hinan mutufor ma ana not gewasin hinab, naatu Regah ana sabuw nabobunabuna’ih.”
Zechariah tounamatar iu, “Iti i boro mi’itube anitumatum? Anayabin ayu i ai regah, naatu aawau auman ibabine sawar.”

1.19 Dan 8.16; 9.21Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Gabriel God nanamaim abatabat, imih ayu iyafaru o airit oisan tur gewasin abai ana o a tur ao’owen, baise ayu au tur men itumitum, imih o boro mena nabit, inama nanan sawar mataramih ao ana veya’amaim namatar, abisa ao’omatan nan niturobe.”

Nati ana maramaim sabuw ufunane hima’am hai kasiy ra’at, Zechariah manin maiyow Tafaror Bar wanawanan ma’am isan. Naatu Zechariah Tafaror Barene titit ana mar, tur oisan menan bit, sabuw nati’imaim hi’itin hiso’ob ina’inan ta isan matar, naatu tur o isan menan bit umanamaim imanuman bairi hio.

Zechariah ana bowabow Tafaror Bar wanawanan sasawar ufunamaim matabir maiye na ana bar tit. Nati ufunamaim a wan Elizabeth yan matar, sumar etei umatroun na’atube baremaim nutanub ma. Elizabeth eo, “Regah bounabo ibaisu au biya’ohow, orot babin matahimaim etei’imak bosair.”

Elizabeth ana sumar umatroun ta’imon ana maramaim God ana tounamatar Gabriel iyafar in Galilee wanawananamaim bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim tit.
1.27 Mat 1.16, 18Nati’imaim babitai ta biyan numin Joseph, aiwob orot David ana agir ta i ana rum hiomatan ma’ama biyan tit, babitai wabin Mary. Tounamatar na babitai biyan tit eo, “Tufuw isa nama! Regah o isa i yan ebaib kwanekwan, naatu baigegewasin o ebit.”

Mary iti tur nonowar ana veya biyababan na’atube bai naatu ana kasiy ra’at iti merarayow ana’an isan. Baise tounamatar eo “Mary, men inabirumih, anayabin God o isa ebiyasisir gagamin maiyow.
1.31 Isa 7.14; Mat 1.21-23O boro ya namatar inatoub kek orot inayai, naatu wabin Jesu iniwab.
1.32-33 2Sa 7.12, 13, 16; Isa 9.7I boro orot gagamin naatu God auyomtoro’ot Natun narouw nao, naatu Regah God boro aiwob nitin, marasika ana’agir David bitin na’atube. Naatu Jacob ana rara’ane i boro ni’aiwob wanatowan, naatu ana aiwob i boro nama wanatowan, wanatowan ana yomanin en.”
Mary tounamatar isan eo, “Ayu i biyau numin. Iti i boro mi’itube namatar?”

Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “Anun kakafiyin boro niwani, naatu God ana fair boro natarsumi, imih iti kek Kakafiyin natutufuw i boro God Natun hinarouw hinao. 1.35 it kek natutufuw i boro Kakafiyin Naatu o tura Elizabeth sabuw a’arin hirouw hio baise boun babine tafan yan matar ana sumar umatroun ta’imon sawar.
1.37 Gen 18.14Anayabin God isan sawar etei’imak i men ta fokarinamih.”
Mary eo, “Ayu i Regah ana akir wairafin, abis isou kuo na’atube namatar.” Naatu tounamatar Mary itumar tit.

Nati ana veya’amaim, Mary matan kabiy bobuna ra’iy yen in Judah 1.39 wabin ta i Judea, ta i Israel wanawananamaim oyaw na’atune bar merar gagamin ta imaim tit, Zechariah ana bar wanawanan run Elizabeth ana merar yi. Aisim sawar gagamin na’in iti na’atube isou matar, au Regah hinah na ebinanawanu? O a merarayow anonowar ana mar, kek yau wanawanan inu’in yasisir auman ia’ayob. O a baitumatumamaim baigegewasin ibai, God eo’omatani boro nan turobe namatar!”
1.46 1Sa 2.1-10Mary eo,

Naatu yau wanawanan yasisir awan karatan,
God au baiyawasenayan isan abiyasisir.

Anayabin i ana akir wairafin wabin men gagamin baise nuh, 1.48 ayu i ana akirwairafin wabu men gagamin, baise ana kabeberamaim nuhu imih boun ebubusuruf sabuw etei boro ayu baigegewasinayan hinarouw hinao.
Anayabin sawar gagamih God Fairin ayu isou sinaf.
I wabin i kakafiyin,

baise sabuw sawar wairafih umah en iyafarih hin.

naatu na ana akirwairafin Israel baibais itin

book.p: Mary sumar etei tounu na’atube Elizabeth hairi hima, imaibo matabir maiye na ana bar tit.
Elizabeth ana toub isan veya na tit, naatu toub ana kek orot yai. Tain tuwan naatu ana ofonah, God ana baigegewasin gagamin na’in Elizabeth bitin ana tur hinowar hina ana merar hiyi bairi hiyasisir.

1.59 Gen 17.12; Lev 12.3; Luk 2.21Naatu fur ta’imon ufunamaim, kek ana’ar mo’on afuwin wabin baiwabin isan tain tuwan etei hina. Tain tuwan hikokok kek wabin i boro Zechariah, tamah wabinamaim hitiwabimih hio, baise hinah eo, “En! Kek wabin i boro John taniwab.”
Sabuw hio, “O taituwa wabih men ta nati na’atube ema’ama boro kek wabin nati taniwab.”

Basit umahimaim kek tamah isan himan wabin menatan kokok baiwabin isan hibatiy. Zechariah eo fef hibai hina hitin imaim kirum eo, “Kek wabin i John.” Sabuw etei hifofofor men kafaita. Nati ana veya’amaim Zechariah menan bit ma’am menan kerer busuruf tur eo, God bora’ara’ah. Taintuwan etei awah hae’e hai baifofofor ra’at, baise abisa himamatar ana tur tasasar tit tafaram Judea wanawanan sabuw etei hinowar. Sabuw etei iti sawar matar ana tur hinonowar isan hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti kek narara’at ana itinin i boro mi’itube?” Anayabin Regah uman i iti kek biyanamaim ma’am.
John tamah Zechariah Anun Kakafiyin targabuw, God ana ewamaim tabor eo.

imih boun it ata kamabiy sabuw umahine baiyawasit isan natit ebiyawasit, naatu fair ebitit God isan men erebir auman tanabow,
1.75 Tit 2.12-14God matanamaim tanakakaf naatu tanayasairit ata ef mutufurinamaim tanakwafir wanatowan, wanatowan.
1.76 Isa 40.3Naatu o ayu natu, o boro God auyomtoro’ot ana dinabumih inamatar, Regah aunan ini’iyon inan ana ef inayabuna,
1.77 Jer 31.34ana sabuw yawas isan inakubuna hai tur ina’owen bowabow kakafih hinihamiyen God hai kakafih nanotawiyen yawas hinab.
1.78 Isa 60.1-2Anayabin ata God, i ana manaw kabeber wairafin, i wanawananamaim marakaw marane boro nakusisiar nare,
sabuw iyab guguminamaim tema’am naatu murumurubih hai youninamaim tema’am tafatamaim namarakaw, at narumutufur nanawiyit tanatit tufuw ana efamaim tanaremor.”
Kek biyan naatu ayubin hairi ana fofonin ra’at yen orot matar, naatu run in arar yan imaim ma ana fair bai, imaibo tit ana bowabow Israel sabuw etei nahimaim busuruf bow.
book.p: (Matthew 1.18-25)

Nati ana veya, sabuw iyab Roman gawan babanamaim hima’am wabih bukamaim kirum isan Caesar Augustus iuwih. Sabuw baiyab isan marasika i men hiyab, baise Quirinius tafaram Syria isan bigawan ana veya imaibo hibusuruf sabuw hiyab wabih bukamaim hikirum. Nati baiyab ana veya’amaim sabuw etei hin hai bar merar gagamihimaim hitit wabih bukamaim hikirum.

Joseph auman tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim ma’am yen na Judea wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Bethlehem imaim tit, aiwob orot David ana tutufuw efan. Joseph na nati’imaim tit, anayabin i David uwan ta. Naatu Joseph nati’imaim in titit ana’an ta i Mary hairi tabin isan hi’omatanih hima’am, imih hairi wabih bukamaim kirumin isan hiyen hin. Nati ana veya Mary i yan auman, hiyen hina Bethlehem hima’am, Mary ana toub ana veya na tit. Naatu toub ana kek orot ain yai, faifuw ta bai e’armetan for hai bay te’aau ana efanamaim i’inuw in, anayabin nanawan bar etei sabuw hirun hibai karam.

Nati gugumin bobaituw kaifenayah afa Bethlehem sisibinamaim hima hai bobaituw hikakaifen, basit Regah ana tounamatar isah irerereb, naatu Regah ana marakaw tafahimaim kusisiar re biyah etei marakaw hi’itin hai bir ra’at. Baise tounamatar iuwih eo, “Men kwanabir! Ayu tur gewasin abai a tur owenamih ana, iti tur gewasin sabuw hinanonowar boro etei hiniyasisir. Anayabin iti boun gugumin David ana bar meraramaim, kwa a baiyawasenayan Regah Keriso i tufuw. Naatu ana i’inan, i boro iti na’atube kwana’itin, kwananan kek boro faifuw boubunamaim hisum bobaituw hai bay te’aa ana efanamaim hi’inuw inu’in kwana’itin.”
Iti na’at eo marta’imon, maramaim tounamatar hai kou’ay gagamin na’in hitit, ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio,
book.q: 2.14 Luk 19.38“Marakaw bonamanamarin etei God auyomtoro’ot
isan nama,
naatu tafaramamaim sabuw iyab God isah
ebiyasisir tufuw isah nama.”
book.p: Tounamatar himatabir maiye hin mar wanawanan hirur ufunamaim, bobaituw kaifenayah himisir hio, “It boro tanan Bethlehem tanatit, sawar abisa himatar Regah eo tanonowar i tana’itah.”

Basit matah kabiy himisir hin Mary Joseph hairi hinuwihih hinan hitita’urih, naatu kek bobaituw hai bay te’aa hai efanamaim hi’inuw inu’in hi’itin. Bobaituw kaifenayah kek hi’i’itin ufunamaim, kek isan tounamatar mi’itube hio hinonowar hai tur hi’owen. Sabuw iyabowat nati’imaim hima’am bobaituw kaifenayah iti kek isan hio hinonowar hifofofor men kafaita.
2.19 Luk 2.51Baise Mary iti tur nonowar i dogoronamaim ya hima inotanot. Bobaituw kaifenayah himatabir hinan efamaim, abisa tounamatar hio hinonowar na’atube hi’i’itin isan, God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah auman hin.
2.21 Luk 1.31Fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim, Kek hibai hina ana ar kanabin hi’afuw, wabin Jesu hiwab. Wabin marasika Mary yan matara’e ma’am ana veya, tounamatar na eo na’atube.

2.22 Lev 12.1-8Kousouwih isan Moses ana ofafaramaim bi’obaiyih na’atube, ana veya na tit hibisawar ufunamaim, Mary Joseph hairi Jesu hibai hina Jerusalem hitit, Tafaror Bar hirun Regah ana siwaramih hitin.
2.23 Exo 13.2, 12Anayabin Regah ana ofafaramaim eo na’atube, “Kek orot ain i kwanaya’asair Regah kwanitin.”
2.24 Lev 12.8Naatu Regah ana ofafaramaim eo na’atube sibor ya’inamih auman hin, mamu imak rou’ab naatu ma’ufor rou’ab hibow auman hina hitit.

nati ana veya’amaim, regah ta wabin Simeon i Jerusalem ma’am, iti regah ana yawas i mutufurin naatu yoyoban wairafin. God Anunin tar gabuw ana ofafar eo na’atube ma bow God ana sabuw Israel baiyawasih isan eomatanih i ma kakaif. Anun Kakafiyin God ana buriburih isan irerereb eo, “O boro yawas inama’am Regah God ana Roubininenayan natufuw ina’itin imaibo inamorob.” Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu hinah tamah hibai hina hirun, hai binanakwaramaim ofafar eo na’atube sinaf isan. Naatu God Anun Kakafiyin auman Simeon bonawiy na Tafaror Bar run. Simeon kek bai irurubun hiyaf God ana merar yi eo,
book.q: “Regah i’o na’atube a’omatanen ikaif,
imih boro’obo a’akir wairafin tufuwamaim inihamiy niyarir.
2.30 Isa 52.10; Luk 3.6; Tit 2.11Taiyuwu matau’umaim a baiyawasenayan tafaramamaim ibiyafar aitin.
Iti baiyawasenayan i ibogaigiwas sabuw etei matahimaim kubitih boro hina’itin.
2.32 Isa 42.6; 49.6; 52.10Naatu yawas ana marakaw boro nab natit Ufun Sabuw isah nirerereb hina’itin, naatu Israel sabuw nahimaim o ayawas ana marakaw boro nama.”
book.p:
Kek hinah tamah Simeon kek isan abisa eo hinonowar i hifofofor men kafaita.
2.34 Isa 8.14; Mat 21.42; 1Pet 2.8Simeon baigegewasin itih sawar, basit kek hinah Mary isan eo “Iti kek i God rubin sabuw moumurih na’in Israel wanawanan boro nagurusih naatu moumurih na’in boro niyawasih. Hai kirikirifot etei boro niwa’an hinirerereb, ina’i’inan nati isan sabuw boro ana tur hinakwahir. Naatu yababan o dogor wanawanan boro ahay na’atube nay.”

Nati’imaim dinab babine ta Asher ana bigane ma’am, wabin Anna Fanuel natun, Anna tabin kwamur etei seven ma naatu aawan morob. Kwamur etei 84 i kwafur ma naatu Tafaror Bar men kafa’imo ihamiy. Fai mar i yohar, ma yoyoban God bobora’ara’ah. Nati ana veya’amaim babine na run God ana merar yi. Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw iyab baiyawasenayan isan hima hikakaif hai tur eowen eo, “Roubininenayan natit.”
book.s: Joseph, Mary Hairi Au Nazareth Himatabir
book.p: 2.39 Mat 2.23Joseph, Mary hairi Regah ana ofafaramaim abisa eo na’atube hisisinaf ufunamaim, himatabir maiye hin hai bar merar wabin Nazareth imaim hitit, tafaram Galilee wanawananamaim. Naatu God ana bosiyasiyar wanawananamaim Kek ra’at yen ana fair bai fudirin rerekab naatu ana not ra’at taseseb.

2.41 Exo 12.24-27; 23.14-17; Deu 16.1-8Kwamur ta ta wanawanahimaim Jesu hinah tamah mar etei Tar Nowaten Hiyuw isan au Jerusalem tenan. Ana veya ta Jesu ana kwamur 12 na’atube basit hiyen hin hiyuw ta isan hai binanakwar eo na’atube. Hiyuw ufunamaim hai ubar himatabir maiye, baise kek Jesu i Jerusalem ma. Hinah tamah men kafa’imo hiso’ob. Hinotanot kek i nati sabuw wanawanamaim bairi hinan hirouw, imih nati veya ta’imon i nuhih fot hiremor hin, baise veya re birabirab, hibusuruf kek hinuwih, hai ofonah naatu taituwah hibabatiyih hinunuwet, men hitita’ur, basit himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit hinuwih. Veya baitounin Tafaror Bar wanawanan Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah wanawanah mare tur hi’o nowar ma bibabatiyih hitita’ur. Sabuw etei Jesu tur buriburih eo, naatu iyafutih hinonowar isan, hifofofor men kafaita. Hinah tamah kek hitita’ur ana veya hiororsa’irih Mary Natun iu, “Aro aisim iti na’atube isinaf? Tamat airi ai yababan ra’at, o anuwihi men kikimin ta.”
Iyafutih eo, “Aisim ayu kwanunuwuhu? Kwa men kwaso’ob ayu i Tamai ana baremaim ama’am?” Baise Kek abisa eo hinah tamah ana tur naniyan men hibai.

2.51 Luk 2.19Basit Jesu misir bairi himatabir maiye hire hin Nazareth hitit, imaim hinah tamah fanah bosiyasiyar bairi hima naatu hinah iti sawar etei ana notamaim ya ma inotanot.
2.52 1Sa 2.26; Pro 3.4Jesu ra’at yen orot matar ana not auman ra’at yen God itin yan sisir na’atube sabuw auman.
(Matthew 3.1-12; Mark 1.1-8; John 1.19-28)

Roman sabuw hai orot gagamin wabin Caesar Taibirias bi’aiwob ana kwamur 15 baib wanawananamaim Pontius Pilate i Judea wanawanan igawan, Herod i Galilee isan igawan, naatu tain Philip i tafaram Iturea naatu Trakonaitis hairi isah igawan naatu; Lysanias i tafaram Abilene isan igawan. Naatu Annas Kaiafas hairi i firis gagamih. Nati ana maramaim Zechariah natun John arar yan ma’am God ana tur na biyan tit.
3.3 Act 13.24Basit misir tit harew Jordan, sisibinamaim tafaram ta ta run tit binan eo, “Kakafih kwasisinaf kwanihamiyen kwanan bapataito anit saise God boro a kakafih nanotawiyen.”
3.4-6 Isa 40.3-5God ana dinab orot Isaiah ana Bukamaim kikirum na’atube eo,
book.q: “Orot ta arar yan bat eafa’af,
‘Regah isan ef kwanabo gaigiwas,
ef kwanimutufur iwat naremor nan!
Awa’awah etei kwanatounen hinayen hinituturin,
heher oyaw etei kwanatar hinare hinituturin.
Ef bibirih kwanarumutufuren,
naatu ef kakafih kwanayabuna gewas.
Sabuw tutufin etei God baiyawasenayan nabiyafar boro hina’itin!’”
book.p:
3.7 Mat 12.34; 23.33Sabuw rau’ay gagamin John bapataito baitih isan hinan iuwih eo, “Kok natunatun! Yait imatnuwi God ana baimakiy nabiyafar boro wan kwanabibir? Men kwananot kwanao, ayu bapataito abai imih boro natafafaru en.
3.8 Jn 8.33, 39Baise wantoro’ot i a yawas nigewasin kwanama saise nati’imaim boro kwa isa niturobe bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwaihamiyen. Naatu men kwanao, Abraham i aki ai agir imih God boro men baimakiy niti! Baise a tur ao’owen God karam kabay iti nabow niwa’an Abraham wawawan hinamatar.
3.9 Mat 7.19Ai tebiw ro’oro’oh men gewasih i boro hinatar wairaf wah hinayara’aten hina’arat, imih kariwak i ai tarinamih hiya’ataitik inu’in.”
Sabuw hibatiy, “Bo aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?”
Iyafutih eo, “O yait isa biya baibiyon rou’ab hinama’am ta inab menatan isan biya baibiyon en initin, naatu yait isan bay nakakaram nafaram.”
3.12 Luk 7.29Kabay o’onayah bapataito bainamih hina hitit hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?”

“Kwa kabay o’onamih hio hibiyuni na’atube ana fofonin kwana’o’on men tafan kwanayara’ah auman kwana’o’onamih.” Roman baiyowayah orot afa auman hio, “Bo aki i boro mi’itube?” Iuwih eo, “Sabuw men kwanao kikinih kabay hinitimih o men baifuwenamaim hai kabay kwanabowamih, baise a bowabow isan a baiyan hinabit i kwaniyasisir.”

Sabuw hai notamaim hinotanot John i baiyawasenayan.
3.16 Act 13.25Imih John iuwih eo, “Ayu i harewamaim bapataito abit, baise orot ta boro enan ana fair i ra’at. Ayu i men gewasu boro an ana baibiyon anaku’ub. I boro Anun Kakafiyin naatu wairafamaim bapataito nit. I umanamaim i roububuna’en ana sawar auman bai enan, boro imaim wheat narububunai ani’anin korom nayai, naatu hain boro nabow nan wairaf wanatowanin in etoto’ab wan naya na’afusar.” John ef maumurih maiyow sabuw isah binan naatu hai yawas auman botabirinamih iuwih.

3.19 Mat 14.3-4; Mak 6.17-18Baise Herod tuwah aawan Herodias bi’aawan isan, naatu bowabow kakafih maumurih maiyow sisinaf isan John kwarar yayamutufur ana maramaim Herod ibanaka sinaf kakafin tabow sinaf John bai dibur bar yari’iy.

Sabuw etei’imak bapataito hibaib ufunamaim, Jesu auman ibapataito. Naatu yoyoyoban ana maramaim mar botawiy,
3.22 Jn 1.32Anun Kakafiyin marane mamu imakabe ra’iy targabuw. Naatu orot fanan marane tit. “O i ayu Natu ta’imonamo. O isa ayu abiyasisir.”

3.23 Luk 4.22; Jn 6.42Jesu ana kwamur 30 imaim ana bowabow busuruf. Sabuw hisoso’ob Jesu i Joseph natun imih Joseph isan hinot, Joseph tamah i Heli, Heli tamah i Mathat, Mathat tamah i Levi, Levi tamah i Melkai, Melkai tamah i Jannai, Jannai tamah i Joseph, Joseph tamah i Matathias, Matathias tamah i Amos, Amos tamah i Nahum, Nahum tamah i Esli, Esli tamah i Naggai, Naggai tamah i Maatah, Maatah tamah i Matathias, Matathias tamah i Semein, Semein tamah i Josech, Josech tamah i Joda, Joda tamah i Joanan, Joanan tamah i Rhesa, Rhesa tamah i Zerubbabel, Zerubbabel tamah i Shealtiel, Shealtiel tamah i Neri, Neri tamah i Melkai, Melkai tamah i Addi, Addi tamah i Cosam, Cosam tamah i Elmadam, Elmadam tamah i Er, Er tamah i Joshua, Joshua tamah i Eliezer, Eliezer tamah i Jorim, Jorim tamah i Mathat, Mathat tamah i Levi Levi tamah i Simeon, Simeon tamah i Judah, Judah tamah i Joseph, Joseph tamah i Jonam, Jonam tamah i Eliakim, Eliakim tamah i Melea, Melea tamah i Menna, Menna tamah i Matatha, Matatha tamah i Nathan, Nathan tamah i David,
3.32 Rut 4.17-22David tamah i Jesse, Jesse tamah i Obed, Obed tamah i Boaz, Boaz tamah i Salmon, Salmon tamah i Nashon, Nashon tamah i Aminadab, Aminadab tamah i Admin, Admin tamah i Arni, Arni tamah i Hezron, Hezron tamah i Perez, Perez tamah i Judah, Judah tamah i Jacob, Jacob tamah i Isaac, Isaac tamah i Abraham, Abraham tamah i Terah, Terah tamah i Nahor, Nahor tamah i Serug, Serug tamah i Reu, Reu tamah i Peleg, Peleg tamah i Eber, Eber tamah i Shelah,
3.36 Gen 11.10-26Shelah tamah i Cainan, Cainan tamah i Arafasad, Arafasad tamah i Shem, Shem tamah i Noah, Noah tamah i Lamech, Lamech tamah i Methuselah, Methuselah tamah i Enoch, Enoch tamah i Jared, Jared tamah i Mahalalel, Mahalalel tamah i Cainan,
3.38 Gen 4.25-26Cainan tamah i Enos, Enos tamah i Seth, Seth tamah i Adam, Adam tamah i God.
(Matthew 4.1-11; Mark 1.12, 13)

Jesu biyan tutufin etei God Anun Kakafiyin karatan Jordan harewane matabir yen naatu Anun Kakafiyin i’unawiy in Judea arar yan tit. Nati’imaim veya etei 40 bay en ma’am ufunamaim bayumih morob. Naatu nati ana maramaim Demon Mowan na routobon itin, eo, “O i God Natun na’at, kabay iti ku’uwih tebotabir rafiy tematar ku’aa.”
4.4 Deu 8.3Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘Orot men bayumaim akisin niyawasimih.’” Naatu Demon Mowan Jesu i’unawiy maiye hiyen hin koun yan bat, imatanubamo tafaram tutufin etei itin. Naatu Demon Mowan eo, “Ayu boro fair etei o anit naatu tafaram ana aiwob auman boro anit. Anayabin etei’imak ayu hitu, ayu orot yait arurubin boro i anitin nab. Imih O ayu inakwakwafiru na’at, iti sawar etei boro o nowamih anit.”
4.8 Deu 6.13-14Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘A Regah a God akisinamo inakwafir isan inabow.’” Naatu iban maiye Demon Mowan Jesu bai nawiy hin Jerusalem hitit, hiyen hin Tafaror Bar tafantoro’ot bat naatu iu, “O God Natun na’at, kukununuw kura’iy.
4.10-11 Psa 91.11-12Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘God boro ana tounamatar na’uwih hinatafafari, umah yanamaim inare hinabuwi, boro men kabay a narab natakakirimih.’”
4.12 Deu 6.16; 1Cor 10.9Baise Jesu iya’afut iu, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘A Regah a God men routobon initinimih.’”
4.13 Hib 2.18; 4.15Demon Mowan routobon ta ta Jesu bitin ufunamaim itumar tabaratait tit mar kafai ufunamaim bat.
book.s: Jesu Ana Bowabow Galilee Imaim Busuruf
book.p: Imaibo Jesu God Anun Kakafiyin ana fair bai auman matabir na Galilee tit. Ana tur ra’at tasasar tit tafaram nati sisibinamaim hima’am etei’imak hinowar. Kou’ay Bar wanawanan run bi’obaibiyih sabuw etei’imak tur hinonowar, hifai hibora’ara’ah.
(Matthew 13.53-58; Mark 6.1-6)

Jesu remor na Nazareth tit, bar merar i ma rara’atamaim, Baiyarir ana veya matanfufur isisinaf na’atube, in Kou’ay Bar run, Buk ta baiyab isan misir. Naatu dinab orot Isaiah ana buk hibai Jesu hitin, bai rusasar tur iti na’atube hikirum inu’in ana efanamaim tit.
4.18-19 Isa 61.1-2“Regah Anun Kakafiyin i ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am,
book.q: anayabin ayu rubinu tur gewasin sabuw yababan wairafih isah anabinan.
book.p: God iyafaru sabuw dibur tema’am hai tur ana’owen anabotaitih,
book.q: matah fim anibaisih matah nigewasin hinanuw.
Naatu sabuw iyab hirouw tibia’afiyih anibaisih hinama gewas. Naatu anakurereb sabuw hinanowar
Regah ana sabuw baiyawasih isan ana veya i natit.”
book.p: Jesu buk itakum orot kaifenayan itin i mara’iy. Sabuw Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hima’am etei’imak matah hito’ab Jesu hi’itin kikin. Baise Jesu misir busuruf sabuw hai tur eowen eo, “Tur iti aiyab kwananowar i boun na iturobe.”

4.22 Luk 3.23; Jn 6.42Sabuw etei’imak nati’imaim hima Jesu eo hinonowar hio, “Turobe iti orot ana tur i gewasin.” Naatu tur mumunin bitan eo hinonowar isan hifofofor, naatu taiyuwih hibatiyih hio, “Iti orot i Joseph natun?” Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Binan tur gewasin matan fufur sabuw teo’omaim boro kwana’uwu kwanao, ‘Adanafur ana orot, taiyuw kwiyawasi.’ Naatu iban boro kwana’uwu maiye, ‘Capernaum ma bow bigan tanonowar na’atube, iti ana bar ana meraramaim nabow tana’itin.’”
4.24 Jn 4.44Jesu iban maiye iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab orot ana bar ana meraramaim boro men ana merar hinay hinabaimih.
4.25 1Ki 17.1, 7Naatu tur anababatun a tur ana’owen, Elijah ma’am ana veya’amaim kwafukwafur maumurih na’in Israel wanawanan hima’am afow matar. Nati ana veya’amaim kwamur etei tounu naatu sumar six na’atube toun men yar, baimar kakafin na, nati tafaram wanawananamaim bar merar etei’imak bay i’en.
4.26 1Ki 17.8-16Nati ana veya’amaim God men Elijah iyafar Israel wanawanan kwafur babin ta ibaisimih, baise Sidon wanawanan Zarepat bar meraramaim kwafur babin ta’imon ma’am isan God iyafar in tit baibais itin.
4.27 2Ki 5.1-14Naatu dinab orot Elisha ma’am ana veya Israel sabuw moumurih maiyow kokom ani’anih hima’ama men yait ta na Elisha iyawasimih, baise tafaram Syria orot wabin Naaman akisinamo na Elisha iyawas.”

Sabuw Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hima iti tur hinonowar ana veya, yah wanawanan so’aso’ar yen higagamat, himisir Jesu hibai hitain ufun hitit, bar merar hitumar, hiyen fan tafan hibat hitarouw fan tare’emih hiwa’an, anayabin bar merar i fan tafan hiwowab hima’am. Baise Jesu sabuw rau’ay gagamin hibatabat umah aren sorabon hai foun remor tit in.

Jesu na Galilee wanawananamaim bar merar ta wabin Capernaum imaim tit, Baiyarir ana veya run sabuw i’obaibiyih hima hinonowar.
4.32 Mat 7.28-29Sabuw etei’imak hifofofor men kafaita. Anayabin ana tur eo i tur anababatun naatu fairin. Nati Kou’ay Baremaim orot ta wagabur iwan demon kakafin anababatun auman na run ma’am, fanan aumetawat na’in iwow eo, “Hei! Aki isai abisa inasinafumih kunan? Aki gurusi’imih? Jesu Nazareth mowan. Ayu aso’ob. O i yait, O i God ana tur abarayan Orot Kakafiyin.” Jesu wagabur mowan kwarartatab eo, “Yate inbainub orot biyanamaim kutit!” Wagabur mowan sabuw nahimaim orot itaiy re tabaratait tit, men isan abisa ta sinafumih. Baise Sabuw etei’imak hai baifofofor ra’at, taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot ana tur i fair kwanekwan. Ana onowaten naatu ana fair auman iti tur eo demon kakafih biyunih i hitit!” Naatu Jesu abisa sisinaf isan ana tur tasasar tit tafaram nati hima’am wanawanan etei hinowar.

Jesu misir Kou’ay Bar itumar tit na Simon ana bar tit, Simon rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab anababatun inu’in, sabuw Jesu hifefeyan baiyawasinamih hio. Basit Jesu na babin inu’in sisibin tit bat sawow i’ari’ar naatu sawow babin biyanane tit, babin yawas misir bay bow eafusar itab hi’aa. Veya re’er ufunamaim, sabuw sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hi’inu’in, turahinah hibuwih hina Jesu biyan hitit, sabuw ta’ita’imon butubutubunih etei’imak hiyawas.
4.41 Mat 8.29; Mak 3.11-12Sabuw moumurih na’in auman biyahine demon kakafih hitit hiwow hio, “O i God Natun!” Baise Jesu demon awah bofafaren men karam boro hitao’rereb. Anayabin demon hiso’ob Jesu i Roubininenayan.

Martot auman Jesu nati bar merar itumar tit in efan ta nautanubinamaim akisinamo ma. Baise sabuw hinuwih hinan hititita’ur ana veya, bairi nati’imaim ma isan hi’otan. Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu boro anan God ana aiwob isan tur gewasin bar merar afa’amaim auman anabinan hinanowar. Anayabin ayu nati bowabow isan God iyunu ana.”
4.44 Mat 4.23Naatu Jesu tafaram Judea wanawananamaim Kou’ay Bar etei run tit binan remor.

5.1 Mat 13.1-2; Mak 3.9-10Veya ta Jesu Genesaret harew kukuf rewarewan batabat sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in God ana tur nowaramih hinahinah hina biyan hitit. Naatu nati dones yanamaim siy bowayah hai wa rou’ab hitain hiyen hi’inu’in Jesu itah, baise siy bowayah hin hai buwat hisasouwen.

Jesu wa nati awar hibatabat wanawanahimaim Simon ana wa bai afe’en yen mare iu inatait tetenane rouw. Naatu Jesu mare sabuw rau’ay gagamin ma i’obaibiyih. Jesus teaching from boatCN01705B.TIFLuk 5.3©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus wa efe’en ma sabuw ebi’obaiyih5.3 Bi’obaibiyih ufunamaim, Simon iu, “A’wa kukutait itit taiyomaim a sabuw bairi buwat kwaya kwaway.”
5.5 Jn 21.3-8Simon eo, “Regah, fai manin buwat aya ama’am mar to men kafai siy ta eon, baise o kuo’o imih boro anasinaf.”

Basit, buwat hitaiy re, siy batabat wanawanan run buwat kafa’imo tatakweb. Turahinah wa ta afe’en hima’am na baibaisih isan himan, naatu turahinah hina bairi siy hibow wa rou’ab hiwan yen awah karatan, wa hairi kafa’imo hita’unun.

Abisa matar Simon Peter i’itin ana maramaim Jesu nanamaim sun yowen re eo, “Regah, kwihamiyu sa’ab kwen, ayu i bowabow kakafin wairafu.” Naatu Simon ana ofonah bairi siy moumurih na’in hibowabow isan hifofofor men kafaita. Zebedee natunatun James naatu John hairi auman hifofofor men kafaita (Simon ana ofonah).

Jesu Simon iu, “Men inabirumih, boun ana veya ebubusuruf o boro orot isah inaway.”
5.11 Mat 19.27Naatu wa hibow hirun dones yan hitain hiyen, sawar etei’imak hihamiyen himisir Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
(Matthew 8.1-4; Mark 1.40-45)
Ana veya ta Jesu tafaram ta in orot biyan kokom ani’anin ma bi’akiramaim tit. Orot Jesu i’itin ana maramaim tit nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan eo “Regah inakokok na’at basit iniyawasu!”
Jesu uman bora’ah orot butubun eo, “Ayu akokok o inayawas!” Iti na’at eo mar ta’imon orot biyanamaim kokom etei na’am in sawar.

5.14 Lev 14.1-32Jesu orot eofafar eo “Men sabuw hai tur ina’owen, baise, inan a firis biyan inatit biya nanutitiy na’itin. Imaibo Moses iu’uwi na’atube Regah isan sibor inayai, saise sabuw hina’itin hinitumatum o biya i turobe igewasin.”

Baise Jesu ana tur ra’at tasasar tit etei’imak hinowar, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in hina ana tur hinowar naatu baiyawasih isan hifefeyan iyawasih. Baise mar etei Jesu efan nautanubinamaim akisinamo ma yoyoban isan en ema eyoyoyoban.
book.s: Jesu Orot An Uman Kafikafirin iyawas
book.p: (Matthew 9.1-8; Mark 2.1-12)

Veya ta Jesu binan sabuw hima hinonowar wanawanahimaim i Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hina hima tur hinowar. Iti sabuw i tafaram Galilee naatu Judea wanawanan bar merar tata’ane hina, naatu Jerusalemane auman hina. Nati ana maramaim yawas ana fair Regah biyanane i na Jesu biyan tit sabuw sawusawuwih baiyawasih isan. Sabuw afa orot an uman Kafikafirin hibai emo’em hiwan hi’abar hina, hikok kwanekwan bar wanawanan hitarun Jesu nanamaim hitayare. Baise sabuw i ra’at kwanekwan men ana mahar ta ma boro orot hitab hitarun. Imih hibai hiyen bar faifiy afe’en hiyare, kabay hibosaisiren sou hikuyouw imaim orot emo’em auman hiruru sabuw hima’am hai founafoun ra’iy, Jesu ma’am nanamaim tit. men making hole in roof for paralyticCN01686B.TIFLuk 5.19©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Orot kwafe’en faifiy wan hitarakwib orot an uman kafilafirin hruru ere’er5.19
5.20 Isa 43.25; Luk 7.48Jesu iti sabuw hai baitumatum itin basit orot isan eo, “Au begon o a bowabow kakafih i anotanotawiyen.”
Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hima’ama taiyuwih hio, “Iti orot i menatan God ebi’ib? God akisinamo boro bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen.”

Abisa hinotanot Jesu so’ob basit iuwih, “Kwa dogor wanawanah not kakafih nati na’atube aisim kwanotanot? Ef menatan i hamehamen, ana bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan anao, i hamehamen o misir bat remor, isan anao i hamehamen?
5.24 Jn 5.8Baise ayu anasinaf kwana’itin saise kwanitumatum. Orot Natun i God eonowah tafaramamaim sabuw hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.” Basit Jesu orot an auman kafikafirin isan eo, “Kumisir a emo’em kubai a ubar kwen!” Orot mar ta’imonamo nahifunik inu’in misir ana emo’em bai e’abar tit God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah auman ana ubar in. Sabuw etei’imak hima’am hifofofor men kafaita, yah birubir fafar auman, naatu God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio, “Ina’inan iti men na’atube ta’i’itin efa’efanin bounabo matar taitin.”
(Matthew 9.9-13; Mark 2.13-17)
Iti ufunamaim Jesu tit in orot kabay o’onayan wabin Levi ana bowabow baremaim ma’am itin basit isan eo, “Kumisir ayu kwi’ufnunu.” Levi ma’am misir sawar etei’imak ihamiyen Jesu i’ufunun.

Levi baitab gagamin ta ana baremaim Jesu isan itab, Levi ana ofonah bairi hai bowabow ta’imon naatu sabuw afa auman hiru’ay.
5.30 Luk 15.1-2Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah himisir higam Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiyih, “Kwa aisim nati kabay o’onayah naatu bowabow kakafih sabuw bairi kwama kwa’aa kwatomatom?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw iyab gewasih adanafur orot men tekokok, baise sabuw sawow wairafih adanafur orot i tekokok. Ayu i men sabuw gewasih bow dogoroh baikitabirin isan anamih, baise sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih.”
(Matthew 9.9-13; Mark 2.13-17)
Sabuw afa Jesu hibatiy hio, “John ana bai’ufununayah i mar etei teyohar teyoyoyoban naatu Pharisee hai bai’ufununayah i na’atube tisisinaf, baise o abai’ufununayah i hi’aa tetomatom.”

5.34 Jn 3.29Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanotanot tabin boubun ana sabuw a baitab isan hinaruru’ay boro na’uwih aamoromorob hinamatabir maiye hinan? Men karam. Baise veya ta tabin boubun orot boro hinabosair sa’ab nan ana sabuw nihamiyih, imaibo i boro hinayohar.”

Naatu Jesu oroubon ta iti na’atube eo, “Men yait ta faifuw boubun e’afuw faifuw atamanin fitimih, nati na’atube nasinaf faifuw boubun boro natakweb. Naatu faifuw boubun hinab atamanin hinafitifit ana itinin boro men gewasin. Na’atube men yait ta wine boubun bai wine atamanin ana kibubumaim ririmih. Anayabin wine boubun ana kibub inab atamaninamaim inaririr wine boro nara’at kibub atamanin natafofor naatu wine nasuwa nare. Imih wine boubun ibo kibub boubunamaim tiririr. Baise men yait ta wine atamanin tomatom ufunamaim wine boubun tom isan kokomih, aiyab. Anayabin nati orot iti na’atube eo, “Wine atamanin i gewasin anababatun.”
(Matthew 12.1-8; Mark 2.23-28)

6.1 Deu 23.25Baiyarir 6.1 Sabbath ana veya ta Jesu sanabey wanawanah remor inan, ana bai’ufununayah sanabey hirut kanabih hikeb ro’oro’oh hibow hi’aa.
6.2 Jn 5.10Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa hi’itih basit hibatiyih. Kwa aisim Baiyarir ana veya ata ofafar kwa’astu’ub iti na’atube kwasisinaf?

6.3 1Sa 21.1-6Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana sabuw bairi bayumih himorob, abisa sisinaf Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwaitin?
6.4 Lev 24.5-9David God Ana Bar wanawanan run Regah isan rafiy hisibor inu’in bai eaan, naatu turin ana sabuw itih hi’aa. Nati i ata ofafar eastu’ub. Anayabin firis akisihimo nati rafiy sibor hinab hina’aan men yait ta. Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim iti na’atube eo, “Orot Natun i Baiyarir ana ukwarin.”
(Matthew 12.9-14; Mark 3.1-6)

Baiyarir ana veya ta Jesu na Kou’ay Bar wanawanan run sabuw bai’obaiyih isan. Naatu nati sabuw wanawanahimaim i orot ta uman asukwafune murubin auman na ma’am. Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee Jesu himtitiy Baiyarir ana veya orot ta tabiyawas na’at hita’itin, saise hai fair imaim hitab hitagam hita’umih. Baise sabuw abisa hinotanot i Jesu so’ob, imih orot isan eo, “Kumisir kutit iti sabuw nahimaim kubat.” Basit orot ma’am misir bat.

Imaibo Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Ayu kwa abibatiy, ata ofafaramaim Baiyarir ana veya abistan i ebibasit boro tanasinaf? Orot babin tanibais gewasin tanasinaf o kakafin tanasinaf? Orot babin ana ma gewas isan taniyawas o ana yawas tanagurus?” Jesu tatabir sabuw nutitiyih in sawar basit orot isan eo, “Uma kubora’ah.” Naatu orot uman bora’ah, marta’imon orot uman igewasin. Etei hima’am yah so’ar higagamat taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot Jesu isan boro mi’itube tanasinaf?”
(Matthew 10.1-4; Mark 3.13-19)

Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu yoyobanamih yen in oyaw wanamaim tit, naatu imaim ma God isan yoyoban in marto. Jesus praying in wildernesscn01698B.tifLuk 6.12©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus arar yanamaim eyoyoyoban6.12 Mar auman basit, ana bai’ufununayah etei eaf ayuwih hiru’ay, naatu wanawanahimaim orot etei 12 rubinih, wabih tur abarayan iwaben. Naatu iti i tur abarayah wabih, Simon (wabin ta Peter, Jesu uf biwab) naatu Peter tain Andrew, James, John, Philip naatu Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas naatu Alpheus natun James naatu Simon (Zerot teo), James natun Judas, naatu Judas Iscariot, (Jesu baban eo momorob).

Jesu ana tur abarayah bairi oyawane himatabir hire hina hititit ana maramaim, ana bai’ufununayah etei hiru’ay butun ana yabarinamaim bairi hibat, naatu sabuw maumurih na’in Judea wanawanan, Jerusalem wanawanan hiru’ay, naatu torane bar merar rou’ab, Taiya, Sidon auman sabuw etei hiru’ay. Hiruru’ay anayabin i tur nowar isan naatu hai sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am baiyawasih isan hina. Naatu sabuw afa demon kakafih hibiwawa’anih auman hinan etei iyawasih. Sabuw etei i hikokok Jesu hitabutubun, anayabin hibubutubun ana veya, ana fair titit i etei biyawasih.
(Matthew 5.1-12)
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nutitiyih in sawar basit eo,
“Yababan wairafi yasisir boro kwanab,
book.q: anayabin God ana aiwob i kwa nowa!
6.21 Psa 126.5-6; Isa 61.3; Rev 7.16-17Kwa iyab boun bayumih kwabi’akir
boro kwaniyasisir bay kwanaa ya hinagadid!
Kwa iyab boun kwarererey
boro kwaniyasisir kwanamarib!
book.p: 6.22 Jn 15.19; 16.2; 1Pet 4.14Sabuw hinifa’ifa’i, hinakwahiri, tur kakafih hina’uwi naatu kakafi hinarouw hinao ana maramaim kwaniyasisir, anayabin Orot Natun kwabi’ufunun!

Imih sawar iti na’atube hinamamatar ana veya kwanakawasa naatu kwaniyasisir kwanaben. Anayabin a baiyan gagamin na’in maramaim inu’in. Abisa tisisinaf anayabin hai a’agir dinab oro’orot isah sawar iti na’atube hisinaf.
Baise kwa iyab boun sawar wairafi kwama’am
book.q: boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab!
Anayabin kwa i yasisiramaim kwama’am!
book.p: Kwa iyab boun bay kwa’aa ya higadid kwama’am
book.q: boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab
bayumih kwanamorob!
Kwa iyab boun kwaiyasisir kwamamarib
boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab kwanarerey kwanitarkoukuw.
book.p: Kwa iyab sabuw wab tebobora’ara’ah boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab! Anayabin hai a’agir dinab baifufuwenayah isah na’atube hisinaf.

Kwa iyab iti tur kwanonowar a tur ao’owen a kamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih, sabuw iyab tibifa’ifa’i isah gewasin kwanasinaf. Sabuw iyab hinao’orarafi, God kwanifefeyan baigegewasin nitih, naatu sabuw iyab isa kakafin hinasisinaf isah kwanayoyoban. Orot yait rebareb nabifafar na’at, raunane’ebo inabotabir nifafar. Naatu orot ta a biyabaibiyon tafan nikiya’ub nabaib na’at, baban auman inau nikiya’ub nab. Orot babin ta sawar isan nabifefeyani initih, naatu orot babin ta sawar o nowa ebaib, kwihamiy ebai, men bainamih inao maiye.
6.31 Mat 7.12A kok mi’itube sabuw isa tisisinaf na’atube, ibo isah na’atube inasinaf.

Sabuw o tibiyabuw akisih isah inabiyabow na’at, aisim boro baigegewasin inab? Sabuw kakafih turahinah tibiyabuwih akisih boro hiniyabuwih! Naatu sabuw o isa gewasin tesisinafuwat isah gewasin inasisinaf na’at, aisim boro baigegewasin inab? Sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih na’atube tisisinaf. Sabuw iyab kubitih o iso’ob i boro wan hinay maiye hinabit na’at, aisim boro baigewasin inab? Sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih i hiso’ob turahinah tibitih ana fofonin boro wan hinab maiye! En! Baise akamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih, a gewasin kwanitih. Kwanitin men wan isan kwananot. Saise a baiyan gagamin na’in boro kwanab, naatu God auyomtoro’ot natunatunamih boro kwanamatar. Anayabin sabuw iyab aurih merarayow en, sabuw kakafih God nati sabuw isah i ebigewasin. Tamat ekakabeber na’atube kwanakabeber.
(Matthew 7.1-5)

6.37 Mat 6.14Taituwa inibatiyih, God boro obo nibatiyi, naatu taituwa ubar initih God boro obo ubar nit, taituwa hai kakafin inanotawiy, God boro a kakafin nanotawiy.
6.38 Mak 4.24Uma natasasar taituw isah, God boro uman natasasar o isa. Tur anababatun o boro inab uma awan nakasuwai. Turobe baibais boro uma yan nasuwa nare inab nayen uma awan nakaratan. Sabuw inabitih ana fofonin God boro na’atube fofon ta’imon nit.”

6.39 Mat 15.14Naatu Jesu oroubon ta iti na’atube eo, “Orot matan fim men karam boro fim turan nanawiy hairi hinan, anayabin nanawiy hairi hinanan na’at boro hairi’ika hinan hub hinare.
6.40 Mat 10.24-25Kirum kek men yait ta boro ana bai’obaiyenayan nanatabirimih, baise na kirum nan yomanin na’a’asa’ub ana veya, i boro ana bai’obaiyenayan na’atube namatar.

Aisim tai matan momor i’itin ku’u? Baise o mata ai bahun yi ebatabat men kutatatam. O mata ai bahun yi batabat men itatam, naatu tai isan i’o Aro, nekuna mata momor abosair, a naniyan mi’itube ibai kuo? Wanawanan rerekabih! Matoro’ot o mata ai bahun ina’uy, imaibo boro inanuw gewas tai matan momor ina’itin inabosair.

Ai gewasin nabiw ro’on boro men kakafin nayai, na’atube ai wanawanan kour nabiw ro’on boro men gewasin nayai. Ai etei’imak boro ro’ohimaim ina’itah, fafou ro’on boro men agor afe’en inima’ub, na’atube waris boro men digumar afe’en inawasarir hinare. Orot gewasin totobuyoy gewasin dogoronamaim tema’am boro nitaman nit. Orot kakafin totobuyoy kakafih dogoronamaim tema’am boro nitaman nit. Anayabin orot awanamaim abisa kakafin ititit, dogoron wanawanan i kakafin awan karatan inu’in.

6.46 Mat 7.21Aisim ayu isau kwa’o, ‘Regah, Regah,’ baise abisa au’uwi i men na’atube kwasisinaf? Orot yait na ayu au tur nowar ebobosiyasiyar, ana itinin i iti ani’obaiyi kwana’itin. Orot ana bar wowabinamih hub kair re kabay afe’en tutut rouw, bar wowab. Harew tit yen bar bufut rab, baise bar men iyuwiyuw, anayabin bar wowab gewas. Baise o yait ayu au tur inowar men kubobosiyasiyar, i orot ana bar wabat en wowowab na’atube, bar tutut en wowab batabat, harew tit yen bar rabirab ana veya mar ta’imonamo ufar re, naatu nati bar re’er i mutufor tarogowan.”
book.s: Roman Hai Baiyowayan Ukwarin Ana Akir Wairafin Jesu Iyawas
book.p: Jesu tur etei eo binan sabuw hinowar in sasawar ufunamaim na Capernaum tit. Nati’imaim Roman baiyowayan orot ukwarin ana akirwairafin isan biyabow kwanekwan i sawow gagamin bai morobomih biwa’an. Baise Jesu na nati’imaim titit ana tur nonowar ana maramaim, Jew hai orot gagamih iyunih hin Jesu biyan hitit ana akir wairafin baiyawasin isan Jesu hifefeyan. Basit Jew hai orot gagamih hina Jesu biyan hitit turobe’emaim hifefeyan hio, “Iti orot ana yababan i ekokok kwanekwan o baibais initin ana akir wairafin iniyawas. Anayabin ata sabuw isah i yabow, aki ai Kou’ay Bar wowab.” Basit bairi hin, naatu hina bar hibiyubin auman, baiyowayan orot ana ofonah afa iyunih hin Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Regah aki ai of iti na’atube eo, Aisim inan a nababan, anayabin ayu men orot gagamu boro inan au bar inatit. Na’atube ayu auman taiyuwu ai’itu ayu men orot gewasu boro anan nanamaim anatit, baise akokok turawat nao au akir wairafin boro nayawas. Anayabin ayu auman baiyowayah orot isah, au fair ema’am, orot ta aniyun anao, ‘Ni’imaim kwen.’ I boro nan, naatu orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti’imaim kuna.’ I boro nan, naatu au akir wairafin orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti kusinaf.’ I boro nasinaf.”

Jesu iti orot ana tur nonowar ifofofor men kafaita, naatu tatabir sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen Israel wanawananamaim ama areremor, men kafa’imo orot ta ana baitumatum iti na’atube aitinimih.” Imaibo orot kob nayah himatabir maiye hin bar hititit, akir wairafin yawas ma’am hi’itin.

Nati ufunamaim sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in, naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hin bar merar wabin Nain imaim hitit. Jesu na bar merar ana fur awan titit auman, kwafur babin natun orot ta’imonamo morob, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in kwafur babin hibai hirerey auman natun hi’abar hititit bairi hitar. Jesu nuw kwafur babin i’itin ana maramaim dogoron wanawanan yababan awankaratan naatu kwafur isan eo, “Babin men inarerey.”

Imaibo na sabuw biyah tit eof ir sum butubun, sabuw orot hi’abar hinan hinutanub hibat, Jesu orot murubin isan eo, “Orot boubun kumisirimih ayu ao!”
7.15 1Ki 17.23; 2Ki 4.36Orot murubin inu’in yawas misir mare ma tur eo. Jesu nawiy hairi hin hinah itin.

7.16 Luk 1.68Sabuw etei orot murubin yawas mimisir hi’itin hai bir ra’at baise God ana merar hiyi wabin hibora’ara’ah hio, “Dinab orot fairin anababatun wanawanatamaim tit! God ana sabuw baiyawasih isan na!” Jesu iti sisinaf ana tur ra’at tafaram Judea wanawanan hima’am etei hinowar na’atube tafaram nati sisibinamaim hima’am auman hinowar.

7.19-20 Psa 40.7; Mal 3.1; Rev 1.8Sawar iti etei isah John ana bai’ufununayah hina ana tur hio’owen ufunamaim, ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab iuwih eo, “Kwanan Regah kwanibatiy, John o isa eo anonowar, o iti ina, ai aki boro orot ta isan anama anakaif?”

Iti na’atube eo imaibo hina Jesu biyan hitit ana tur hi’owen hio, “Aki John Baptist o baibatiyimih iyafari ana, imih akokok inao ananowar, John o isa eo anonowar o iti ina, o aki boro orot ta isan anama anakaif.”

Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu sabuw maumurih na’in hai sawow yumatah ta ta, naatu demon kauh hiyen hima hibiwawa’anih etei biyawasih. Naatu sabuw moumurih na’in matah fim iwa’an matah higewasin hinuwanuw.
7.22 Isa 35.5-6; 61.1; Luk 4.18Imih Jesu John ana bai’ufununayah iyafutih eo, “Kwamatabir kwan abisa kwa’i’itah John ana tur kwa’owen. Sabuw matah fim higewasin tinuwanuw, ah kafikafirih higewasin hibat tereremor, kokom ani’anih biyah igewasin, tainih gugurih higewasin tur tenonowar, naatu sabuw morobone abiyawasih, tur gewasin i yababan sabuw isah abibinan. Sabuw iyab erekasiy auman ayu tibitutumu i boro men baigegewasin hinab!”

Kob nayah himatabir John isan hinan ufut, Jesu tatabir sabuw rau’ay gagamin hina hima’am ibatiyih eo, “Arar yan John abisa sisinaf itinamih kwatit kwan? Kotar wadar bi’inuwas itinamih kwan? Abisa itinamih kwatit kwan? Orot sawar wairafin e’abur gewas ma’am itinamih kwan? En anayabin sabuw hai abur gewasin i bar gewasihimaim tema’am.
7.26 Luk 1.76Imih kwao anowar. Abisa itinamih kwan? Dinab orot? Turobe, baise a tur ana’owen, iti orot i dinab oro’orot etei tafahimaim.
7.27 Mal 3.1Anayabin John isan, God iti na’atube eo Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum,
book.q: ‘Ayu au tur abarayan boro wan o namaim
aniyafar nan o a ef nayabuna.’
book.p: Jesu iban eo maiye, “‘Tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, baibin hitatoub wanawanahimaim, orot men yait ta John natabirimih. Baise orot ta God ana aiwobomaim taiyuwin bikafai i John natabir.”

7.29 Luk 3.12Sabuw etei, kabay o’onayah auman tur hinonowar ana maramaim, hiorereb God ana ef i turobe mutufurin, anayabin iti sabuw etei’imak i John bapataito itih.
7.30 Mat 21.32Baise Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah God abisa sinafumih kokok i hikwahir men hisinaf naatu John ana bapataito hikwahir.

“Imih sabuw iti boun tema’am hai itin boro abisa’amaim anayai anao? Hai itinin i mi’itube? Sabuw hai itinin i Kek gidigidih urababan tefafafow na’atube. Kek turih boro turahinah isah hio, ‘Aki tabin ana douduf arabirab baise kwa men kwabenabenamih. Naatu aki morob ana ew atatabor, baise kwa men kwarerereyamih.’ John Baptist nan ana veya’amaim yohar bay, harew fokarih men eaa tomatom, naatu kwa kwao, ‘Iti orot i demon kaun hiyen!’
7.34 Luk 15.2Baise Orot Natun na bay harew eaa tomatom kwa kwao, ‘Iti orot i ana bay aa naatu ana harew tom kakafin, kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah hai begon!’ Baise God ana ukwar rerekab i sabuw iyab hikok tebaib isah ebiturobe.”

Pharisee orot ta wabin Simon Jesu ifefeyan na ana baremaim hairi bay aa isan, basit Jesu na orot ana bar run hairi hima bay hi’aa.
7.37 Mat 26.7; Mak 14.3; Jn 12.3Babin ta bowabow kakafin wairafin nati bar meraramaim ma’am, Jesu Pharisee ana baremaim ma bay eaa ana tur nowar, basit re kibub wabin alabaster kabayamaim hikwak biya rarouw yamurin gewasin hisuwai batabat bai na Jesu ufunane bat, anamaim rerey maturin re an hihuruf, naatu kwafure aribunamaim Jesu an sasam naatu an mamay. Imaibo raiy bai Jesu anamaim isuwai re.

Iti na’atube sisinaf Pharisee orot i’itin ana maramaim, nuhinamaim not eo, “Iti orot dinab mowan na’at iti babin ebubutubun boro taso’ob, naatu boro taso’ob iti babin i yait, anayabin iti babin i bowabow kakafin wairafin!”
Naatu Jesu eo, “Simon, ayu tur ta anao inanowar.” “Bo i aisim bai’obaiyenayan. Kuo anowar.”

Jesu eo, “Orot rou’ab hin orot ta kabay wairafin biyan kabay isan hifefeyan, basit orot 500 kina bai orot ta itin naatu 50 kina bai orot ta itin. Baise ana maramaim orot hairi aurih men karam boro orot kabay wairafin ana kabay wan hitay, imih orot kabay matuwan turan hairi’ika wabih bosairen. Imih orot menatan isan i ana yabow ra’at?”
Simon Jesu iya’afut eo, “Anotanot orot nati kabay gagamin baibine.” Imaibo Jesu Simon iu, “Nati kuo i turobe.”

Imaibo Jesu tatabir babin isan Simon iu, “Iti babin i’itin? Ayu ana o a bar atit o men au sauwin isan harew iyai’imih, baise iti babin maturinamaim au sauw naatu aribunamaim au sasam. O men au merar iyi imamayu’umih, baise iti babin a bar aruruka busuruf au mamay men ihamiyimih. O men olive iroro’onamaim aribu isuwei’imih, baise iti babin raiy yamurin gewasin au’umaim isuwai re. Imih anababatun a tur ao’owen, iti babin ana bowabow kakafin maumurih na’in etei’imak anotanot tawiyen, anayabin ana yabow gagamin na’in ayu itu. Baise orot yait ana bowabow kakafin kikimin anotanotawiyen i ana yabow kikimin.”
Imaibo Jesu babin isan eo, “A bowabow kakafih etei i anotanotawiyen.”
Sabuw afa bairi hima bay hi’aau, hibusuruf taiyuwih hibabatiyih, “Iti i abi’orot bowabow kakafih notawiyenayan.”
7.50 Luk 8.48; 18.42Baise Jesu babin isan eo, “O a baitumatumamaim iyawasi tufuwamaim inatit inan.”

Veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 bairi hin bar awan, awan hirun hitit God ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin binan hiremor.
8.2 Mat 27.55-56; Mak 15.40-41; Luk 23.49Hinan wanawanahimaim, i baibin afa sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am, naatu demon kakafih hitar gubih hima’am Jesu biyawasih auman bairi hin. Mary wabin ta Magdalin biyanamaim demon seven Jesu nunih hititit auman bairi hin. Naatu Herod ana bowayan orot ukwarin wabin Chuza i aawan Joanna, Susanna, naatu baibin afa auman bairi hin. Naatu iti baibin hai kabayamaim Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hibaisih hai bowabow wanawananamaim.

Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow bar awan ta ta’ane hinan tafaram awan karatan, naatu Jesu oroubonamaim sabuw iuwih eo, “Ana veya ta orot ana ub tanumamih bow in ana me bifufubiy yanamaim tit, naatu ana ub ta ta asi’asiy ana veya ub afa i ef yanamaim hire, sabuw hina tafan hibat hiwas tatanen hin, naatu mamu hire hibow hi’aa. Ub afa i to yanamaim hire, baise hikuboubunih hiyey ana maramaim veya re rarih etei himorob, anayabin me owasasin. Ub afa i kokor ro’oh wanawanahimaim hire, naatu hikuboubunih bairi hiyen, baise kokor hiyen sasa hai fafa’amaim ub gewasih hirouw. Naatu ub afa i me gewasin yanamaim hire, hikuboubunih hiyen gewas hiw ai ta’ita’imon afe’eh ro’oro’oh etei 100 na’atube hiya.” Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “O yait tain nama’am na’at iti tur inanowar.”

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hikok oroubon anayabin so’ob isan hina hibatiy.
8.10 Isa 6.9-10Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “So’ob wa’iwa’irin God ana aiwob isan i God kwa it, baise sabuw afa isah i oroubonamaim ao, saise abisa bukamaim hikikirum niturobe, ‘Matah hinakubar hinanuw, baise boro men hina’itin, tainih nawayay tur hinanowar, baise boro men naniyan hinab.’”

“Oroubon anayabin i iti. Ub i God ana tur gewasin. Ub ef yanamaim hire’ere i sabuw God ana tur hinowar hibai, baise Demon Mowan na tur gewasin sabuw dogorohimaim bosair, anayabin Demon Mowan men ekokok sabuw tur gewasin hinanowar hinitumatum naatu yawas hinab. Ub afa to yan hire’ere, i sabuw God ana tur tenonowar ana maramaim i tibiyasisir, baise aurin an wairoron en, anayabin tur tenonowar ana veya boro hinitumitum naatu routobon nan nabubuwih ana veya boro mar ta’imon hinara’iy. Ub afa kokor ro’on wanawanah hire’ere, i sabuw God ana tur tenonowar, baise iti tafaram ana yasisir, tafaram ana yababan, naatu tafaram ana sawar isah tenotanot kwanekwan; imih ro’oh etei tekokokor naatu men ta ebiyamur. Baise ub me gewasin yan hire’ere, i sabuw iyab God ana Tur Gewasin hinowar dogoroh tutufin etei hibai, naatu nati tur isan hiten nowanowar tebowabow boro niw.

8.16 Mat 5.15; Luk 11.33“Orot men yait ta ramef ito’ab noukwat wanawanan tarafut in, o gem babanamaim yai in to’abamih. Baise ana efanamaim sikof, saise sabuw boro ana marakawin hina’itin naatu kawin hinan bar hinarun.”
8.17 Mat 10.26; Luk 12.2“Anayabin abisa baibunuwenamaim inu’in, God boro nabotait nirerereb, naatu abisa hisakirafut inu’in, sum boro natakweb nan bebeyan marakawamaim natit.”
8.18 Mat 25.29; Luk 19.26Imih tur iti kwanonowar i kwananowar gewas, anayabin orot yait isnubanub tur enonowar gewagewas, God boro dogoron nabotawiy tur moumurih na’in naniyah boro naso’ob. Baise orot yait tur isan men isnubanub enonowar, dogoron boro nahirafut naatu abisa kikimin ana notamaim ma enotanot auman God boro nabosair.”

Jesu hinah naatu taitin itinamih hina, baise men karam boro hita run biyan hitatit, anayabin sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in ef hifut. Orot ta na Jesu biyan tit eo, “O hinat naatu taitit hina ufun tebatabat tekokok o hina’iti.” Jesu sabuw etei nati hibatabat iuwih eo, “Sabuw iyab God ana tur hinowar tebobosiyasiyar, nati sabuw i ayu hinai naatu taitu.”

Ana veya ta Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi wa afe’en hiyen naatu iuwih, “Kwana boy tana rabon tanan harew kukuf rewan raunane tanayen.” Basit wa hinatait hitit, rar hikutatar hirabon hin. Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu matan fot wa wanawanan inure inu’in naniyan meyemeye wowog batabat tafair tit kukuf yan re rabih, wa harew iwan hisiwisiw men karam. Basit bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibunibun hio, “Regah, Regah! Wa iu’unun tana morob!” Jesu misir wowog, yabat hairi kwararih iuwih, mar ta’imonamo nuwarob e’afuw. Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Kwa a baitumatum i menamaim kwayai?”
Baise bai’ufununayah hifofofor naatu hibir taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot i yait? Yabat naatu wowog iu’uwih i marta’imon fanan hibai.”
book.s: Demon Orot Hiforatoun Hima’am Jesu Iyawas
book.p: Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hiboy hirabon hin tafaram Gerasa imaim hitit, Galilee harew kukuf rewan raunane. Jesu wa afe’enane dones yan bisure auman, orot ta nati bar merarane demon koun hiyen hiforatoun kwamur manin maiyow ana bar itumar, segar rah yahimaim, watu’umaim in ma reremor tit nan hairi hitar. Naatu nuw Jesu i’itin ana veya nanamaim ra’iy rerey fanan aumetawat na’in iwow eo, “Jesu God auyomtoro’ot Natun, ayu isau boro abisa inasinafumih kunan? Abifefeyani men baimakiy initu!” Iti na’atube eo, anayabin demon mowan orot baihamiyin titamih Jesu kwarartatab iu. Mar maumurih maiyow demon kakafih iti orot ana yawas etei hibi’a’afiy, an uman seinimaim ti’utan dibur baremaim tekaif tema’am, baise itukwar chain tituru’uru’um, tebonawiy ten arar yan imaim ema ereremor.

Jesu ibatiy eo, “O wab i mi’itube?” Orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu wabu i ‘Burut.’” Anayabin demon maumurih na’in iti orot wanawanan hirun hiforatoun hima’am. Demon Jesu hifefeyan men hikok boro tiyafarih hitan Sou Awan Wanu’umin hitama. 8.31 Abyss: Demon hai efan wanu’umin.

Naatu nati oyaw sisibinamaim i for burut hima hi’u’ufar, imih demon na for wanawanah run isan Jesu hifefeyan, naatu Jesu ana baibasit itih, iuwih hibihir hitit. Demon orot biyanane hitit i hinunuw hin for wanawanah hirun, naatu for burut hibatabat fan naiwan hinunuw hire hin harew kukuf yan hire etei hi’atomatom himorob.

Naatu orot nati for hima’uten hima’am, abisa matar hi’itin, himisir hinunuw hin bar merar hitit, sabuw etei hai tur hi’owen. Naatu tur tasasar in sabuw afa bar merar gidigidihimaim hima’am auman hinowar. Sabuw abisa mamatar itinamih hitit hina Jesu biyan hititit, orot demon hiforatoun hima’am Jesu biyawas, i Jesu sisibinamaim mare, ukwarin ruboun ar bai us ma’am hi’itin hai bir ra’at. Naatu sabuw afa orot demon hiforatoun hima’am Jesu mi’itube iyawas hi’i’itin sabuw afa hai tur hi’owen. Naatu sabuw nati tafaram Gerasa wanawanan hima’ama, Jesu hiu tafaram itumar, anayabin hai bir ra’at, naatu Jesu re wa bai matabir maiye rabon.

Naatu Orot nati demon biyanamaim hititit Jesu ifefeyan hairi namih, baise Jesu eo, “O i abiyafari ina’intabir maiye a bar, abisa God isa sisinaf, i sabuw hai tur ina’owen.” Basit orot in bar merar run remor Jesu isan mi’itube sisinaf sabuw etei hai tur eowen.

Jesu matabir rabon na harew kukuf rewan raunane yey ana maramaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit ana merar hiyi, anayabin isan hima hikakaif natit. Naatu Jew hai Kou’ay Bar 8.41 synagogue kaifenayan orot wabin Jairus na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan, ana kok i mi’itube Jesu hairi hitan ana bar. Anayabin i natun babitai ta’imonamo ana kwamur 12 na’atube i ana sawow ra’at momorob.

Naatu Jesu busuruf inan, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit nan ufun awan karatan. Nati sabuw wanawanahimaim i babin ta ana faifuwamaim rara kakafin bota’ar ma’am kwamur etei 12 na’atube sawar, yawas isan kabay gagamin maiyow doket tubunih baiyawasin isan sinaf, baise men yait ta iyawasimih. Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw rau’ay hinan wanawanan babin na Jesu ufunane tit eof ana faifuw tainin butubun, naatu mar ta’imonamo rara kakafin nununuw nutanub.
Jesu naniyan tatam eo, “Yait ayu butubunu?”
Baise sabuw etei hiyaub, naatu Peter eo, “Regah, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in na ufu awan karatan tenan ku’i’itih o kuo.”

Baise Jesu eo, “Sabuw afa ayu hibutubunu. Anayabin hibubutubunu ana veya’amaim au fair titit naniyan atatam.” Babin naniyan baib i yawas naatu men karam boro tibun, imih Jesu nanamaim an uman hi’oror auman tit sun yowen, sabuw etei matahimaim ana tur eowen aisim butubun, naatu bubutubun ana veya’amaim marta’imon yayawas auman ana tur eowen.
8.48 Luk 7.50Imaibo, Jesu babin isan eo, “Natu a baitumatumamaim iyawas. Tufuwamaim ina remor inan.”
Jesu iti na’at bat eo auman, Kou’ay Bar ana bonawiyen orot ana barene kob hina hitit hio, “Jairus o natu babitai i morob, imih men bai’obaiyenayan nawiyin airi na isan inanotamih.”
Iti na’at hibat hio Jesu nowar, naatu Jairus isan eo, “Men inabir, baise initumatum natu babitai boro nayawas.”

Naatu hina bar hititit ana veya’amaim, sabuw etei eotanih ufun hibat, i Peter, John, James, naatu kek hinah tamah akisihimo iuwih bairi bar wanawanan hirun. Sabuw etei kek momorob isan hiyababan hima hirererey, Jesu iuwih eo, “Men kwanarerey, kek i matan fot inu’in, men morobomih.”

Sabuw etei Jesu eo i bai’iyab na’atube imih himarib. Anayabin i matah yan kek morob hi’itin hiso’ob. Baise Jesu na kek uman bai, eaf eo, “Babitai, kumisir!” Babitai ayubin matabir na wanawanan run, mar ta’imon yawas misir mare ma. Imaibo Jesu kek bay baitin aa isan hinah tamah iuwih. Kek hinah tamah hifofofor men kafaita, baise Jesu eofafarih eo, “Abis matar kwa’i’itin men orot babin ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah etei I2 eaf ayuwih hina hitit, demon kakafih nunih isan, naatu sawow yumatah ta ta bosaisiren isan fair itih, naatu eonowahih. Imaibo God ana aiwob binan isan naatu sawusawuwih baiyawasih isan iyafarih hitit hin.
9.3-5 Luk 10.4-11Naatu iuwih, “A nanawan isan kwanatitit ana maramaim men sawar afa kwanabow auman kwananamih, men hafoy, tu, kabay, bay, o wanabir. Kwananan sabuw iyab hina’iti a merar hinay hinabubuwi na’at, nati bar meraramaim kwanama a bowabow kwanisawar imaibo kwanatit. Baise sabuw men a merar hinay hinabubuwi na’at, a fofob kwanarutatab nare naatu nati bar merar kwanihamiy kwanatit, baimatnuwen ana orereb na’atube.”
Imaibo bai’ufununayah hitit hin bar awan, awan hirun hitit God ana aiwob isan tur gewasin hibinan naatu sawusawuwih hiyayawasih.

9.7 Mat 16.14; Mak 8.28; Luk 9.19Herod, Galilee sabuw hai aiwob orot, sawar iti himamatar hai tur nonowar ana veya ana kasiy ra’at, anayabin sabuw afa hio John Baptist morobone matabir maiye, sabuw afa hio, Elijah marane ra’iy, sabuw afa hio, “Dinab orot ta marasika momorob i yawas maiye matabir na.”
9.9 Luk 23.8Baise Herod eo, “Ayu taiyuwu aso’ob John i ayu sikan ao hi’afuw, naatu iti orot i yait iti bowabow sinaf ana tur anonowar?” Iti na’atube eo naatu kok i orot ana yumat itinamih nuwih.

Jesu ana tur abarayah himatabir hina hitit, sawar abisa’awat hisisinaf ana tur hi’owen. Naatu nawiyih hitit akisihimo hin tafaram wabin Bethsaida imaim hima. Baise sabuw maumurih na’in Jesu au Bethsaida inan ana tur hinowar, naatu hi’ufunun hin biyan hitit. Hai merar yi God ana aiwob isan binan hinowar naatu sawusawuwih iyawasih. Veya re birabirab auman bai’ufununayah 12 hin Jesu hiu, “Sabuw kwiyafarih ten bar iti yubinamaim naatu masawabar iti yubinamaim taituwah tema’am biyah bay hinanuwet hinabow hinaa, naatu efan auman hinanuwet fai hina’in, anayabin iti efan i owararin.”

Baise Jesu iuwih, “Bay i boro kwa kwanitih hinaa.” Bai’ufununayah hiya’afut, “Rafiy fafar umat roun naatu siy rou’abamo efanamaim ti’inu’in. Kukokok aki anan sabuw etei’imak isah bay anatobon?” Sabuw nati’imaim hiru’ay hima tur hinonowar nah etei i 5,000 na’atube. Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih, “Sabuw kwa’uwih nah 50 na’atube kou’ay tata’amaim timarir.” Bai’ufununayah Jesu eo na’atube sabuw hi’uwih himarir. Imaibo Jesu rafiy fafar umat roun bow, naatu siy rou’ab bow, au mar nuw ra’at, God ana merar yi igegewasin sawar, im seseb ana bai’ufununayah itih hibow sabuw hifaramih hi’aa. Sabuw etei hi’aa yah iw naatu bai’ufununayah kaifet etei 12 hibow sabuw bay hi’aau turih hibihamiyen hiwan awah hikufoten.

Ana veya ta Jesu akisinamo ma yoyoyoban ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hitit ibatiyih eo, “Sabuw ayu isau mi’itube’ewat teo kwanonowar?”
9.19 Luk 9.7-8Hiya’afut hio, “Sabuw afa teo o i John Baptist, afa teo o i Elijah, naatu afa teo o i God ana dinab oro’orot marasika himomorob i ta morobone yawas maiye na.”
9.20 Jn 6.68-69Naatu ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Bo kwa ayu isou mi’itube kwanotanot?” Peter iya’afut eo, “O i God ana Roubininenayan.” Imaibo Jesu eofafarih eo, “Men yait ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”

9.22 Luk 9.44; 18.32-33Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Jew hai orot gagamih, firis hai ukwarih na’atube Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah boro Orot Natun hinakwahir, biyababan gagamin na’in nab, hina’asabun namorob, baise veya baitounin ufunamaim boro morobone namisir maiye.”

9.23 Mat 10.38; Luk 14.27Naatu etei’imak iuwih eo, “Orot yait ayu bai’ufnunu’umih nakokok na’at, taiyuwin ana yawas i nakwahir, mar etei ana onaf na’abar ayu ni’uf nunu.
9.24 Mat 10.39; Luk 17.33; Jn 12.25Anayabin orot yait ana yawas i taiyuwin isan eo’oharihar boro nikasiy, baise orot yait ana yawas nakwahir ayu nabi’ufnunu, ma’ama wanatowan boro natita’ur. Tafaram wanawanan orot ta sawar tutufin etei i bow karam, baise i taiyuwin ana yawas nabi’afiy, o hina bigegesair na’at, iti sawar bow ya ma tototo boro hinibais?
9.26 Mat 10.33; Luk 12.9Orot yait ayu isou biyan eo’ohow, naatu au tur isan biyan nao’ohow na’at, Orot Natun ana bonamanamarinamaim na’atube Tamah God ana bonamanamarinamaim naatu ana tounamatar kakafiyih auman hai bonamanamarinamaim namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, boro ibo isan biyan na’ohow. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, kwa iyab iti kwama’am boro yawas kwanama’am God ana aiwob kwana’itin.”

Tur iti eo hima fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim, Peter, John, naatu James buwih bairi hiyen hin oyaw wan yoyoban isan. Naatu hiyen hin yoyoyoban ana maramaim yumatan botabir, ana faifuw hikwes anababatun namanamar ebowabow emamarakaw na’atube. Nati ana maramaim naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab, Moses, Elijah hairi hirerereb,
9.31 Luk 9.22mar ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman hira’iy Jesu ana bowabow iti tafaramamaim baisawarin matabir maiye isan, naatu God ana kok abisa Jesu Jerusalemamaim sinaf baiturobe isan bairi hio.
9.32 2Pet 1.16-18Peter ana ofonah bairi i nuhih bur hi’inu’in ufut iti sawar himatar, baise matah nuw himimisir auman Jesu biyanamaim bobonamanamar hi’itin naatu orot rou’ab bairi hibatabat hi’itih. Naatu orot rou’ab Jesu hibihamiy auman, Peter Jesu isan eo, “Regah igewasin aki iti ama’amamaim sis tounu ana wowab, ta o isa ta Moses isan naatu Elijah isan!” Iti na’atube eo anayabin i men so’ob abisa eo.

Peter iti na’at bat eo auman sakusakuk ra’iy ana youninamaim tar sumih, naatu wanawanan hirur auman, bai’ufununayah yah birubir fafar.
9.35 Luk 3.22Sakukuw wanawanan God eafatait eo, Iti Orot i Ayu Natu, ayu arubin imih nao’o kwananowar.”
Iti tur hinowar in sasawar ufunamaim Jesu akisinamo batabat hi’itin. Naatu bai’ufununayah sawar abisa nati ana veya’amaim hi’itin men yait ta ana tur hi’owen awah hibofot hima.
book.s: Demon Kek Hitoun Bububur Hima’am Jesu Iyawas
book.p: Marto Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hire hina oyaw an hitit, naatu nati’imaim sabuw hima’am hina biyah hitit. Orot ta sabuw rau’ay wanawanahimaim batabat e’af eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, abifefeyani kunuw natu ku’itin, natu ta’imon maiyow! Demon kakafih kaun teyey ana veya eororsair iwow ere erab awan fusifusin ekubar in erabirab biyan riririr ebiwa’an. Naatu iti na’atube i mar etei esisinaf men kafa’imo ebihamiyimih. A bai’ufununayah ai fefeyanih, demon nuninamih auwih, baise men karam.”
Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa sabuw iti boun ana veya aur baitumatum naatu ayawas etei i hibibir. Kwanotanot ayu boro bairit manin tanama abit ana’abar? A kek kubai kuna aitin.”

Kek nan auman demon kakafin kek bai rab rouw me yan re naatu ifiruruw in hub itaiy re. Baise Jesu demon kakafin kwarar tatab nun tit kek iyawas bai tamah itin. Sabuw etei’imak God ana fair hi’itin hifofofor men kafaita. Sabuw Jesu abisa sisinaf isan, hibat hibifofofor wanawanan Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo,
9.44 Luk 9.22“Tain kwanarub gewas tur iti anao kwananowar. Orot Natun i boro baban hinao naatu hinab sabuw umahimaim hinayai.”
9.45 Luk 18.34Baise bai’ufununayah iti tur naniyan men hibai, tur anayabin hai notamaim ibun, naatu baibatiyin tur anayabin o nowar isan hibir.

9.46 Luk 22.24Bai’ufununayah taiyuwih wanawanahimaim, yait orot gagamin isan hio hinan gamin matar. Jesu abisa hinotanot itin, basit kek kafa’i ta bai na sisibinamaim iu bat.
9.48 Mat 10.40Imaibo iuwih, “Orot yait kek kafai iti na’atube nab ayu wabu’umaim ana merar nayiy, i ayu au merar eyiy. Naatu orot yait ayu au merar eyiy i orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana merar eyiy. Anayabin orot yait kwa wanawanamaim wabin en kek kikimin na’atube ema’am, nati orot i gagamin.”
book.s: Orot Yait Kwa Isa Men Ebirakit I Kwa A Of
book.p:
John misir eo, “Regah, orot ta o wabimaim demon kakafih nununih a’itin naatu a’otan. Anayabin nati orot i men it ata kou’ayomaim ema’ama.”
9.50 Mat 12.30; Luk 11.23Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men ina’otanimih, anayabin orot yait kwa isa men ebirakit i kwa isa ebatabat.”

Jesu au mar yen isan ana veya na kakabom auman, ana not bogaigiwas yen in au Jerusalem. Naatu kob wan iyafarih hin Samaria bar merar hitit ana efan hitayabuna tanan imaim ta’in isan. Baise Samaria sabuw men ana merar hiyi hibai efan hitinimih, anayabin hiso’ob Jesu i au Jerusalem yey.
9.54 2Ki 1.9-16Naatu bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab James John hairi iti na’atube hi’i’itin yah so’ar hio, “Regah, kukokok wairaf marane anao nara’iy iti sabuw nagurusih?” Baise Jesu tatabir hairi’ika kwararih. Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hin bar merar ta hitit.

Ef hiyen hinan naiwanamaim orot ta Jesu ana tur eowen eo, “Ayu boro ani’ufnuni o menamaim kwenan boro imaim tanan.” Jesu orot iya’afut iu, “Haruharu hai sau tema’am, naatu mamu hai batar tema’am, baise Orot Natun mare ma biyan tubaiwa’an isan aurin efan i en.” Naatu Jesu tatabir orot ta isan eo, “Kwi’ufnunu airit tan.” Baise orot eo, “Regah akokok wan i boro inihamiyu anan tamai morob inu’in anab anan ana yai imaibo ani’ufnuni?”

Baise Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Murubih kwaihamiyih boro murubih taiyuwih hinaya’ih. Baise o i kwen, God ana aiwob isan kubinan.”
9.61 1Ki 19.20Naatu orot ta na maiye eo, “Regah ayu i boro o ani’ufnuni, baise wan i boro anan hinai tamai naatu taitu tuwai’inah anao tuturih.” Jesu iya’afut iu, “Orot yait busuruf ana me bifufubiy, naatu misir maiye bat au’uf enunutabitabir, God ana aiwobomaim boro men karam nabow.”

10.1 Mak 6.7Iti ufunamaim Jesu orot afa’abo rubinih, nah etei 72. Naatu efan i na bainanawanamih notanot imaim rouru’ab wan iyafarih hin. Bar awan, awan hirun hitit hibinan hiremor.
10.2 Mat 9.37-38; Jn 4.35Jesu iuwih eo, “Masaw i gagamin na’in iyamur, baise fourayah i matan ta’amo. Isan imih Regah fourayan matuwan isan kwanayoyoban saise bowayah moumurihika niyafarih hinan masaw hinafour.
10.3 Mat 10.16Kwatit kwan! Sheep na’atube abiyafari haru kakafih wanawanahimaim kwananamih.
10.4 Mat 10.7-14; Mak 6.8-11; Luk 9.3-5Kwanatitit umamaim men Kaukut ta kwanab, hafoy, a baibiyow ta kwanab; naatu efamaim men kwanabat sabuw kwanibabatiyihimih.

Bar menatan kwanarur wantoro’ot kwanao, “Tufuw kwa etei isa nama.’ Naatu nati bar wanawanan tufuw ana orot nama’am na’at, kwa tufuw kwabitin boro nab, baise en na’at, a tufuw kwabitin boro namatabir maiye kwanab.
10.7 1Cor 9.6-14; 1Tim 5.18Naatu bar nati kwarun kwabaib imaim kwanama, siwar abisa’awat tibit i kwanabow kwanaa kwanatom bairi kwanama, anayabin bowabow sabuw tebowabow i hai baiyan tebaib. Naatu men bar bar afe kwana yara’ara’ah kwanaremor.

10.8 1Cor 10.27Bar merar menatan kwanatitit a merar hinay hinabuwi, abisa hinabit kwanab kwana’aan, nati bar meraramaim sawusawuwih kwaniyawasih, naatu hai tur kwana’owen ‘God ana aiwob i natit sawar.’ Baise bar merar menatan kwanarur sabuw men a merar hinayiy, kwanatit ef yan kwanabat kwanao,
10.11 Act 13.51; 18.6‘Aki ai fofob iti a bar a meraramaim arutatab bebeyan abimatnuwi kwa a baimakiy isan. Baise men nuhi nabur God ana Aiwob i na iyubin sawar.’
10.12 Gen 19.24-25; Mat 10.15; 11.24Anababatun a tur ao’owen baibatebat ana veya nati bar merar sabuw i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in hinab, men Sodom sabuw hibaib na’atube’emih.

Chorazin sabuw naatu Bethsaida sabuw, kwa i boro sawar kakafin maiyow isa namatar! Anayabin ina’inan iti kwa biyamaim asisinaf marasika Taiya, Sidon sabuw biyahimaim ata sinaf, mar ta’imon boro hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan yuhwah gao hitarab hai kakafih hitae’en! Baise baibatebat ana veya Taiya naatu Sidon sabuw God boro kaifai nakabibirih, naatu kwa i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in kwanab. Kwa Capernaum sabuw! Wab kwabora’ah a fair kwabibigan, God boro nagurusi morob ana efanamaim nitaiy kwanare!”

10.16 Mat 10.40; Luk 9.48; Jn 5.23Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Orot yait a tur enonowar, nati i ayu au tur enonowar, na’atube orot yait ekwakwahiri nati i ayu ekwakwahiru. Naatu orot yait ayu ekwakwahiru, nati i yait ayu iyafaru anan i ekwakwahir.”

Orot nah etei 72 yasisiramaim hina Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Regah, o wabimaim demon au’uwih i mar ta’imon fanai hibai hititit.”
10.18 Jn 12.31; Rev 12.8-9Jesu iyafutih eo, “Satan marane namanamar na’atube bokiyakiyat hea’obow re’er a’itin.
10.19 Psa 91.13; Mak 16.18Kwananowar fair etei kwa ait aonowahi sawar, imih kwa boro kok naatu sana’ar tafah kwanabat kwanaremor, na’atube rakit hai ahay hai waf etei boro kwanawasatan, boro men abis ta niyababanimih.
10.20 Php 4.3; Rev 3.5Naatu demon kakafih kwa’uwih fana hibai hibibihir isan men kwaniyasisir. baise maramaim God wab kikirum isan i kwaniyasisir.”

Nati ana veya’amaim God Anunin Kakafiyin Jesu iwa’an yan wanawanan yasisir awan karatan eo, “Tamai o i mar tafaram ana aiwob! A merar ayiy anayabin sawar iti etei o sabuw so’obayah naatu sabuw notanotayah men i’obaiyih, baise ibun na’atube ma’am boro’obo natunat bereberefiy i i’obaiyih tesoso’ob isan, Tamai a merar ayiy, iti sawar etei i o a kokomaim isinaf temamatar.”
10.22 Jn 3.35; 10.15Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Sawar tutufin etei Tamai ayu itu, men yait ta so’ob ayu i God Natun, baise Tamai akisinamo so’ob, na’atube men yait ta Tamai so’ob, baise ayu i Natun akisu’umo aso’ob. Naatu sabuw iyabowat i Natun rurubinihiwat boro God isah nirerereb hinaso’ob.”

Imaibo Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah akisihimo iuwih eo, “Kwa i kwabiyasisir anayabin God ana bowabow anababatun mata yan kwa’i’itin. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab oro’orot naatu aiwob sabuw hikok kwanekwan kwa abisa kwa’i’itin i hita’itin naatu abisa kwanonowar, i hitanowar, baise men hi’itin naatu men hinowar.”

10.25 Mat 22.35-40; Luk 18.18Ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot so’obayan ta, Jesu baikubibiruwinamih misir ibatiy eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, ayu i boro abisa anasinaf ma’ama wanatowan anab?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in ibiyab hai yabih abisa’awat i’itan?”

10.27 Deu 6.5; Lev 19.18Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah, a God isan, dogor tutufin etei, ayub tutufin etei, a fair tutufin etei, naatu a not tutufin etei a Regah isan iniyabow, naatu taituwa isah iniyabow, o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube.”
10.28 Lev 18.5Jesu iya’afut eo, “Abisa i’o i tur anababatun i’o, isan imih kwen abisa i’o na’atube kusinaf saise ma’ama wanatowan boro inab.” Baise ofafar bai’obaiyenayan taiyuwin bora’ah na’atube, imih Jesu ibatiy maiye, “Ayu taituwau i iyab?”

Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ana veya ta Jerusalemane orot ta au Jericho re inan basit, sabuw kakafih wanawanah run, hitit ana faifuw hi’oromen hibai hirab hitaiy re imamayay in, ana sawar hibow hibihir hin. thieves attacking travellerCN01745B.TIFLuk 10.30©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Bainowah orot binanawan hirab imamayay inu’in10.30 Nati veya ta’imon firis ibo Jerusalemane au Jericho re inan basit, orot ef awan inu’in itin, baise ef sisibin raunane yagebageb bihir in.
Levi 10.32 Iti kou’ay i firis hai baibaisayah orot ibo auman nati ef ta’imon re nan orot inu’in itin, naatu ef au waraunane yagebageb in. Baise Samaria orot nati ef ta’imon remor re nan orot inu’in koun yen, naatu nuware i’itin ana veya’amaim ana yababan ra’at. Basit na orot inu’inumaim tit, biyan feher matahimaim raiy isusuwa’en naatu biyan fiyow sawar, basit bai ana donkey 10.34 Bowabaituw kikimin ta horseabe. afe’en yara’ah naatu bai hin nanawan bar ta imaim yai ma’uh ma. Hi’in marto ana kaukut eofere kabay rou’ab 10.35 2 denari bai orot bar kaifenayan itin eo, ‘Iti orot inakaif airi kwanama, naatu abisa’awat isan inasisinaf ana matabir anan au tur ina’owen boro anibaiyani.’”

Iti na’at eo sawar basit, Jesu orot ibatiy, “Orot tounu wanawanahimaim orot menatan i taituwan kakafih hirab inu’in isan ana yabow i’inuw?” Ofafar bai’obaiyenayan Jesu iya’afut eo, “Orot taituwan itin yan baban bibais.” Imaibo Jesu orot iu, “Kwenan nati na’atube kusinaf.”

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi efamaim hiremor hinan basit hina babin wabin Martha ana bar ana meraramaim hitit; hai merar yi buwih ana baremaim hirun.
10.39 Jn 11.1; 12.2-3Naatu i tain Mary na Jesu nanamaim mare ma, Jesu abisa eo i ma nonowar, Martha cooking Mary sitting at Jesus’ feetCN01750B.TIFLuk 10.39©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Martha bay ebitab, Mary Jesus a namaim ma tur enonowar10.39-42 baise Martha bowabow etei akisin bowabow isan yan so’ar na eo, “Regah Mary sawar etei ihamiyen akisu abowabow ku’i’itin i mi’itube kunotanot? Karam boro itau tan tibaisu airi ata bow ai en?”

Regah iya’afut eo, “Martha, Martha, o i sawar moumurih na’in isah inot a yababan ra’at ya esoso’ar,
10.42 Mat 6.33baise sawar ta’imon i takokok gagamin. Mary i sawar gewasih rubin, naatu boro men yait biyanamaim nabosairimih.”

Veya ta Jesu efan ta’amaim ma yoyoban inan, ana yoyoban sasawar ufunamaim ana bai’ufununayah orot ta natit eo, “Regah, kwi’obaiyi ana yoyoban, John ana bai’ufununayah bi’obaiyih na’atube.” Jesu iuwih eo, “Yoyobanamih iti na’atube kwanayoyoban.
