Anayabin Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, tafaram wanawanan ana’itin i boro namanamar ebow tafaram etei emamarakaw na’atube boro namarakaw. Baise wantoro’ot i boro sabuw iyab iti boun tema’am ana veya’amaim boro hinab hini’a’akir, hinakwahir biyababan ta ta hinitin.

Ana itinin i boro Noah ana veya’amaim mamatar na’atube, Orot Natun ana veya’amaim boro na’atube namatar. Noah ana veya’amaim sabuw hi’aa hitomatom, orot babin hitatabin, wanawanan Noah wa wanawanan run harew gagamin tit sabuw etei himorob.
17.28 Gen 18.20; 19.25Naatu ana itinin ta i Lot ana veya’amaim mamatar na’atube. Orot babin hi’aa hitom, masaw hitar hibow, bar hiwowab, hitobon hi’aa hinan wanawanan Lot tafaram Sodom bihamiy ana veya wairaf marane God iyafar re sabuw etei e’arahih himorob.”

Ana itinin i ta’imon, Orot Natun nanan ana veya boro nati na’atube namatar.
17.31 Mat 24.17-18Nati ana veya’amaim orot yait ana or ema’am boro men nayen bar ana sawar nabow, na’atube orot ana masaw ebow boro men namatabir bar sawar nabowamih.
17.32 Gen 19.17, 26Orot Lot aawan isan abisa namatar i kwananot!
17.33 Luk 9.24Orot yait i taiyuwin ana yawas enunuwih boro men nabaimih, baise orot yait ana yawas ayu isou kwakwahir ana yawas boro natita’ur nab. A tur ao’owen, nati ana guguminamaim, orot rou’ab boro gem ta’imon tafan hina inu’in, orot ta boro hina bora’ah, ta boro gem tafan hinihamiy na’in. Baibin rou’ab boro hinama maiwok hinakakair, babin ta boro hina bora’ah ta boro hinihamiy nama. Orot rou’ab boro hinama masaw hinabob, orot ta boro hina bora’ah, ta boro masaw yan hinihamiy nama.” Ana bai’ufununayah hibatiy hio, “Regah iti boro menamaim namatar?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Efan menamaim murumurubih biyah ti’inu’in mamu ikou boro imaim hinaru’ay.”

18.1 Col 4.2; 1Th 5.17Jesu bai’obaiyen ta oroubonamaim ana bai’ufununayah i’obaiyih eo, “Mar etei kwanayoyoyoban, men guban nahurir yoyoban kwanihamiyimih.” “Veya ta bar merar gagamin ta’amaim tur nowarayan orot ta nati’imaim ma’am, i men kafa’imo God isan birubir naatu orot babin isah birubirumih. Nati bar meraramaim i kwafur babin auman ma’am. Nati babin mar etei tur nowarayan orot ifefeyan eo, ‘Ayu akokok inibaisu au kamabiy wairafin airi kwanao ayu ana ma gewas.’ Veya moumurih maiyow orot iti babin ana fefeyan nonowar men kafa’imo abisa ta sinafumih. Baise yomaninamaim taiyuwin ma binotanot eo, ‘Ayu i men God abibiruw naatu orot babin men akakafiyih. Baise iti babin i mar etei isau enan, gewasin babin i boro anibais nama gewas, saise men mar etei nan ayu nihaharu’umih.’”

Naatu Regah Jesu eo, “Tur nowarayan orot kakafin ana tur kwanowar. Naatu kwanotanot God ana roubinen sabuw fai mar isan hinarererey boro men na’itin nibaisih hinama gewas? Naatu baibaisih isan boro nama narubirabir? Baise a tur ao’owen, God i boro hai yababan na’itin naatu boro matan nakabiy nasinaf. Baise Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, tafaramamaim boro sabuw baitumatumayah natita’urih.”

Sabuw afa taiyuwih tebora’ahih gewasih terouw, taih tuwah tinunufuruwih isan, Jesu oroubonamaim eo. “Ana veya ta orot rou’ab hitit hin Tafaror Baremaim yoyoban isan, orot ta i Pharisee, naatu orot ta i kabay o’onayan. Pharisee orot akisin nabin bat yoyoban eo, ‘God a merar ayiy gagamin maiyow, anayabin ayu i men sabuw afa na’atube’emih, ayu men kabat mowan, men baifufuwenayan, men bainowan mowan, men taituwau a’aawah ufuh a nan, naatu ayu i men iti kabay o’onayan na’atube.
18.12 Isa 58.1-4; Mat 23.23Fur ta’imon wanawanan mar rou’ab ayoyohar naatu au kabay abaib roumukur etei o a siwar abit ofafaramaim eo na’atube.’

18.13 Psa 51.1Baise kabay o’onayan akisin babanane bat, uwan yi dogoron rab yoyoban eo, ‘God kwiwanbabanu, ayu bowabow kakafin wairafu.’
18.14 Mat 23.12A tur ao’owen, orot rou’ab yoyoban ufunamaim au bar hinan kabay o’onayan God matanamaim i roumutufuren bai yasisiramaim ana ubar in, men Pharisee. Anayabin orot yait taiyuwin ebobora’ah God boro nab nayare, baise orot babin yait taiyuwin eyayare God boro nayara’ah orot gagamin namatar.”

Sabuw afa natunatuh Jesu baigegewasinih isan hibow hina biyan hititit, ana bai’ufununayah hi’itih, sabuw higam hi’uwih. Baise Jesu kek eafih hina biyan hitit naatu eo, “Kek kwaihamiyih tena biyou titit, men kwanao tanihimih, anayabin sabuw iyab dogoroh iti kek gidigidih na’atube God ana aiwobomaim boro hinarun.
18.17 Mat 18.3A tur ao’owen, orot yait nayare iti kek na’atube God ana aiwobomaim boro narun.”

18.18 Luk 10.25Jew sabuw hai bonawiyenayan orot ta Jesu ibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan Gewas, kuo anowar, abisa anasinaf boro yawas ma’ama wanatowan anab.” Jesu iya’afut eo, “O aisim ayu orot gewasu irouw kuo’o? Men yait ta gewasinamih, baise God akisinamo i gewasin.
18.20 Exo 20.12-16; Deu 5.16-20Ofafar etei Moses ana Bukamaim kikirum iso’ob? ’Taituwa a’aawah ufuh men inan, men sabuw ina’asbunuw, men inabain, men inifufuwen, men inayanuw, naatu hinat tamat fanah inabosiyasiyar.’”
Orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu kek ana veya’ika abusuruf iti ofafar etei ai’ufnunen, men ta astu’ubimih.”

Jesu nonowar ufunamaim eo, “Sawar ta’imonamo men isinafumih. Inan sawar etei inabow sabuw hinatobon naatu kabay yababan wairafih inafaramih. Imaibo inan ayu ni’ufnunu, saise maramaim o boro totobuyoy wairaf inamatar.” Baise orot iti tur nonowar ana maramaim ana yababan ra’at, anayabin i totobuyoy wairafin.

Jesu iti orot biyababan itin basit eo, “Sabuw iyab totobuyoy wairafih maramaim run isan boro isah nafokar. Sinak ana sou awan kikimin camel imaim boro karam nasorabon, baise orot totobuyoy wairafin God ana aiwobomaim run isan boro men karam narun.”
Sabuw iti tur hinonowar hio, “Orot yait i boro yawas natita’ur?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw isah i fokar, baise God isan i hamehamen maiyow.” Imaibo Peter, Regah isan eo, “Aki ai bar ai tumar o abi’ufnuni ku’itin.” Jesu iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, orot yait ana bar, aawan, natunatun, taintuwan, hinah tamah, ihamiyen God ana aiwob isan i’akir ebowabow boro sawar moumurih na’in iti tafaramamaim tafan hinaya’abar nabow naatu yawas mar boro enan ma’ama wanatowan boro nab.”
book.s: Jesu Mar Baitaunin Ana Morob Isan Eo
book.p:
18.31 Luk 24.44Jesu ana tur abarayah nah 12 buwih nabinamaim iuwih eo, “Kwananowar! It i au Jerusalem tayey, naatu nati’imaim dinab oro’orot Orot Natun isan abisa mataramih hio hikikirum boro imaim yabin namatar.
18.32 Luk 9.22, 44Nati’imaim i boro hinab Eteni Sabuw umahimaim hinayai, hinab hini’i’iyab, hinigigim, hinakwaitututur, hinawabir naatu hina’asabun namorob. Baise veya tounu ufunamaim boro nayawas maiye namisir.”
18.34 Mak 9.32Naatu bai’ufununayah Jesu abisa eo men kafa’imo tur naniyan hibai hinotaboun. Anayabin kawen turamaim eo naniyan bain isan fokar.
book.s: Jesu Orot Matan Fim Fefeyanayan Iyawas
book.p: Jesu yena Jericho biyubin auman orot ta matan fim nati ef yanamaim ma fefefeyan. Sabuw hinan fanah nowar, basit ibatiyih, “Abisa matar kwa’i’itin?”
Sabuw hiya’afut hio, “Jesu Nazareth matuwan enan.”
Basit orot matan fim erererey auman eaf eo, “Jesu David ana’agir kwiwanbabanu.”
Sabuw wan hi’iyon hinan hitatabir orot hikwarar tatab awan fotamih hio. Baise orot matan fim fan sib aumetawat na’in eaf eo, “David ana agir kwiwanbabanu!”

Basit Jesu nutanub bat naatu eo, “Orot kwabai kwana aitin.” Orot hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit, Jesu orot ibatiy. “Abisa kukokok isa anasinaf?” Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu akokok matau nigewasin ana nuw maiye.”

Basit Jesu orot iu, “Mata igewasin kunuw, abaitumatumamaim ebiyawasi.” Mar ta’imonamo orot matan igewasin nuw naatu God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah auman Jesu i’ufunun hairi hin. Naatu abisa matar sabuw hi’itin ana maramaim God ana merar hiyi wabin hibora’ara’ah.

Jesu na Jericho tit naatu nati bar merar wanawanan remor inan, basit nati’imaim orot totobuyoy wairafin wabin Zakias, kabay o’onayah hai orot ukwarin ma’am tit. Kok kwanekwan Jesu ana yumat ta’itin, baise i orot kabumin sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in nan hisumisum i men karam boro Jesu ta’itin. Naatu sabuw aunah i’iyon nunuw in ai sycamore afe’en yen mare ma Jesu nan ta’itinimih, anayabin Jesu ef nati’iwat inan.

Baise Jesu na nati ai anamaim titit ana veya an kutan bat, naatu ai afe’en nuw ra’at eo, “Zakias saise kura’iy, anayabin ayu akokok boun o abaremaim airit tanama.” Jesus talking to Zachaeus in treeCN01776B.TIFLuk 19.5©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus Zachaeus ai afe’en ma’am isan eafa’af ra’at19.5 Zakias matan kabiy kayam rena haw tit, kawasa auman Jesu ana merar yi
19.7 Luk 15.2Sabuw etei’imak hi’i’itin men hiyasisir naatu higam hio, “Iti orot i bowabow kakafin wairafin ana nanawan orotomih matar hairi tenan ana bar.”
19.8 Exo 22.1; Num 5.6-7Zakias misir eo, “Regah ayu i boro au sawar founafoun ana kuru’um turin yababan wairafih anitih, naatu sabuw iyab aifufuwih hai sawar abowabow boro hai sawar tafanamaim matah kwakwafe’en auman anaya’abar anitih.”

19.9 Luk 13.16; Act 16.31Jesu misir Zakias iu, “Boun iti baremaim God ana yawas natit orot ebiyawasi, anayabin iti orot auman i Abraham uwan ta.
19.10 Luk 15.4; Jn 3.17; 1Tim 1.15Orot Natun i sabuw iyab hikasiy tema’am nuwihih bow naatu baiyawasih isan na.”

Jesu na Jerusalem tit biyubin auman, sabuw abisa Jesu eo hinowar hinan hinotanot i God ana aiwob iti boro’omo tatit ana naniyanabe, baise Jesu i kofan maiye oroubonamaim iuwih eo, “Ana veya ta orot gagamin tafaram ta’amaim roubinin aiwob baitin, imaibo matabir maiye isan in tafaram ta ef yok na’in imaim tit. Baise na isan bobobunabuna ana veya, ana akirwairafih etei 10 e’af hina gold taita’imon faramih naatu iuwih. ‘Kabay iti abit kwanab, imaim kwanama kwanabowabow ayu ana matabir.’
Baise i taiyuwin ana tafaram sabuw hifa’ifai naatu men hikok nati orot ti’aiwob, imih sabuw hiyafarih hin hitit hio, ‘Aki men akokok iti orot aki isai ni’aiwob.’
Baise nati orot aiwob hitin naatu matabir na ana bar tit. Imaibo ana akirwairafih iyab kabay bitih hina hitit ibatiyih, kok taso’ob, kabay itih hibowabow baibi’ab tafan hiya’abar hibow.

Orot ta wan run eo, “Regah ayu au kabay itu ama abowabow tafan i ten hiya’abar abai.’
19.17 Luk 16.10Ana regah eo, ‘O i bowayan orot gewas, au bowabow kikimin abit ikaif gewas, imih bar merar etei ten abit inakaifen.’ Orot bairou’abin run eo, ‘Regah ayu kabay itu ama abowabow tafan etei five aya’abar abai.’

Naatu ana orot ukwarin iyasisir eo, ‘O i bar merar etei five abit inakaifen.’ Naatu orot baitounin run eo, ‘Regah a kabay ibitu i abai an koukufet wanawanan asum ai boun inu’in iti abai ana abit maiye. Ayu o isa abir, anayabin o a tur fokarin, turanah arih o aribe asir kubowabow kwanekwan, naatu turanah hai masaw o kubobobe asir kufafour kwanekwan.’ Regah misir iu, ‘O i bowayan orot kakaf nokonokow! Nati a tur i’o’omaim boro natatabir nafatumi! O iso’ob ayu i au tur fokarin, sabuw hai sawar abowabow kwanekwan, naatu hai masaw ayu abobobe afafour. Gewasin au kabay banikamaim itayai tabowabow amatabir anan saise tafan hitaya’abar atab.’

Naatu tatabir sabuw nati’imaim hibatabat iuwih, ‘Iti orot uman kabay gold kwabosair kwabai kwan akir wairafin kabay etei ten bowabow i kwaitin. Baise hitatabir hio, ‘Regah nati orot i ana kabay etei ten bowaka.’

19.26 Mat 13.12; Luk 8.18Iyafutih eo, ‘A tur ao’owen, sabuw iyab umah i’e’etaw sawar moumurih tebowabow boro tafan hinaya’abar nab, baise sabuw iyab umah nutanub tema’am aurin boro sawar en, naatu abisa kikimin nati biyahimaim tema’am boro hinabosairen. Naatu boun i akokok sabuw iyab ayu bai’aiwob isan men hikokok kwabow kwana iti nou’umaim kwarouw temorob.”
book.s: Jesu Merarayow Auman Au Jerusalem Run
book.p: Iti na’at eo ufunamaim sabuw au nah i’iyon, wan au Jerusalem yen in. Yen na tafaram Bethage naatu Bethany hairi sisibihimaim tit, Olive Oyaw an, basit ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab eobaimanih naatu wan iyafarih eo, “Kwanan bar merar ta nati namaim kwanatit naatu kwanarur auman donkey boubun hi’utan ebatabat boro kwana’itih, nati donkey i men yait ta bai afe’en yen remoramih. Kwana rufam kwanab kwan iti kwanatit. Naatu orot ta nati’imaim na’iti nibatiy nao, ‘Aisim kwarurufam?’ ana tur kwana’owen, ‘Ai Regah ekokok.’”

Orot hairi hiremor hin, sawar abisa Jesu eo na’atube etei isah himatar. Hina hitit donkey boubun hirurufam, ana matuwan itih naatu ibatiyih, “Aisim au donkey kwarurufam?” Hiya’afut hio, “Ai Regah ekokok.” Basit ihamiyih hirufam hibai hin Jesu biyan hitit, naatu hai biya baibiyon tafah hibosaisiren donkey tafan hiyabar uman hibai yen tafan mare. Sabuw hai faifuw tafah hibosaisiren ef yan hiyabar tafanamaim remor in.

Na Jerusalem tit biyubin auman, ef ta Olive Oyaw na’at re inan i awanamaim hitit naatu ana bai’ufununayah sabuw moumurih na’in Jesu ina’inan iwa’an hi’itah isan fanah sib God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio.
book.q: 19.38 Psa 118.26; Luk 2.14“God ata aiwob nigegewasin, Regah wabinamaim nan, tufuw maramaim nama naatu God auyomtoro’ot isan fair nama!”
Pharisee afa nati rou’ay wanawanamaim Jesu hiu, “Bai’obaiyenayah, a bai’ufununayah kukwararih awah tefot.”
Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “I ana’uwih awah nafot, kabay iti ti’inu’in boro fanah nasib God hinabora’ara’ah.”
book.p:
Jesu na Jerusalem tit iyubin nuw bar hiwowab batabat i’itin ana veya ana yababan ra’at rerey eo, “Tufuwamaim ma isan ana ef iti boun enan akisin itaso’ob. Baise boro men ina’itin, anayabin mata hibofafar. Mar boro enan a rakit sabuw boro roun roun hina’ar bebera’uh a ef hinarufut, run tit isan boro nafokar,
19.44 Luk 21.6hinabat hinayuw hinarab, hinagurus, natunatun wanawanamaim tema’am etei boro hinarouw hinamorob. kabay iti etei boro hinarab hinagurus nasawar, boro men ta hinihamiy ana efanamaim na’inumih, anayabin God ana sabuw baiyawasihimih nan o men i’inanimih!”

Jesu na Tafaror Bar wanawanan run, ana was efanamaim sabuw sawar hiya hima hitotobon itih naatu nunih ufun hitit.
19.46 Isa 56.7; Jer 7.11Iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim God iti na’atube eo hikirum, ‘Ayu au Bar i yoyoban ana bar, baise kwa kwabai kwabotabir na bainowan hai wawa’ir watu matar!’”
19.47 Luk 21.37Nati’imaim Jesu mar etei Tafaror Baremaim ma sabuw i’obaibiyih. Baise firis ukwarih, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu sabuw hai ukwarih hikok kwanekwan i mi’itube hitarab temorob. Baise ef hinunuwet men ta hitita’urimih, anayabin sabuw etei’imak i Jesu ana tur akisin hinonowar naatu men hikok boro tur ta hitasa’ir.
book.s: Jesu Ana Fair Isan Sabuw Hibatiy
book.p: Veya ta Jesu in Tafaror Bar run ma sabuw i’obaiyih Tur Gewasin binan hima hinonowar, basit firis ukwarih, ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in bairi hina Jesu hibatiy. “Kuo anowar, a fair menane ibai iti bowabow kusisinaf? Naatu iti fair i yait it?”
Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo ayu’ubo kwa abibatiyi. John fair i menane bai sabuw bapataito itih, God biyanane ai sabuw biyahine? Kwao anowar.”

Baise sabuw hikasiy taiyuwih hitatabir hima hibabatiyih hio, “Mi’itube tanao? God biyanane tanao, boro nao, ‘Bo aisim John bibinan men kwaitumitum.’ Naatu sabuw biyahine fair bain tana rouw tanao, iti sabuw rau’ay gagamin tema’am boro kabayamaim hinarabit, anayabin etei tibitumatum John i God ana dinab orot ta.”
Iti na’at hio sawar, basit hiya’afut hio, “Aki men aso’ob John ana fair menane bai.”
Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu auman au fair menane abai abowabow boro men anao kwananowar.”

20.9 Isa 5.1Naatu Jesu sabuw oroubonamaim iti na’atube eo, “Ana veya ta orot masaw bow, ana ai grape tanum naatu sabuw masaw bowayah afa tubunih hima hikaif, i ef yok bai nanawanamih in. Naatu grape hiw hi’inu’in hiyamur, basit bairut ana veya natit, orot ana akir wairafin ta iyafar eo, ‘Inan ai ro’oh hibirut ayu au nowau ta inab inan initu ana’aan, baise nan masaw bowayah himisir akirwairafin hibai hirab uman en hiyafar matabir. Naatu akir wairafin tabo iyafar maiye na tit, baise masaw bowayah hibai hirab hiu kwanikwaniy naatu hi’i’iyab uman en matabir maiye in. Iban maiye ana aki wairafin baitounin iyafar na tit, baise masaw bowayah hibai hirab feher hitin hibai hitit ufun hisaroun re.
Imaibo orot masaw matuwan eo, ‘Abisa boro anasinaf? Anotanot ayu natu ta’imon isan abiyabow aniyafar nan, saise i boro hina’itin hinakakafiy.’

Baise orot natun iyafar na titit ana veya sabuw masaw bowayah hi’itin taiyuwih himare hiyabuna sawar hio, ‘Iti i masaw matuwan natun enan, gewasin i boro tanarab namorob, saise iti sawar boro it ninowat.’ Basit orot natun hibai hirab masaw ana fur ufunane hitaiy re hi’asabun morob.’” Naatu Jesu sabuw ibatiyih eo, “Iti orot masaw matuwan nanan sabuw masaw bowayah isah boro mi’itube nasinaf? I boro sabuw nabow narouw hinamorob, naatu masaw i boro nab sabuw afa nitih hinakaif hinama.” Iti na’at eo sabuw hinonowar hio, “Iti na’at i men namatar!”
Baise Jesu nuw sabuw itih sawar, basit eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum anayabin i kwaso’ob.
book.q: ‘Kabay gagamin bar wowabayah hi’itin kakafin hirouw hikwakwahir,

baise botabir na bar ana bubu’umih matar.”
20.18 Isa 8.14-15Imih sabuw iyab iti kabay afe’en hinare nararabih boro hina taweyaweyar, baise iti kabay i tafah nare nararabih boro hinimusumus.
book.p:
Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu firis ukwarih hikok Jesu nati ana veya’amaim hitab hitafatum, anayabin ana oroubon eo naniyan hibaib i iuwih, baise sabuw isah hibir.
20.20 Luk 11.54Imih hin sabuw afa hitobon, hiyafarih ana itinin sabuw gewasih na’atube hina Jesu hibabatiy abitur tao na’at, saise Jew sabuw hitab Roman gawan hititin baimakiy titin isan ana ef hinuwet. Basit iti oro’orot hina Jesu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan aki aso’ob abisa o sabuw kubi’obaiyih i tur anababatun naatu ana efamaim kuo, naatu o i men sabuw ufuhine ku’i’itinimih, baise o i anababatun God ana efamaim sabuw kubi’obaiyih. Imih kuo anowar, Rome Ana Aiwob isan kabay tabibaiyan i ata ofafar ta’a’astu’ub ai en?”

Baise Jesu hai baifuwen itin, naatu iuwih eo, “Kabay kwabai kwana kwai’obaiyu aitin.” Naatu kabay hibai hitin basit ibatiyih, “Iti kabay wanawanan i yait ana yumat naatu wabin tema’am?” Hiya’afut hio, “Caesar.”
Jesu iuwih eo, “Caesar nowan Caesar kwanitin naatu God nowan God kwanitin.”
Fatumin isan hai tur hibogaigiwas hina hibikubibiruw sabuw nahimaim iyafutih gewas hai kasiy ra’at, naatu men abisa hisinaf.
book.s: Morobone Yawas Maiye Naatu Tabin Ana Baibat
book.p:
Nati’imaim Sadducee orot afa morob ufunamaim yawas maiye isan men tibitumatum i hina Jesu hibatiy,
20.28 Deu 25.5“Bai’obaiyenayan, Moses ofafar ta aki isai iti na’atube kirum, orot natabin nama’am aurin kek en namorob, kwafur i boro nati tain ni’awan, saise kek hinatufuw orot murubin efanin. Imih, marasika orot ain uf nah etei seven hima’am, basit orot ain tabin naatu aurin kek en morob. Naatu orot ufunamaim tuwah ana kwafur i’awan, i auman kek en morob. Naatu orot baitounin kwafur i’awan, kek en morob naatu orot ufi’uf kwafur hibi’awan kek en etei himorob in sawar. Basit uftoro’ot kwafur babin morob. Imih morobone hinayawas maiye hinamimisir ana veya, iti babin boro yait ni’awan, anayabin orot ain uf nah seven etei iti babin ta’imon hi’awan?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot babin iti tafaramamaim tema’am ana veya i tetatabin. Baise sabuw iyab gewasih nati efan gewasinamaim ma isan hirurubih naatu morobone misir maiye isan hirurubinih i morobone hinamimisir maiye boro men hinatabin. I boro tounamatar na’atube hinama naatu men hinamorob. Nati sabuw i God natunatun na’atube hinama, anayabin morobone himisir maiye.
20.37 Exo 3.6Moses bebeyan ebi’obaiyit i turobe, morobone boro hinamisir maiye anayabin buk wanawanan wairaf toto’ab isan kirum. Nati’imaim Moses Regah isan eo, ‘O i Abraham ana God, Isaac ana God, naatu Jacob ana God.’ Imih iti God i ma’ama wanatowan ana God, men murubih hai Godamih. Sabuw iyab i wanawananamaim tema’am i yawasih.”
Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa nati’imaim hima hinonowar himisir hio, “Anababatun turamaim iyafutih bai’obaiyenayan!” Nati ufunamaim men yait ta baibat afa bow na Jesu ibatiyimih.

Imaibo Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Aisim sabuw teo Roubinenayan orot i boro aiwob orot David ana rara’ane natufuw?
20.42-43 Psa 110.1Anayabin David akisin iti na’atube eorereb Buk Atamanin wabin Psalm imaim kirum,
book.q: ‘Regah God ayu au Regah isan eo.
Sisibu au asukwafune kumare.
Ina ma’am ayu boro a rakit sabuw
anabow amaim ana ya inasasam.’
book.p: David Roubinenayan orot isan i ana Regah rouw eo, naatu mi’itube’emih Roubinenayan i boro David ana rara’ane nan natufuw?”

Jesu eo sabuw hima hinonowar auman, ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Mata to niwa’an Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hinanan kwanahaiwih, anayabin i hai kok faifuw manih hina’osen hinabat hinaremor, ahar hai efanamaim sabuw hina’itih hai merar hinay hinakakafiyih, naatu Kou’ay Bar wanawanan efan gewasih hinabow hinamare hinama, na’atube hiyuw ana veya efan gewasih hinabow saise sabuw hai merar hinay. Kwafur baibin hai sawar boro asir hinabow kwanekwan, yoyoban manimanih hinayoyoban, nati sabuw hai baimakiy i boro kakafin anababatun hinab.”

Jesu Tafaror Bar wanawanan siwar ya’aya ana efamaim mare ma sabuw kabay wairafih hina hai siwar tew wanawanan hibiwanen itih. Naatu kwafur babin yababan wairafin auman na ana kabay gidigidih rou’ab tew wanawanan biwan itin.
21.3 2Cor 8.12Naatu sabuw iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, iti kwafur babin, yababan wairafin ana siwar God bitin i sabuw etei natabirih. Anayabin sabuw afa i totobuyoy wairafih, imih hai siwar gagamin na’in hiyai, baise iti kwafur babin ana efanamaim abisa i isan yai inu’in i etei bai na ana siwar yai.”

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah afa Tafaror Bar hiwowowab ana gewasin hi’itin, naatu kabay hitar hikikirum isan, na’atube siwar ta ta God isan hiyasairen bar hibi’abur hi’itah isan hio hibifofofor. Baise Jesu eo,
21.6 Luk 19.44“Sawar iti etei kwa’itih kwa’o, mar boro kabay iti etei boro nihururuw nare narubar na’in, boro men ta iti hai efanamaim hina’inumih.”
Sabuw Jesu hibatiy hio, “Bai’obaiyenayan, mar i boro biy iti sawar hinamatar, naatu ina’inan i boro abisa namatar saise aki ana’itin ana so’ob veya i na tit?”

Jesu iuwih eo, “Mata toniwa’an, men koko’aw na’atube hinifufuwimih. Anayabin orot moumurih na’in boro ayu wabu’umaim hinao, ‘Ayu i Keriso, naatu Veya i na kabom.’ Men kwani’ufnunih. Hinabiyow tur kwananonowar men kwanabir, naatu yababan nara’at ef hinafofokar auman men kwanabir, anayabin sawar nati na’atube boro wan hinamatar, baise men kwananot mar yomanin i na kabom.”

Naatu iban iuwih maiye eo, “Tafaram ta ta boro taiyuwih hinagam hiniyow na’atube bar merar ta ta boro taiyuwih hinagam hiniyow. Iriyoy gagamih boro hinamatar, baimar kakafin, sawow yumatah ta ta tafaram wanawanan boro awan nakaratan, maramaim sawar itah birubir boro hinamatar.

Wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan, hinarab hini’a’akir, hinabuw hinafatumi kwanan Kou’ay Bar hai ukwarih umahimaim hinayai, naatu i boro hinabuw kwanan dibur hinayariyi, tafaram ana aiwob na’atube orot gagamih nahimaim kwanatit hinibabatiy. Imih nati’imaim kwanatitit, veya keboroban i nati, ayu mi’itube kwaitutumu kwabowabow i hai tur kwana’owen.
21.14 Luk 12.11-12Naatu baibatiyimih hinabuw kwananan men bogaigiwas taiyuw was fafari isan kwananot kwaniyababanamih.
21.15 Act 6.10Anayabin ayu boro tur anit a not hinarerekab tur kwanao a kamabiy sabuw hinanonowar boro men karam a tur hinarukouw naatu bairi kwanibasamih.
21.16 Mat 10.21-22Hinat, tamat, taituwa, a ofonah boro baba hinao, hinabuw orot gagamih umahimaim hinaya’i, baimakiy hinit naatu kwa afa boro hina’asbuni kwanamorob. Sabuw etei boro hinifa’ifai, anayabin ayu kwabi’ufnunu isan. Baise ukwarimaim arib ta boro men nakasiyomih. Naatu kwa a batkikinamaim yawas boro kwanatita’ur kwanab kwanama gewas.
book.s: Jesu Jerusalem Hinarab Nare’er Isan Eo
book.p:
Baiyowayah sabuw Jerusalem hina’ar bebera’uh kwana’i’itin kwa i kwanaso’ob, Jerusalem rabin baitaiyin isan ana veya i kabom. Sabuw iyab Judea wanawanan tema’am boro hinabihir hinan oyaw wan hinayen, sabuw iyab Jerusalem tema’am boro tafaram hinihamiy, sabuw iyab bar meraramaim tema’am boro men hinan Jerusalem hinatit.
21.22 Jer 5.29; 46.10; Hos 9.7Anayabin nati i baimakiy ana veya, saise abisa bukamaim hikirum inu’in nan niturobe. Nati ana veya’amaim baibin iyab yah auman naatu hai kek sosof auman bihir isan boro nafokar, yababan gagamin na’in boro iti tafaramamaim namatar naatu sabuw boro baimakiy hinab.
21.24 Psa 79.1; Rev 11.2Sabuw afa boro ahay wan hinayen hina morob, afa boro hinabow hinan tafaram ta ta’amaim dibur hinaya. Naatu Eteni Sabuw Jerusalem boro hinarab nare tafan hinatet, naatu hinama hinakaif hai veya God bitih na’atube nan niturobe.

21.25 Isa 13.10; Ezk 32.7; Jol 2.31; Rev 6.12-13“Maramaim veya, sumar, daman boro ina’inan yumatah ta ta hinamatar. Tafaram tutufin wanawan etei boro ayay hinabosair abisa namamatar isan, yabat boro namisir, gis nayen ana’itin boro birubir kakafin. Sabuw boro hai bir nara’at hinimamayay hinao, ‘Abisa tafaram wanawan emamatar.’ Anayabin maramaim sawar etei ti’inu’in hai efan boro hinasa’iren nanabin hinan.
21.27 Dan 7.13; Mat 26.64; Rev 1.7Imaibo Orot Natun sakukuw wanawanan ana fair ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman natit nanan hina’itin. Sawar iti hinabusuruf hinamamatar ana veya’amaim, kwanamisir kwananuw ra’at, anayabin God ana sabuw baiyawasih isan ana veya i na rukabom.”

Imaibo Jesu oroubon ta eo, “Ai fafou kwana’itin naatu ai afa auman kwana’itah. Hiw ana veya natitit kwa boro kwanao, ai abeb ana veya na, ai rourih hina’abebemih. Imih ef i boro nati ta’imon, ana veya’amaim sawar iti na’atube hinamatar kwana’i’itah, kwa boro kwanaso’ob, God ana aiwob namih ana veya i na kabom. Anababatun a tur ao’owen sabuw iti tema’am boro moroboe hinama’am sawar iti hinamatar. Mar tafaram boro nasawar, baise ayu au tur i boro men nasawaramih.

Mata toniwa’an, men aa tom namomon, naatu iti tafaram ana yawas isan a yababan nara’at, anayabin veya i boro naniyan meyemeye warasa na’atube nabuw kwana’oror. Sabuw iti tafaram wanawanan boro etei isah namatar. Imih mata toniwa’an mar etei kwanayoyoban, saise fair kwanab sawar iti hinamamatar wanawanahimaim kwanahaiw kwan Orot Natun nanamaim kwanabat.”
Jesu veya etei Tafaror Baremaim na sabuw bi’obaibiyih, baise rabirab en Olive Oyawemaim inu’in. Baise mar etei mar auman sabuw i tena Tafaror Baremaim eo tema tenonowar.
book.s: Jesu Ana Morob Isan Baban Hio.
book.p: Faraw Wanawanan Yeast en ana hiyuw wabin Tar Nowaten aa isan ana veya i na kabom. Naatu nati ana veya’amaim firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah wa’iwa’iramaim ef hinunuwet mi’itube Jesu hitab hitarab tamorob isan, anayabin bebeyanamaim sinafumih sabuw hibiruwih.
book.s: Judas Ibasit Jesu Morob Isan Baban Eo
book.p: 22.3 Jn 13.2, 27Nati ana veya’amaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot Judas wabin ta Iscariot Satan dogoron wanawanan run. Basit na firis ukwarih naatu Tafaror Bar ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih biyah tit, Jesu mi’itube nab nabitih isan bairi hiyakitifuw. Naatu orot ukwarih hiyasisir Judas kabay baitinin isan hio’matan. Judas ibasit naatu ef ana gewasin wa’iwa’iramaim nuwet, mi’itube Jesu tab tabitih, sabuw men hitaso’ob.

Faraw Wanawanan Yeast en hiyuw ana veya natit, nati ana veya’amaim i Tar Nowaten isan sheep natunatuh lamb terouw sibor teya’aya. Imih Peter, John hairi Jesu eobaimanih iyafarih eo, “Kwanan Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw kwanabogaigiwas tanaa.”
Hibatiy hio, “Menamaim kukokok boro ana bogaigiwas?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanan Jerusalem kwanatitit auman orot ta boro noukwatamaim harew nahun na’abar nanan bairi kwanitar, naatu kwani’ufunun bairi kwanan bar erurumaim kwanarun. Naatu bar matuwan orot kwanibatiy, ‘Bai’obaiyenayan,’ o isa iti na’atube eo. ‘Ayu au bai’ufununayah bairi nanawan bar awan menatan boro imaim Tar Nowaten ana bay anaa?’ Naatu i boro bar awan gagamin yate tafan ni’obaiyi kwana’itin, nati’imaim sawar etei hirereb hiyabuna inu’in, imaim kwanabogaigiwas.”
Orot rou’ab hitit hinan sawar etei Jesu eo na’atube hi’itah, basit Tar Nowaten hiyuw hibogaigiwas.

Bay aa isan ana veya tit, naatu Jesu ana tur abarayah bairi bay aa ana efanamaim himare. Baise iuwih eo, “Ayu akokok kwanekwan iti Tar Nowaten ana bay kwa bairit tanaa, imaibo ani’akir biyau nababan. Anayabin a tur ao’owen, ayu i boro men kafa’imo iti bay anaa maiye, ana veya’amaim iti sawar yabin anababatun niturobe God ana aiwob wanawananamaim.”

Imaibo Jesu kerowas bai, God ana merar yi, naatu ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Kerowas iti kwabai etei’imak kwafaram kwatom. A tur ao’owen, veya iti boun ebubusuruf ayu iti wine boro men anatom, ayu boro iti na’atube ana ma nan God ana aiwob nan natit.”
Naatu rafiy bai God ana merar yi sawar, imasib ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Iti i ayu biyou, kwa abit, iti na’atube kwanasinaf saise imaim ayu kwananuhu.”

Naatu kerowas isan i na’atube sinaf, bay hi’aa ufunamaim bai itih eo. “Iti kerowas i God ana Obaibasit Boubun ayu au rara’amaim ibour kwa etei isa ebisuwai.
22.21 Psa 41.9; Jn 13.21-22Baise kwanaso’ob orot yait ayu morobomih babau eo, i iti gemamaim airi ama’am. Orot Natun i boro namorob God isan yayakitifuw na’atube, baise orot yait baban eo emomorob i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in nab.” Basit bai’ufununayah taiyuwi hibabatiyih hio, “Iti kou’ay wanawanamaim o yait iti na’atube sinafumih iyakitifuw ima kunotanot?”

22.24 Luk 9.46Bai’ufununayah taiyuwih wanawanahimaim gamin matar hai kokok hitaso’ob yait i orot gagamin.
22.25 Mat 20.25-27; Mak 10.42-45Jesu iuwih eo, “Tafaram wanawanan Eteni Sabuw hai aiwob ana sabuw kaifih isan i hai fair ema’am imih sabuw tekakaifih, naatu sabuw iyab onowaten hibai sabuw tebobonawiyih, i tekokok wabih nara’at Bonawiyenayah hinarouw.
22.26 Mat 23.11; Mak 9.35Baise kwa wanawanamaim i men na’atube nama, o yait orot gagamin mataramih taiyuw inayare inikek, naatu o yait bonawiyenayan mataramih taituwa isah ini’akir inabow.
22.27 Jn 13.12-15Yait i orot gagamin, orot bay aayan o orot bay semorayan? Orot mare ma bay eaau i turobe orot gagamin. Baise ayu kwa wanawanamaim i akir wairafin na’atube ama kwa isa abowabow. Au routobon fokarih wanawananamaim men kwaihamiyu, baise sisibu’umaim mar etei bairi tama’am. Tamai aiwob ana fair itu abi’aiwob 22.29 abobonawiy na’atube nati fair ta’imon kwa abit kwani’aiwob 22.29 sabuw kwanabonawiyih
22.30 Mat 19.28Kwa boro au aiwob wanawananamaim kwanaa, kwanatom yasisir kwanab, aiwob hai ura ma’ama’amaim kwanamare Israel sabuw hai big etei 12 kwanakaifih.”

Jesu eo, “Simon, Simon! Satan i baibasit God biyanane bai, kwa routobon nit nakubaituturimih. Orot masaw bowayan ana rice erab erububunai ani’aanin nabin eyai, naatu kanabin nabin eya’iyai na’atube.
22.32 Jn 17.15Baise Simon, ayu o isa ayoyoyoban, saise a baitumatum men nara’iy, naatu ayu isou inamamatabir ana veya, taituwa koufair initih hinabatkikin.”
Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu airit na dibur run naatu na morob isan abobuna ama’am.”
Jesu eo, “Peter, boun gugumin o boro mar tounu inayoub inao, ‘Ayu orot nati men aso’ob,’ i ufunamaim kokorere boro nao inanowar.”
22.35 Luk 9.3; 10.4Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih eo, “Kwanotanot ayu ai yuni aur kaukut, hafoy naatu a baibiyon en kwatit kwanan ana veya’amaim, sawar afa isah kwaiyababan.” Hiya’afut hio,
“Men abistan ta isan ai yababanamih.”

Jesu iuwih eo, “Baise a tur ao’owen, o yait aur kaukut, o hafoy ema’am inab, naatu o yait aur kaiy en, a biya baibiyon inab inan hinatubun naatu kabay inab kaiy inatubun uma inisinfafar.
22.37 Isa 53.12Anayabin a tur ao’owen, Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hio hikirum, ‘Hi’i’itin i bainowan mowanabe,’ naatu nati tur i ayu isou hikirum, naatu boro anasinaf nan yabin namatar’’”
Bai’ufununayah hio, “Regah kaiy rou’ab iti abobotanen kui’itan.” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Nati ana fofonin.”

Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi matan fufur tisisinaf na’atube Jerusalem hihamiy hiyen hin Olive Oyawemaim hitit. Jesu na nati efanamaim titit ana veya, basit ana bai’ufununayan iuwih eo, “Kwanayoyoban saise routobon nanan boro kwanarukouw.” Imaibo in fotafot wan ana fofonin na’atube, sun yowen yoyoban eo, “Tamai inakokok na’at, basit iti biyababan ana kerowas biyau’umaim kubosair, men ayu au kok, baise abisa o kukokok na’atube namatar.” Jesu dogoron wanawan yababan yan awan karatan, dogoron tutufin etei yoyoban ana foyab rara na’atube hituhorohoror me yan hire, naatu God ana tounamatar marane hire hina fair hitin. 22.43 buk afa’amaim teten 43-44 men tema’am
Yoyoban sawar misir inan, ana bai’ufununayah matah fot hi’inu’in itih, hai yababan ra’at kwanekwan easbunih hi’inu’in. Iuwih eo, “Aisim kwa’inu’in? Kwamisir kwayoyoban saise men routobon kwanab.”

Jesu iti na’atube bat eo auman, bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta wabin Judas sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in nawiyih hina hitit. Naatu Judas mutufor in Jesu biyan tit bai mamay. Judas kissing Jesus; with soldiers and Jewscn01812B.tifLuk 22.47©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Judas baiyowayah naatu Jews bairi hina Jesu emamamay22.47-48 Baise Jesu iu, “Judas o iti mamayenamaim Orot Natun ibai rakit sabuw kubitih?”

Bai’ufununayah bairi hibatabat Jesu isan abisa mamatar hi’itin, basit hibatiy, “Regah karam boro kaiyomaim bairi aniyow?” Naatu ana bai’ufununayah orot ta ana kaiy bora’ah, Firis Gagamin ana akir wairafin ta tainin asukwafune buru’um.

Baise Jesu eo, “Men inasinaf maiye kunutanub!” Naatu Jesu orot tainin butubun efanin matar maiye. Imaibo Jesu firis ukwarih, Tafaror Bar ana firis ukwarin, furisiman, naatu regaregah ai’in Jesu bain fatuminamih hinan iuwih eo, “Kwa iti kaiy, kefat yuwu rabu’umih kwabow kwanan ana itinin i ayu orot kakafu bainowan na’atube? Ayu mar etei Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan bairit tama’am, men kwakok boro imaim ayu kwatafatumu? Baise iti boun i kwa a veya, imih abisa kwakokok na’atube kwasinaf. Anayabin gugumin ana orot ebobonawiyi.”

22.54 Mak 14.53-54Jesu hibai hifatum hibai hin Firis Gagamin ana bar hitit, naatu Peter nabineika bat i’uf nunih bairi hin hitit. Wairaf merar yan foun hi’asir himare hima rararih, Peter na wanawanah mare bairi hima rararih, basit akir wairafin babitai ta nuw Peter ma wairaf rarar itin, naatu matan kubar itinbunai sawar imaibo eo, “Iti orot auman i Jesu hairi hima hireremor.” Baise Peter yaub eo, “Babitai, ayu nati orot i men kafa’i aso’ob.”

Hima kafa’imo, orot ta itin maiye eo, “O i ni’i orot ana bai’ufununayan ta.” Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Aro, ayu men nati orot ana bai’ufununayan ta’amih.” Hima one hour na’atube sawar, basit orot tabo iban eo maiye “Tur anababatun iti orot i Galilee matuwan Jesu hairi hima hireremor men kasikasiy ta’amih.”

Baise Peter orot iya’afut eo, “Aro ayu men kafa’i aso’ob o abisa kuo.” Iti na’at eo auman kokorere eo. Regah tatabir mutufor nuw Peter itin, naatu Regah abisa eo i not, “Boun gugumin o boro mar tounu ayu inayayoubu ufunamaim kokorere boro nao.” Basit Peter misir tit in ufun re rerey i gagagamat.
Orot afa Jesu hima’uh hima’am himisir faifuw ta hibai matan hisum, imaibo hi’i’iyab naatu hiborabirab hio, “Kuo anowar, yait o rabi?” Naatu tur kakafih moumurih maiyow hiu kwanikwaniy hi’i’iyab.

Mar sibisib auman sabuw hai regaregah ai’in, firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah etei hiru’ay hita’imon, imaibo Jesu hinawiy hina Kaniser nahimaim bat
22.67 Jn 3.12naatu hibatiy, “Kuo anowar o i Keriso?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “A tur ana’owen boro men kwanitutumu’umih, naatu ana bibatiyi auman boro men kwaniyafutu’umih.
22.69 Act 7.56Baise mar enan Orot Natun boro God fairin uman asukwafune namare nama’am kwana’itin.” Naatu etei’imak hibatiy hio, “Bo o God Natun?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu God Natun kwarouw kwao i tur anababatun kwao.” Imaibo sabuw hio, “Men takokok koubuna’ayah sabuw afa tanabow, anayabin tur awanamaim titit i tainitamaim tanowar!”

Kou’ay tutufin etei himisir Jesu hibai hina Pilate nanamaim hitit. Nati’imaim ubar hitin hio, “Iti orot i ma kakaf bai na ai sabuw nawiyih tafaram hiti’afiyimih aki atita’ur, naatu sabuw eo’otanih Caesar isan kabay men hinibaiyan, naatu i taiyuwin isan eo, ‘Ayu i Keriso aiwob orot.’”
Imaibo Pilate Jesu ibatiy, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Nati kuo.”
Pilate firis ukwarih naatu sabuw hiru’ay hibatabat iuwih eo, “Iti orot baimakiyin isan anunuwet men ana kakafin ta atita’urimih.”
Baise abisa hio i hiukikin. “Iti orot i kougeyageyayan, ana bai’obaiyenamaim Galilee wanawanan busuruf sabuw etei hai ma bi’a’afiy boun na Judea wanawanan sabuw etei kugiyigiyih hai ma eafe’af.”

Pilate iti na’atube hio nonowar ufunamaim, ibatiyih eo, “Iti orot i Galilee matuwan?”
23.7 Luk 3.1Pilate nati ana veya’amaim so’ob Jesu i Herod ana aiwob babanamaim ma’am, imih Herod isan iyafar hibai hin. Anayabin nati ana veya Herod auman i na Jerusalem ma’am.

Herod Jesu i’itin ana maramaim yansisir gagamin maiyow, anayabin ana tur marasika nowar naatu kok kwanekwan Jesu taitin, ina’inan auman ta tiwa’an ta’itin. Imih Herod tur moumurih maiyow Jesu ibabatiy, baise Jesu men iya’afut tur ta eomih. Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hitit tur fokarin maiyow hio ubar hitin hiu kwanikwaniy. Imaibo Herod ana baiyowayah bairi Jesu hi’iyab hiu kwanikwaniy. Naatu faifuw gewasin hibai hi’us hiyafar maiye matabir in Pilate biyan tit. Nati ana veya’amaim Herod Pilate hairi hitounuw, baise marasika i hairi rakit na’atube nanabih hima’am.

Firis ukwarih naatu bonawiyenayah, sabuw ukwarih etei’imak Pilate e’af ayuwih hina iuwih eo, “Iti orot kwabai kwana biyou kwatit sabuw nawiyih kakaf kwarouw kwa’o, naatu ayu kwa etei namaim ai babatiy kwa’itin, baise ana kakafin kwao anonowar na’atube men ta atita’urimih. Na’atube Herod nunuwet ana kakafin men tatita’ur, imih iyafar maiye matabir na. Anayabin men abisa kakafin ta sinaf boro namorob. Isan imih ayu boro anarab naatu anabotait natit nan.” Matan fufur Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya, Pilate mar etei dibur orot ta’imon sabuw isah ebobotait. 23.17 teten 17 i buk afa’amaim hiya’abar

Baise sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hibatabat hiwow hio, “Nati orot i na morob! Aki akokok Barabas inabotait natit!” (Barabas i Jerusalemamaim kukugeyagey, naatu orot babin ta easabun momorob isan dibur hiyai ma’am.)
Pilate kok kwanekwan i Jesu tabotait tatit, imih fanan aumetawat na’in eafare maiye sabuw ifefeyanih. Baise sabuw fah sib hinow hi’af ra’at hio, “Ku’onaf! Ku’onaf!”

Pilate iban mar baitounin ibatiyih maiye, “Abisa kakafin sinaf? Ayu ana kakafin men ta a’itin boro namorob, imih ayu boro anarab naatu anabotait.” Baise sabuw fanah sib Jesu morobomih hiwow hio hinan yomaninamaim hai kok na yabin matar. Basit sabuw hio na’atube hai kokomaim Pilate sinaf, Jesu morob isan ibasit. Naatu orot kougeyageyayan naatu asbunuwayan dibur ma’am isan hibifefeyan i botait, naatu Jesu isan abisa sinafumih hikokok na’atube bai itih.

Roman baiyowayah Jesu onafinamih hibai hitit hinan efamaim, Sairini orot wabin Simon ana barene na au Jerusalem rur bairi hitar. Naatu hikwarar tatab, onaf hibai hitin e’abar Jesu ufun bairi hin. Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan wanawanahimaim baibin afa Jesu hi’itin yah baban hirerey. Jesu tatabir itih eo, “Jerusalem baibin ayu isau men kwanarerey, baise kwa taiyuw isa naatu natunat isah kwaniyababan kwanarerey.
23.29 Luk 21.23Anayabin mar boro enan sabuw boro hinao, ‘Baibin iyab a’arih, taubu’e tema’am naatu kek men tibitotomanen boro hiniyasisir.’
23.30 Hos 10.8; Rev 6.16Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw boro oyaw isah hinao,
book.q: ‘Oyaw kure kutouni, naatu hihib kubu’ub kure kutouni!’
book.p: Anayabin sawar iti na’atube ai biyan ahiy ana veya’amaim tisisinaf, baise ai nakekerer ana veya’amaim hinasisinaf boro mi’itube?”

Nati ana veya’amaim orot kakafih rou’ab auman Jesu bairi morobomih hinawiyih hitit hin. Hitit hina efan wabin Gifow imaim hitit naatu Jesu hi’onaf orot kakafih rou’ab auman, orot ta ana asukwafune, orot ta ana beyawane. Jesus and thieves on the crossCN01836B.TIFLuk 23.33©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesu orot kakafih ro’ab bairi koros afe’en23.33-35
23.34 Psa 22.18; Isa 53.12Imaibo Jesu eo, “Tamai hai bowabow kakafih kunotawiyen men hiso’ob abisa tisisinaf.” Naatu ana faifuw hibosairen arowamaim hifaram hibow.
23.35 Psa 22.7-8Sabuw nati’imaim hibat hi’i’itin ana maramaim, bonawiyenayah orot ukwarih Jesu hi’iyab hio, “Sabuw afa iyawasih bo i Keriso God narurubin na’at taiyuwin niyawasiban tana’itin.”
23.36 Psa 69.21Roman baiyowayah auman hi’iyab, naatu wine tenakuyakuy tomamih hitin hio, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob na’at taiyuw kwiyawasi!”
Naatu ukwarinamaim hikirum hio, “Iti I Jew Sabuw Hai Aiwob.”
Orot kakafin ta hi’onaf inu’in Jesu isan eafabon tur kakafih eo. “O Keriso na’at kwiyawas kure naatu aki auman kwiyawasi.”

Baise orot ta rounane inu’in turan kwarar iu, “O God isan kubirubir ai en? It etei i baimakiy ta’imon tabaib. It airit biyababan tabaib i ana efamaim tabaib, anayabin atasisinaf kwanekwanemaim wan tama ra’at biyat ebababan. Baise iti orot i men kafa’imo kakafin ta sinaf, asir biyababan ebaib.” Naatu Jesu isan eafabon eo, “Jesu a aiwobomaim inarur ayu inanuhu.” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ao’omatani, boun ayu Paradise imaim ana rur o boro airit tanarun.”

Veya yen na i’ouyit, veya rararan matan gugum tafaram etei fobe inu’in veya re three korok na’atube bai.
23.45 Hib 6.19-20; 10.19-20Basit faifuw gagamin Tafaror Bar wanawan hitaiy re efan kakafiyin, kakafiyin hirafut inu’in taseb rou’ab himatar. Imaibo Jesu fanan aumetawat rerey eo, “Tamai umamaim ayubu abit inab.” Iti na’atube eo basit morob.

Baiyowayah hai ukwarin nati’imaim bat abisa mamatar itin, God wabin bora’ara’ah eo, “Turobe iti orot i gewasin.” Sabuw nati’imaim hiru’ay hibat abisa mamatar hi’itin, dogoroh hirab yababan auman hai ubar himatabitabir hin. Sabuw afa Jesu hisusu’ub, naatu baibin afa Galilee ine hi’ufunun bairi hina hibibais, nabinamaim hibat Jesu momorob hi’itin.

Nati’imaim Arimathea orot wabin Joseph ma’am, Arimathea i Judea wanawananamaim bar merar ta. Iti orot Joseph i orot gewasin naatu ana ef mutufurin, God ana aiwob nan isan ma kakaif, naatu i auman Kaniser hai kou’ay orot ta, baise abisa hio hiyayanuw i ana baibasit men ta nati’imaim ma’amih. Na Pilate nanamaim tit Jesu biyan bai na ya’in isan ifefeyan naatu aiwob orot ibasit. Joseph na Jesu biyan onaf afe’en inu’in bosair bai re faifuw boubunamaim sum bai in hub boubun to naiwanamaim tar numin inu’in imaim yai. Naatu nati veya i Friday, Baiyarir busurufin isan ana veya nakabom. Baibin Galilee ine Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan i Joseph bairi hin hubemaim hitit, Jesu biyan mi’itube ya’iyai i hi’itin.
23.56 Exo 20.10; Deu 5.14Naatu himatabir hin bar hitit Jesu biyan yabuna’in isan ana raiy 23.56 spices perfume hibogaigiwas naatu mar to Baiyarir Ana Veya i hima hiyarir hai ofafar eo na’atube.

Sunday maraumanika baibin raiy hibogaigiwas hi’inu’in hibow hin rah yan hitit. Naatu hin rah yan hitit ana veya kabay gagamin Jesu ana hub awan hiya’afut inu’in hifururuw tit hub awan asir inu’in hi’itin. Basit wanawanan hirun hin, baise Regah Jesu biyan men hitita’urimih. Nati’imaim hai kasiy ra’at hibat hibinubunibun naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab hai bonamanamarin auman sisibihimaim himatar hibat. Baibin hai bir ra’at nahimaim yumatah au babe me yan hire, baise orot rou’ab hi’uwih hio, “Kwa aisim orot yawasin isan sabuw murubin hai efanamaim kwanunuwih?
24.6 Luk 9.22Iti’imaim boro men kwana’itin, i morobone misir maiye! Galilee imaim bairi kwama’am ana veya tur abisa eo i kwanotanot. ‘Orot Natun i boro hinab sabuw kakafih umahimaim hinayai, hina’onaf, naatu veya tounu ufunamaim morobone nayawas maiye.’” Imaibo baibin ana tur eo nuhih taseb hinot.

Naatu rahane himatabir maiye hina bar hitit. Sawar abisa’awat hi’i’itah ana bai’ufununayah nah 11 naatu bai’ufununayah afa nati baremaim hima’am auman hai tur hi’owen. Baibin iyabowat sawar hi’itah hina Jesu ana tur abarayah hai tur hio’owen wabih i Mary Magdalin, Joanna naatu Mary, James hinah naatu baibin afa auman. Baise Jesu ana tur abarayah baibin hio men hitumatum, anayabin hai tur hinonowar naniyan i tamim tao kwanekwan na’atube. Baise Peter misir nunuw in rah yan tit, hub wanawanan kwaf nuwariy faifuwawat hi’inu’in itah, basit abisa mamatar isan erebainotanot auman matabir in.

Nati veya ta’imon Jesu ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab Jerusalemane hin bar merar ta wabin Emmaus imaim hitit. Jerusalem in Emmaus titit ana fofonin i 11 kilometres na’atube. Baise iti orot rou’ab efamaim sawar abisa’awat himamatar isah hairi hio hidudur hinan ana veya, Jesu ufuhine natit botanih bairi hita’imon hiremor hin. Naatu bairi hinan i hi’itin baise men kafa’imo hi’inan.

Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa abisa isan tura airi kwaidudur auman kwanan?” Naatu orot rou’ab hinutanub yah rererey yen hibat. Orot ta wabin Cleopas ibatiy eo, “Jerusalem wanawanan o akisimo nanawan orot, imih sawar abisa fai fur wanawanan mamatar o men iso’obamih?”
Jesu ibatiyih, “Sawar abistan?”

Hiya’afut hio, “God ana dinab orot wabin Jesu Nazareth matuwan, God matanamaim na’atube sabuw matahimaim ana tur eo naatu ana bowabow sisinaf etei i fairih naatu turobe. Baise aki ai firis ukwarih naatu bonawiyenayah orot ukwarih hibai Roman gawan hitin, morobomih eo ibasit naatu hibai hin hi’onaf morob.
24.21 Luk 19.11; Act 1.6Aki anotanot iti orot boro Israel sabuw baiyawasih arouw nuhifot ama’am, baise iti orot hirab momorob i veya boun tounu sawar. Naatu baibin afa aki ai kou’ayomaim boun maraumanika hin rah yan hititit biyan hiboyouw naatu himatabir hina hio, ‘Aki tounamatar ai’itih, naatu tounamatar ai tur hi’owen Jesu i morobone misir maiye.’ Iti na’at hio aki aoror sa’iri ai kasiy ra’at.
24.24 Jn 20.3-10Basit ai kou’ayomaim sabuw afa hin rah yan hit abisa baibin hio hinowar na’atube hi’itah, baise Jesu men hi’itinimih.”

Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Kwa i kwabikoko’aw, aisim dinab oro’orot abisa hio hikikirum men fudir rerekab kwabitumatumamih!
24.26 Luk 9.22Keriso iti sawar etei isah ni’akir biyan nababan saise ana aiwob maramaim narun nabi’aiwob isan men kwaso’ob?”
24.27 Psa 22.1-21; Isa 53Imaibo Jesu taiyuwin isan aneika Moses ana Buk kikirum imaim busuruf idudur rena God ana dinab oro’orot hai Buk hikikirum imaim tit.

Naatu bar merar hinuh hinanamaim hititit auman, Jesu bar merar ta namihibe iwa’an hi’itin. Baise hi’otan hio, “Veya sawar naatu mar efof imih tarun bairit ta’in.” Iti na’at hio itin, basit bairi inumih hirun.

Bay aa isan Jesu bairi himare, eof rafiy bai God ana merar yi sawar imasib itih. Imaibo hairi matah to iwa’an hi’inan, baise marta’imon na’am sa’iwa’an. Hairi himisir hio, “Efamaim tanan Buk Atamaninamaim bidudur dogorot ahayabe yiy naniyan itatam?” Basit himisir himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit, nati’imaim bai’ufununayah nah 11 naatu afa auman hiru’ay hima’am hi’itih,
24.34 1Cor 15.4-5hai tur hi’owen hio, “Tur anababatun Regah i morobone misir maiye Simon isan irerereb. Orot rou’ab efamaim abisa mamatar naatu mi’itube rafiy imasib bitih ana veya’amaim matah to iwa’an hi’i’inan etei hidudur turahinah hinowar.

Orot rou’ab iti na’atube hima hio hinonowar auman naniyan meyemeye Regah nah yan foun matar bat iuwih eo, “Tufuw isa nama.”
24.37 Mat 14.26Etei hi’oror, hai bir ra’at, hinotanot i yoyom mowan itinin hirouw. Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Aisim kwabirubir naatu aisim a not boro’ika tekakasiy? Au umau kwa’itah, naatu biyau kwabutubun finimu au rakit naniyan kwatatam, saise kwanaso’ob iti i anababatun ayu, anayabin yoyom i aurih finimih en.”

Iti ra’at eo sawar basit an uman i’obaiyih hi’itan. Baise men kafa’imo hitumatumamih, hai kawasa ra’at hikasiy auman, basit Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa bay urey ta kwayai inu’in?” Siy baibitab finimin reban hibai hitin naatu nahimaim bat eaan hi’itin.

24.44 Luk 9.22Imaibo hai tur eowen eo, “Ayu i sawar iti isah bairit tama’ama ana veya a tur aowen. Sawar abisa ayu isau mataramih Moses ana Bukamaim, dinab hai Bukamaim na’atube Psalms imaim hio hikikirum hina hiturobe.” Imaibo hai not botawiy Buk Atamaninamaim abisa isan hio hikikirum naniyan hibai. Naatu iuwih eo, “Abisa hio hikikirum anayabin i iti, Keriso i ni’akir biyan nababan namorob, naatu veya tounu ufunamaim boro nayawas maiye namisir. Saise i wabinamaim ya baikitabir naatu notawiyen ana tur Jerusalemamaim an hinayai hinabinan hinatit hinan tafaram tutufin etei hinanowar.
24.48 Jn 15.27; Act 1.8Imih kwa abisa matamaim kwa’i’itin i kwanakubuna sabuw etei hai tur kwana’owen hinanowar.
24.49 Jn 14.16; 15.26; Act 1.4Jerusalemamaim kwanama ayu Tamai abisa baitimih eo’omatani marane aniyafar nare a fair kwanab.”

Imaibo nawiyih bairi Jerusalem hihamiy hitit hin Bethany hitit, nati’imaim uman bora’ah isah yoyoban igegewasinih. Bigegewasinih auman ihamiyih earura’ah yen in mar wanawanan run. Hibora’ara’ah yasisir yah awan karatan auman himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit. Nati’imaim mar etei hin Tafaror Baremaim God ana merar hiyiy naatu hibobora’ara’ah.
