book.p: John
Tur Gewasin Kikirum
Roube’aten Ana Tur

Tur Gewasin John eo’orereb Jesu i God ana Tur wanatowanin na’atube, I orot babin hai tufuwabe tufuw naatu wanawanatamaim ma (1.14). Buk eo na’atube, iti Tur Gewasin hikikirum saise baiyabayah hitiyab hitaso’ob, Jesu i omatan ana Baiyawasenayan God Natun naatu i hai baitumatum wanawananamaim hinabitumitum i karam boro yawas hinab (20.31).

Iti wanawanan ebi’ubaiyit ufunanamaim nati ekukubuna God ana Tur wanatowanin i Jesu hairi, Tur Gewasin wantoro’ot turin i ina’inanen afa bimataren i’obaiyi, Jesu i omatanen ana Baiyawasenayan God Natun. Iti ufunamaim ina’inan abistanawat sinaf hibirerereb kubuna hai yabih eorereb. Iti buk turin ebikik mi’itube sabuw afa Jesu hitumitum naatu i ana bai’ufununayah himamatar naatu afa i ana geg sabuw himatar, naatu men hikok hiti’ufunun. Teten 13 naatu in 17 I maninaka eo’o mi’itube Jesu ana bai’ufununayah kou’ay gewasin hibai nati gugumin hifafatum nanamaim, naatu anarabirab bogaigiwas isan iuwih naatu tafah fair yei, anamar tot onaf afe’en hikubar. Teten ura’u’unin i mi’itube Jesu hifafatum naatu hibai hibabatiy, ana onafin naatu ana misir maiye, nati ufunamaim ana bai’ufununayah isah birerereb.

Babin biwa’an kwanekwan ana binanakwar (8.1-11) ina’inan iti na’atube ( ) hiyei anayabin marasika tur hikirum hiyaya’abun i hihamiy baise efan afa’amaim hikirum hi’in. John tur eo’ofair i ma’ama wanatowan ana siwar Keriso’one enan boun iyab hibusuruf tebitumatum Jesu i ef, i turobe naatu yawas. Itinin ebirerereb gagamin John ana turamaim i mi’itube mar etei ata yawas bai in ayubitane yabih haibabatun hai bahobahoramaim ya’a nati harew rafiy, marakaw, kaifenayan ana bobaituw hairi naatu ai grape naatu i ro’on hairi.
Fef wanawanan Tur iti na’atube Hi’asgidigid
Roubeaten 1.1-18
John Baptist naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah wan toro’ot 1.19-51
Jesu rererebamaim bowabow 2.1–12.50
Mafufun ana veya Jerusalem wanawanan naatu ufunane 13.1–19.42 Regah ana misir naatu ana bairerereb 20.1-31
Ana bairerereb ta Galilee wanawanan 21.1-25
1.1 Jn 17.5; 1Jn 1.1-2; Rev 19.13Tafaram matara’e ana veya Tur i wan ma, naatu Tur i God hairi hima, naatu Tur i God taiyuwin. Tur i God hairi wan hima’abo tafaram matar.

1.3 1Cor 8.6; Col 1.16-17; Hib 1.2Tur wanawananamaim God sawar etei’imak sinafen himatar; iti sawar himamatar i etei tur wanawananamaim himatar men ta asir matar kwaneyanamih.
1.4 Jn 5.26Tur i yawas an anababatun, naatu iti yawas i sabuw isah marakaw bai na.
1.5 Jn 3.19Iti marakaw guguminamaim kusisiar, naatu gugumin men karam boro marakaw na’asabun.

1.6 Mat 3.1; Luk 1.13-17, 76God ana kob abarayan wabin John iyafar na tit; marakaw isan sif ruboun eorereb sabuw hinowar, naatu sabuw iyab tur hinonowar hitumatum. I taiyuwin i men marakaw; i marakaw akisin ana sif narubonamih na.
1.9 Jn 8.12Iti marakaw i turobe, marakaw anababatun, tafaramaim na sabuw tafahimaim ekukusisiar.

Tur i na tafaram eo mamatar wanawananamaim ma, baise tafaram i men inanimih. I na ana tafaram tit, baise taiyuwin ana sabuw i men hibaimih. Baise sabuw afa hibai naatu wabinamaim hitumitum, naatu baibasit itih i hina God natunatun himatar.
1.13 Jn 2.11; 3.3-6; 1Pet 1.23God natunatun himamatar i men orot anarara, o men orot babin aawan hairi hi’in kek tetutufu na’atube’emih, baise i God akisin anakokok sinaf i natunatun himatar.

1.14 Php 2.7Tur i na orot matar, naatu wanawanatamaim ma, ana marakaw bonamanamarin i taitin, iti marakaw bonamanamarin i God Natun ta’imonamo ebitin. Iti tur wanawanan i turobe naatu manaw kabeber awan karatan.
John iti orot isan fanan sib binan eo,” Iti orot ayu isan ao’oban iti enan, anamaramaim ayu iti na’at ao, ‘I ayu ufu enan i ana fair ra’at ayu natabiru, anayabin i wan ma’abo ayu atufuw.’”

I wanawanan manaw kabeber karsuwei it etei ebigegewasinit, ana baigegewasin tafan baban ebitit.
1.17 Exo 34.28; Rom 6.14Anayabin God ana ofafar i Moses itin, baise manaw kabeber naatu turobe i Jesu Keriso’one na.
1.18 Exo 33.20; Jn 6.46; 1Tim 6.16Men yait ta God itin. baise God Natun ta’imon Tamah wanawananamaim ema’am akisinamo God bai na bebeyanamaim tasusu’ub.

Jew hai ukwarih Jerusalem hima’am firis afa naatu hai baibaisayah 1.19 Levite afa hiyafarih hin John hibatiy? “O i yait?” I men baifuwenamaim iyafutih, baise i mutufor bebeyanamaim eorereb, “Ayu i men Keriso.”

1.21 Deu 18.15, 18; Mat 11.14Naatu hibatiy, “Bo o i yait? Om Elizah?” John eo, “Ayu men Elizah.” Ai o dinab orot?” John iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men dinab orot.” Ibanak hibatiy maiye hio, “O i yait? Ku’o anowar saise anamatabir anan iyab hiyafari anan hai tur ana’owen. O taiyuw isa boro inakubuna ananowar.”

1.23 Isa 40.3John iya’afutih dinab orot Isaiah Buk Atamaninamaim kirum inu’in imaim eo, “Ayu i orot ta fanan araramaim eafa’af. Ef kwanarumutufur Regah ana remor isan!” Kob nayah Pharisee hiyafarih hina, John hibatiy, “Bo o men Keriso, o Elizah o dinab orot na’at, aisim sabuw bapataito kubitih?”

John hai tur eowen eo, “Ayu harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih, Baise kwa wanawanamaim orot ta ebatabat kwa men kwaso’ob.
1.27 Jn 1.15I Ayu ufu’umaim enan, an ana baibaiyon murab men gewasu boro anarufamen.”
Iti sawar etei i Bethany himatar harew Jordan sisibin veya yeninane, John sabuw bapataito bitihimaim.

1.29 Isa 53.6-7; 1Pet 1.18-19Mar to John nuw Jesu nan itin eo, “Kwanuw God Ana Lamb tafaram ana kakafin bosairenayan enan kwa’itin!”
1.30 Jn 1.15Iti orot isan ao’orereb anamaramaim iti na’atube ao, ‘Orot ayu ufu’umaim enan i ana fair ra’at kwanekwan, anayabin i wan ma’abo ayu a tufuw.’ Ayu taiyuwu auman iti orot men asu’ub, baise anayabin nati isan ayu harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih imaim Israel sabuw isah tirerereb hitaso’ob’.

1.32 Mat 3.16Naatu John iti tur eorereb. “Ayu Anunin mamu imag na’atube marane ra’iy naatu i tafanamaim mamara’at aitin. Ayu iti orot i boro men ataso’ob, baise God iyunu ana harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih i au tur eowen, ‘Orot yait Anunin nara’iy tafanamaim namara’at ina’i’itin, i boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito nitih.’”
1.34 Mat 3.17John eo, “Ayu aitinika naatu ao’orereb iti i God Natun.”

Ana martot John iban maiye ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab bairi hina efan ta’imonamaim hibatabat.
1.36 Jn 1.29Naatu Jesu na natabirih inan i’itin anamaramaim, John eo, “God ana Lamb enan kwa’itin!”
Anamaramaim bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab iti hinonowar, i hairi Jesu hi’ufunun. Jesu nunutabir, orot rou’ab hibi’ufunun itih naatu ibatiyih, “Kwa abistan kwakokok?”
Hiya’afutih hi’o, “Rabbi” (anayabin Bai’obaiyenayan), “O menamaim kuma’am?”
I iya’afutih eo, “Kwanatan, kwa taiyuw efan kwa’itin.”
Naatu hin efan menamaim ma’am hi’itin, naatu veya tutufin bairi imaim hima. Nati i tanao 4 korok na’atube.

1.40 Mat 4.18-20John abistan eo’o orot rou’ab hinowar Jesu hibi’ufunun orot ta i Andrew, Simon Peter tain Andrew Jesu bihamiy ufunamaim wantoro’ot i tuwah Simon nuwih, naatu tita’ur ana tur eowen, “Ayu i Roubininenayan atita’ur, nati i Keriso.”
1.42 Mat 16.18Naatu Andrew tuwah Simon nawiy in Jesu biyan tit.
Jesu nura’at itin naatu eo, “O i Simon, John natun. O boro wab hina’af Cephas.” Cephas, Peter hairi hai yabin i kabay.
Ana marto, Jesu au Galilee namih bobogaigiwas, Philip tita’ur naatu iu, “Kuna kwi’ufnunu tan.”

Philip ana tafaram i Betsaida, Andrew tuwah Peter bairi hai bar merar ta’imon.
1.45 Deu 18.18; Isa 7.14; 9.6; Jer 23.5; Ezk 34.23Philip na Nathanael tita’ur naatu iu, “Iti orot isan Moses Buka Atamaninamaim eo kikirum naatu dinab oro’orot auman hikikirum i boun atita’ur, iti orot tamah i Joseph ana bar ana merar i Nazareth.”
“Nazareth! Sawar gewasin ta boro imaim namatar?” Nathanael ibat.
Philip eo, “Kuna tan, kwi’itin.”
Anamaramaim Jesu nuw Nathanael nan itin, isan eo, “I turobe Israel mowan, i orot ana yawas gewasin men baifufuwenayan.” Nathanael ibatiy, “O mi’itube ayu isu’ubu?”
Jesu iya’afut eo, “O i ai fig an anayouninamaim ima’am ayu ait, naatu ufibo Philip o isa eaf.”

1.49 Mat 14.33; 16.16; Mak 3.11Imaibo Nathanael eorereb eo, “Rabbi, Bai’obaiyenayan o i God Natun! o i Israel hai Aiwob.” Jesu eo, “O i tumatum anayabin ayu a tur aowen o i ai fig an ima’am ait. O boro sawar gagamihika ina’itan men iti i’i’itin na’atube.”
1.51 Gen 28.12Tur tafan ya’abar maiye eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, kwa boro mar ana etawan nabotawiy, naatu God ana tounamatar Orot Natun biyanamaim hinayen hinarara’iy kwana’itih.”

Veya baitonin ufunamaim tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar Canna imaim tabin ana hiyuw hibogaigiwas. Jesu hinah i nati’imaim. Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufunanayah auman bairi hibuwih tabin ana hiyuw aa wanawanan hirun. Sabuw wine hitom sasawar anamaramaim Mary natun Jesu isan eo, “Wine hitom sawar.”
2.4 Jn 7.30; 8.20Jesu iya’afut eo, “Babine, ayu men inabobaru iti hiyuw aa wanawanan. Ayu au veya i men baimih.”
Hinah sabuw bowayah isah eo, “Abistanawat na’u’uwi imaim kwanasinaf.”

Sisibihimaim noukwat buhuw etei umat roun ta’imon kabayamaim hikwakwen hibatabat, iti noukwat i Jew hai koksouwen binanakwar noukwat. Nati noukwat wanawananan i karam harew boro 70 o 100 litres hinisuwei nayen awan nakaratan.
Jesu bowayah uwih, “Buhuw harew kwariren teyen.” Imih harew hiriren hiyen awah hikartanen, naatu uwih, “Bounabo turin kwahun kwabai kwan tabin ana orot ukwarin kwaitin.”

Eo na’atube hisinaf. Naatu tabin ana orot ukwarin harew bai kakartubun harew botabir in wine naniyan matar. I men so’ob wine i menane na, baise bowayah iyab harew hihuh i hiso’ob. Naatu tabin boubun eaf na bai tit nabinamaim ibatiy naatu, eo, “Mar etei hiyuw ana veya wine hai baiyan gagamin i wan tetomatom, naatu ufunamaim nanawan sabuw tetom terarouwabon i wine ana baiyan kikimin tetomatom. Baise o bounabo wine gewasin iya’asair inu’in ibotait.”
Iti i Jesu ana ina’inan fairin wantoro’ot tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar Canna imaim sinaf matar. Nati’imaim i ana fair botait, naatu i ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin hitumatum.

2.12 Mat 4.13Iti ufunamaim Jesu hinah naatu taitin ana bai’ufununayah bairi hire hin Capernaum hitit. Nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube hima.
2.13 Exo 12.1-27Naatu Jew hai Tar Nowaten Hiyuw i na kakabom auman, Jesu yen in Jerusalem tit. Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana seboseb rur sabuw hima, sheep, mamu hitotobon, naatu sabuw afa i gem afe’en hima kabay hibiyabonen tita’urih. Imih i murab bai eam wabir matar imaim wabirih nunih seboseb hihamiy ufun hitit, naatu for hiyataiten hima hitotobon auman naatu kabay hibiyabonebonen hai kabay tar baisrouwen hai gemogem eabar tabitabiren hisuwa hire. Sabuw iyab mamu hiyateiten hitotobon isan i eo, “Iti kwabosairen kwatit ufun. Aisim Tamai ana bar kwiwa’an in ahar bar matar!”

2.17 Psa 69.9Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah nuhih taseb Buk Atamaninamaim mi’itube hikirum inu’in hinot, “Ayu dogorou O a Bar isan aniyababan wairafabe na’arahu anamorob.” Imaibo Jew sabuw tur fokarinamaim Jesu hibatiy, “Ina’inanen baifofofor afa kusinafen a’itah saife imaim ni’obaiyi o sawar etei sinaf isan ana fair ibai?”

2.19 Mat 26.61; 27.40Jesu iyafutih eo, “Iti Tafaror Bar anagurus nare, naatu veya tounu wanawananamaim ana bora’ah maiye.” Jew sabuw hiya’afut hi’u, “Iti Tafaror Bar hiwowowab i kwamur etei 46 sawar, naatu o ku’o i veya tounu wanawananamaim inawowab maiye?”
2.21 1Cor 6.19Baise Jesu Tafaror Bar isan eo nati i taiyuwin biyan isan eo.
2.22 Luk 24.6-8; Jn 12.16Jesu morobone mimisir ufunamaim, ana bai’ufnunenayah nuhih taseb abistanawat eo hinot. Naatu imaibo Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum hitumatum naatu Jesu tur eo auman hitumatum.
2.23 Jn 7.31Jesu Jerusalem ma’am ana veya Tar Nowaten ana hiyuwamaim ina’inan baifofofor sisinafen i sabuw moumurih maiyow hi’itah naatu i wabinamaim hitumatum. Baise Jesu taiyuwin so’ob nati sabuw i men ebitutumih, anayabin orot babin etei i su’ubih, imih men karam orot babin hai not i ana tur hita’owen anayabin abisa orot dogoron wanawanan i so’ob.

3.1 Jn 7.50; 19.39Jew hai ukwarin orot wabin Nicodemus i Pharisee ana kou’ayamaim orot ta. Guguminamaim na Jesu biyan tit, naatu eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki aso’ob o i bai’obaiyenayan God biyanane ina. Men yait ta karam boro ina’inanen fairih o kusisinafube nasinaf, God men hairi hinama’am na’at.” Jesus and NicodemusCN01670b.tifJhn 3.2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus Nicodemus hairi bar tafan hima tibidudur3.1-4
3.3 Mat 18.3; 1Pet 1.23Mar ta’imonamo Jesu iya’afut, “Ayu tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, men yait ta boro God ana ma’ama wanatowan na’itin, baise i boro natufuw maiye’ebo.”
“Orot ra’at gagamin na’in ema’am, boro mi’itube natufuw maiye?” Nicodemus ibat. “Men karam hinah yan wanawanan narun mar bairou’abin natufuw maiye!”

3.5 Ezk 36.25-27Jesu iya’afut eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, men yait ta boro God ana ma’ama wanatowan narun, baise i harew naatu Anuninamaim natufuw.
3.6 Jn 1.13Biyat etatoub, i biyat eya’iy, baise Anun Kakafiyin etatoub Anun Kakafiyin iya’iy. O boro men ita’ororsa’ir ayu tur iti tufuw maiye ao isan. Waruw ana kokomaim ebababin. O i nidun kunonowar, baise o men karam boro inao, i menane na enan, o au mena’at babin enan. Imih orot babin anunihine i nati na’atube tetutufuw.”
Nicodemus i bat, “Iti i mi’itube?”

Jesu eo, “O i Israel hai bai’obaiyenayan naatu o iti sawar men imanamamih?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, aki abisa asoso’ob i a’o, naatu abisa aki a’i’itin i isan a’o, baise kwa i boro’ika aki ai tur naniyan men kwabaibimih. Ayu tafaram ana sawar isah ao kwanowar baise kwa men kwabitumatum. Kwa boro mi’itube kwanitumatum ayu mar ana sawar isah ana’o na’at?” Men yait ta in mar run, baise orot Natun marane nan akisinamo.
3.14 Num 21.9; Jn 8.28; 12.32Moses mi’itube arar yan kok bora’ah na’atube, orot natun hinabora’ah nayen,
3.15 Jn 20.31saise iyabowat i tebitumatum boro ma’ama wanatowan hinab.

3.16 Jn 3.36; 10.28; Rom 5.8; 8.32; 1Jn 4.9-10God tafaram iyabuw kwanekwan imih i Natun ta’imonamo iyafar na, saise yait i ebitumitum boro men namorob, baise boro yawas wanatowan nab.
3.17 Luk 19.10God i men tafaram bai’afiyin isan Natun iyafar na tafaramaim titamih, baise tafaram baiyawasin isan na tit.
3.18 Jn 5.24O yait I kubitumitum boro men ina’afemih, baise o yait men ebitumitum i eaf sawar, anayabin i men God Natun Ta’imon, i akisinamo wabin itumitumamih.
3.19 Jn 1.5, 9; 8.12Iti i baib’afiyen. Marakaw na tafaramamaim tit, baise orot marakaw efanin gugumin iyabuw anayabin hai sinaf kakafih.

Orot babin etei sinaf kakafih tesisinaf i marakaw hikwahir naatu boro men hinan marakaw wanawanan hinarun, tebirubir hai sinaf boro hinirerereb. Baise yait ta turobe’emaim ema’am marakaw wanatowan erur, saise i ana bowabow God wanawananamaim bowabow boro nirerereb.

3.22 Jn 4.1-2Iti ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hitit hin Judea tafaram ufunane hirun, nati’imaim mar kikimin hima naatu bapataito itih. Nati’imaim John auman tafaram Aenonamaim sabuw bapataito bitih, Salim i men ef yok i sisibinamaim, anayabin nati’imaim i harew moumurih, naatu sabuw i nan ufun hinan bapataito bain isan. (Iti John dibur hiyaru’uy ma’am nanamaim.) John ana bai’ufununayah afa naatu Jew sabuw afa wanawanahimaim gamin matar, bapataito ana ofafaren isan. I hina John biyan hitit naatu hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, orot nati o airi no Jordan harew rounane menatan isan o i’o’orerereb, i boun bapataito sabuw ebitih, naatu sabuw etei i isan tenan.”

Nati isan John iya’afut eo, “Orot abistanawat marane tebitin iwat nab.
3.28 Mat 11.10; Jn 1.20Kwa taiyuw i karam ayu ao i kwanao’rereb, Ayu i men Keriso, baise ayu i nanamaim hiyafaru ana. Babin orot ana rum hi’o ema’am, orot ana of menatan i bai’awaninamih i orot isan ma tainin rub ma ekakaif, naatu i ana rum fanan enonowar ana veya i anababatun ekakawasa. Iti kawasa i ayu nowau, naatu kawasa i boun ana yomanin a’asa’ub. I ana fair ra’at natabiru, ayu fair i men ra’at.”

3.31 Jn 8.23Yeit auyomane nan i ra’at etei natabirih, menatan iti tafaramane nan i tafaram nowan, naatu tafaram ana sawar isah i ebidudur. Menatan marane nan i sawar etei tafahimaim.
3.32 Jn 3.11I abis nonowar, i’itanen i isah eo’orerereb, baise men yait ta ana tur ebaibimih. Orot yait ta i ana tur nabitumitum na’at, i ebi’obaiyit i ebitumatum God abistan eo’o i turobe. Menatan God biyafar i God ana tur eo’orerereb; anayabin God i Anun i nowanamih itin anababatun
3.35 Mat 11.27; Jn 5.20Tamah Natun iyabuw kwanekwan naatu sawar etei i ana fair babanamaim ya.
3.36 Jn 3.16-18; 1Jn 5.12Yait ana baitumatum Natunamaim naya’iy boro yawas wanatowan nab, baise yait ta God Natun nabifutuw boro men yawas nitinimih, God ana yaso’ar tafahimaim nama.

4.1 Jn 3.22Pharisee hinowar Jesu i bigegesairih naatu John natabir ana bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in bapataito ebitih, turobe iti i men Jesu bapataito ebitih, baise i ana bai’ufununayah. Anamaramaim Jesu, i Judea ihamiy naatu matabir maiye in Galilee. Boun ana remoramaim i boro Samaria wanawanan narun nan.
4.5 Gen 33.19; Jos 24.32Imih i Samaria bar merar wabin Sychar tit, Jacob ana me kamar i natun Joseph bitin i sisibinamaim. Jacob ana harew karakar i nati’imaim, naatu Jesu ef nan hahar, karakar sisibin mara’at ma. Nati i ouyit. Samaria babin harew huninamih nan anamaramaim, Jesu babin isan eo, “Karam harew ititu atatom?Jesus talking to Samaritan womanCN01674B.TIFJhn 4.7©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus Samaritan babin hairi tibidudur4.7 I ana bai’ufununayah hin bar merar bay tobonamih.
4.9 Ezr 4.1-5Samaria babin Jesu isan eo, “O i Jew naatu ayu i Samaria babin. Mi’itube ayu isou harewamih kufefefeyan?” (Jew hai naukwat, o hai kerowas boro men Samaria bairi hinafaram hinaa hinatom.)
4.10 Jn 7.37-38; Rev 21.6Jesu, babin isan iya’afut eo, “O God ana siwar itasoso’ob na’at yait o isa harew tomamih efefeyan, o boro itibatiy i boro yawas ana harew tit itatom”. Babin eo, “Aro, o taratarfuruwen men ibai ina naatu karakar ana sou i manin na’in ra’iy in. Karakar menatanamaim boro iti yawas ana harew inab?
4.12 Jn 8.53Iti karakar i aki agir Jacob kair imaim ma tomatom, naatu ana haru ana for ouman. Iti karakar aki iti. O taiyuw ku’o’o, o Jacob inatabir? Jesu iya’afut eo, “Orot babin etei iti harew natomatom boro sikan namamah maiye,
4.14 Jn 6.35baise yait ayu harew anitin natomatom boro men sikan namamah. Naatu harew nati ayu anabitin boro wanawananamaim harew buruburur namatar. Naatu yawas’anaharew imaim na’in nitin, naatu yawas wanatowan nab. Babin Jesu isan eo,” Aro, harew nati ayu kwiti saise ayu men sikou namamaa nan naatu men mar etei iti’imaim harew huninamih anan.” Jesu babin iu, “Kwen ku’af aaw isan naatu kumatabir kuna.” Babin iya’afut eo, “Ayu aawu en.” Jesu eo,” O aaw en ku’o’o i turobe.” Anababatun, o oro’orot etei five, i aa’awanen naatu orot iti boun airi kwama’am i men o aawamih. Abistan iti boun i’o’o i turobe.” Babin eo, “Aro, ayu ai’iti, o i dinab orot.”
4.20 Deu 12.5-14; Psa 122.1-5“Aki ai a’agir iti oyawemaim hikwakwafir, baise kwa Jew kwa’o’o kwafiren efan i Jerusalemamaim tanakwafir.”

Jesu eorereb eo, “Babin ayu initutumu, veya i enan anamaramaim kwa boro men Tamat no oyawemaim o Jerusalemamaim kwanakwafir.
4.22 2Ki 17.29-41; Isa 2.3; Rom 9.4-5Kwa Samaria men kwaso’ob abistan kwakwakwafir, aki aso’ob abistan a kwakwafir, anayabin yawas i Jew sabuw biyahine na. Veya i enan naatu natitaka anamaramaim anababatun kwafirenayah boro Regah turobe naatu Anuninamaim hinakwafir, naatu kwafirinayah iti na’atube i boun Regah enunuwet.
4.24 Rom 12.1; 2Cor 3.17; Php 3.3God i Anunin, naatu i ana kwafirenayah i turobe naatu Anuninamaim hinakwafir.”
Babin eo, “Ayu nati Roubininenayan i aso’ob (Keriso terarouw) i enan. I nanan ana veya i boro sawar etei it isat nakubuna.”
4.26 Mak 14.61-62Imaibo Jesu eorereb eo, “Ayu i yait? Ayu yait airit ta’o’o.”

Jesu eo oumatan, ana bai’ufununayah himatabir hina hitit naatu Jesu babin hairi hibidudur hi’itih hi’ororsa’ir. Baise men yait ta kok babin tibatiy, o Jesu hitibatiy, “Anayabin aisimamih babin airi kwabidudur?”

Naatu babin ana harew hunihun ihamiy, i matabir in bar merar tit naatu sabuw nati’imaim hima’am hai tur eo’wen, Kwana tan orot kwa’itin, sawar abistanawat asisinaf etei’imak au tur eowen. Ta’itin i Roubinineyan wariten?” Naatu bar merar hihamiy naatu sabuw etei ef hinuwet hin Jesu biyan hitit. Nati ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan bay ta ku’aan ya kurutan!” Baise i isah eo, “Ayu au bay menamaim ana’ani’aan kwa men kafa’imo kwaso’ob.” Imih bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hima hi’o, “Ta’itin sabuw afa bay hibow hina hitin eaa wariten?”
4.34 Jn 6.38Jesu eo, “Ayu au bay, i yait ayu biyafaru i anakok anabosiyasiyar anasinaf naatu bowabow ayu bitu i anabow anisawar.
4.35 Luk 10.2Kwa iti na’atube kwa’o’o, ’Sumar kwafe’en o tafanamaim aki boro anafour’. Baise a tur ao’owen, Kwa matatoniwa’an me kwana’itin gewas naatu bay iyamur sawar fourin isan ana veya tit. Boun auman fourayan boro hibaiyan ana kabay nab, naatu bay four eya’ay ma’ama wanatowan isan, imih ta’itin tanumayan naatu fourayan i hairi auta’imon hiniyasisir. Abistan hi’o’o i turobe, “Orot ta’imon etatanum naatu orot ta’imon efafour”. “Efan men imaim ima ibowabow, ayu aiyafari kwenan inafouramih naatu i hai fairamaim hibowabow o nonowatin inafour inaa’amih”.

Samaria moumurih maiyow nati bar merar Jesu hitumitum anayabin babin ana turamaim, “I ayu au sinaf etei eo anowar”. Imih anamaramaim Samaria sabuw hina Jesu biyan hititit, hifefeyan bairi ma isan, imih veya rou’ab bairi hima. Sabuw moumurin maiyow hitumatum anayabin i ana turamaim,
4.42 1Jn 4.14naatu babin isan hi’o, “Aki bounabo abitumatum, men babin i’o isan, baise abistan tur eo’o aki taiyuwika taini anowar”.
book.s: Sabuw Hai Orot Ukwarin Natun Jesu Iyawas
book.p:
Veya rou’ab sasawar ufunamaim Jesu efan nati ihamiy, naatu au Galilee na’at misir in.
4.44 Mat 13.57Anayabin i taiyuwin isan eorereb eo, “Dinab orot taiyuwin ana tafaram sabuw isan men tekakakaf”.
4.45 Jn 2.23Imih anamaramaim na Galilee titit, sabuw ana merar hiyi hibai. Anayabin hin Jerusalem Tar Nowaten Hiyuw aa isan hiruru’ay, nati’imaim sawar abistanawat sinaf hi’i’itin isan.
4.46 Jn 2.1-11Naatu matabir maiye in Canna tit, nati Canna i Galilee wanawanan, imaim harew botabir wine mamatar. Naatu nati’imaim gawan ana orot ukwarin natun sawow Capernaumamaim inu’in.
4.47 Mat 8.5-6Jesu Judea’ane na Galilee tit ma’am ana tur na nowar. Misir in biyan tit ana tur eowen naatu ifefeyan i tare tan natun sawow inu’in tiyawas i kafa’imo namorob.
4.48 Jn 2.18; 1Cor 1.22Jesu sabuw iuwih, “Kwa sabuw ina’inan naatu baifofofor kwana’itah, baise boro men kwanitumatum.” Gawan ana orot ukwarin Jesu isan eo, “Aro, inare tananabo au kek namorob.”
4.50 Mat 8.13Jesu orot isan eo, “Kwen! O a kek yawas ema’am!” Orot itumatum abistan Jesu tur isan eo naatu ana ef rura’ah in. I ra’iy inan efamaim ana akir orot bairi hitar naatu ana tur hi’owen, “O a kek i yawas ema’am Naatu ibatiyih, Veya abistanamaim au kek yawas?” Naatu i hiya’afut hi’o, “Fai ouyit one korok na’atube imaim sawow ihamiy”. Naatu imaibo tamah not nati ana veya Jesu eo, “O a kek i boro nayawas.” Imih nati ana baremaim hima’am etei hitumatum.
4.54 Jn 2.11Iti ina’inan bairu’abin men tesinaf emamatar Jesu sinaf matar, no Judea’ane na au Galilee inan ufunamaim.

Veya bai’ab sawar ufunamaim, Jew hai hiyuw aa isan Jesu yen in Jerusalem. Jerusalem wanawanan efan wabin For Hirahir 5.2 Sheep Gate sisibinamaim i harew kukuf, naatu ana seboseb etei umatroun hiwowaben Aramek fanahimaim tisusu’ub Betsaida, nati sebosebomaim sabuw sawusawuwih moumurin maiyow hiya hi’inu’in, matah fim, ah umah kafikafirih, naatu ah umah ririmih hima hikakaif harew tabi’etaw isan. Anayabin veya ta ta Regah ana tounamatar boro nara’iy harew kukuf nabenei niyabat rarouw nayen. Naatu sabuw sawow ana yumat ta ta hibow hina ti’inu’in, yait wan nara’iy nakifukif i boro nayawas. Orot ta sawow bai ma kwamur etei 38 i nati wanawanahimaim. Jesu nuw orot nati’imaim inu’in itin, naatu so’ob orot sawow nati bai virurumin maiyow, imih orot ibatiy, “O kukokok inayawas?”
Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah, anamaramaim harew iyabat rarouw eyey, men yait ta boro nibaisu nabuwu anara’iy harew kukuf yan. Ayu misir ra’iyemih abiwa’an, sabuw afa i wan hira’iyeka.”
5.8 Mat 9.6Naatu Jesu orot isan eo, “Kumisir! A ir kunu naatu kuremor kwen.” Mar ta’imon orot yawas; misir ana ir nu bat remor.

Iti sawar mamatar i Baiyarir Ana Veya.
5.10 Neh 13.19; Jer 17.21Naatu Jew sabuw orot yayawas isan hi’o, “Iti boun i Baiyarir ana veya, ata ofafar men ebibasit o a ir ina’abar.”
Baise iya’afutih eo, “Orot yait ayu biyawasu iuwu, ‘Kumisir a ir kunu naatu kubat kuremor.’”
Imih hibatiy, “Nati orot i yait uwi a ir inu i’abar ibat kureremor?”
Orot nati yayawas i men kafa’imo so’ob orot i yait, anayabin sabuw moumurin maiyow nati’imaim hibatabat Jesu sorabon in kasiy.

Nati ufunamaim Jesu Tafaror Bar wanawanan tita’ur naatu iu, “Kwi’itin, o iyawas. Bowabow kakafih inihamiyen o sawar kakafin anababatun boro biyamaim namatar.” Orot nati’imaim tit in, Jew sabuw hai tur eowen i Jesu iyawas.

Imih hibusuruf Jesu isan turamaim hi’u hi’a’a’afiy, anayabin i Baiyarir ana veya sawar iti na’atube sinaf isan. Jesu isah eo, “Ayu Tamai i mar etei ebowabow, imih ayu auman boro anabow.”
5.18 Mat 26.4; Jn 7.1; 10.30Ana’an iti isan Jew hisinaftobon ef hinuwet Jesu asabunin isan; men Baiyarir ana ofafar ea’eastu’ub akisin, baise God isan Tamah rouw eo’omaim, iwa’an taiyuwin bai yen in God hairi anafofonin matar.

5.19 Jn 5.30Jesu iyafutih eo. “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Orot Natun akisin ana kok men karam nasinaf; baise Tamah abistan sinaf i i’itinimaim boro nasinaf, anayabin Tamah abistan isisinaf na’atube Natun isisinaf. Anayabin Tamah i Natun iyabuw sawar etei esisinaf na’atube Natun i’obaiy imaim esisinaf. Turobe, kwa a baifofofor isan, i boro sawar gagamihika ni’obaiy nasinaf men boun iti na’atube. Tamah murumurubih imisiruwih yawas ebitih na’atube, nati ef ta’imon Natun ekok yait yawas baitinamih boro nitin.
5.22 Jn 5.27; Act 10.42I na’atube Tamah men yait ta ebibatiy, baise baibabatiyen ana fair tutufin etei Natun itin.
5.23 Php 2.10-11; 1Jn 2.23Saise sabuw etei Tamah tirurusagiy na’atube, Natun boro hinarusagiy. Imih o yait Natun men kururusagiy, Tamah, i ana baiyonenayan auman men kururusagiy.

5.24 Jn 3.15-18“Turobe a tur ao’owen, o yait ayu au tur inowar naatu menatan ayu iyafaru anan kubitumitum, o i yawas ma’ama wanatowan ibaika, naatu o boro men baibatebat inab, anayabin morobone irabon yawas wanawanan irun. Turobe a tur ao’owen, veya i enan naatu i na titaka, nati ana veya murumurubih boro God Natun fanan hinanowar naatu iyab fanan hinanonowar boro yawas hinab hinama. Anayabin Tamah taiyuwin i yawas an, imih nati yawas ta’imon Natun itin yawas an matar. Naatu i baibabatiyen ana fair Natun itin, anayabin i, i Orot Natun.

“Tur iti ao isan men kwana’ororsa’ir; veya i nati namamataramaim enan, murumurubih etei boro fanan hinanowar,
5.29 Dan 12.2; Mat 16.27; Act 24.15hai rahane hinatit, naatu iyab gewasin hisisinaf boro hinamisir yawas hinab, iyab kakafih hinasisinaf boro hinakusairih.”

5.30 Jn 5.19; 6.38“Ayu men karam akisu au kok ana sinaf, baise abisa God iu’uwu’umaim sabuw abibabatiyih, imih ayu au baibatiyen i mutufor, anayabin men ayu au kokomaim asisinaf, baise orot yait ayu iyunu anan i anakok asisinaf. Ayu taiyuwu au sinaf isan ana’o’orereb na’at, au tur i men turobe’emih. Baise orot ta ayu isou eo’orereb, i a tur ao’owen i ana orereb ayu isou i turobe. Kwaso’ob gewasomih kob abarayah John isan kwaiyafarih hinan John i turobe kwa a tur eowen. Iti i men kwa orot maiyow isou kwataorereb, baise iti ao saise mi’itube kwa yawas kwatab isan. John i hinow na’atube to’ab marakaw kwa it, naatu mar kikimin kwa ana marakaw isan kwaiyasisir.

5.36 Jn 3.2; 14.11Baise ayu au orererebayan orot i gagamin, men iti John eo’orereb na’atube. Ayu au orererebayan i abisa Tamai iyunu ana asisinaf i eo’orereb, naatu nati ebi’obaiyi ayu i Tamai iyafaru anasinaf isan, orot ta eo’orereb i John eo’orereb natabir, anayabin iti bowabow ayu Tamai bitu i anisawar, naatu iti bowabowamaim eo’orereb Ayu Tamai iyunu ana i ana bowabow anabow.
5.37 Mat 3.17; Jn 5.32; 8.18Naatu Tamai iyunu anan i taiyuwin ayu isou eo’orereb. Kwa men kafa’imo fanan kwanowar naatu yumatan kwa’itin. Kwa ana tur men dogor wanawanan run, anayabin menatan ayu iyunu anan i men kwabitumitum.
5.39 Luk 24.27Kwa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum kwaiyab kwabinotanot anayabin boro imaim yawas wanatowan kwanab. Nati tur i ayu isou eo, baise men kwakokok kwanan ayu biyau yawas kwanab.

“Ayu men orot babin bora’ara’ahu isan ao’omih. baise kwa orot babin a yawas ayu aso’ob, kwa a yabow God isan dogoromaim i men ema’am. Ayu Tamai wabinamaim anan kwa men kwabuwu au merar kwayi, baise orot babin ta i taiyuwin wabinamaim nanan boro kwanab ana merar kwanay. Kwa taiyuw baifa’i isan a kok gagamin, baise God ta’imonamo ana baifa’en i men kwakokok, imih ayu abisa ao boro kwanitutumu? Men kwananot ayu boro Tamai nanamaim ubar kwa bait kwanarouw en, baise Moses kwa a not tutufin imaim kwayai kwama’am boro ubar nabit kwana’itin.
5.46 Act 3.22Moses kwatabitumitum na’at, ayu boro kwatitutumu, anayabin i ayu isou kirum. Baise Moses abistan kikirum kwa men kwanabitumatum na’at, boro mi’itube ayu ao kwanitumatum?”

Nati ufunamaim ana veya ta, Jesu Galilee harew isobon rabon rewan rounane (wabin ta Taibirias kukuf.) Naatu sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hi’ufunun hin anayabin sabuw sawusawuwih biyahimaim ina’inan sinaf biyawasih hi’itan isan. Naatu Jesu yen in oyaw sisibinamaim tit naatu ana bai’ufununayah hina biyanamaim himarir hima. Jew sabuw hai Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya i na biyubin. Jesu nuw ra’at sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow isan hinan itih, naatu Philip ibatiy, “Rafiy menamaim boro tanatobon iti sabuw tanituwih?” Iti i Philip fufunin isan ibibatiy, anayabin i ana notamaim so’obaka i boro abistan nasinaf.

Philip iya’afut eo, “Orot ana baiyan sumar eight ana fofonin 6.7 200 denari tatab rafiy tatutubun sabuw ta’ita’imon tatabituwih i kikimin kwanekwan.” Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah orot ta, Andrew, Simon Peter tain awan tara’ah eo, “Kek ta iti’imaim rafiy afu’afusar umat roun naatu siy rou’ab umanamaim hima’am aitin. Baise anotanot boro men nakaram, sabuw i ra’at kwanekwan.”

Nati’imaim samar gewasin tuw inu’in, imih Jesu eo, “Sabuw kwa’uwih samar yan timarir. naatu sabuw samar yan himarir hima, naatu oro’orotowat hibiyab etei 5,000. Jesu faraw bai, God ana merar yi, naatu sabuw himarir hima’am faramih, siy bai ef ta’imon sinaf, etei hi’aa yah gadid hai fofonin bai.

Naatu hai fofonin baib ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Hi’aa tuturih etei kwaita’ay, men ta kwanihamiy.” Basit hi’aa tuturih hi’o’on naatu kaifet hibiwanen etei 12, iti i rafiy fafar umat roun naatu siy rou’abamaim sabuw bituwih.

Iti ina’inan Jesu sinaf sabuw hi’i’itin ufunamaim hibusuruf hi’o, “Turobe iti orot i dinabamon, i namih hi’o’oban na tafaramamaim tit.”
6.15 Jn 18.36Jesu itih so’ob boro kafa’imo hinan hinab naatu hinau’kikin ni’aiwob, imih i hamenamo nati efan ihamiy naatu akisinamo yen in oyaw wan.

Veya re birabirab ana bai’ufununayah hire hin harew kukuf hitit, Jesu isan hima hikakaif mar bu’u’um, men na biyah tit, imih wa hibai hiboy hirabon au Capernaum. Nati ana veya kotar bitufuwan wanawanan hin naatu yabat busuruf ra’at. Hiboy hitit hire hikuyowen five o six kilometres na’atube hinuwanuw Jesu nahine riy yan bat remor wa isan nan hi’itin yah birubir fafar. Baise isah eaf eo, “Ayu o! men kwanabirumih!” Imaibo ereyasisir hiu na wa afe’en yen, naatu men yok efan hinot hinanamaim awar hiyut.

Marto, sabuw rou’ay nati harew kukuf rounane hima hinunuwabon wa ta’imon nati’imaim batabat hi’inan, naatu hiso’ob Jesu i men nati wa’amaim isra’at bairi hinamih, baise ana bai’ufununayah akisihimo hinan hi’itih. Imaibo wa afa Taibiriasine hina efan nati Regah faraw bai igegewasin sabuw bituwih sisibinamaim hirun. Naatu sabuw wa afe’en hinunuwatet Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi men hi’it fa’arih, matah kabiy wa hibow au Capernaum na’at Jesu hinuwih hin.
Jesu harew kukuf rewan rounane ma’am hitita’ur, naatu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan, biyika ina itit kuma’am?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu kwanunuwuhu i men ina’inan asisinaf kwa’i’itin isan, baise kwa rafiy kwa’aan ya gagadid isan ayu kwanuwuhu kwanan.
6.27 Jn 6.48-58Bay nati eafe’af isan men kwanabowamih, baise ma’ama wanatowan ana bay isan i raro nanababan, nati bay i Orot Natun boro kwa nit. Anayabin God ayu Tamai ana baibasit nati bay roufaramin isan ana fair ayu itu.”
Imaibo Jesu hibatiy, “Bo aki boro mi’itube anasinaf saise God abistan eo imaim anasinaf?”
6.29 1Jn 3.23Jesu iyafutih eo, “God ana bowabow bow isan i iti. Orot yait God biyafar i kwanitumitum.

6.30 Mat 16.1; Jn 2.18Imih i hibatiy, “Ina’inan fairin menatan boro inasinaf aki ana’itin naatu o anitutumi? O boro abistan inasinaf?
6.31 Exo 16.14-15; Num 11.7-9; Psa 78.24It ata a’agir arar yanamaim i rafiy wabin manna hi’aa; Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hi’o’o na’atube, I mar ana rafiy itih hi’aa.”

Naatu Jesu hai tur eowen eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, “Iti mar ana rafiy kwa kwa’ani’aan i men Moses kwa itimih, baise ayu Tamai rafiy anababatun marane kwa it. Anayabin God ana rafiy i orot yait marane rara’iy sabuw etei tafaram wanawanan yawas ebitih.”
Sabuw hi’o, “Regah iti rafiy i mar etei initi ana’aan.”

6.35 Jn 4.14Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu i yawas ana rafiy. Orot Yait ayu isou enan i boro men kafa’imo bayumih namorob, naatu orot yait ayu isou ebitumatum boro men kafa’imo sikan namamahimih.” Naatu iti tur i ao kwanowaraka naatu mata yan kwa’i’itin baise men kafa’imo kwabitutumu. Sabuw iyabowat ayu Tamai bitu boro ayu isou hinan, naatu orot babin yait ayu isou enan boro men ananun ufun natitamih. Anayabin ayu marane arara’iy, i men ayu au kok sinaf isanamih, baise orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana kok anasinaf.
6.39 Jn 10.28-29; 17.12Naatu orot yait ayu iyunu anan ana kok i iti, sabuw iyabowat ayu bitu etei men ta anikasiy, baise mar yomaninamaim etei’imak anabuwih hinamisir. Anayabin ayu Tamai ana kok i sabuw iyab matah etei Natun akisin ti’i’itin naatu tibitumitum boro ma’ama wanatowan ana yawas hinab; naatu mar yomaninamaim ayu boro anabuwih hinamisir.

Imaibo Jew sabuw hibusuruf Jesu isan higam, anayabin i eo, “Ayu i mar ana rafiy.
6.42 Mat 13.55Basit sabuw hi’o, “Iti orot i Jesu, Joseph natun, hinah tamah i taso’ob. Naatu baise boun i eo’o, Ayu i marane ara’iy.”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Taiyuw men kwanagam.
6.44 Jn 6.65Sabuw boro men ayu isou hinan kwaneyan, baise Tamai ayu iyunu anan boro nabonawiyih hinan ayu biyau hinatit; naatu mar yomaninamaim ayu boro ana bora’ahih hinamisir.
6.45 Isa 54.13Dinab oro’orot hikirum hi’o na’atube, ‘Sabuw etei boro God ni’obaiyih. Orot yait Tamai fanan nowar naatu biyanane so’ob ebaib boro ayu isou nan.
6.46 Jn 1.18Men yait ta Tamai itin; baise orot yait Godane nan i akisinamo Tamai itin.
6.47 Jn 3.15-16Turobe a tur ao’owen, orot yait ebitumatum, yawas wanatowan i baika.
6.48 Jn 6.32, 58Ayu i yawas ana rafiy. Kwa a’a’agir hai veya, rafiy wabin manna arar yanamaim hibow hi’aa, baise etei himorob. Baise rafiy iti i marane ra’iy, sabuw iyab hinab hina’ani’aan boro men hina morob. Ayu i yawas ana rafiy, marane hiyafaru are. Orot babin yait iti rafiy na’ani’aan na’at boro nama wanatowan. Iti rafiy i ayu finimu boro anit, saise sabuw boro tafaramamaim yawas hinab hinama.”
Naatu Jew sabuw iti tur hinonowar isan yah so’ar hibusuruf taiyuwih wanawanahimaim higam hikwaris hio, “Iti orot biyan finimin boro mi’itube nitit tana’animih eo?”

Jesu iuwih eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Orot Natun biyan finimin men kwana’aan naatu ana rara men kwanatomatom, kwa wanawanamaim yawas men ema’am. Orot yait ayu biyou finimin na’aan naatu au rara natomatom yawas wanatowan i bai, naatu yomaninamaim ayu boro ana bora’ah namisir. Anayabin ayu biyou finimin i bay anababatun naatu au rara i harew anababatun, orot babin yait ayu biyou finimin na’aan naatu au rara natomatom boro wanawana’umaim nama naatu ayu i wanawananamaim anama.
6.57 1Jn 3.24Tamat yawas ana’an i ayu iyunu ana, anayabin i ema’am isan imih, ayu auman ama’am, ef ta’imonaban orot yait ayu biyau’umaim bai eani’aan boro yawasin nama anayabin ayu ama’am isan imih. Iti rafiy marane rara’iy i men kwa a a’agir manna hi’aa hibimumurub na’atube’emih, baise o yait iti rafiy boun marane rara’iy inab ina’ani’aan boro inama wanatowan.” Tur iti etei i Capernaum Kou’ay Bar 6.59 synagogue wanawananamaim ma sabuw hai tur eowen i’obaibiyih.
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah moumurin na’in tur iti hinonowar hi’o, “Iti bai’obaiyen i fokarin. Yait boro iti tur nanowar nab?”

Baise Jesu ana bai’ufununayah abisa isan hio higamigam so’ob naatu iuwih eo, “Tur iti kwanonowar imaim kwa a naniyan ebi’afiy? Bo Orot Natun nayen ana efan marasika ma’am imaim nama kwana’itin boro mi’itube kwanao! Anun Kakafiyin i yawas ebit biyat i aurin fair en. Iti tur kwa isa a’o i ayub ana tur naatu wanawananamaim i yawas ema’am.
6.64 Jn 13.11Baise kwa afa iti kwama’am i men kwabitumatum. Anayabin iyab men hinabitumatum naatu orot yait baban na’o Jesu so’obaka.”
6.65 Jn 6.44Ibanak eo maiye, “Anayabin iti isan kwa au’uwi, orot babin boro men asir ayu isou nan kwaneyanamih, baise Tamai ana baibasitamaim boro niwa’an isah naham hinan ayu isou.”
Nati ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in hihamiy naatu himatabitabir hina’ufut hin.
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 ibatiyih. “Kwa auman kwakokok kwanan?”
6.68-69 Mat 16.16Simon Peter iya’afut eo, “Regah yait isan boro anan? Yawas wanatowan ana tur o akisimo biya ema’am. Aki abitumatum naatu aso’ob o i Kakafiyin Ta’imon Godane ina.”

Imaibo Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa na 12, i ayu arubini, baise kwa wanawanamaim orot ta i demon mowan.” (Jesu iti tur eo’o i Judas Simon Iscariot natun isan, Judas i bai’ufununayan nah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta, yomaninamaim i boro Jesu nayanuw namorob.)

7.1 Jn 5.18Nati ufunamaim Jesu Galilee wanawanan run titit remor in, men kok au Judea tan anayabin Jew hai ukwarih hima hikakaif hitarab tamorob isan.
7.2 Lev 23.34Baise Jew sabuw Yagama Sis ana hiyuw aa ana veya i nabiyubin, Imih Jesu taitin hi’o, “O boro efan iti inihamiy naatu inan Judea inatit, saise a bai’ufununayah bowabow gewasih abistan kusisinaf hina’itin. Anayabin orot yait sabuw etei su’ubin isan boro men wa’iwa’iramaim nabowamih. Baise bebeyanamaim nabow hina’itin. Imih a bowabow bebeyanamaim inabow tafaram tutufin etei ini’obaiyih hina’itin.”
7.5 Act 1.14I taiyuwin taitin men hitumitum, imih iti tur hi’o.

Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu au veya i men na tit, baise kwa a veya i mar etei bobotawiyen inu’in. Sabuw kwa boro men hinifutuwi, baise ayu boro hinifutuwu, anayabin ayu mar etei sabuw hai kakafih ao’orerereb. Hiyuw isan kwa akis kwanan ayu men bairit tanan, anayabin ayu au veya anababatun i men na tit.” Iti na’atube eo, i Galilee wanawananamaim ma.

Taitin hiyuw isan hiyen hinan, i auman ufuh yen in, men bebeyanamaim in baise i wa’iwa’iramaim in. Nati hiyuw wanawanan Jew hai ukwarih Jesu isan hinuwet sabuw hibabatiyih, “Iti orot menamaim ema’am?” Sabuw wanawanahimaim baitarsibesib busuruf ra’at. Sabuw afa hi’o, “I orot gewasin,” afa hi’o, “Aiyabin i sabuw ebifufuwih?” Baise men yait ta boro fanan aumetawat isan hitao, anayabin Jew ukwarih isah hibir.

Hiyuw hi’aa na biyanfoun, Jesu na Tafaror Bar run naatu bai’obaiyen busuruf.
7.15 Mat 13.54; Luk 2.47Jew hai ukwarih hifofofor men kafai ta naatu hi’o, “Iti orot menamaim kirum iti so’ob bai?”

7.16 Jn 12.49; 14.10Imaibo Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bai’obaiyen ayu abi’obaiyi i men ayu nowau, baise God ayu biyafaru i nowan. O Yait ta God anakok kusisinaf boro inaso’ob ayu au bai’obaiyen i Godane enan, ai ayu taiyuwu au fairamaim ao’o.
7.18 Jn 8.50Yait taiyuwin ana fairamaim eo’o, i taiyuwin ana gewasin bain isan enunuwih, baise orot yait God ayu iyafaru anan ana gewasin enunuwih nati orot i turobe, i wanawananamaim men baifuwen ema’am.
7.19 Act 7.53; Rom 2.21-24Moses ofafar kwa it ai en? Aisim ofafafar men kwabi’ufunun naatu ayu rabu morobomih kwabiwa’an?”
7.20 Jn 8.48; 10.20Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “O wanawan i demon tema’am. Yait o asabunimih ebiwa’an?”

Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu ina’inan ta’imon asinaf kwa’itin naatu kwaifofor men kafaita.
7.22 Gen 17.9-13; Lev 12.3Moses uwi natunat oro’orot Baiyariri hai veya’amaim hai ar, mo’oh kwa’afuw, nati i men Mosesine na, nati i kwa a’agir wabih gagamihine na. Imih kwa kek oro’orot hai ar mo’oh kwa’a’afuw.
7.23 Jn 5.8-10, 16Kwa Baiyarir ana veya’amaim kek orot ana ar mo’on kwana’a’afuw nati Moses ana ofafar i men kwa’a’astu’ub, aisimamih ayu Baiyarir Ana Veya orot biyan tutufin abiyawas isan kwa ya esoso’ar? Men ufun ana’itininamaim sabuw kwanibabatiyih, baise a baibabatiyen i turobe’emaim kwanibatiyih.”

Nati isan Jerusalem sabuw afa hibusuruf hibatebat hi’o, “Orotoban iti i boun rabin morobomih ana ef tenunuwet? Kwa’itin iban iti bebeyanamaim eo’o, naatu i men tur ta isan te’eo’omih. Kwa kwanotanot sabuw ukwarihiban hiso’ob gewas iti orot i turobe Rourubinen?
7.27 Jn 7.41; 9.29Baise iti orot menane nan i aki aso’ob; Rourubinen nanan anamaramaim boro men yait ta naso’ob i menane na.”

7.28 Mat 11.27; Jn 8.55Imaibo Jesu Tafaror bar wanawanan ma bi’obaibiyih fanan aumetawat na’in eo, “Turobe ayu kwa kwaso’ob, naatu menane anan kwa kwaso’ob? Ayu iti anan i men taiyuwu au kok ana, baise turobe ana God ayu iyunu ana. Nati orot kwa men kwaso’ob ayu asu’ub, anayabin ayu ine ana naatu i iyunu ana.”

7.30 Jn 7.44Nati’imaim sabuw bain fatuminamih hiwa’an, baise men yait ta biyan butubun, anayabin ana veya i men natit. Baise rou’ay gagamin wanawanan sabuw moumurin maiyow hitumitum naatu hi’o, “Rourubinen nanan ina’inan fairih moumurihika nasinaf iti orot boro nanatabir.”

Rou’ay wanawanan Jesu sawar sisinaf isan hibitarsibesib Pharisee hinowar. Basit firis gagagamih naatu Pharisee Tafaror Bar ma’utayah hiyafarih hin Jesu bain fatuminamih. Imih Jesu eo, “Ayu boro men manin bairit tanama, naatu anamatabir maiye anan yait iyunu anan biyan anatit.
7.34 Jn 8.21; 13.36Kwa boro ayu kwananuwuhu, baise boro men kwanatita’uru, naatu ayu menamaim anama’am, kwa boro men kwanan.”

Jew sabuw taiyuwih hima hi’o, “Iti orot boro menamaim nan nama naatu it men karam tanatita’ur? Ai i boro nan Greek wanawanah ata sabuw hitagey nanabin tema’am imaim nama ni’obaibiyih? Kwa boro ayu isou kwananuwet baise boro men kwanatita’uru naatu ayu menamaim anama’am kwa boro men kwanan? Iti tur eo’o anayabin i abisa?”

7.38 Isa 58.11Yait ayu inabitutumu na’at kuna biyau harew kutom. Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube ‘Harew yawasin boro o wanawananamaim nanunuw.’”
