7.40 Jn 6.14Rou’ay wanawanan hima tur hinonowar sabuw afa hi’o, “Anababatun iti orot i God ana dinab orot.”
7.41 Jn 1.46Afa hi’o, “Iti orot i Rourubinen.” Naatu sabuw afa ibanak hi’o, “Rourubinen ana orot i boro men Galilee’ine nan?
7.42 Psa 89.3-4; Mic 5.2Buk Atamaninamaim eo Rourubinen i boro aiwob orot David ana rara’ane naatu boro Bethlehem David ana bar meraramaim.” Imih nati kou’ay wanawanan kouseb matar anayabin Jesu isan. Sabuw afa hikok hitab hitafatum, baise men yait ta biyan butubun.
Imaibo Tafaror bar ma’utenayah himatabir hin firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee biyah hitit naatu firis ukwarih himisir ma’utenayah hibatiyih, “Aisimamih men kwa bai kwana kwatit?”

7.46 Mak 1.22Ma’utenayah hiya’afutih hi’o, “Iti orot tur eo’o, i men orot afa te’eo na’atube eomih!” Pharisee hibatiyih, “Kwa kwa’o anananiyan kwa auman ifuwi ebobonawiyi kakaf i?”
7.48 Jn 12.42“Kwata’itin ukwarih afa o Pharisee orot afa tur hinonowaraban Jesu hitumitum? Aiyabin! Iti rou’ay Moses ana ofafar i men ta hiso’ob, imih i God ana orarafen baban tema’am!”
7.50 Jn 3.1-2I taiyuwih hai orot ta wabin Nicodemus i wan in Jesu biyan tit, Imih i ana kou’ay ibatiyih, “It ata ofafar eo orot anasinaf kakaf i wan tananuwet imaibo tanab tanan ata ofafaramaim tanibabatiy.”

7.52 Jn 7.41-42Hiya’afut hi’o, “Nicodemus o auman i Galilee orot? Baise Buk Atamaninamaim inanunuwet boro men inatita’ur, dinab orot i men Galilee’ine na.” (Naatu rou’ay hima’am hitarboubun himisir hai bar hai bar hin.)

Imaibo Jesu Olive Oyaw na’at tit yen in. Maraumanika Jesu matabir maiye Tafaror Bar ana meraramaim bat, sabuw moumurin maiyow hiru’ay hi’arbebera’uh naatu i busuruf ma sabuw i’ubaibiyih. Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee babin turan aawan hairi hi’inu’in hibai hina hirun. Naatu hi’u kou’ay nahimaim bat. Naatu Jesu isan hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, iti babin i turan aawan hairi hi’inu’in atita’ur.
8.5 Lev 20.10; Deu 22.22-24Ofafaramaim Moses aki iti na’atube eobaiyuni, babin yait ta iti na’atube nasisinaf boro kabayamaim anarab namorob. O a not ta ema’am boro inao.” Iti baibat hibai hititit i mi’itube Jesu hitikubibiruw, saise abitur ta’o na’at imaim hitabat ubar hititin isan.

Baise Jesu kwafure fofob yan uman kimamaim ma kubebebeyan.
8.7 Deu 17.7Hi’u hibibabatiy anamaramaim, Jesu nakwetan tara’ah naatu isah eo, “O yait aur bowabow kakafin men nama’am na’at, o wan kabay kubai babin isan kurouw.” Naatu i kwafure maiye me yan ma kubebebeyan. Iti tur hinonowar anamaramaim ta’ita’imon hitabartaitit hin, oro’orot atamanih wan hi’iyon hibusuruf hitit. Babin akisinamo hihamiy Jesu nanamaim bat Jesu totofar misir babin itin basit isan eo, “Babin iti sabuw menika hin? Naatu yait ta o isa rouw’ouri ai en?”
8.11 Jn 5.14Babin eo, “Regah men yait ta ema’am.” Naatu Jesu eo, “Basit gewasin! Ayu auman men karam boro anibatiyi. Kwen, iti boun inabubusuruf bowabow kakafih men inasinaf maiye.”

8.12 Isa 49.6; Jn 1.4-9; 9.5; 12.46Jesu sabuw isah eo maiye, “Ayu i tafaram ana marakaw. Yait ayu ebi’ufnunu i boro men guguminamaim naremor, baise i boro yawas ana marakaw nab.” Pharisee Jesu isan hi’o, “Iti tur ku’o’o i o taiyuw isa ku’o’orerereb naatu abistan o ku’o’orerereb i men turobe.”
8.14 Jn 5.31-32; 7.28Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu taiyuwu isou ana’orerereb na’at, ayu ao’orereb i turobe, anayabin ayu aso’ob menane ana naatu menamaim ananan. Baise ayu menane ana naatu menamaim ananan kwa i men kwa so’ob.
8.15 Jn 12.47Kwa sabuw hai itininamaim kwa’itih kwabibabatiyih. Ayu men yait ta ana itininamaim aitin abibabatiyimih.
8.16 Jn 5.30; 8.29Baise ayu anabibatiyi na’at, ayu au baibatiyen i turobe. Anayabin ayu i men akisu. Ayu Tamai iyunu anan i airi ama’am.
8.17 Deu 19.15Kwa taiyuw a’ofafaramaim iti na’atube hikirum, anamaramaim sifroubonayan orot rou’ab te’orereb tebibasit nati i turobe.
8.18 1Jn 5.9Ayu i orot ta taiyuwu isou ao’orereb; Tamai ayu iyunu anan ayu au sifroubounayan ta.” Naatu sabuw hibatiy, “O Tamat i menamaim ema’am?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa ayu men kwaso’ob na’atube Tamai auman men kwaso’ob. Kwa ayu kwatasusu’ubu na’at Tamai auman boro kwatasu’ub.”
8.20 Jn 7.30Iti tur i tafaroror bar wanawanan kabay teya’ay ana efan sisibinamaim Jesu ma i’obaibiyih. Men yait ta bai fatumimih, anayabin i ana veya men baimih.
book.s: Ayu Menamaim Anan Kwa Men Karam Kwanan
book.p:
8.21 Jn 7.34; 13.33Jesu ibanak isah eo maiye, “Ayu boro kwa anihamiyi anan, naatu kwa boro ayu isou kwananuwet naatu kwa a kakafih wanawanahimaim boro kwanamorob. Ayu menamaim ananan kwa boro men imaim kwanan.” Naatu Jew hai ukwarih hi’o, “I eo, ayu menamaim anan kwa men karam kwanan. Iti eo anayabin i boro taiyuwin na’asabun?”
8.23 Jn 3.31Baise Jesu eo maiye in, “Kwa i babe ma’ani, Ayu i yate ma’anu. Kwa i tafaram nowan, baise ayu i men tafaram nowan. Ayu ao kwanowaraka, ayu men kwanasu’ubu kwanabitutumu na’at, kwa boro anababatun a kakafih wanawanahimaim kwanamorob. Ayu’uban tur iti ao’o.” Hibatiy hio, “O i yait?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Tabubusurufika kwa a tur aowen taremor tana. Kwa isa ayu boro tur moumurika anao anibabatiyi. Baise yait ayu iyunu anan i turobe? Naatu abistan i eo anonowar ayu sabuw hai tur ao’owen.” Jesu Tamah isan sabuw hai tur eo’eowen naniyan men hibai.
8.28 Jn 3.14Imih Jesu eo, “Orot Natun kwanabobora’ah anamaramaim, kwa boro kwanaso’ob; Ayu i Yait; naatu ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim asisinafumih, baise Tamai abistan tur mutufor bi’obaiyu’umaim ao’o. Naatu yait ayu iyunu anan airi ama’am i men ihamiyu, anayabin mar etei i ana kokomaim asisinaf isan ebiyasisir.” Nati eo’omaim sabuw moumurih maiyow hitumitum.

Imih Jesu Jew sabuw iyab i hibitumatum isah eo, “Ayu au bai’obaiyen kwanabubukikin na’at, kwa i anababatun ayu au bai’ufununayah, naatu kwa boro turobe kwanaso’ob naatu turobe boro imaim narufami kwanatit.”
8.33 Mat 3.9Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki Abraham ana a’agir. Naatu aki men yait ta ana akir wairafin. Mi’itube inarufami anatit isan kuo’o?”
8.34 Rom 6.16, 20Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, o yait ta bowabow kakafin kukusisinaf i bowabow kakafin ana akir wairafin imatar. Akir wairafin taitin tuwahinah wanawanahimaim i boro namarorore, baise Natun i ana efan wanatowan. Imih Natun kwa narurufami, kwa i anababatun narufami, Ayu aso’ob kwa i Abraham ana a’agir, baise kwa i ef kwanunuwet ayu kwana’asbunu. Anayabin kwa dogor wanawanan, ayu au tur ana efan i men ema’am. Ayu Tamai ana taragub wanawanan abistan i’obaiyu ai’itin i a tur ao’owen, naatu kwabo tamat demon hi’o kwanonowar na’at kwasisinaf.”
8.39 Mat 3.9Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Abraham i aki tamai.” Jesu eo maiye, “Kwa Abraham natunatun na’at kwa boro i sisinafube kwatasinaf. Itinin i iti. God anababatun au tur eowen ao kwanonowar isan kwa a not kwabobaifufun ayu asabunu’umih. Abraham iti na’atube men sinaf.
8.41 Isa 63.16Kwa tamatanah mi’itube hisisinaf na’atube kwasisinaf.” Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki Tamai i ta’imon God akisinamo, aki i men ometakek aki i natunatun anababatun.”

Jesu sabuw isah eo, “God kwa Tamat na’at ayu boro kwatiyabuwu, anayabin ayu Godane ana naatu boun iti bairit tama’am. Ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim anamih, baise i ayu iyunu ana. Aisimamih ayu tur ao’o naniyan men kwabaib? Abistan ayu ao men kwananonowar anayabin kwa tain i gugurih.
8.44 1Jn 3.8Kwa i tamat demon mowan natunatun, naatu kwa a kok i tamat esisinafube kwani’ufunun. Aneika i asbunubunuwenayan, i men turobe’emaim batamih, anayabin i wanawanan turobe en. Baifufuwen nati i ana tur, anayabin i baifufuwenayan naatu baifufuwenayah etei tamah. Baise ayu tur anababatun ao’o, kwa i men kwabitutumu.
8.46 2Cor 5.21; 1Pet 2.22O yait ta karam ayu au kakafin inaorerereb? Ayu turobe ana’o na’at, aisim men kwabitutumu?
8.47 1Jn 4.6Yait Godamaim ema’am naatu ana tur enonowar i i God nowan. Kwa tur men kwanonowar anayabin Kwa i men God nowan.”

8.48 Mak 3.21-22Jew sabuw Jesu hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki’ima turobe ao’o, oma Samaria mowan naatu demon hitounbuburi kuma’am.” Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men demon hitounbuburu ama’am. Ayu Tamai akisinamo akakakafiy, baise kwa ayu men kwakakafiyu. Ayu men taiyuwu wabu bora’ara’ahin isan anunuwet, baise orot ta i ayu isou akisinamo nanuwet naatu i boro ayu nibabatiyu.

8.51 Jn 5.24Tur anababatun au’uwi, yait ayu au tur ebobosiyasiyar boro men namorob.” Jew sabuw Jesu isan hi’o, “Aki bounabo aso’ob o i demon hitoububuni kuma’am! Abraham morob naatu dinab oro’orot himorob, baise o ku’o’o yait ta ayu au tur nabobosiyasiyar boro men namorob. Aki tamai Abraham i morob o men taiyuw inabora’ahi Abraham inanatabir? Naatu God ana dinab auman himorob. O kunotanot o i yait?” Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu taiyuwu anabobora’ahu na’at ayu au bora’ara’aten anayabin en. Ayu Tamai kwa a God kwarouw kwa’o’o i akisinamo ayu ebobora’ara’ahu. Kwa i men kafa’imo kwasu’ub, baise ayu asu’ub. Ayu men su’ubin anarouw ana’o na’at, ayu boro baifuwenayan kwa ana karam, baise ayu i asu’ub naatu i ana tur abobosiyasiyar. Kwa tamat Abraham ayu au na ana veya nuw i’itin i iyasisir naatu veya na titit isan i kawasa.” Jew sabuw Jesu isan hi’o, “O a kwamur i men 50 baimih naatu mi’itube Abraham i’itin.”
8.58 Jn 1.1Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu wan ama’abo Abraham tufuw.” Nati isan sabuw kabay hi’o’on Tafaror Bar wanawanan hitarabimih baise Jesu sabuw umah aren sorabon ufun tit.

Orot matan fim auman tufuw ma’am Jesu remor inan itin.
9.2 Ezk 18.20; Luk 13.2, 4Ana bai’ufununayah Jesu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan, yait ana kakafinamaim iwa’an iti orot matan fim auman tufuw? I taiyuwin ana kakafin o i hinah tamat hai kakafinamaim?”
9.3 Jn 11.4Jesu eo, “Orot matan fim i men anabowabow kakafinamaim iwa’an matan ifimemih o i hinah tamah hai kakafinamaim, baise i ana fimemaim God ana fair iti orot biyanamaim nirerereb hina’itin. Iti ana veya’amaim yait ayu iyunu anan i ana bowabow tanabow, gugumin i enan men karam yait ta nabow.
9.5 Mat 5.14; Jn 8.12Ayu boun iti tafaramamaim ama’am, ayu i tafaram ana marakaw.”
9.6 Mak 8.23Iti tur eo ufunamaim, Jesu kwei me yan re naatu iyuriyur bai bora’ah orot matan idadawir. Naatu iu, “Kwen harew Siloam kukuf (nati wab anayabin iyafar) imaim kururub.” Imih orot in rurub naatu matan nuw sawar itah auman matabir au bar in. Orot tain tuwan naatu sabuw afa marasika hi’i’itin ma fefefeyan, hibatiy, “Iti orot ta’imon mar etei ema efefefeyanaban i iti?” Sabuw afa hi’o, “Orot i nati.” Afa hi’o, “En nati i ana yumatabe.”
Baise orot taiyuwin eo, “Nati orot i ayu.”
Sabuw hibatiy, “Mi’itube o mat igewasin kunuwanuw?”
Orot iyafutih eo, “Orot wabin te’o Jesu i yur bai matou idadawir naatu na Siloam harew kukufamaim rurubamih iuwu. Imih ayu an arurub, naatu matou to iwa’an anuwanuw.”
Sabuw hibatiy, “Bo iti orot i menamaim ema’am?”

Orot iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men aso’ob.” Nati orot Jesu biyawas hibai hina Pharisee biyah hitit. Baiyarir ana veya’amaim Jesu nati orot matan fim yuramaim idawir matan igewasin nuw. Isan imih Pharisee ibanak maiye orot hibatiy mi’itube matan igewasin. Orot hai tur eowen eo, “I yuramaim matou idadawir uwu harewamaim arurub naatu boun i anuwanuw.”
Pharisee afa hi’o, “Iti orot i men Godane na, anayabin Baiyarir ana ofafar i men ekakaif.”
Baise afa hi’o, “Bowabow kakafin orot boro mi’itube iti ina’inan tasinaf?” Naatu nati’imaim kouseb matar.
9.17 Jn 4.19Imih Pharisee hitatabir orot ibanak hibatiy maiye, “Iti orot o mata iwa’an bigewasin isan o boro mi’itube inao?”
Orot iya’afutih eo, “I i dinab orot.”

Jew hai ukwarih men kafa’imo hititumatum iti orot matan fim ma’am naatu bounabo matan nuw, naatu orot hinah tamah isah hi’af hina, imaibo hibatiyih. “Iti orot i kwa natu? Kwa kwa’o’o i matan fim auman tutufuw kekeban iti? Naatu boun i mi’itube enuwanuw?”

Hinah tamah hiyafutih hi’o, “Aki aso’ob iti kek i aki natu, naatu matan fim auman tufuw. Baise aki men aso’ob, boun i mi’itube enuwanuw, o yait matan iwa’an igewasin, kwaibatiy i sanaman, karam taiyuwin isan boro nao.” Hinah tamah iti tur hi’o, i Jew sabuw isah hibir, anayabin iti tur i marasika Jew ukwa’ukwarih hi’o hibasit, yait Jesu isan naorereb Keriso nararauw boro kou’ay barene hinabotait ufun nama. Iti isan imih i hinah tamah hi’o, “Kwa taiyuw kwaibatiy kwa’itin, i sanaman.”
Mar bairu’abin orot matan fim nuwanuw isan hi’af na, naatu hibatiy maiye, “Turobe God nanamaim ai tur ina’owen! Aki aso’ob orot yait o biyawasi i bowabow kakafin wairafin.”
Orot iyafutih eo “Ayu men aso’ob i bowabow kakafin wairafin o en? Ayu sawar ta’imonamo asoso’ob i ayu matou fim ama’am naatu boun i anuw a’i’itah.”

Naatu orot hibatiy, “Abistanawat o isa sinaf? Mi’itube sinaf o mata botawiy?” Orot iyafutih eo, “Ayu marasika kwa isa aoka naatu kwa men kwanowar. Aisim kwakokok anao maiye kwananowar? Ta’itin kwa auman kwakokok i ana bai’ufununayah kwanamatar?”

Hi’obaibiyab naatu hi’o, “O i nati orot ana bai’ufununayan, baise aki i Moses ana bai’ufununayah. Aki aso’ob God mutufor Moses hairi hi’o, baise orot nati Jesu tibiwab, aki men kafa’imo aso’ob i menane na?”

Orot matan fim bigewasin iyafutih eo, “Abifofofor men kafaita! I menane nan kwa men kwaso’ob, baise i ayu matu fim iwa’an anuwanuw.
9.31 Psa 34.15It Taso’ob bowabow kakafih wairafih God hai tur men enonowar. God ana sabuw i ana kok tesisinaf naatu isan tekakakaf i hai tur enonowar. Men yait ta tafaram wanawanan orot matan fim auman tufuw ma’am matan botawiy nuwanuw ana tur nowaramih. Iti orot men Godane tanan na’at, i boro men karam iti bowabow tasinaf.”
9.34 Psa 51.5Iti isan hi’o, “O bowabow kakafin wanawanan itufuw ira’at iyey, i boun aki ini’obaiyi!” Naatu kou’ay barene hibotait tit ufun ma.
Jesu orot hinun tit ufun ma’am ana tur nowar, naatu titita’ur anamaramaim ibatiy, “O Orot Natun kubitumitum?”
Orot Jesu ibatiy, “Regah, iti orot i menatan ku’o anowar saise i anitumitum!”
Jesu orot isan eo, “Orot i iti kwi’i’itin, boun iti airi kwa’o’o.”
Naatu orot eo, “Regah, Ayu abitumatum.” Naatu Jesu nanamaim sun yowen kwafir.
Jesu eo, “Ayu ana iti tafaramaim atitit anayabin i sabuw ana kusibih, saise iyab mata fim boro hinanuw, naatu iyab tenuwanuw boro matah fimabe hinamatar.”
9.40 Mat 15.14Pharisee afa nati’imaim bairi hima’am iti tur eo’o hinowar, naatu hibatiy, “Nati tur ku’o’o, aki auman matai fim?”
Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa mata fim na’at, kwa boro men kakafimih. Baise boun kwa kwa’o’o aki matai anuwanuw, kwa a kakafih i tema’am.”

“Turobe a tur ao’owen, bobaituw hai fur ana etawanamaim orot men imaim narun, baise nakayam ef ta’ane narun, nati orot i bainowan mowan. Orot yait etawanamaim erur, i bobaituw kaifenayan. Orot fur kaifenayan boro etawan isan nabotawiy naatu bobaituw boro orot fanan hina’inan naatu ana bobaituw ta’ita’imon wabih naso’oben na’afih hinanowar naatu nabotaitih ufun hinatit. I ebotaitih ufun tetitit anamaramaim, i wan ebi’iyon, naatu ana bobaituw ti’ufunun bairi tenan anayabin i fanan hiso’ob. Baise fanan ta boro men hini’ufunun, anayabin i fanan men hi’inan imih boro hinabihir.” Jesu iti kawen turamaim eo, baise tur ana naniyan i men hibaimih abistan isan eo’o.

Imih Jesu tur ibanak eo maiye, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Ayu i etawan bobaituw isah.
10.8 Jer 23.1-2; Ezk 34.2-3Sabuw afa wan hinan i bainowah naatu bokwanekwaneyah, baise bobaituw men tainih isah hirub fanah hinowaramih. Ayu i etawan, yait ayu wanawana’umaim run enan boro yawas nab, boro hinarun hinatit fotan gewasin hinagatur. Bainowan tenan i bain, asbunin naatu gurusin akisin hinot tenan; Ayu anan i boro yawas gewasin hinab hinama boro men abistan ta isan hiniyababan.”

10.11 Psa 23.1; Rev 7.17“Ayu i bobaituw gewasu. Bobaituw Kaifenayan gewasin ana bobaituw isah ana yawas ebi’inuw.
10.12 Act 20.29Bobaituw kaifenayan orot ta men karam bobaituw nakaifen naatu i men nowan. Imih anamaramaim haru tuwetuwenih nan na’i’itin, i boro bobaituw nihamiyih nabihir. Naatu haru tuwenituwenih boro bobaituw bairi hiniyow naatu hina’abargiyih nanabin hinabihir. Orot boro nabihir anayabin i orot ta hibai na ma ekakaifen, imih bobaituw isah i men enotanot gagamin. Ayu i bobaituw kaifenayan gewasu. Au bobaituw asu’ubih naatu i ayu hisu’ubu.
10.15 Mat 11.27; 1Jn 3.16Tamai ayu susu’ubu na’atube, ayu Tamai asu’ub naatu au yawas bobaituw isah ai’inuw.
10.16 Isa 56.8; Ezk 34.23Bobaituw afa ayu nowau i men iti fur wanawanan tema’am. I auman anabuwih hinan hinarun. I auman ayu fanau hinanowar, nati’imaim i boro bobaituw ta’imon naatu kaifenayan ta’imon.
10.17 Php 2.8-9Tamai ebiyabuwu anayabin ayu au yawas ani’inuw, saise yawasu anama maiye. Men yait ta ayu au yawas nabosair, baise ayu taiyuwu au kokomaim au yawas anayara’iy. Ayu au fair ema’am anayara’iy naatu au fair ema’am anabora’ah maiye. Iti obaiyunen i Tamai biyanane abai.”
Iti tur hinonowar anamaramaim Jew sabuw tarsibih maiye. Sabuw moumurih maiyow hi’o, “I demon hitounbubur ema’am naatu ebikoko’aw. Aisim ana tur kwanonowar.”
Baise sabuw afa hi’o, “Tur iti na’atube men karam orot demon hinatounbubur ema’am nao’omih. Mi’itube demon orot matan fim nabotawiy?
book.s: Jew Men Hitumatum Imih Jesu Hikwahir
book.p: Nati rarabkokou wanawanan Tafaror Bar ana hiyuw wabin Koksouwen 10.22 I baise Hanukkah teo i Jerusalemamaim hibogaigiwas. Naatu Jesu Solomon ana efan awan ta Tafaror Bar wanawanan imaim bat reremor. Jew hai ukwarih hiru’ay hi’arbebera’uh hi’u, “Mar bai’ab boro inabotani anama anakaifi? O Keriso na’at, bebeyanamaim ku’o anowar.”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu kwa a tur aowen, baise kwa men kwaitumatum. Ina’inanen ayu Tamai wabinamaim asisinaf i ayu isou eo’orereb. Baise kwa men kwabitumatum anayabin kwa men ayu au bobaituw. Ayu au bobaituw asu’ubih imih fanau hinowar tebi’ufnunu.
10.28 Jn 3.16; 6.39Ayu yawas wanatowan abitih; naatu boro men ta nakasiy; men ta ayu umou’umaim nabosair. Tamai ayu bow bitu i ra’at etei natabirih, imih ayu Tamai umanamaim men yait ta nabosairen. Tamai naatu Ayu airi i ta’imon.
Ibanak maiye Jew sabuw kabay hibow hitarabimih, baise Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Ayu Tamai biyanane ina’inan gagamih moumurih maiyow ai’obaiyi. Anayabin iti isan ayu kabayamaim kwanarabu.”
10.33 Lev 24.16Jew hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki men nati isan kabayamaim anarabi, baise o God kubi’i’iyab, anayabin o i orot maiyow, naatu taiyuw God kurarouw.”

10.34 Psa 82.6Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa a Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum ema’am, ayu ao’o kwa etei i god? I etei god narouw na’a’afih na’at, tur God i menane na naatu Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum men hina’astu’ub. Ayu Tamai yasairu i nowanamih amatar naatu irubinu naatu iyafaru ana iti tafaramaim atitit i boro mi’itube? Mi’itube ayu God bai’i’iyabin kwarouw kwa’o’o, anayabin ayu God Natun arouw ao’omih? Ayu Tamai sisinafube men ana sisinaf bibaitutumu.
10.38 Jn 14.10-11Baise ayu ata sinaf kwa men kwatabitutumu na’at, karam nati ina’inanen kwata’itah kwataso’ob imaim kwatitumatum, ayu i Tamai wanawanan, naatu Tamai i ayu wanawanau.” Ibanak maiye bain rabinamih hiwa’an, baise i umahine soratait tit.
10.40 Jn 1.28Naatu Jesu ibanak matabir maiye Jordan rabon rounane, marasika John sabuw imaim bapataito bitih efan imaim tit naatu Jesu imaim ma. Naatu sabuw moumurin maiyow hina biyan hitit, naatu hi’o, “John ina’inan men ta sinaf a’itin, baise John iti orot isan eo’o i turobe.” Efan nati’imaim sabuw moumurin maiyow Jesu hitumitum.

11.1 Luk 10.38-39Orot wabin Lasarus i Bethany orot imaim ma’am sawow, nati i Mary tain Martha hairi hai bar hai merar.
11.2 Jn 12.3Iti Mary raiy yamurin mamarin Regah aribun yan isuwei rara’iy naatu aribunamaim an sasafam, i boun rubun orot Lazarus sawow. Imih i ruburubun tur hiyafar Jesu isan, “Regah orot o ibiyabuw i sawow.”

11.4 Jn 9.3Jesu iti tur nonowar anamaramaim eo, “Nati Lazarus ana sawow boro men nan morobomaim natitamih. En, iti i God ana fair bairerereb isan, saise i wanawananamaim God Natun hinifai hinabora’ara’ah.” Martha tuwah babitai hairi naatu rubun orot Lazarus, Jesu iyabuwih kwanekwan. Baise Lazarus sawow inu’in ana tur Jesu nonowar i men saise in, i nati’imaim ma veya rou’ab sawar.
Naatu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “It tanamatabir maiye tanan Judea.”
Baise bai’obaiyenayan, ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Iti boro’omo Jew sabuw kafa’imo kabayamaim hitarabi, naatu o baise imatabir maiye imaim kwenan.”

Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Veya ta’imon erararan ana manin men tarsisib in 12. Anayabin veya kusisiar tafaram marakaw itin, imih orot mar nuw enan boro men an narusukun nara’iy. Baise guguminamaim naremor nanan boro an narusukun nara’iy, anayabin i aurin marakaw en.”
Iti tur eo ufunamaim, ibanak ikofan hai tur eowen eo, “It ata of Lazarus i matanfot inu’in; baise ayu imaim anan anibunibun namisir.’

Ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hi’o, Regah, i matan nafot na’inu’in na’at, i boro matannanuw namisir.” Jesu Lazarus ana morob isan eo’o, baise ana bai’ufununayah hinotanot i boun matat efot ta’inu’in na’atube hirouw.
Naatu imaibo mutuforomo hai tur eowen, “Lazarus i morob. Naatu ayu men nati’imaim ama’am isan abiyasisir anayabin, kwa taiyuw kwana’itin kwanaso’ob naatu kwanitumatum. Boro’obo tan ta’itin.”
11.16 Mak 14.31Thomas wabin ta Kikifukek bai’ufnunenayah etei’imak isah eo, “It auman tan, bairit tamorob youn.”

Jesu natitit ana veya imaibo so’ob Lazarus i rahemaim hiyai in veya kwafe’en sawar. Jerusalem ef i men yok inan Bethany inatit, naatu Martha, Mary hairi rubuh bihamiyih isan. Jew sabuw moumurih na’in hina koubainunub baitihimih. Jesu nan Martha ana tur nonowar anamaramaim, hairi baitaramih tit in, baise Mary i bar ma.
Martha Jesu isan eo, “Regah, o iti’imaim itama’am na’at, ayu tuwai i boro men tamorob. Baise ayu aso’ob veya iti boun auman karam abistan isan inafefefeyan God boro nit.”
Jesu Martha isan eo, “O tuwat boro nayawas namisir maiye.”
11.24 Jn 6.40Martha iya’afut eo, “Ayu aso’ob nati i mar yomaninabo nayawas namisir.”

Jesu Martha isan eo, “Ayu i misir maiye naatu yawas. Yait ayu ebitutumu boro yawasin nama naatu namomorob auman yawasin nama. Naatu yait ta ayu’umaim ema’am naatu ebitutumu boro men kafa’imo namorob. Iti tur ao’o kwabitumatum?”
11.27 Jn 6.69Martha iya’afut eo, “Ai Regah anowar, Ayu abitumatum. O i Keriso, God Natun. O na tafaramamaim titamih hi’o’oban oban iti. ina itit.”

Tur iti eo’o ufunamaim, Martha intabir in Mary eaf na hamenamo ana tur eowen. “Bai’obaiyenayan i na tit, naatu o isa ebibatebat?” Mary iti tur nonowar anamaramaim, duku iwa’an misir naatu in biyan tit. Jesu men na bar merar tit, baise efan menamaim Martha hairi hima’am boro’ika imaim ma’am. Mary duku iwa’an mimisir Jew sabuw ana baremaim hima koubainunub hibitin hi’itin, naatu himisir hi’ufunun ufun hitit, hinotanot i enan rahemaim nama narerey.

Mary remor in Jesu menamaim ma’am biyan tit naatu eo, “Regah, O iti’imaim itama’am na’at ayu tuwai boro men tamorob.” Mary rererey, naatu Jew sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan auman hirererey Jesu i’itih anamaramaim, dogoron yababan awankaratan naatu naniyan kwaris. Ibatiyih “Menamaim kwayai inu’in?”
I hi’o “Regah Kuna kwi’itin.”
Jesu maturin ra’iy rerey.
Jew sabuw hi’o, “Kwa’itin i ana yabow Lazarus isan i ra’at kwanekwan!”
11.37 Jn 9.6-7Baise sabuw afa hi’o, “I orot matan fim botawiy. Karam iti orot auman tabotan men tamorobomih.”
Jesu ibanak dogoron wanawanan yababan kuyuyuw, na rahamaim tit. Rah i watu, awan i kabayamaim hihir.
Jesu eo, “Kabay kwabosair.”
Murubin rubun Martha eo, “Baise Regah, Lazarus nati’imaim hiyai in boun veya kwafe’en sawar, mas yamurin mataraka.”
Naatu Jesu eo, “Ayu au’uwi men kwanowar? Kwa kwanabitumatum na’at God ana fair boro nirerereb kwana’itin.”

Naatu rah awan kabay hibosair. Jesu nakwetan tara’ah au mar na’at nura’at eo, “Tamai, O a merar ayiy, ayu abistan ao’o inowar.” rolling stone from Lazarus’ graveCN01768B.TIFJhn 11.41©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Lazarus ana rah etwan botawiy11.41 Ayu aso’ob mar etei fanau kunonowar, baise iti ao’o i sabuw iti tebatabat isah, saise hina’itin hinitumatum, O ayu iyunu ana.”
Iti eo ufunamaim, Jesu fanan aumetawat na’in eaf, “Lazarus kumisir kutit!” Orot murubin, an uman, yumatan faifuw metametan auman misir tit na.
Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Rah ana faifuw kwabosairen naatu kwaihamiy au bar en.”

11.45 Jn 7.31Isan imih Jew sabuw moumurin maiyow hina Mary hibinanawan ana mar, Jesu abistan sinaf hi’i’itin, i hitumitum.
11.46 Luk 16.31Baise afa hin Pharisee hai tur hi’owen abistan Jesu sisinaf. Firis hai ukwarih naatu Pharisee bairi hi’af’ayuwih kou’ay hibai.

Taiyuwih hibatiyih, “Abistan tao tasisinaf men emamatar? Kwanaso’ob iti orot ina’inan moumurin maiyow esisinaf! It tanihamiy na’at nama nasisinaf sabuw etei boro hinitumitum. Naatu Roman sabuw boro hinan ata me ata tafaram hinab.” I hai orot ta wabin Kaiafas, nati kwamur i Firis ukwarin ma’am awan tara’ah eo, “Kwa men ta kwaso’ob! Kwa men matato iwa’an kwa’i’itin, anagewasin orot ta’imon tamorob sabuw isah, men karam tafaram tutufin etei hitarab hitagurus.” I men taiyuwin ana notamaim iti tur yai eomih, baise nati kwamur wanawanan i firis ukwarin ma’am Jesu Jew sabuw isah namomorob isan eorereb.
11.52 Jn 10.16Naatu men i akisih isah, baise God ana sabuw efan nanabin tema’am nabuwih hinan nita’imonih biyah ta’imon namatar.
11.53 Jn 5.18Naatu hibusuruf Jesu baban hi’o rabin morob isan. Imih Jesu Judea wanawanan i men bebeyanamaim ma remoramih, baise efan nati ihamiy naatu in efan arar sisibinamaim ma, bar merar wabin Efaram, imaim ana bai’ufununayah bairi hima. Jew hai Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw, i na biyubin ana veya, naatu tafaram wanawanan efan ta ta hima’am hiyen hin Jerusalem, kouksouwen ana kou’ay bainabo, Tatar nowaten ana veya nan natit. Jesu isan hinunuwet, naatu Tafaror Bar ana efanamaim hibat ta’ita’imon nane hibibabatiyih, “Kwa mi’itube kwanotanot? Forag isan kafai enan?” Baise firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee sabuw obaiyunen hitih, menamaim Jesu nama’am hina’i’itin na’at, hinan hinao hinanowar saise i hinan hinab hinafatum.
(Matthew 26.6-13; Mark 14.3-9)

12.1 Jn 11.1, 43Veya six nasasawar ufunamaim i Tar Nowaten ana veya, Jesu na Bethany tit, Lazarus morobone biyawas i ana bar merar.
12.2 Luk 10.40Nati’imaim rabirab ana bay hibogaigiwas Jesu bairi aa isan, Martha ibaisih bairi bay hisemor. Lazarus orot afa auman Jesu bairi himarir gem sisibinamaim hima’am.
12.3 Luk 7.37-38Raiy yamurin mamarin wabin nard i ai rourin hibun iroro’on hibai. Nati raiy iroro’on ana baiyan i gagamin na’in, Mary bai na isuwei ra’iy Jesu an rororon ihurufen, naatu aribunamaim safam. Naatu yamurin ana mamarin bar wanawanan etei itakwar.

Baise ana bai’ufununayan orot ta, Judas Iscariot boro ufibo baban nao, i eo, “Ana gewasin iti raiy yamurin mamarin ana baiyan 300 silver coins 12.5 kwamur ta’imon ana baiyan tatayai sabuw hitatubun naatu kabay tatab bai’akirayah tatibaisih.” Iti tur eo’o, asir sabuw hinanot i akir sabuw baibaisih isah not eo hinarouw, baise i bainowan orot ta, anayabin hai kabay koukufet kakaif, abistan ekokok i ebai ana kokomaim esisinaf.

Jesu iya’afut eo, “Babin kwaihamiy! Abistan biyanamaim ema’am i ayu anamorob hinayaya’u isan eyayabuna.
12.8 Deu 15.11Kwa boro mar etei akir sabuw wanawanahimaim kwanama, baise ayu boro men mar etei kwa bairit tanama’amih.”

Sabuw moumurin maiyow tur hinowar Jesu i na Bethany ma’am, imih sabuw Jesu itinamih hin, men i akisin itinamih hin baise Lazarus morobone Jesu biyawas auman itinamih hin. Imih firis gagamih ef hinuwet hiyakitifuw Lazarus auman hitarab tamorob isan.
12.11 Jn 11.45Anayabin Lazarus biyanamaim abistan matar hi’itin Jew sabuw moumurin maiyow himisir firis gagamih hikwahirih naatu Jesu isan higeger hitumitum.
book.s: Rou’ay Gagamin Jesu Ana Merar Hiyi Hibora’ara’ah Jerusalem Run
book.p:
Marto sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiru’ay Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw isan, tur hinowar Jesu i enan au Jerusalem.
12.13 Psa 118.25-26; Jn 1.49Sabuw ai rourih hikakir naatu hitit hin Jesu nan bairi baitaramih, hitarkoukuw hi’o, “God tanifai! Regah wabinamaim enan, God nigegewasin! Israel hai aiwob inigegewasin!” Hitit hin bairi hitar. Bobaituw boubun wabin donkey hitita’ur naatu afe’enamaim mara’at ma remor yen in. Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hi’o na’atube.
book.q: 12.15 Zec 9.9“O Zion Natun Babitai, Men inabir;
Kwa a aiwob enan, kwa’itin,
donkey boubun afe’en mare ema’am.”
book.p: 12.16 Jn 2.22Abistan nati ana veya himamatar ana bai’ufununayah men hiso’ob. Baise Jesu ana fair nabaib ufunamaim, imaibo hina’itin hinaso’ob. Buk Atamaninamaim i isan hi’o hikirum, naatu hisinafen himatar.

Sabuw iyab Jesu bairi hin rahemaim hitit Lazarus morobone yawas misir hi’i’itin hi’o tur ra’at tasasar. Sabuw moumurin maiyow hitit hin Jesu biyan hitit, anayabin tur hinowar i ina’inan iti na’atube men tisinaf emamatar i sinaf matar. Imih Pharisee taiyuwih himare hi’o, “It abistan tayayakitifuw men kafa’imo emamatar. Sabuw etei i’etaw tebi’ufunun kwa’i’itin!”
book.s: Greek Sabuw Afa Hikok Jesu Hita’itin
book.p: Greek sabuw afa wanawanahimaim bairi hiyen hin Jerusalem hiyuw ana veya imaim kwafirin isan. Hina Philip biyan hitit, i Betsaida orot Galilee wanawanan, isan hifefeyan hi’o, “Aro, aki akokok Jesu ana’itin.” Philip in Andrew ana tur eowen, naatu Andrew Philip hairi hin Jesu ana tur hi’owen.

12.23 Jn 13.31-32; 17.1Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot Natun baifa’in naatu bora’ara’ahin isan ana veya na kabom.
12.24 1Cor 15.36Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, sanabey tutufin ta’imon hinama’ub me yan hinataun na’inu’in, naatu nabikubobun boro moumurih na’in hinayen naatu ani’anin boro moumurih na’in naya.
12.25 Mat 16.25Orot yait taiyuwin ana yawas ebiyabuw i boro yawas narusa’ir, naatu yait iti tafaramamaim taiyuwin ana yawas ekwakwahir boro nabotan yawas wanatowan isan.” Yait ayu isou nabowabow, i ayu ni’ufnunu, naatu ayu menamaim ama’am au akir orot boro airi imaim anama. Yait ayu isou ebowabow Tamai boro nifai nabora’ara’ah.
12.27 Psa 6.3; 42.5; Mat 26.38“Ayu dogorou i yababan awan karatan, Tamai ayu boro mi’itube anao? Iti bai’akir ana veya iniyawasu? ‘Aiyabin, Tamai iti bai’akir ana veya nan anabaib isan ana atit. Tamai o wab anabora’ah.” Naatu marane fanan tit eo, “Ayu wab abora’ahika naatu boro anabora’ah maiye.’” Sabuw rou’ay nati’imaim hibatabat hinowar, afa hi’o, gunum rab naatu afa hi’o, “Tounamatar isan eo.” Jesu eo, “Iti fanan i kwa isa eo, men ayu isou. Veya boun iti tafaram baibabatiyin isan naatu iti tafaram ana aiwob boun boro hinabosair.
12.32 Jn 3.14Baise Ayu iti tafaramamaim hinabobora’ahu anamaramaim, sabuw etei boro anabonawiyih hinan ayu akisu biyou hinatit.”
12.33 Jn 19.6Iti tur eo, i mi’itube ti’obaiyih i ana morob ana itinin boro mi’itube namorob.
12.34 Psa 110.4; Isa 9.7Sabuw hi’o, “Aki ofafaramaim anonowar Keriso boro nama wanatowan, naatu o mi’itube ku’o’o, Orot Natun boro hinabora’ah. Iti Orot Natunam yait?”
12.35 Jn 8.12Naatu Jesu uwih eo, “Kwa mar kafai boro marakaw kwanab, marakaw kwabaibimaim kwanaremor, imaibo gugumin nan natarsumi. Orot yait guguminamaim ereremor i men so’ob menamaim enan.
12.36 Eph 5.8Marakaw nati kwabai kwama’am a baitumatum i kwanitin. Saise kwa boro kwanan marakaw natunatun kwanamatar.” Iti eo’o ufunamaim, Jesu sabuw ihamiyih naatu i taiyuwin ibunwa’ir.

Mensanet Jesu wanawanahimaim sawar faifirih imamataren, baise i boro’ika men tibitumitum.
12.38 Isa 53.1Iti i mi’itube dinab orot Isaiah ana tur eo’o i titurobe isan. “Regah, yait aki tur a’o ebitumitum? Yait biyanamaim Regah ana fair ebirerereb?” Anayabin iti isan, men karam hititumatum, imih Isaiah eo maiye;
book.q: 12.40 Isa 6.10“God iwa’an matah hifim
naatu dogoroh rufoten, saise men hina’itin,
naatu hai not nakwaris anayabin boro men hinaso’ob.
naatu Regah eo, ayu isou boro men hinatatabir. Naatu tena ayu aniyawasih.”
book.p: 12.41 Isa 6.1Isaiah iti eo’o, anayabin Jesu ana marakaw itin naatu isan eo i nowar.

12.42 Jn 9.22Naatu nati veya ta’imon wanawanan Jew ukwa’ukwarih wanawanahimaim Jesu hitumitum. Baise anayabin Pharisee isah hibir, men karam hai baitumatum hitao rereb, i boro kou’ay barene hitabotaitih.
12.43 Jn 5.44Anayabin i orot babin isah tibiyabow men boun God isan tebiyabow na’atube. Basit Jesu fanan aumetawat eo, “Orot ayu ebitutumu, i men ayu akisu ebitutumu, baise yait ayu iyafaru anan auman ebitumitum.
12.45 Jn 14.9Yait ayu i’itu anamaramaim, ayu iyafaru anan auman i’itin. Ayu i marakaw na’atube ana tafaramamaim atit, saise yait ayu ebitutumu i boro men guguminamaim nama.
12.47 Jn 3.17Orot yait ayu au tur enonowar baise men ebaib, ayu boro men anibatiy. Ayu men tafaram fufuninamih ana atit, baise baiyawasinamih ana. Yait ayu ebifutuwu naatu au tur men ebaib i ana baibatiyenayan ema’am. Tur iti ayu a’o i boro mar yomaninamaim nibabatiyi. Anayabin ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim ao’omih, baise Tamai ayu iyafaru anan tarbaiyunu tur abistanawat anao naatu boro mi’itube ana’o. Naatu ayu aso’ob i ana tarbaiyunen tur boro nabonawiy inan ma’ama wanatowan. Imih ayu abistan ao’o i mutufor, Tamai uwu imih ao’o.”

Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw nanamaim. Jesu so’ob i isan veya na kabom iti tafaram nihamiy naatu nan Tamah isan. Sabuw i nowan iti tafaramamaim tema’am isah i yabow men kafaita, naatu bounabo ana yabow yomanin ni’obaiyih nan na’asa’ub.

13.2 Luk 22.3; Jn 13.27Rabirab ana bay hibusuruf hi’aa’u, naatu demon ana not kakafin Judas Iscariot, Simon natun marasika ana notamaim yaru’uy Jesu baban eo rabin isan.
13.3 Jn 3.35; 16.28Jesu so’ob Tamah sawar etei i ana fair babanamaim ya, naatu i Godane na naatu God boun isan emamatabir maiye. Imih bay hi’aa wanawanan misir, ana faifuw tafan iyoun ma’am bosair, naatu biya rarouw bai naiwan fifin. I ufunamaim harew bai tew yan isuwei naatu busuruf ana bai’ufununayah ah souwen, naatu biya rarouw naiwanamaim fifin ma’am bai ah safamen.
Jesu na Simon Peter biyan titit ana veya, Simon Jesu isan eo, “Regah ayu au inasouwimih?”
Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu abisa boun asisinaf o boro men inaso’ob, baise boro ufibo inaso’ob.”
Peter eo, “Aiyabin, ayu men abibasit au inasouwen.”
Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu a men ana sasouw na’at, o i men ayu au bai’ufununayan.”
Naatu Simon Peter iyafut eo, “Regah, Men au akisih, baise umou naatu ukwaru auman kwikifuwu.”

13.10 Jn 6.64, 70-71; 15.3Jesu iyafut eo, “Orot yait biyan tutufin ekifukif? I an akisinamo tanasouw, i biyan tutufin etei i gewasin. Naatu kwa etei i gewas, baise men etei gewasamih.” Jesu so’ob yait boro nayanuw, naatu anayabin iti isan i eo kwa etei i men gewas.

Ah souwen sasawar ufunamaim, ana faifuw bosair yai inu’in bai iyoun naatu matabir maiye ana efan mara’iy. Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa isa ayu abistan asisinafuban kwaso’ob?” Kwa ayu isou “Bai’obaiyenayan naatu Regah kwarouw kwa’o’o, nati i gewasin maiyow. Anayabin i nati, Ayu i nati na’atube ama’am.
13.14 Mat 20.28; Luk 22.27Boun ayu kwa a Regah, a bai’obaiyenayan a souwen, kwa auman turanah ah kwanasouwen.
13.15 Php 2.5; Col 3.13; 1Pet 2.21Ayu bai’obaiyen kwa isa asinaf, kwa isa iti boun asisinaf i na’atube kwanasinaf.
13.16 Mat 10.24Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, akir orot i men ebi’ukwarin ana orot ukwarin isan, o tur abarayan i men orot baiyuninenayan na’atube. Bounabo kwa sawar etei kwaso’ob, kwa iti kwanasisinaf na’at, kwa boro baigegewasin kwanab.
13.18 Psa 41.9“Ayu men kwa etei isa ao’omih; ayu iyab arurubiniyih i aso’ob. Baise iti i mi’itube Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum i tan titurobe. ‘Yait ayu airi rafiy afafaram, i koun ayu itu.’

13.19 Jn 14.29; 16.4“Ayu bounaika a tur a’o’owenabo namatar, saise anamaramaim abistan namamatar kwa boro kwanitumatum Ayu i Yait?
13.20 Mat 10.40Turobe a tur ao’owen, yait ayu aiyun en ebaib, nati i Ayu ebubuwu; naatu yait Ayu ebubuwu, nati i yait Ayu iyunu anan i ebaib.”
Jesu iti tur eo’o ufunamaim, dogoron yababan awan karatan naatu eorereb, Turobe kwa a tur ao’owen, kwa wanawanamaim orot ta ayu boro babu nao.
Ana bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hima hinubunibun, hai kasiy ra’at yait isan eo’o. Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayan orot ta i biyabuw, sisibinamaim ma’am. Simon Peter isan itarasib eo, “Kwaibatiy, ait isan eo’o.”
Naatu Bai’ufununayan na fufufur Jesu sisibinika tit naatu ibatiy, “Regah yaita?”

Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu rafiy anab tew yan anabutu’ub anabitin i orotoban nati.” Anamaramaim rafiy butu’ub, Judas Iscariot, Simon natun itin.
13.27 Jn 13.2Judas rafiy baib ana mar Satan marta’imon dogoron wanawanan run.

Jesu iu eo, “Abistan o kunotanot sinafumih, saise’ewat kusinaf.” Baise bay hi’aa wanawanan Jesu tur abistan i isan eo’o men yait ta naniyan bai. Nati ana veya Judas i kabay kakaif, imih Jesu iti tur eo’o i hinot na bay tobon bow na hiyuw isan, o sabuw aurih sawar meyemeye bow na baitih hirouw. Nati gugumin wanawanan. Judas faraw bai eani’aan ana veya, i misir ufun tit.
13.31 Jn 12.23Judas ufun titit anamaramaim, Jesu eo, “Sabuw bounabo Orot Natun ana aiwob nab nibirerereb hina’itin. Naatu Jesu wanawananamaim God ana fair natit sabuw hina’itin.
13.32 Jn 17.5Naatu God ana fair i wanawananamaim nabirerereb na’at, naatu God taiyuwin Orot Natun biyanamaim boro ana fair saise’ewat niwa’an nirerereb. God Natun akisinamo wanawananamaim boro nifai nabora’ara’ah naatu boro mar ta’imonamo.

13.33 Jn 7.33-34“Natunatu, Ayu boro men manin bairit tanama. Mi’itube Jew sabuw hai tur ao’owen na’atube kwa boun a tur ao’owen. Kwa boro ayu kwananuwuhu. Ayu efan menamaim anan, kwa men karam kwanan.”

13.34 Jn 15.12, 17; 1Jn 3.23; 2Jn 5“Obaiyunen tur boubun kwa abit. Turanah kwaniyabuwih. Ayu kwa abiyabuw na’atube, turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen. Kwa turanah bairi kwanabiyabowbonen na’at, sabuw etei boro hinaso’ob kwa i ayu au bai’ufununayah.”
Simon Peter Jesu ibatiy, “Regah, o menika kwenan?”
Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu menamaim anan, o men karam boun boro ayu ini’ufnunu, baise o boro ufibo ini’ufnunu.”
Peter ibat “Regah, aisimamih boun men ani’ufnuni? Ayu au yawas boro o isa anaya’ra’iy.”
Naatu Jesu iya’afut eo, “O anababatun ibogaigiwas ayu isou a yawas inayara’iy? Turobe a tur ao’owen, kokorere o’e nanamaim, o boro mar tounu inao inayoubu, ayu orot nati men aso’ob.”
book.s: Jesu I Ef Ine Hinan Tamah Biyan
book.p:
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isa eo, “Men kwaniyababan, God kwanitumatum naatu ayu auman kwanitutumu. Ayu Tamai ana baremaim bar awah moumurih na’in ti’inu’in naatu ayu anan kwa isa a bar awah anayabuna naatu bar awah men hitama’am na’at, aisim boro a tur ata’owen.
14.3 Jn 12.26Ayu anan kwa a efan anayayabuna ufunamaim boro taiyuwu anamatabir anan ananawiyi bairi tanan ayu menamaim ama’am kwa boro imaim kwanama. Ayu efan menamaim anan kwa i kwaso’ob.”
book.s: Jesu I Ef Turobe Naatu Yawas
book.p:
Thomas Jesu isan eo, “Regah, aki men aso’ob o menamaim kwenan, ef boro mi’itube anaso’ob?”
14.6 Jn 11.25; Rom 5.1-2Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu i ef, turobe, naatu yawas. Men yait ta nan Tamai biyan baise ayu’une nan Tamai biyan natit.

14.7 Jn 8.19Kwa anababatun ayu kwanasusu’ubu gewas na’at, Tamai boro auman kwanasu’ub. Bounabo kwasoso’ob naatu kwa’i’itin.” Philip eo, “Regah Tamat kwi’obaiyi a’itin saise aki boro nuhinafot.”
14.9 Jn 12.45; Col 1.15; Hib 1.3Jesu iya’afut eo, “Philip manin maiyow airit tama baise men isu’ubu? Yait ta ayu i’itu Tamai i’itin? Aisimamih ayu isou i’o, ‘Tamat kwi’obaiyi a’itin?’
14.10 Jn 12.49Ayu i Tamai wanawananamaim ama’am naatu Tamai ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am. Philip o men kubitumatum? Iti tur i kwa isa ao’o, i men ayu au kokomaim ao’omih baise Tamai ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am bowabow i esisinaf.
14.11 Jn 10.38Kwanitumatum ana maramaim iti tur anao’o, ayu i Tamai wanawanan ama’am naatu Tamai i ayu wanawanau ema’am, o men kwanabitumatum na’at ina’inan asisinaf imaim boro ni’obaiyi kwana’itin.
14.12 Mak 16.19-20Ayu anababatun a tur ao’owen yait ayu ebitutumu ayu abistan asisinaf boro nasinaf hinamatar, naatu sawar boro au gagamihika nasinaf. Anayabin ayu Tamai isan anan.
14.13 Mat 7.7; Jn 15.16Naatu abistanawat ayu wabu’umaim kwafefefeyan boro ana sinaf saise Natun Tamah wabin nabora’ara’ah. Kwa sawar abistanawat ayu wabu’umaim kwanafefeyan boro anasinaf namatar.
book.s: Jesu Eomatan Anun Kakafiyin Boro Niyun Nan
book.p:
14.15 Jn 15.10; 1Jn 5.3“Ayu kwanabiyabuwu na’at, au obaiyunen tur boro kwanabosiyasiyar.
14.16 Jn 14.26; 15.26; 16.7Naatu ayu boro Tamai anifefeyan i boro kwa a Baibaisayan ta wabin Turobe Ana Anun Kakafiyin nit bairi kwanama wanatowan.
14.17 Jn 16.13Iti tafaram men nab, anayabin i boro men na’itin o boro men nasu’ub. Baise kwa i kwasu’ub, anayabin kwa bairi kwama’am naatu boro wanawanamaim nama. Ayu boro men anihamiyi kwanigaganamih, Ayu boro kwa isa anamatabir maiye anan. Mar kafai iti tafaram boro men na’itu, baise kwa boro kwana’itu. Anayabin ayu ama’am isan kwa auman kwama’am.
14.20 Jn 17.21-23Nati anamaramaim kwa boro kwanaso’ob ayu i Tamai wanawanan ama’am naatu kwa i ayu wanawanau kwama’am naatu ayu i kwa wanawan ama’am. “Yait obaiyunen tur bai, ebobosiyasiyar, i ayu ebiyabuwu. Yait ayu ebiyabuwu i Tamai ebiyabuw naatu ayu auman boro aniyabuw naatu ayu taiyuwu anirerereb i isan.” Judas (men Judas Iscariot) Jesu isan eo, “Regah aisimamih tafaram ana sabuw men isah inirerereb baise aki akisi isai inirerereb?” Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Yait ta ayu isou ebiyabow boro au bai’obaiyen nabosiyasiyar? Ayu Tamai boro isan niyabow, naatu ayu Tamai airi biyanamaim ai bar anawowab bairi anama.
14.24 Jn 7.16Yait ayu isou men ebiyabow au bai’obaiyen boro men nabosiyasiyar naatu iti tur ao kwanonowar i men ayu au turamih baise iti tur ayu Tamai iyafaru anan i biyanane enan.

“Boun bairit tama’amamaim sawar etei’imak ao kwanowaraka. Baise Baibaisayan, Anun Kakafiyin, boro Tamai niyun ayu wabu’umaim nan, i boro sawar etei ni’obaibiyi naatu sawar etei’imak au’uwi boro a not nakusisib. “Tufuw kwa biyamaim abihamiy, ayu tufuw kwa abit. Iti tufuw i men tafaram kwa bit na’atube abitimih. Yare kouh kwanayey a not men narukasiy naatu men kwanabir.

14.28 Jn 20.17Iti tur i ao kwanowaraka. ‘Ayu i anan kwa isa boro anamatabir anan.’ Ayu kwanabiyabuwu na’at, kwaniyasisir ayu i Tamai isan anan anayabin Tamai i ra’at ayu natabiru.
14.29 Jn 13.19Bounaika a tur ao’owenabo sawar hinamatar, imih abistan hinamamatar kwa i kwanitumatum. Ayu boro men tur manin bairit tanao, anayabin tafaram ana kaifenayan kakafin i enan. I aurin fair men ema’am ayu nisnowahu. Baise sabuw iti tafaramamaim i hinaso’ob ayu Tamai abiyabow isan imih Tamai abistan eo etatarbaiyunu imaim asisinaf.
“Efan iti kwihamiy, kwanatan.”
book.s: Jesu I Ai Anababatun Naatu Famefamen.
book.p:
“Ayu i ai an anababatun, naatu Tamai i masaw Matuwan.
15.2 Mat 3.10Ayu famufamu ro’oro’on men ebiw gewas boro na’afuw nisaroun, naatu ro’oro’on ebiw gewas boro famufamu natobubunei saise ro’o’ro’on moumurihika niw naya. Kwa i marasika kwaigewasin sawar, anayabin ayu turamaim ao kwanowar sawar. Wanawana’umaim kwanitubonen kwanama, naatu ayu kwa wanawanamaim anitubonen anama. Famen akisin men karam taiyuwin niw ro’on nayai, baise i boro ai naiwan nituw. Ef ta’imon kwa ayu wanawanau kwanitubonen boro ro’oro’o moumurihika kwanaya.

“Ayu i ai, naatu kwa i ai famefamen, o yait ayu wanawana’umaim inabituwabon naatu ayu o wanawananamaim anabituwabon, i boro ro’oro’o moumurihika naya; anayabin, o akis men karam boro inasinaf namatar.
15.6 Mat 7.19; 13.42O yait ta ayu airit men tanibitubonen na’at, i boun ai famefamen hituw batabat kekerer na’atube, nati boro hina’o’on wairaf wan hinaroura’aten hinikubaren hina’arat. O yait ayu wanawana’umaim inabitubonen naatu ayu au tur o wanawanamaim nabitubonen na’at, o a kok abistan isan kufefefeyan o boro anit.
15.8 Mat 5.16Kwa ro’oro’o moumurihika kwanaya’ay kwa boro taiyuw kwana’inani, kwa i ayu au bai’ufununayah naatu Tamai ana gewasin boro sabuw kwani’obaiyih.

Tamai ebiyabuwu na’atube; kwa abiyabuwi. Au yabowamaim kwanitubonen kwanama.
15.10 Jn 14.15; 1Jn 2.5Kwa ayu ou’obaiyunen tur kwanabobosiyasiyar na’at, boro ayu au yabowamaim kwanitubonen kwanama, boun ayu Tamai ana’obaiyunen tur abosiyasiyar naatu i ana yabowamaim aitubonen ama’am na’atube. “Ayu a tur aowen kwanowar sawar saise au yasisir kwa wanawanamaim nama, naatu kwa mar etei yasisiramaim kwanama.
15.12 Jn 13.34Ayu au obaiyunen tur i iti. Turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen, ayu kwa abiyabuwi na’atube.
15.13 Jn 10.11; 1Jn 3.16Yait ta ana ofonah isah namomorob na’at, nati ebi’obaiy i ana yabow ra’at kwanekwan.
15.14 Mat 12.50Ayu obaiyunen tur abistan sinaf isan ou’uwi, i kwanasisinaf na’at, kwa i ayu au ofonah. Ayu boro men kafa’imo kwa isa akir anarouw ana’af, anayabin akir orot i men so’ob ana orot ukwarin abistan esisinaf. Nati efanin ayu kwa isa au ofonah arouw ao’o, anayabin ayu Tamai biyanane tur abistanawat anonowar etei’imak a tur aowen kwanowar sawar. Kwa men ayu kwarubinu, ayu kwa arubini naatu atarbaiyuni kwanatit kwanan kwaniw ro’oro moumurihika kwanaya–nati ro’o’ro’on boro men hinamun. Naatu abistan isan ayu wabu’umaim kwafefefeyan Tamai boro nit.
15.17 Jn 13.34Iti i ayu ou’obaiyunen tur. Turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen.

“Kwa sabuw hinabifutuwi na’at, kwa kwanaso’ob nati ayu wan ifutuwu’ubo kwa uf ifutuw.
15.19 Jn 17.14Kwa tafaram nowan kwanama’am na’at, tafaram boro niyabuwi nowan na’atube kwanamatar kwanama, kwa i men iti tafaram nowan, baise kwa tafaramane arubini abotaiti kwatit. Nati isan tafaram kwa ebifutuwi.
15.20 Jn 13.16Iti tur kwa isa ao’o i a notamaim nama. ‘Orot ana bowayan i men ra’at ana orot ukwarin natabirimih.’ Kwa hinarabi hinabi’a’afiyi na’at, ayu auman hirabu tibi’afiyu. Ayu au bai’obaiyen hinabobosiyasiyar na’at, kwa auman boro hinabosiyasiyari. Ayu wabu isan, kwa isa boro iti na’atube hinamatar. anayabin i men hiso’ob yait ayu iyunu ana. Ayu men atan biyah atatit naatu tur gewasin men atao hitanonowar na’at, kakafin isan boro men ubar hitabaimih; baise boun boro men hai kakafin isan hinifufuwenamih.
15.23 Luk 10.16Yait ayu ebifutuwu Tamai auman i ebifutuw. Ayu wanawanahimaim asisinaf men yait ta sisinaf na’atube asinafumih, imih i boro men kakafin hitasinaf. Baise boun ina’inan hi’itah, naatu ayu Tamai airi’ika hikwahiri.
15.25 Psa 35.19; 69.4Baise iti mamatar, i abistanawat hai ofafaramaim hi’o hikikirum i na iturobe, Anayabin en ayu hifutuwu.

15.26 Jn 14.26“Ayu boro Baibaisayan aniyafar nan, nati i turobe ana Anun Kakafiyin, i boro Tamai biyanane niyafar nan kwa biya natit, naatu ayu isou boro nao rerereb. naatu kwa auman boro ayu isou kwana’orerereb, anayabin no aneika kwa ayu bairit tama.

“Sawar etei’imak i ao kwanowar sawar, saise kwa boro men ef kwanarukasiy.
16.2 Mat 24.9; Luk 6.22; Jn 9.22Jew hai Kou’ay Bar wanawanan boro hinanuni ufun kwanatit, veya nanan anamaramaim o yait ta na’a’asbuni, i boro asir nanot God ana sibor eya’iy narouw.
16.3 Jn 15.21Sabuw boro kakafin isa hinasinaf, anayabin Tamat men hisu’ub naatu ayu auman men hisu’ubu. Ayu kwa a tur ao’owen, saise ana veya nanan kwa boro kwananot ayu i ai’matnuwi sawar, anayabin ayu kwa bairit tama’am isan, men saise a tur aowenamih.

16.12 1Cor 3.1-2“Ayu auru tur moumurin maiyow boro atao kwatanowar, baise boun kwa isa ana’o boro men naniyan kwanab. Baise anamaramaim turobe ana Anun Kakafiyin nanan, i Boro turobe ana ef etei nabonawiyi. I boro men taiyuwin ana notamaim na’omih, abistanawat enonowar i akisinamo nao, naatu sawar uf hinamamatar isan boro a tur na’owen. Ayu boro nabora’ara’ahu, anayabin ayu au tur biyau’une bai na kwa a tur eo’owen isan. Sawar etei ayu Tamai biyan tema’am i ayu nowau naatu abistan ayu biyau ema’am boro Anun Kakafiyin nab nan niwa’an kwa isa nirerereb, anayabin iti isan kwa a tur ao’owen.
16.16 Jn 14.19“Mar kikimin kwa boro men ayu kwana’itu naatu mar kafai kikimin kwa boro ayu kwana’itu.

Ana bai’ufununayah afa taiyuwih hima hibabatiyih? “Anayabin abistan isan i tur iti na’atube eo, ‘Mar kikimin kwa boro men kwana’itu, naatu mar kafai ufunamaim ayu boro kwana’itu’ naatu ‘Anayabin ayu anan Tamai biyan?’ Naatu i hima hi’o hibabatiyih, Iti anayabin nam abisa isan eo’o, ‘Iti mar kikimin?’ Aki men aso’ob i abistan eo’o.”

Jesu itih so’ob iti isan boro hinibatiy, imih i isah eo, “Ayu iti tur ao isan kwa tayuwiwat kwama kwabibabatiyi anayabin isan, anamaramaim ayu iti na’at ao, ‘Mar kikimin ayu boro men kwana’itu, naatu mar kafai ufunamaim ayu boro kwana’itu.’ Ayu anababatun a tur ao’owen, Kwa boro kwanarererey naatu kwanigagamat baise tafaram naben nakawasa. Kwa boro kwaniyababan, baise kwa a yababan boro nabotabir yasisir namatar. Babin anatoub ana veya nakabom ebiyababan na’atube anayabin biyababan ana veya i na kabom; baise anamaramaim kek tufuw, i ana biyababan inatbuhuruw anayabin kek tafaramamaim tufuw i ebiyasisir. Imih kwa auman. Boun i kwa a veya kwaniyababan, baise ayu boro kwa ana’iti maiye naatu kwaniyasisir naatu men karam yait ta kwa a yasisir biyane nabosair.
16.23 Mat 7.7Nati anamaramaim o men yait ta ayu isou sawaramih inafefeyan. Tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, sawar abistan isan ayu wabu’umaim inabifefeyan, ayu Tamai boro nit. Marasika na iti boun kwa men yait ta iti na’atube ayu wabu’umaim fefeyanamih. Boun kwanafefeyan, naatu kwa boro kwanab, naatu kwa boro mar etei yasisiramaim kwanama.

“Ayu mar etei kawen turamaim ao kwanowar sawar, mar i enan ayu boro men kafa’imo kawen turamaim anao, baise ayu Tamai isan i boro mutufor bebeyanamaim anao kwananowar, Nati ana veya’amaim kwa boro ayu wabu’umaim kwanafefeyan. Ayu ao i men kwa au kou anabat Tamai anifefeyanimih.
16.27 Jn 14.21, 23Aiyabin, Tamai i taiyuwin kwa isa ebiyabow, anayabin kwa ayu isou kwabiyabow naatu kwabitumatum ayu i God iyafaru ana. Ayu Tamai iyafaru ana, tafaram wanawanan arun abow aremor, boun ayu tafaram abihamiy naatu anan Tamai biyan.

Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Bounabo tur bebeyanamaim ku’o’o naatu men kawenamaim ku’o’omih. Bounabo aki mataito’iwa’an a’i’itin o sawar etei i so’ob, naatu o men yait ta kukokok boro o isa baibat nabow natit. Aki iti’imaim i’obaiyi abitumatum o i Godane ina.” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa bounabo kwabitumatum?”
16.32 Mat 26.31, 56“Baise veya i enan, naatu na titaka, anamaramaim kwa boro na’abargiyi taiyuw a bar a merar na’at kwanabihir. Ayu boro kwanihamiyu nakutatabu ana bat. Baise ayu men akisu anayabin Tamai ayu airi ama’am.
16.33 Jn 14.27; Rom 5.1; 1Jn 5.4“Ayu sawar etei ao kwanowaraka, saise ayu wanawana’umaim kwanama’am kwa karam boro tufuwamaim kwanama. Iti tafaramamaim kwa boro yare wanawanan kwanarun kwani’akir. Baise kwanafair kwanabat! Ayu Tafaram aigegesair.”
Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo sasawar ufunamaim, au mar nuwra’at naatu yoyoban eo,

“Tamai, veya i na tit sawar. Natu wabin kwifai kubora’ara’ah na’atube o Natun Tamah ifai ebora’ara’ah. Anayabin sabuw etei kaifih isan fair itin, saise sabuw iyab o ibitin etei boro yawas wanatowanin nitih.
17.3 1Jn 5.20Iti yawas wanatowan anayabin o su’ubi isan, o akisimo i turobe ana God, naatu Jesu Keriso ibiyafar i auman su’ubin isan.
17.4 Jn 4.34Iti tafaramamaim a fair ibitu sabuw ai’obaiyih hi’itin, naatu bowabow sinafumih ibitu etei abow aisawar.
17.5 Jn 1.1Tamai nati fair mar tafaram matara’e ana veya ayu itu airit tama’am boun i ayu kwitu maiye.”

“Iyabowat tafaramamaim hima hibowabow ibow ayu ibitu ai obaiyih o hisu’ubi sawar. Nati sabuw i o nowa ibow ayu itu, naatu o a tur hibosiyasiyar hibow. Naatu bounabo sabuw hiso’ob, sawar ibow ayu ibitu etei o biyane hina. Tur ayu ibitu etei au bai’ufnunayah ao hinowar sawar naatu hibai hibukikin, hiso’ob i men baifuwenamih. Naatu hiso’ob hitumatum ayu o biyane iyafaru ana. Ayu ibitu isah ayoyoyoban, men tafaram wanawanan sabuw tema’am isah ayoyoyobanamih baise iyabowat ayu ibitu i isah ayoyoyoban, anayabin nati sabuw i o nowa. Naatu abistanawat ayu biyau tema’am etei i o nowa naatu abistanawat o biya tema’am i ayu nowau, naatu ayu au fair bonamanamarin i bai’ufununayah biyahimaim irerereb sabuw hi’itin. Naatu boun i ayu o isa anan, ayu boro men tafaramamaim anama maiye’emih, baise i boro tafaramamaim hinama. Tamai o i Kakafiyin o wab ana fairamaim inatarfafarih nati wab o ibitu’umaim saise hinan ta’imon hinamatar, boun o ayu airit ta’imon tama’am na’atube.
17.12 Jn 6.39; 13.18Ayu i bairi ama’am anamaramaim, o wab ayu ibitu imaim atafafarih akaifih gewas bairi ama. Men ta kasiyomih, baise orot ta’imonamo i bai’akir kakafin bai, saise abisa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum na iturobe.

Naatu ayu boun i o isa anan, iti tafaram wanawanan ama’am anamaramaim iti sawar etei isah aobo, saise ayu au yasisir tutufin i wanawanahimaim nakarsuwei. Ayu a tur aitih, naatu tafaram kwahirih, anayabin i men tafaram nowanamih, boun ayu na’atube men iti tafaram nowanamih.
17.15 Mat 6.13; 2Th 3.3Ayu au yoyoban i men au bai’ufununayah bosairih isan, baise ayu abifefeyani o wagabur kakafihine inatarfafarih. Ayu i men iti tafaram nowan, imih i auman men iti tafaram nowanamih. O a turobe’emaim kweiwa’an uhew tematar, O a tur i turobe anababatun.
17.18 Jn 20.21Ayu tafaram wanawanan aiyafarih hin boun ayu tafaram wanawanan i yafaru anan na’atube. I isah ayu taiyuwu aiwa’an uhew amatar, saise ibo auman o isa anababatun uhew hitamatar.

“Ayu men i akisih isah ayoyoyobanamih, baise iyab i hai turamaim ayu isou tebitutumu i isah auman ayoyoyoban, saise i etei hinan ta’imon hinamatar. Tamai boun ayu wanawana’umaim kuma’am na’atube ayu o wanawanamaim anama. Karam i auman hitan wanawanatamaim hitama, saise tafaram hititumatum o i ayu iyafaru ana.
17.22 Act 4.32O a gewasin ayu ibitu, i aitih, saise i hinan ta’imon hinamatar, boun o ayu airit ta’imon tama’amabe. Ayu i wanawanahimaim naatu o ayu wanawana’umaim, saise i hinan anababatun ta’imon hinamatar. Saise tafaram boro naso’ob ayu i o iyafaru, naatu o i kubiyabuwih boun ayu kubiyabuwu na’atube.
“Tamai iyab ayu ibitu i akokok menamaim ama’am bairi imaim anama, saise ayu au marakaw bonamanamarin hina’itin, nati marakaw bonamanamarin o ayu itu, anayabin o iyabuwu ufibo tafaram matar.

“Tamai mokob maiyow; sabuw iti tafaramamaim o men hisu’ubi, baise ayu wan asu’ubi, naatu etei hiso’ob ayu i o iyafaru ana. O isa ayu aorereb hinowar sawar, naatu ayu boro’ika boro o isa anao’rerereb saise yabow nati ayu ibitu i wanawanahimaim nama naatu ayu taiyuwu i wanawanahimaim anama.”

Jesu yoyoban sasawar ufunamaim ana bai’ufnunenayah bairi efan nati hihamiy hin Kidron Kwaf hirabon. Nati’imaim i masaw ta, imaim Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah bairi ten tema’am. Judas yanuwayan menamaim hima’am i so’ob, anayabin Jesu anabai’ufununayah bairi mar etei imaim teruru’ay. Imih Judas Romans hai baiyowayah hai kou’ay bonawiyih naatu afa i orot ukwa’ukwarih firis ukwarih biyahine hiyafarih hin naatu afa i Pharisee biyahine hin. I umah, ahay waf hibow naatu hinow hitoto’aben kawih hin masaw yan hitit. Jesu abistanawat boro isan hinamamatar i so’ob, imih au nah isutait tit naatu ibatiyih, “Kwa yait kwanunuwih?”
Hiya’afut hi’o, “Jesu Nazareth mowan.
Jesu eo, “Ayu iti wei.” Judas yanuwayan i bairi nati’imaim hibatabat. Anamaramaim Jesu eo, “Ayu i iti. I ou’uf hibat naatu me yan hira’iy rabih.
Ibanak i batiyih maiye, “Kwa i yait kwanunuwih.”
Naatu i hiya’afut. “Jesu Nazareth mowan.”

“Ayu kwa ouwi wei, ayu i iti.” Jesu iya’afut. “Ayu kwananunuwuhu na’at, basit au bai’ufununayah kwanihamiyih hinan.”
18.9 Jn 17.12Iti namamatar saise tur abistan hi’o’o i nan niturobe. “Tamaim abistan ibitu, men ta kasiy.”
Naatu Simon Peter, i ana kaiy auman batabat, rowenra’ah firis ukwarin ana akir orot tainin asukwafune eafuru’um. Akir orot wabin Malchus.
18.11 Mat 26.39Jesu Peter isan eo, “A kaiy kwiwan maiye! O kunotanot, Ayu Tamai kerowas bitu boro men anatom”

Imaibo Rom rakit wairafih hai ukwarih bairi naatu Jew hai ma’utenayah bairi Jesu hibai hifatum, naatu wantoro’ot hibai hin Annas biyan hitit, nati kwamur wanawanan i Firis ana ukwarin ma’am ana veya, nati orot i Kaiafas rawan.
18.14 Jn 11.49-51Iti orot Kaiafas i Jew uwih eo, gewasin orot ta’imon sabuw etei isah tamorob.

Simon Peter naatu bai’ufununayan turan ta hairi Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin. Nati bai’ufununayan ta i firis ukwarin i su’ub, imih i ufunun bairi hin firis ukwarin ana bar merar wanawanan hirun, baise Peter etawan awan bat. Bai’ufnunenayan ta iban matabir maiye tit etawan awan akir babitai ifefeyan naatu babitai Peter iu basit, Peter na fur wanawanan run.

Babitai etawan awanamaim Peter isan eo, o i ni’i orot ana bai’ufnunenayan orot ta? Peter iya’afut eo, “En ayu men asu’ubimih.” Nati ana gugumin i siba’u kwanekwan imih akir wairafih naatu ma’utenayah bairi wairaf hi’asir hi’ar bebera’uh hibat rararih. Imih Peter rabon in bairi hibat rararih.

Firis ukwarin Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayan naatu ana bai’obaibiyen isan ibatiy. Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu i bebeyan sabuw etei matahimaim a’o a binan hinonowar, naatu au bai’obaiyen mar etei i sibor ya’aya efanamaim naatu Tafaror Bar wanawanan sabuw etei teruru’ay matahimaim. Ayu men abistan ta awa’ir aomih. Aisim ayu kubibabatiyu, sabuw ayu abistanawat a’o hinonowar i kwibatiyih ayu abisa ao i hiso’ob.”
Jesu iti na’at eo ana mar ma’utenayan orot ta nati’imaim batabat Jesu rebareban ifar eo, “Men iti na’atube firis ukwarin isan ina’omih.”

Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu abisa ana’o kakaf na’at sabuw etei hai tur ku’owen, tur menatan i a’o kakaf. Baise ayu tur etei ana’o’o gewas na’at i aisim irabu”. Imaibo Annas Jesu uman fatufatum auman iyafar in Kaiafas firis ukwarin isan.
Peter boro’ika ma fora’ab rarar, sabuw afa nati’imaim bairi hima’am hibatiy hio, “O nati orot ana bai’ufnunenayan ta” Baise Peter youb eo, “En, orot nati men ayu’umih.”

Firis ukwarin ana akir orot ta i Peter tainin ea’afuw ana rara orot ta nati’imaim batabat, eawafoten eo, “O airi ayu masawamaim ait”
18.27 Jn 13.38Ibanak mar baitounin Peter eo, “En!” naatu mar ta’imon kokorerek eo.
book.s: Jesu Hibai Maiye Hin Pilate Biyan
book.p: Maraumanaika Jesu Kaiafas ana barene hibai hin gawan orot ana baremaim hirun. Jew hai ukwarih bar wanawanan i men hirun hinamih, anayabin i men hikok wanawanah kato tamatar naatu hai Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw men hita’aamih. Imih Pilate ufun tit sabuw ibatiyih, “Iti orot abisa isan kwa ubar kwabitin?”
Hiya’afut hi’o, “I men kakafin tasisinaf na’at, i boro men atab atan o biya atanamih.”

18.31 Jn 19.6-7Pilate isah eo, “Kwabai kwan, kwa taiyuw a’ofafar eo na’atube kwasinaf.” Ibo hai tur hirutabir hio, “Aki auri men baibasit ta ema’am boro yait ta ana asabunimih.”
18.32 Jn 3.14; 12.33Iti na’atube mamatar i Jesu ana tur mi’itube ana morob isan yai eo’o i tan titurobe isan.
Pilate matabir maiye ana bar wanawanan run naatu Jesu eaf na ibatiy, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob?”
Jesu iya’afut eo, “Iti baibat i o taiyuw a not ayu kubibatiyu o sabuw afa ayu isou a tur hi’owen?”
18.35 Jn 1.11Pilate iya’afut, “O kunotanot ayu i Jew orot? O taiyuw a sabuw naatu firis ukwa’ukwarih o hibuw hinawiy ina ayu isou. Abisa isinaf?”

Jesu eo, “Ayu au aiwob i men iti tafaram nowanamih, baise ayu au aiwob iti tafaram nowan na’at, ayu au bai’ufununayah boro isou hitiyow, naatu Jew hai ukwarih umah wahine boro hitawasfafaru. En, ayu au aiwob i men iti faram nowanamih.” Imih Pilate ibatiy, “Bo o i aiwob orot?
Jesu iya’afut eo, “Nati tur i gewasin ku’o’o, ayu i aiwob. Ana an ta’imon i nati isan. Ayu atufuw ana iti tafaram wanawanan arun, turobe ata’orereb. Yait turobe oukoun ebatabat fanau ebobosiyasiyar.”

Pilate Jesu ibatiy, “Turobe i abistan” Iti tur nonowar ibanak matabir maiye ufun tit Jew sabuw isah eo, “I biyanamaim men kakafin ta atita’ur boro imaim anibabatiy. Baise kwa a binanakwar eo na’atube. Tar Nowaten hiyuw aa ana veya diburane orot ta kwa isa anabotait. Kwa kwakokok Jew hai aiwob anabotait na tit.” Isan hitarakouw hiwow hi’o, “En, men nati orotomih! Aki akokok i Barabas.”

Naatu Pilate ma’utenayah uwih, Jesu hibai hibowabiwabir sawar.
19.2 Luk 23.11imaibo ma’utenayah kokor hi’afuw hififin ana kowasimih ukwarin hiyoun, naatu faifuw wair hibai hi’osenawein, naatu hiyen hin biyan hitit naatu hi’o, “Jew hai aiwob ma’ama’anin!” Naatu yumatanamaim hifafar.

Pilate ibanak tit maiye sabuw rou’ay isah eo, “Ayu iti orot kwa namaim abai atitit i anao kwanaso’ob, i biyanamaim ayu men kakafin ta atita’ur.” Jesu ana kowas kokor ukwarin hiyow naatu ana waifuw wair hi’osenawein imaibo hibai hititit. Pilate sabuw isah eo, “Orotoban iti.”
Firis ukwarih naatu i ana sabuw ukwa’ukwarih bairi hinuw hi’i’itin anamaramaim hitarakouw hi’o, “ku’onaf, ku’onaf!”
Pilate eo “I Kwabai kwan kwa’onaf, ayu isou’une i ana kakafin men ta atita’ur.”
Sabuw hiya’afut maiye hi’o, “Aki ai ofafar eo i boro namorob, anayabin i taiyuwin eorerereb God natun rauw eo.”

Pilate iti nonowar i ana bir ra’at,
19.9 Mat 27.12matabir maiye bar wanawanan run naatu Jesu ibatiy, “O menane ina?” Baise Jesu men tur ta eomih. Pilate Jesu isan eo, “O men kukokok tur ta ayu isou inao?” “Inaso’ob, ayu isou i fair ema’am boro o ana botaiti inatit o boro ana onafi.”
19.11 Jn 10.18; Act 2.23; Rom 13.1Jesu iya’afut, “Iti fair ayu tafau’umaim ibai kuma’am, anayabin iti fair i God it. Imih orot yait ayu o isa yayabunu i bowabow kakafin gagamin maiyow bai.

19.12 Luk 23.2; Act 17.7Ana maramaim Pilate iti tur nonowar ef nuwet mi’itube Jesu tabotait isan. Baise rou’ay hitarakouw i matabir maiye run, “o nati orot inabobotait ana itinin o i men Caesar ana ofamih. O yait ta aiwob inararouw, o i Ceaser ana wosai orot”.

Pilate iti tur nonowar ana maramaim Jesu bai tit ufun efan wabin teo kabay ana’ubun imaim baibabatiyen ana ura ma’ama tafan mare (Hebrew tur i te’o Gabbatha). Veya na bi’ouyit nati i Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw ana veya nanamaim Pilate sabuw isah eo. “Kwa a aiwob orot i iti”. Hitarkoukuw hi’o, “kwa’asabun! kwa’asabun!” kwa’onaf! Pilate ibatiyih, “Kwakokok ayu a aiwob ana onaf?” Firis ukwa’ukwarih hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki ai aiwob i ta’imon maiyow, Caesar akisinamo”.
Imaibo Pilate Jesu ya’abun i isah onafinamih hibai hin.

Naatu Jesu hibonawiy onafinamih hin. Jesu tit ana onaf abar remor in ukwarih rarik ana efanamaim tit. (Hebrew fanahimaim Golgotha). Jesus carrying crosscn01833B.tifJhn 19.17©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Jesus ana koros eabar enan19.17 Nati’imaim hi’onafen, naatu orot rou’ab auman, Jesu foun in, orot rou’ab roun roun hi’in.

Pilate fef kirum naatu onafamaim hidudun, Kikirum i JESU NASARETH OROT, JEWS HAI AIWOB. Sabuw moumurih maiyow iti kikirum hi’itin hiyab, anayabin efan iti Jesu hio’onaf i men yokomih bar merar gagamin sisibin. Iti tur i Hebrew, Latin naatu Greekamaim kirum. Firis ukwarih, Pilate isan hio, “Jew hai aiwob bikirumin, i eo i Jew hai aiwob.” Pilate iya’afut, “Abistan ayu akikirum, i kirum.” Rakit wairafih Jesu hio’onaf ufunamaim ana waifuw hibow hiyarouseben matah kwafe’en himatar, matah taita’imon hiya, rakit wairafih taita’imon isah. Naatu faifuw tafan ebiyoun aurin sakisakir en auman hibai.
19.24 Psa 22.18Rakit sabuw taiyuwih isah hio, “Men tanasib baise tani’arow tana’itin yait boro nab.” Iti mamatar i tur marasika hio hikirum inu’in i titurobe isan.
book.q: “Au faifuw hibow taiyuwih hai fonamaim hiyarouseb hibow
naatu au tafan baibiyon hibai hi’arouw.”
book.p: Naatu baiyowayah i iti na’atube hisinaf.

19.25 Mat 27.55-56Jesu ana onaf anamaim i hinah batabat, naatu i hinah rubun, Mary Clopas aawan naatu Mary Magdalin.
19.26 Jn 13.23Jesu hinah naatu ana bai’ufununayan orot i ana yabow hairi hibatabat itih, imih hinah isan eo, “Natu ina’itin.” Naatu bai’ufununayan orot isan eo, “Hinat ina’itin”. Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayan orot hinah bai hairi hin ana baremaim hima.

19.28 Psa 22.15Jesu so’ob bounabo sawar etei’imak na ana yomanin tit, marasika Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in na iturobe. Jesu eo “Ayu sikou mamah.”
19.29 Psa 69.21Tew ta nati’imaim harew tenakuyakuy awan karatan batabat, wanabir hibai harew hibu’utu’ub isikar wan himetan hi’otra’ah Jesu ufurinamaim hiyei. Jesu harew kartoman naatu eo, “Iti’imaim sawar.” Imaibo sikan sir naatu ayubin tabaratait.

19.31 Deu 21.22-23Jew ukwa’ukwarih Pilate hifefeyan baibasit baitih orot hio’onafih ah tarkakakiren isan, naatu biyah onaf afe’enane bow yara’iyen isan. Hifefeyan anayabin ana mar natot i Baiyarir Ana Veya. I men hikok biyah boro auyom hita’in. Imih baiyowayah hin orot ta wan an hitarkakiren naatu hin orot bairu’abin an hitar kakiren, iti orot hairi i Jesu bairi hio’onafih. Baise hina Jesu biyan hititit i moroboka inu’in hi’itin, isan imih an men hitarkakiren. An hitatakakiren efanin sorodiy kiram robra’at Jesu naiwan yi naatu mar ta’imon rara naatu harew auman suwa re.
19.35 Jn 21.24Orot iti matar i’itin i eo’orereb, naatu anaorerereb i turobe. I so’ob abistan eo i turobe, isan imih kwa auman kwana’itin kwanitumatum.
19.36 Exo 12.46; Num 9.12; Psa 34.20Iti na’atube matar saise abisa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum na iturobe. “Boro men ana rarik ta natato’ob.”
19.37 Zec 12.10; Rev 1.7Tur tabo Buk Atamaninamaim eo, “Sabuw boro hinanuw nati hiyiy hina’itin.”

Iti ufunamaim Joseph Arimathea orot, Jesu ana bai’ufununayan ta wa’iwa’iramaim na Pilate ifefeyan Jesu biyan tab isan. Anayabin Jew hai ukwarih isah bir. Pilate ana baibasitamaim, Joseph na Jesu biyan bai yare.
19.39 Jn 3.1-2Nicodemus gugumin ta i wan in Jesu i’itin, i boun raiy ta wabin myrrh naatu raiy ta wabin aloes auman higagamuw ana bit i 30 kilos bai na Joseph hairi hin. Orot hairi Jesu biyan hibu’ub hiyare naatu Jew hai bairahiya ana efamaim biyan raiyamaim hibobunei naatu rah ana faifuwamaim hisum. Efan menamaim Jesu momorob i sisibinamaim i masaw ta, naatu nati masaw wanawanan hub boubun men yait ta imaim hiyai. Iti ufunamaim i Baiyarir Ana Veya, anayabin hub i yubin, isan imih Jesu biyan hibai hin imaim hiyai.

Fur an bubusuruf, maraumanika Mary Magdalin eregugumin auman in hubemaim tit, nuwanuw hub awan kabay hifururuw tit inu’in itin. women see stone rolled awaycn01850B.tifJhn 20.1©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co. Imih i matabir erenunuw in Simon Peter biyan naatu bai’ufununayan orot ta Jesu biyabuw i hairi biyah tit naatu eo, “Sabuw hina Regah biyan hubemaim hibosair naatu i menamaim hiya’iy, it men taso’ob.”

Imih Peter naatu bai’ufununayan orot ta hairi hub itinamih hin. Naatu hairi erenununuw hin, baise bai’ufununayan orot ta Peter i gegesair i wan in hubemaim tit. Naatu i kwafure nuwariy waifuw Jesu hisumisum inu’in itin baise men runamih. Naatu Simon Peter, uf nunuw na tit naatu in hub wanawanan run, waifuw Jesu hisum inu’in itin. naatu murubih tesumasum ana faifuw Jesu nukwarin himetan auman inu’in itin. Nati waifuw i taiyuwinawat nu nabin in, men Jesu biyan hisumisum aumanamih. Naatu bai’ufunenayan orot ta wan na hubamaim titit, i auman run. Itin itumatum.
20.9 Act 2.24-32; 1Cor 15.4Naatu Buk Atamaninamaim eo i men hiso’ob, Jesu i boro morobone namisir.

Naatu bai’ufnunenayah himatabir hai ubar hin. baise Mary hub ufunane bat rererey. Rerey auman kwafure hub wanawanan nuwariy naatu tounamatar rou’ab hai waifuw kwes Jesu inu’in ana efanamaim hima’am, ta nukwarinane ta anane.

I babin hibatiy, “O aisim kurererey?” Babin eo, “Au Regah hibosair hibai hin menamaim hiyai, naatu ayu men aso’ob.”
20.14 Luk 24.16; Jn 21.4Iti na’atube eo ana veya tatatabir Jesu nati’imaim batabat itin, baise i men so’ob nati i Jesu. Jesu eo, “Babin, o aisim kurererey? O i yait kununuwih” Babin notanot i masaw bowayan ta, imih i eo, “O inab inanan na’at, kuo anowar menamaim iyai saise ayu anan anab.”

Jesu babin isan eo, “Mary” Naatu Mary tatabir Jesu isan rerey Aramaic turamaim eo, “Rabboni.” Anayabin i Bai’obaiyenayan.
20.17 Rom 8.29; Hib 2.11-12Jesu eo, “Biyau men inabutubun, anayabin ayu men amatabir an Tamai biyan atitamih. baise kwen taitu hai tur ku’owen. Ayu amamatabir Tamai isan na’atube kwa Tamat, ayu au God kwa auman a God.” Mary Magdalin tur bai matabir in bai’ufnunenayah biyah tit, eo, “Ayu Regah aitin.” Naatu Jesu abistanawat eo nonowar i hai tur eowen.

Fur antoro’ot bubusuruf ana rabirab, bai’ufununayah etei’imak hiru’ay bar wanawanan etawan hitufabon hima’am, anayabin Jew hai ukwarih isah hibir. Jesu na hai founamaim bat naatu eo, “Tufuw isa nama.”
20.20 Jn 16.22; 1Jn 1.1Iti na’atube eo’o ufunamaim, i uman naatu sisibin i’obaiyih. Anamaramaim Regah hi’i’itin, bai’ufununayah yasisir dogoroh awan karatan.

Jesu ibanak eo maiye, “Tufuw isa nama! Tamat ayu iyunu ana, na’atube ayu kwa abiyuni.” Naatu earatit tafahimaim yen naatu eo, “Anun Kakafiyin kwabai.
20.23 Mat 16.19O yait ta tura ana kakafin inanonotawiy na’at, i i notawiy, o men hai kakafih inanonotawiyen na’at, God men nanotawiyihimih.”
book.s: Thomas Wabin Ta Kikifukek Jesu Isan Irerereb
book.p: Thomas, wabin ta Kikifukek, 20.24 Greek turamaim Didimas teo. bai’ufununayah nah 12 i orot ta, i men bairi hima’am Jesu natitamih. Bai’ufnunenayah afa ana tur hi’owen, “Aki Regah a’itin.”
Baise i’uwih eo, “Ayu matou yan tout ana fit ana itin naatu menamaim tout ana fit umu kim anakutuwariy naatu sisibin ana fit anabutubun, ayu boro men anitumatum.”

Fur nati ufunamaim ana baitumatumayah ibanak hiru’ay maiye bar wanawanan hima’am, naatu Thomas i nati’imaim bairi etawan hitufabon hima’am, Jesu na hai founamaim bat naatu eo, “Tufuw isa nama!” Naatu Thomas isan eo, “Uma kim iti’imaim kuyai, umu kwi’itah. Uma ku’ut ena au fit kubutubun. Kasiy kwihamiy naatu kwitumatum.” Thomas Jesu isan eo, “Ayu au Regah, au God.”
20.29 1Pet 1.8Naatu Jesu Thomas iu, “Anayabin o ayu i’itu imih kubitumatum; iyab men ayu ti’i’itu baise tebitumatum i baigegewasin tebaib.”

Jesu ina’inanen afa gewagewasih moumurih maiyow sinafen ana bai’ufununayah matahimaim, nati afa men bukamaim hikirumen ti’inu’in.
20.31 Jn 3.15; Rom 1.17; 1Jn 5.13Baise iti afa i hikirumen ti’inu’in saise imaim kwana’itin kwanitumatum Jesu Keriso, i God Natun, naatu i wabinamaim kwanabitumitum kwa boro yawas kwanab.
book.s: Jesu Ana Bai’ufununayah Nah 7 Isah Irerereb
book.p:
Iti ufunamaim Jesu ibanak maiye ana bai’ufnunenayah isah irerereb, Taibirias Harew Kukufamaim. Anamatar i iti na’atube matar. Simon Peter, Thomas wabin ta Kikifukek, 21.2 Didimas Nathanael Canna orot, Galilee wanawanan, Zebedee natunatun, naatu bai’ufnunenayah rou’ab auman nati’imaim bairi hima’am.
21.3-6 Luk 5.4-7Simon Peter turahinah iuwih, “Ayu anan buwat anaya’amih.” Turahinah hio, “Aki boro bairit tanan.” Imih hitit hin wa hibai buwat ya’amih hin. Baise nati gugumin men siy ta eonamih.
Maraumanika Jesu dones yan tit bat, baise bai’ufnunenayah Jesu men hi’inan. Jesu isah eafatait eo, “Au ofonah, kwa siy ta kwabai?” Hiya’afut hio, “Eno.”

Jesu iuwih eo, “A buwat wa sisibin asukwafune kwaya boro siy afa hina’on.” Imih i eo na’atube hisinaf, naatu men karam boro buwat hitabora’ah tayen, anayabin siy buwat etei bai sonan.
21.7 Mat 14.29; Jn 13.23Naatu bai’ufnunenayan menatan Jesu biyabuw i Peter isan eo, “No’om Regah wei.” Simon Peter tur Regah nonowar mar ta’imon ana biya baibiyon tafan bosair i kununuw riy yan re. Bai’ufnunenayah afa hi’ufunun, buwat siy sonan auman hitain hirun. Naatu dones tit in i biyah titit men yok, 100 metres anafofonin. Hirun wa hiyut hinunura’at wairaf ana waru’umawat dones yan inu’in hi’itin siy naatu rafiy afa auman wairaf wan hi’in hi’a’arat.
Jesu iuwih eo, “Siy iti boun kwabowabow afa kwabow kwana kwaitu.”

21.11 Luk 5.6Simon Peter yen wa afe’en bat buwat bai tain na dones rewan yen. Siy gagagamih buwat awan karatan, etei 153, siy moumurih maiyow hi’on baise buwat men takweb. Jesu isah eo, “Kwana marauman ana bay taa.” Bai’ufnunenayah men ta not baibatiyin isan, “O i yait?” I hiso’ob nati i Regah. Jesu na faraw bai naatu itih, siy auman na’atube sinaf.
21.14 Jn 20.19, 26Iti i mar baitaunin Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah isah irerereb morobone mimisir ufunamaim.

Bay hi’aa sasawar ufunamaim, Jesu Simon Peter isan eo, “Simon John natun, o turobe ayu kubiyabuwu men iti afa tebiyabuwu na’atube?” Simon eo, “Au Regah, o iso’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.” Jesu eo, “Au bowbaituw inituw”
21.16 Act 20.28Jesu ibanak eo maiye, “Simon, John natun o turobe ayu kubiyabuwu?” Simon iya’afut eo,
“Au Regah, o i so’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.”

Jesu eo, “Au bobaituw inakaifen.” Jesu mar baitonin Simon isan eo, “Simon John natun, o ayu kubiyabuwu?” Peter iyababan anayabin Jesu mar baitonin ibatiy, “O ayu kubiyabuwu?” Peter eo, “Regah, sawar etei o iso’ob, o iso’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.” Jesu eo, “Au bobaituw inituw.” Turobe a tur ao’owen. “Orot boub ima’am ana veya o taiyuw i’osenweini, naatu menamaim a kok imaim iremor, baise inabiregah anamaramaim o boro uma ina’oftobotobon, sabuw afa boro hini’osweini naatu efan men akok boro imaim hinabonawiyi kwanaremor.”
21.19 Mat 16.24-25; 2Pet 1.14Jesu tur iti na’atube eo anayabin, i Peter ana morob ef mi’itube boro namorob imaim God wabin nifai nabora’ara’ah. Naatu Peter isan eo, “Kuna kwi’ufnunu.”

21.20 Jn 13.23-25Peter tatabir nuw, naatu bai’ufununayan Jesu biyabuw i bi’ufnunih itin. Iti bai’ufnunenayan i aa fufun ana bay hi’aa Jesu sisibinamaim tugeger eo, “Regah yait boro o nayanuwi?” Peter nuw ayu John i’itu ana maramaim, Jesu ibatiy, “Regah iti orot isan i mi’itube?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu anakok i yawasin ma ayu matabir maiye anararauw na’at, o isa mi’itube kunotanot? Kwi’ufnunu.” Anayabin iti isan tur tasasar tit bowturah etei hinowar, iti bai’ufnunenayan i boro men namorob. Baise Jesu eo’o i men morob rouw eomih. I tur iti akisinamo eo, “Ayu anakok i yawasin ma ayu matabir isan, nati o i mi’itube kunotanot?”
21.24 Jn 19.35Bai’ufnunenayan iti i boun sawar etei isah eorereb naatu kirumen. It taso’ob i ana eorereb i turobe.
21.25 Jn 20.30Jesu sawar moumurih maiyow afa auman sinafen. Sawar etei’imak fefemaim hitakikirum na’at, ayu anotanot iti tafaram tutufin wanawanan boro fef awan takaratan.

book.id: - Miniafia NT; Stanley Oyabua; Josiah; David and Fran Wakefield; 29-Jul-2010 (web edition -2012 bd)
book.p: Acts
Tur Abarayah Hai Bowabow
Roube’aten Ana Tur
Luke i buk rou’ab kirum, ana buk wantoro’ot kikirum.

Luke kakafiyin ana tur gewasin kirum, nati ufunamaim ikofan maiye Tur Abarayah hai bowabow iban kirum maiye. Iti buk ana’an gagamin i Jesu ana bai’ufununayah mi’itube Anun Kakafiyin re tar gabuwih nawiyih tur gewasin Jesu isan hibai hitit Jerusalem wanawanan, Judea wanawanan, Samaria wanawanan naatu hitit hin tafaram tutufin etei wanawanan hibibinan i kok ta’orereb isan eo kirum. (1.8) Iti binanakwar i Kirisiyan sabuw hai bowabow mi’itube Jew sabuw biyahimaim busuruf naatu tit na tafaram tutufin etei tur hinowar hibai hai baitumatumamih mamatar isan eo kirum. Luke iti tur kikirum i kok ana baiyabayah hitaso’ob Kirisiyan ana bowabow i men Roman gawan ana fair baitaiyin isan, baise Kirisiyan ana baitumatum i Jew hai kwafiren ana yawas ma’am bai na sinaf iturobe.

Acts wanawanan i hikusib buk tounu matar, Jesu Keriso ana tur gewasin busuruf tuw tit tafaram etei bai naatu ekaleisia hibusuruf hiwowab. (1) Wantoro’ot Kirisiyan ana bowabow i Jerusalemamaim hibusuruf Jesu au mar yey ufunamaim. (2) Bairu’abin busuruf tuw tit Palestine wanawanan. Naatu (3) baitounin i tuw tit Mediterenean wanawanan naatu na Rome anasanet.

Ana’an gagamin ta i Anun Kakafiyin Pentecost ana veya re baitumatumayah etei tafah mara’at hai bowabow hibai hinunuw, naatu ekaleisia hai ukwarih bairi bonawiyih, koufair itih, yababan ta ta himamatar wanawanan hibatkikin hai bowabow haibai nunuw. Kirisiyan ana bowabow mi’itube wantoro’ot anamaim bubusuruf etei i bai na tur afa auman bo’ay inu’in. Naatu sawar abisa’awat himamatar etei i tur ana fair baitumatumayah wanawanahimaim mi’itube hima hibowabow naatu hibita’ay imaim God ana fair irerereb ta’i’itin.
Fef wanawanan tur iti na’atube hi’asgidigid
Koubuna’ayah hai yabuna (1.1-26)
a. Jesu ana obaiyunen tur naatu ana omatanen (1.1-14)
b. Judas efanin hirubin (1.15-26)
Tur Abarayah Jerusalem wanawanan hibusuruf hibinan (2.1–8.3)
Tur Abarayah Judea naatu Samaria wanawanah hibinan (8.4–12.25)
