b. Jerusalemamaim hiru’ay tur hio (15.1-35)
c. Paul ana nanawan bairou’abin (15.36–18.22)
d. Paul ana nanawan baitonin (18.23–21.16)
e. Paul dibur run Jerusalem, Caesarea naatu Rome imaim ma remor (21.17–28.31)

1.1 Luk 1.3Theophilus au buk wantoro’ot i Jesu ana bowabow etei mi’itube busuruf bow sabuw i’obaibiyih inan
1.2 Mak 16.19; Luk 24.49-51God bora’ah au mar yey isan i ao akirum. Baise au mar yena’e ana veya orot iyab kob abarin isan rurubinih i Anun Kakafiyinane roube’aten tur itih.
1.3 Luk 24.36-49; Act 10.41Ana bai’akir ufunamaim, isah irerereb hai not hikwaris hima hibinotanot ana sinaf ef tata’amaim botabirih hi’itin hiturobe i, i yawasin ma’ama, veya 40 wanawanan ana bairererebamaim God ana aiwob isan i’obaibiyih hima hinowar.
1.4 Luk 24.49; Jn 14.16-17; Act 2.33Veya ta bairi hima bay hi’aa ana maramaim, iuwih eo, “Jerusalem men kwanihamiy, baise kwanama Tamai a siwar baitimih eomatani, ao kwanonowar isan kwanakaif.
1.5 Mat 3.11Anayabin John i harewamaim bapataito it, baise veya bai’ab na’atube ufunamaim kwa boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito kwanab.”

1.6 Luk 24.21Basit Tur Abarayah etei hina hibita’imon ana veya hibatiy, “Regah, karam iti boun aiwob itab Israel sabuw ititih maiye?”
1.7 Mak 13.32Iyafutih eo, “Veya naatu sumar abisa’amaim iti sawar hinamamatar isan i God akisin ana fair tafanamaim veya yakitifuw, i boro men kwa kwanaso’obamih.
1.8 Mat 28.19; Luk 24.48Baise kwa i Anun Kakafiyin nanan ana veya’amaim fair boro kwanab, naatu ayu isau Jerusalemamaim boro kwanabusuruf kwanakubuna, kwanatit Judea wanawanan, Samaria, naatu kwanatit kwanan tafaram yomanin.” Iti na’atube eo ufunamaim, God bora’ah yen himtitiy auman in sakuk wanawanan run himat kasiy.

Matah etei hikubar nati mar wanawanan rurumaim hibat hi’i’itin, naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab hai faifuw kwes sisibihimaim himatar. Two angels speaking to disciplesCN01887B.TIFAct 1.10©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Tounamatar ro’ab bai’ufununayah bairi teo1.10-11
1.11 Mat 26.64; Luk 21.27Naatu hi’uwih. “Galilee oro’orot, kwa aisim kwabat au mar kwanuwanuw? Iti Jesu ta’imon God kwa biyamaim bora’ah au mar yey, i boro ef ta’imon kwa’itin yeyebe boro namatabir maiye nanan kwana’itin.”

1.12 Luk 24.50-53Imaibo Olive Oyaw hihamiy himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit, ef ana manin i one kilometre na’atube.
1.13 Mat 10.2-4Hina bar hitit, naatu hiyen bar awan ta no tafan i hima’ama’amaim hitit. Iyabowat nati’imaim hima’ama wabih i iti, Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, naatu James, Alpheus natun, naatu Simon Kafafarayan, naatu Judas, James natun. Iti orot i mar etei hina hita’imon hiyoyoyoban, baibin bairi, naatu i wanawanahimaim i Mary Jesu hinah naatu taitin auman.

Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayah etei 120 na’atube wanawanahimaim Peter misir eo,
1.16 Psa 41.9“Taitu, marasika Anun Kakafiyin David iwan Bukamaim eo kikirum i Judas ana sinafumaim nati tur na yabin matar. I rafot rouwayan na’atube sabuw bonawiyih Jesu hifatum. Judas i ata kou’ay orot ta naatu iti bowabow wanawananamaim bairi tabow.

1.18 Mat 27.3-8Bowabow kakafin sisinaf isan ana baiyan hibitin imaim me tubun ukwarin aubabe re yi yan fudir kabutin ihouw. Sabuw Jerusalem hima’ama etei ana tur hinowar, imih hai turamaim nati efan wabin Akeldama hiwab. Wab anayabin ‘Rara ana Efan.’
Psa 69.25; 109.8Anayabin Psalm wanawananamaim iti na’atube eo,
book.q: ‘Ana bar kwaihamiy eowarar,
naatu men yait ta nati’imaim narun nama’amih.’
book.p: Naatu iban maiye eo.
book.q: ‘Ana efan orot ta kwanitin.”
book.p:
Isan imih, igewasin orot yait ata Regah Jesu wanawanatamaim ma reremor ana veya i bairi tama tabowabow boro i tanarubin.
1.22 Mak 1.9; 16.19; Jn 15.27Naatu nati orot i John Baptist ana veya’amaim bairi taibuya tana Jesu hibora’ah au mar yey i boro tanarubin. Anayabin ata orot ta nati na’atube tanarurubin i boro Jesu morobone mimisir isan bairi sif tanarubon.”

Basit orot rou’ab hikutaitih, Joseph wabin ta Barsabas, wabin baitounin Justus naatu Mathias hairi hirubinih. Imaibo hiyoyoban. “Regah o sabuw etei dogoroh iso’ob. Imih abifefeyani orot iti rou’ab kwi’obaiyi menatan i o irubin. Peter and others prayingcn01903B.tifAct 1.24©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Peter ana ofonah bairi teyoyoyoban1.24 Judas ana efan nab tur abarayan namatar, anayabin Judas iti efan ihamiy ana ma’ama efan rurubinimaim in.” Imaibo hi’arow, naatu Mathias wabin hisusu’ub ana veya arow ben, basit Mathias hibai tur abarayah nah 11 hima’ama wanawanah run.
book.s: Anun Kakafiyin Pentecost Ana Veya Ra’iy
book.p:
2.1 Lev 23.15-21; Deu 16.9-11Pentecost ana veya na tit, etei’imak hiru’ay efan ta’imonamaim hima. Naniyan meyemeye yaurabad nidun wowogabe marane rena bar hima’am imaim run awan karatan.
2.3 Mat 3.11Naatu abisa hi’i’itin i wairaf orot menan na’atube tamunimun na ta’ita’imon tafahimaim mara’ara’at.
2.4 Mak 16.17; Act 4.31; 10.44-46; 19.6Etei’imak Anun Kakafiyin iwanih menah botabir tur tata’amaim hio, Anun Kakafiyin fair bitih na’atube.

Nati ana veya, Jew sabuw God ana bowayah orot gagamih etei tafaram tata’ane hiru’ay Jerusalemamaim hima’am. Iti nidun hinonowar ana maramaim sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hiru’ay hima’am, hai kasiy ra’at naatu hifofofor men kafaita, anayabin etei hai turamaim hio hinowar. Kasiy gagamin maiyow isah matar naatu taiyuwih hibabatiyih. “Iti sabuw tur teo etei i Galilee oro’orot? Naatu mi’itube’emih it ata turamaim hio tanonowar? It i tafaram ta ta’ika tana, Partia, Media, Ilam naatu afa i Mesopotamia’ane hina, Judea, Kapadosia, Pontus naatu Asia, Firigia, Pamfilia, Egypt naatu Libia wanawanan turin Sairini na’atune auman hina tema’ama. Naatu Romene nanawan auman hina Jerusalem tema’am. Nati i Jew sabuw naatu sabuw afa hai baitumatum hibotabir hina Jew sabuw himamatar auman. It afa i Kurit naatu Arab sabuw. Baise God sawar gewasih maiyow sisinaf isan ata turamaim hio tanonowar!” Sabuw hifofofor naatu hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti sawar anayabin i abisa?” Peter speaking to crowdCN01892B.TIFAct 2.12©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Peter sabuw rou’ay gagamin isah ebibinan2.12
Baise sabuw afa hi’iyab hio, “Nati sabuw i harew fokarin, hitom imih teo kwanekwan!”

Tur Abarayah etei 11 hai founamaim Peter misir fanan aumetawat sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in isah eo, “Taitu tuwai’inah Jew sabuw naatu kwa iyab Jerusalem wanawanan kwama’am, akokok tain kwanarub gewas sawar iti mamatar anayabin anakubuna kwananowar. Kwa kwanotanot iti orot i harew fokarin hitom tibikoko’aw, baise, boun i nine korok mar auman. Imih i men harew hitomamih, baise dinab orot Joel ana Bukamaim Atamaninamaim kirum eo,
book.q: 2.17-21 Jol 2.28-32‘Mar ana yomaninamaim God eo,
Ayubu boro sabuw etei tafahimaim anisuwai nare.
Kwa natunat oro’orot naatu baibitar boro dinabatur hinao, a orot baubuh boro matah hinabora’ah sawar hina’itah, naatu a orot gagamih boro hinamim.
Isa’amih, nati ana veya ayu au akir wairafih, oro’orot naatu baibin etei,
tafahimaim Anunu anisuwai nare dinabatur hinao.
Ayu boro maramaim baifofofor ana sinaf
naatu ina’inan tafaramaim ana sinaf,
Nati’imaim boro rara, wairaf, naatu sow agor kutikutin kwana’itin.
Veya matan boro nagugum
naatu sumar matan boro rara namatar,
imaibo Regah ana veya gagamin bodiridirin nanan natit.
Orot yait
Regah wabin su’ub e’afa’af boro yawas nab.’”
book.p:
“Israel sabuw tur iti kwananowar! Jesu Nazareth mowan i God rubin naatu i wanawanamaim ina’inan yumatah ta ta, baifofofor ta ta God kwa biyamaim sinaf kwa’itin kwaso’ob. Iti orot hibai kwa umamaim hiyai kwa’a’asabun i God ana kok naatu marasika yakitifuw inu’inumaim matar, naatu kwa sabuw kakafih hai baibaisamaim Jesu kwabai onaf afe’en kwa’onaf morob. Baise God morobone iyawas maiye misir, naatu morob ana biyababanane rufam tit, anayabin morob ana fair men karam boro diburamaim tabotan tama.
2.25-28 Psa 16.8-11David nati orot isan eo,
book.q: ‘Ayu Regah mar etei nau’umaim ai’itin,
anayabin i ayu umau asukwafune,
imih ayu boro men hininanawiyu.
Isan imih ayu dogorou ebiyasisir
naatu awau’umaim i kawasa tur etitit,
ayu i orot afa na’atube,
baise God ana’omatanen isan ayu i nuhufot ama’am.
Anayabin o boro men ininatbuhuruwu rahemaim ana’in,
na’atube a Orot Kakafiyin boro men ina’itin namasamih.
O yawas ana ef i’obaiyu, naatu o ataragub wanawananamaim aiyasisir boro iniwansumu.’”
book.p:
2.29 1Ki 2.10“Taituwau Jew, bebeyan a tur ao’owen aiwob orot David ata agir wabin gagamin, morob hiyai naatu ana rah i iti biyatamaim inu’in.
2.30 2Sa 7.12; Psa 89.3-4; 132.11Naatu David i dinab orot God omatanen ana obaifaro auman yayare i so’ob, veya ta David ana rara’ane i uwan ta boro ni’aiwob.
2.31 Psa 16.10God mar boro nanan abisa nasisinaf David i so’ob, Keriso morobone misir maiye isan ana tur i nowar.
book.q: ‘Biyan boro men ninatbuhuruw moroboyah hai efanamaim na’in
na’atube biyan boro men na’itin namasamih.’”
book.p:
“God iti Jesu i boun morobone iyawas maiye misir, naatu aki i iti sawar himamatar ana sif robonayah.
2.33 Act 5.32; 7.55-56God iti Jesu bora’ah yen uman asukwafune mare, naatu Tamah biyanane Anun Kakafiyin eo’omatan bai aki tafai yan isuwai re’er boun iti kwa’i’itin naatu kwanonowar.
2.34-35 Psa 110.1Naatu David i men au mar yenamih, baise iti tur i eo,
book.q: ‘Regah au Regah isan eo
Umau asukwafune kumare.
Inama’am a kamabiy sabuw ana bow
a babanamaim anaya.’
book.p: 2.36 Act 5.30-31Isan imih kwa Israel sabuw iti tur ao i kwanaso’ob gewas. God iti Jesu kwabai kwao’onaf i bai yen ata Regah naatu ata Roubininenayan matar!”

Sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana veya dogoroh rusib Peter naatu Tur Abarayah hibatiyih, “Taitu tuwai’inah aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?” Peter iyafutih eo, “Kwa etei dogor hinikitabir naatu Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito kwanab, saise a bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen, naatu God ana usar Anun Kakafiyin boro kwanab.
2.39 Isa 57.19Iti omatanen i kwa isa naatu kwa natunat isah, na’atube sabuw tutufin etei iyab ef yok tema’am ata Regah God boro na’a’afih isah.”

Peter tur maumurih na’in imaim imatnuwih naatu ifefeyanih eo, “Sabuw tafa’asarih wanawanah kwama’am saisewat kwanatit kwaniyawasi!”
2.41 Act 2.47; 4.4Sabuw maumurih na’in iti tur hinonowar hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai, nati ana veya’amaim sabuw etei 3000 na’atube nati kou’ayamaim hirun.

2.42 Act 20.7Naatu hai veya hiya’asair Tur Abarayah biyahine tur hinowar bairi hibita’ay, rafiy himseseb hifaram hi’aa naatu hiyoyoyoban. Tur Abarayah wanawanahimaim ina’inan naatu baifofofor maumurih maiyow hisisinaf sabuw awah ha’e.
2.44 Act 4.32-35Bai’ufununayah mar etei hina hita’imon sawar i nowah etei nena hifafarambonen. Naatu hai sawar was arin, roumukur arin etei hibow hin hitobon kabay hibai hina wanawanahimaim sabuw iyab hai kok abisa isan hibiyababan etei ana fofonin hifafarambonen. Veya matan hiyi Tafaror Bar gagaminamaim hiruru’ay. Naatu hai baremaim bay himseseb dogoroh ere yasisir auman hi’aa,
2.47 Act 6.7; 11.21God hibobora’ara’ah naatu sabuw etei tur abarayah isah i hibiyasisir. Naatu veya ta’ita’imon ana fofonin sabuw iyab God biyawasih Regah bow ana kou’ay wanawanan yababar rara’at.
book.s: Peter Orot Fefeyanayan An Murubih Iyawas
book.p:
Veya ta rabirab three korok na’atube Peter, John hairi Tafaror Bar gagaminamaim yoyobanamih hiyen hin. Nati Tafaror Bar gagamin ana seboseb Etawan Gewagewasin awanamaim orot an kafikafirin auman tutufuw, i mar etei te’abar tena nati’imaim teyare sabuw tirun titit isah ema efefeyan. Peter, John hairi hina hirur itih, isah kabayamih fefeyan.
3.4 Act 14.9Peter John hairi mutufor isan hinuw naatu Peter eo, “Aki kui’iti!” Basit orot isah nuw, notanot boro hairi biyahimaim abisa ta tab.

3.6 Act 4.10; 16.18Baise Peter isan eo, “Ayu auru kabay en, baise abistan abai anan i boro anit. Jesu Keriso Nazareth mowan i wabinamaim, abiyuni kumisir kubat kuremor!” Naatu ofere uman ana asukwafune bai ibais misir an yan bat. Mar ta’imon orot an fuk sun higewasih, fasi iwa’an misir an yan bat remor. Imaibo bairi etawan awan hirun kunununuw God ana merar yi wabin bora’ara’ah. Sabuw rou’ay gagamin hima’am kawasa kununuw God bobora’ah hi’itin, Naatu hi’i’inan i fefeyanayan Etawan Gewagewasin awanamaim ma’ama, naatu biyanamaim abisa matar hi’i’itin isan hi’oror sa’irih naatu hai kasiy ra’at.

Orot na Peter, John hairi biyahimaim bukikinih batabat sabuw hi’i’itin ana veya hifofofor erekasiy auman hinunuw hin biyah hitit, efan wabin Solomon ana seboseb efanamaim. Peter bat sabuw itih in sawar naatu iuwih eo, “Israel sabuw, aisim iti sawar mamatar isan kwabifofofor? Naatu aisim aki kwa’i’iti kikini? Kwanotanot iti i aki ai fairamaim, ai aki ai kakafiyinamaim iti orot ai yawas bat ereremor?
3.13 Exo 3.6, 15; Luk 23.13-25; Act 2.23Iti i Abraham, Isaac naatu Jacob hai God, naatu it ata’a’agir auman hai God, ana omatanen i iti ana’akir orot Jesu kakafiyin isan eo, baise kwa kwabai a orot ukwarih umahimaim kwayai hi’asabun, naatu Pilate botaitinamih eo ana veya Pilate nanamaim kwakwahir. Kwa Orot Kakafiyin naatu ana Yawas Mutufurin kwakwahir, efanin Pilate kwaifefeyan sabuw asbunuwenayan i botait. Kwa ayawas ana bonawiyenayan orot kwa’asabun. Baise God morobone bora’ah misir maiye naatu aki i iti yawas ana kourerebayah. Aki abitumatum Jesu wabinamaim iti orot iyawas fair bai. Iti i Jesu wabinamaim naatu baitumatum i wanawananamaim na, iti orot biyan tutufin etei iyawas boun iti kwa’i’itin naatu kwaso’so’ob.

3.17 Luk 23.34; 1Tim 1.13Taitu tuwai’inah Jew, ayu bounabo aso’ob kwa a ukwarih bairi a kasiyomaim Jesu isan iti na’atube kwasinaf. Baise God marasika ana dinab orot biyahimaim itenaya, ana Roubininenayan orot boro ni’akir naatu ana tur nati i boun na iturobe.
3.19 Act 2.38Imih dogor kwanikitabir naatu God isan kwanatatabir maiye, saise i boro a kakafih nakusouwen. Nati namamatar ana veya, imaibo ayub ana fair bain baiboubun isan boro Regah wanawananamaim nan biya natit. Jesu, i ana Roubinineyan orot marasika kwa isa rurubin boro niyafar. I boro maramaim nama nanan God ana veya ya’iyai nan natit, sawar etei nasinaf hinan hiniboubuh maiye, marasika ana dinab orot kakafiyih biyahimaim kukurereb na’atube.
3.22-23 Deu 18.15, 18-19Moses eo, ‘Regah a God boro kwa wanawanamaim a orot ta narubin dinab orot namatar ayu rurubinu na’atube, imih tain kwanarub sawar etei sinafumih nao kwananowar. Orot yait nati dinab orot fanan men nabobosiyasiyar i boro God ana sabuw biyahine hina’afuru’um natit anababatun.’

Dinab oro’orot etei tur hibai, Samuel ma’am ana veya’amaim dinab orot afa i ufununamaim auman iti veya boun boro abistan namamatar isan i hi’orerebaka.
3.25 Gen 22.18God ana’omatanen dinab biyahine nan i kwa isa, naatu obaibasit iti boun kwafafaram God bai uwatanah bairi hibasit ana veya, Abraham isan iti na’atube eo, ‘O wawaw wanawanahimaim sabuw tafaram wanawanan tutufin etei boro baigegewasin hinab.’
3.26 Act 13.46Imih God ana bai’akirayan orot rubin iyafar kwa isa wan na, anayabin God ana kok i kwa baigegewasin tit naatu kwa ta’ita’imon a ef kakafihine kwama’am kwatamatabir maiye isan.”
book.s: Peter, John Hairi Kaniser Nahimaim Baibatiyih Isan
book.p:
Firis afa naatu Tafaror Bar gagamin kaifenayah hai ukwarih, Sadducee bairi hiyen hina Peter, John hairi hibat sabuw hai tur hi’owen biyah hitit. Ya so’ar yen bufutih, anayabin Peter John hairi sabuw hi’obaiyih hio, “Sabuw karam boro morobone hinamisir maiye, Jesu morobone mimisir maiye na’atube.” Peter, John hairi hibuwih hifatumih hin dibur bar hiyariyih imaim hi’in, anayabin veya re mar fo.
4.4 Act 2.41Baise sabuw iyab nati rou’ay gagamin wanawanan hima binan hinonowar, hitumatum naatu orot nati kou’ay wanawanan hibiyab yena 5,000 bai.

Marto marauman sabuw hai bonawiyenayah, ai’in naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah etei Jerusalemamaim kou’ay hibai. Annas Firis Gagamin na nati’imaim, Kaiafas hairi, John, Alexander naatu orot afa iyab Firis Gagamin ana nibur wanawananamaim hima’am auman hina. Peter John hairi hibuwih hina nahimaim hibat naatu hibusuruf hibabatiyih hio, “Kwa mi’itube kwasinaf orot igewasin? Naatu fair menane kwabai iti kwasinaf? O yait wabinamaim kwasinaf?”

Imaibo Peter Anun Kakafiyin iwanasum batabat iyafutih eo, “Sabuw bonawiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in. Aki kwa’afi orot an kafikafirin biyanamaim sawar gewasin iti matar kwa’i’itin isan naatu mi’itube bigewasin isan kwabibatiyi,
4.10 Act 3.6, 13-16i boro iti na’atube atao, kwa naatu sabuw tutufin etei Israel wanawanan kwama’am kwataso’ob, orot boun iti namaim biyan tutufin etei igewasin ebatabat, i Jesu Keriso Nazareth mowan kwabai onaf afe’en kwa’asabun naatu morobone God bora’ah maiye mimisir i wabinamaim iti orot yawas.
4.11 Psa 118.22Iti orot isan Bukamaim hikirum hio,
book.q: ‘Iti kabay kwa wowabayah kakafin kwarouw kwarurutawiy
i boun na bar ana bubu matar.’
book.p: 4.12 Mat 1.21Yawas boro men yait ta biyanamaim tanatita’ur, anayabin tafaram tutufin wanawanan men yait ta wabin nati na’atube ema’ama boro imaim niyawasitamih.”

Naatu Peter John hairi hibitafofor hi’itin ana veya hi’inanih iti orot i kirumatih, orot maiyow bar ma’anih, naatu hifofofor men kafaita, imaibo hi’inanih hiso’ob iti orot i Jesu bairi hima hireremor. Naatu iban maiye orot hibiyawas i bairi hibatabat hi’i’itin hai tur etei sawar. Imih hi’uwih Kaniser hai efan hihamiy ufun hitit naatu i taiyuwih hibabatiyih ef hinuwet hio. “Abisa boro tanasinaf iti orot isah? Sabuw etei Jerusalem wanawananamaim tama’am hiso’ob iti sawar gagamin ta hisinaf, naatu it boro men karam tanibun wa’irimih. Baise iti sawar tasasar tit sabuw wanawanah run isan, it boro tana’otanih naatu tanimatnuwih iti orot wabinamaim men sabuw hini’obaiyihimih.”

4.18 Act 5.28Imaibo hi’af maiye hirun naatu hiofafarih Jesu wabinamaim men hinabinan naatu men yait ta hini’obaiy maiye’emih.
4.19 Act 5.29Baise Peter, John hairi hi’awar foten hio, “Kwa taiyuw kwafufun kwa’itin, God nanamaim kwa fana anabaib i gewasin o God fanan anabaib i gewasin? Aki taiyuwi abistan a’itin naatu anonowar iti tur boro men anihamiy.”

Obiruwen tur afa hio ufunamaim hibotaitih hin, baikwatutunen ana ef men ta ma’am boro hititih, anayabin sabuw etei’imak abisa mamatar isan God hibobora’ara’ah. Naatu orot nati yayawas ana kwamur i 40 tafanamaim.

Hibobotaitih ufunamaim Peter, John hairi hin hai sabuw biyah firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in mi’itube hi’u’uwih etei hai tur hi’owen.
4.24 Exo 20.11; Neh 9.6; Psa 146.6Iti hinonowar etei’imak auta’imon yoyobanamaim fanah hibora’ah God isan hio, “Regah fair matuwanin, mar, tafaram naatu riy baimatarenayan, naatu wanawanahimaim sawar etei auman ana baimatarenayan.
4.25-26 Psa. 2.1-2Anun kakafiyinamaim a’akir orot, aki uwai David awanamaim eore eo,
book.q: ‘Eteni Sabuw aisim hitara’at
naatu sabuw aisim hai yakitifuwen yabin men temamatar?
book.p: Tafaram ana aiwob baiyow isan teyayabuna,
book.q: naatu bonawiyenayah etei hiku’ay
Regah tibigigim
naatu ana Roubininayan tibigigim.’
book.p:
4.27 Mat 27.1‑2; Luk 23.7-11; Act 3.13Turobe Herod, Pontius Pilate hairi Ufun Sabuw naatu Israel sabuw bairi iti bar merar gagaminamaim hibobaita’ay o a Roubininenayan orot wabin Jesu, o a’akir wairafin kakafiyin isan hiyakitifuw.
4.28 Act 2.23Iti sabuw i marasika o a kok abisa mataramih a fairamaim iyayakitifuw i nonowatin hisinaf emamatar.
4.29 Eph 6.19Naatu boun Regah, aki teo’obiruwi kunowar, aki o a’akir wairafi kwibaisi fair kwiti, saise ana batkikin a tur anabinan. Uma kuru’atayan o a’akir kakafiyin Jesu wabinamaim yawas kwiyafar etit naatu ina’inanen fokarih, baifofofor, kusinaf.”
Yoyoban hibisawar ufunamaim, efan nati hima’ama’amaim busuruf ibiguw, naatu Anun Kakafiyin iwanih hitafofor hitit hibusuruf God ana tur hibinan.

4.32 Act 2.44Baitumatumayah hai not naatu dogoroh etei na ta’imon matar. Men yait ta ana sawar akisin nowan rouwamih, baise hai sawar etei hifafarambonen. Tur Abarayah fair gagamin maiyow iwanih hibat Regah Jesu ana misir maiye hiorerereb, naatu manaw kabeber Godane gagamin maiyow tafahimaim isuwai ra’iy.
4.34 Act 2.45Naatu nati kou’ay wanawananamaim men yait ta sawar isan biyababanamih, anayabin sabuw iyab isah me hima’am naatu bar hima’am i hiyateten hitobon kabay hibow hina, tur abarayah nahimaim hiyaraiyen naatu i hibow sabuw hai yababan ana fofoninamaim hifafaramih.

Iti na’atube mamatar ana veya baitumatumayan orot ta wabin Joseph Levite ana bowabow orot ta, Cyprus imaim tufuw, naatu tur abarayah wabin ta Barnabas hiwab (anayabin Koufair Ana Orot). Ana me ya’atait hitubun naatu kabay bai na tur abarayah itih.

Orot wabin Ananias aawan Sapphira hairi auman hai sawar turin hiya’aitit sabuw hitubun.
5.2 Act 4.34-35Naatu kabay turin i botan, aawan i so’ob, naatu i ana baibasit auman iwa’an, turinawat bai in tur abarayah nahimaim ihouw ra’iy.

5.3 Jn 13.2Peter Ananias isan eo, “Aisim Satan not kakafin dogor wanawanan yaru’uy Anun Kakafiyin matanamaim ifuwen, a me hitutubun kabay turin o isa ibotan? Inaso’ob iti me i o nowa, baise o a baibasitamaim sabuw hitubun, naatu sabuw hitutubun ufunamaim iti kabay i o nowa. Aisim iti na’atube isinaf? O men orot ifuw, baise God ifuw.”
Ananias tur iti nonowar ana maramaim an uy re morob, sabuw etei’imak tur iti hinonowar hai hibir ra’at. Oro’orot boubuh hina hirun biyan hibai hisum hibai hin rahemaim hiyai.

Three hours na’atube sasawar ufunamaim aawan babin na tit, i men so’ob Ananias isan abisa mamatar. Peter babin ibatiy, “Ku’o gewas anowar, aaw airi a me hitutubun baiyanaban ana fofonin iti kwabai?” Babin iya’afut eo, “Me hitutubun ana baiyan etei i nati.”
Peter babin isan eo, “Aisim aaw airi kwaibasit, Regah Anunin kwarutubun? Oro’orot iyab o aaw hibai hin hiya’iy i nati etawanamaim tebatabat o hina’abar kwananamih.”

Mar ta’imon babin Peter anamaim ra’iy rab morob, oro’orot boubuh hina hirur babin morob inu’in hi’itin hi’abar hin aawan sisibinamaim hiyai. Sawar iti mamatar ekaleisia sabuw naatu sabuw afa auman iti tur hinonowar hi’oror sa’irih naatu hai hibir ra’at.
book.s: Tur Abarayah Sabuw Moumurih Na’in Hiyayawasih
book.p: 5.12 Act 2.43; 14.3Tur Abarayah ina’inan naatu baifofofor moumurih maiyow sabuw wanawanahimaim hisisinaf. Naatu baitumatumayah hai rou’ay mar etei i Solomon ana sebosebomaim hiruru’ay. Orot babin ufunane men karam boro hitakofanih, basit baitumatumayah hai gewasih isan sabuw wabih hibobora’ara’ah. Naatu orot babin iyab Regah hibitumatum hina hirun kou’ay yayababar yen ra’at. Rou’obow nati’imaim sabuw sawusawuwih hi’abaren hitit ef gagamih yah emo’em afe’eh naatu ir yah hi’i’inuwih, saise Peter tanan ana youn afa tafahimaim tarabon isan. Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiru’ay, naatu bar merar afa Jerusalem sisibinamaim hima’am hai sabuw sawusawuwih naatu afa afiy kakafih hitoun buriburih hima’am hibuwih hinan etei’imak hiyayawasih.

Firis Gagamin ana ofonah etei naatu Sadducee hai kou’ay bairi hibusuruf tur abarayah isah yah so’ar hibobowen, naatu sinafumaim hiyai. Tur Abarayah hibow hifatumih naatu hibuwih hin dibur bar gagaminamaim hiyariyih.
5.19 Act 12.7-10Baise gugumin wanawanan Regah ana tounamatar na etawan etei botawiyen tur abarayah iunawiyih hitit, iuwih eo, angel frees the apostles from the prisoncn01911b.tifcolAct 5.19©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Tounamatar tur abarayah dibur barane botaitih5.19-20 “Kwanan Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan kwanabat iti yawas boubun ana tur tutufin sabuw etei hai tur kwana’owen.”
Mar sibisib auman tur abarayah Tafaror Bar wanawanan was efanamaim hibusuruf sabuw hi’obaibiyih.

Firis Gagamin ana ofonah bairi hina hirun naatu Kaniser ana kou’ay tutufin etei hi’af ayuwih, Jew hai regaregah ai’in etei auman hina kou’ay wanawanan hirun, imaibo diburane tur abarayah buwih na isan tur hiyafar. Baise hina dibur baremaim hititit hibouyuwih naatu ma’utenayah hai ukwarih himatabir maiye hina hai tur hio’wen hio, “Aki an dibur bar atitit etawan etei i tufatufbonen naatu etawan ma’utenayah auman hibatabat ai’itih, baise etawan abobotawiyen i men yait ta nati bar wanawananamaim atita’urimih.” Firis ukwarih naatu Tafaror Bar kaifenayan hai ukwarin iti tur hinonowar etei hai kasiy ra’at hio, “Iti orot isah abisa matar?”

Rubira’e orot ta na run eo, “Kwananowar oro’orot kwabow dibur kwaya’aya i Tafaror Bar wanawanan sabuw tibi’obaibiyih.” Naatu kaifenayan ukwarin ana orot afa bairi hin tur abarayah hibuwih bairi himatabir maiye, men hifair o hikwararihimih, anayabin sabuw agimamaim borabirabih hirouw hibir.

Tur Abarayah hibuwih hina hirun Kaniser (Sanhedrin) nahimaim hibat naatu Firis Gagamin ibatiyih eo,
5.28 Mat 27.25“Aki tur fokarin maiyow ao fafari iti orot wabinamaim sabuw men kwani’obaiyih, naatu baise kwa abai’obaiyen i tit Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw etei tenonowar, naatu kwakok iti orot momorob ana ubar aki bain isan kwayayamatat.”

5.29 Act 4.19Peter naatu tur abarayah afa bairi hiyafutih hio, “Aki i God fanan anab men orot fanahimih. It ata a’agir hai God Jesu kwa onaf tafanamaim kwa’onaf kwa’asabun momorob i morobone God bora’ah maiye,
5.31 Act 2.33-34; Eph 1.20; Hib 2.10; 12.2God bora’ah yen uman ana asukwafune ima’an, bonawiyenayan naatu baiyawasayan matar, saise Israel sabuw hai ef nabotawiy dogor baikitabiren naatu notawiyen hinab. Aki i iti sawar hai sifrubonayah, naatu sabuw iyab hibifanabow isan God Anun Kakafiyin bitih auman siftirurubon.”

Kaniser sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana veya, gagamat yen bufutih hikokok kwanekwan i boro tur abarayah hita’asbunih. Baise Pharisee orot wabin Gamaliel, ofafar bai’obaiyenayan, sabuw etei iti orot hikakakafiy, kou’ay wanawanan misir iuwih tur abarayah hibuwih hitit ufunamaim mar kafai hibat. Naatu imaibo Kaniser iuwih eo, “Taituwau Israel, abisa iti orot isah kwayayakitifuw mata toniwa’an gewas kwananotabo kwanasinaf.
5.36 Act 21.38Kwananot iti boro’omo Theudas tit orot gagamin ta rouw eorereb naatu oro’orot etei 400 na’atube hikofan, Baise hi’a’asabun ana veya ana bai’ufununayah etei hitaragiy nanabin hin, naatu ana kou’ay re rumoromorob sawar. Nati ufunamaim Judas Galilee orot sabuw hibiyab ana veya tit, sabuw bow kou’ay busuruf, baise i auman hi’asabun naatu ana bai’ufununayah hitaragiy nanabin hin. Isan imih abisa iti boun emamatar isan au’uwi, iti orot kwaihamiyih, naatu kwa’uwih ten, anayabin orot ana notane hinayakitifuw hinasisinaf na’at boro nasawar. Baise Godane nanan na’at, kwa men karam boro kwana’otanih, kwa boro taiyuw God bairi kwanabiyow kwana’itin.”

Iti na’atube eo dogoroh ikitabir.
5.40 Act 4.18Tur Abarayah hi’afih hirun naatu hirouw. Imaibo tur fokarin maiyow hi’uwih naatu hiofafarih Jesu wabin men hinao rerereb, naatu hi’uwih hai au ubar hin.

5.41 Mat 5.10-12; 1Pet 4.13Tur Abarayah Kaniser hihamiyih hitit naatu ereyasisir auman hin, anayabin Jesu wabinamaim hibi’akir i igewasin kwanekwan. Mar etei Tafaror Baremaim naatu hai baremaim sabuw hibi’obaiyih naatu tur gewasin Jesu Keriso isan sabuw hai tur hi’o’owen.

6.1 Act 4.35Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayah hai kou’ay busuruf ra’at. Naatu Jew sabuw iyab Greek tur hio yah so’ar himisir Jew sabuw iyab Hebrew tur hio higam hi’uwih. Anayabin veya ta’ita’imon hai faramamaim kwafukwafur baibin i hikukusairih. Imih tur abarayah nah 12 hi’af bai’ufununayah sabuw etei’imak hiru’ay naatu hi’uwih hio, “Aki God ana tur anihamiy sabuw ana bituw ana itinin aki isai men igewasin. Isan imih taitu, wanawanamaim orot nah seven iyab kwa’i’itih i God Anunin iwansumih tema’am naatu not wairafih i kwanarubinih, saise aki iti bowabow i anitih sabuw hinakaifih. Naatu aki baise ai veya tutufin etei yoyoban anitin naatu tur ana binan.”

Tur Abarayah iti not hibai hititit isan kou’ay tutufin etei hiyasisir naatu Stephen hirubin, orot baitumatumayan naatu Anun Kakafiyin ana way, Philip, Prokorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas auman hirubinih, naatu Nicolaus Antioch orot marasika dogoron hikitabir Jew hai kwafirenamaim run ma’am auman hirubin. Orot nah seven hibow hina tur abarayah nahimaim hitit isah hiyoyoban sawar naatu umah ta’ita’imon tafahimaim hiyara’aten.
6.7 Act 2.41; 16.5Naatu God ana tur tuw ra’at. Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw moumurih na’in hitumatum naatu bai’ufununayah hai kou’ay wanawanan hirun kou’ay ra’at, naatu firis oro’orot auman baitumatum hibai.

Stephen God ana baigegewasin naatu ana fair gagamin maiyow itin, ina’inanen gagamih fokarih sabuw wanawanahimaim ma sinaf. Baise orot iyab Roufamen ana Kou’ay barane himisir Stephen bairi higam. (Roufamen Kou’ay bar i wabih). Nati i Jew sabuw Sairini’ine naatu Alexandria’ane hinan, na’atube Jew afa Silisia naatu Asia wanawanahine hina.
6.10 Luk 21.15Baise God Anunin Stephen baibais itin ukwarin rerekab tur eo i men karam boro fanan hitiya’afut.
Sabuw afa wa’iwa’iramaim hitubunih naatu awah hiore hitit hio, “Stephen, Moses isan naatu God isan baigigimen tur eo aki anonowar!”

Iti na’atube hio, sabuw, regaregah ai’in, naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah yah hiora’ah, Stephen hibai hifatum hibai hina Kaniser nahimaim hitit. Sabuw afa baifufuwenayah hibow hina Stephen isan hifufuwen hio, “Iti orot i mar etei ata Bar Kakafiyin isan naatu Moses ana ofafar isan eo ibigigim.” Naatu iban maiye iti na’atube eo aki anowar, “Jesu Nazareth mowan i boro iti bar kakafiyin nagurus nare naatu ata binanakwar Moses ya’abun rena tabaib boro nab nabotabir!” Iyabowat nati Kaniser ana kou’ay wanawanan hima Stephen hi’itin kweyakweyar, yumatan botabir tounamatar ana yumatabe matar hi’itin.

Imaibo Firis Gagamin Stephen ibatiy, “Tur iti i anababatun o isa teo?”

7.4 Gen 11.31–12.5Imih Kaldia tafaram ihamiy naatu na Haram imaim ma. Tamah momorob ufunamaim God nawiy na me tafaram iti bitin boun kwa iti kwama’am.
7.5 Gen 12.7; 15.18; 17.8God men abisa ta Abraham nowanamih itin naatu men kafa’imo me kikimin eafuw nowanamih itin. Baise God eomatan tafaram tutufin etei boro nowanamih nab naatu wawawan uf hinatutufuw boro hinab. Nati ana veya’amaim Abraham i aurin kek en ma’am God eomatan.
7.6-7 Gen 15.13-14; Exo 12.40Naatu God iti na’atube eo, ‘O wawaw i boro nah toumanih hai tafaramamaim hinama, nati’imaim boro nah toumanih hai fair babanamaim hinama bowabow fokarin maiyow hinabow, hinarouw hini’a’afiyih kwamur etei 400 na’atube nasawar.’
7.7 Exo 3.12Baise God iuwih eo, ‘Ayu nati tafaram hinabuwi babahimaim kwanama kwanabowabow boro baimakiy anitih. Nati ufunamaim boro tafaram kwanihamiy kwanatit efan iti’imaim ayu kwanakwafiru.
7.8 Gen 17.9-14; 21.4Imaibo God ar afu’afuw ana obaibasit Abraham itin ina’inanen na’atube kaif. Imih Abraham natun Isaac tufuw fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim ana ar kanabin e’afuw. Nati ufunamaim Isaac natun Jacob ana ar kanabin e’afuw naatu Jacob natunatun 12 it uwatanah wabih gagamin auman hai ar kanabih e’afuw.

7.9 37.11, 28; 39.2, 21-23Baise uwatanah wabih gagamin Joseph isan hibobowen akir wairafin na’atube hitih hitubun hibai hin Egypt imaim ma. Baise God i mar etei biyanamaim ma’am.

Veya ta Joseph Egypt hai aiwob nanamaim titit ana veya aiwob orot Joseph i’itin yan bai naatu ana kakaf isan ma, anayabin God ukwar rerekab Joseph itin. Imih aiwob orot Joseph bai ana gawanamih yai, naatu aiwob ana bar gagamin wanawanan auman kaifin isan ana fair itin.” Joseph as rulercn01917b.tifAct 7.10©1978 David C. 7.11 Gen 41.54; 42.1-2“Nati ana veya’amaim baimar kakafin na, Egypt naatu Canaan tafaram wanawanan yababan gagamin na’in matar, naatu it uwatanah bayumih hi’akir. Egyptamaim bay ma’am ana tur Jacob nonowar ana veya uwatanah hai nanawan wantoro’ot imaim hin.
7.13 Gen 45.1-4, 16Hai nanawan bairou’abin ana veya Joseph taiyuwin botait irerereb tuwahinah hai tur eowen, naatu Pharaoh nati’imaim Joseph ana nibur isah so’ob.
7.14 Gen 45.9-11; 46.27Nati ufunamaim Joseph tamah Jacob isan, naatu tamah ana nibur isah tur iyafar, nah etei 75 na’atube.

7.17-18 Exo 1.7-8“God ana omatanen Abraham eo’omatan na baiturobe isan ana veya na kabom, naatu ata sabuw Egypt hima’am busuruf ra’at tafaram awan karatan. Imaibo aiwob orot ta Joseph men susu’ub i busuruf Egypt isan i’aiwob.
7.19 Exo 1.11-22Ata a’agir ifufuwih, biyababan kakafin anababatun itih, eokikinih hai kek sosof hisrouwen hi’in himorob.

7.20 Exo 2.2“Nati ana veya’amaim Moses tufuw, kek ana itinin gewasin maiyow. Baremaim hinah tamah hibunwa’ir ma sumar etei tounu na’atube sawar.
7.21 Exo 2.3-10Imaibo barene hibotait titit ana veya, Pharaoh natun babitai natunamih bai ituw ra’at yen orot matar. Egypt ana ukwar rerekab etei Moses hi’obaiy so’ob, naatu ana tur ana sinafumaim eo sisinaf etei i fairih.

“Moses ana kwamur etei 40 na’atube baib ana maramaim ana not bogaigiwas tit ana sabuw Israel inananawanih.
7.24 Exo 2.11-15Tit inan Egypt orot ta Israel orot boborabirab itin, basit na ibais wasfafar naatu anasa bow Egypt orot rab morob. Moses not eo, ‘God ana baibais ayu wanawana’umaim esisinaf au sabuw boro hina’itin hinaso’ob, baise men hi’itinimih.’ Marto Israel orot rou’ab hairi hibiyow itih, basit na fafar naatu iuwih, ‘Kwa airi i ain uf, aisim taiyuw kwabiyow?’ Baise orot ta biwa’an kakafene Moses rukouw eo, ‘O aki bainabatani naatu baibabatiyi isan yait rubini?’
7.28 Exo 2.14‘O kukokok ayu ina’asbunu fai Egypt orot ia’asabun na’atube?’
7.29 Exo 2.21-22; 18.3-4Moses iti tur nonowar ana veya Egypt ihamiy bihir in tafaram wabin Midian imaim ma, nati’imaim touman orot na’atube ma’am natunatun orot rou’ab hitufuw.
7.30-34 Exo 3.1-10Kwamur 40 sasawar ufunamaim oyaw Sinai sisibinamaim arar yan tounamatar Moses isan irerereb wairaf na’atube wa’ab wanawanan to’ab. Moses iti wairaf to’ab i’itin ana veya ana kasiy ra’at, naatu itinbunai isan na biyubin auman Regah fanan nowar; ‘Ayu i o uwatanah hai God, Abraham ana God, Isaac, naatu Jacob.’ Moses yan wanawanan birubir fafar an uman hioror naatu men karam boro tanuw ta’itin.

Imaibo Regah eo, ‘A ana sumasum kubosair anayabin iti kamar i kakafiyin yan kubatabat. Ayu au sabuw Egypt imaim bai’akir kakafin maiyow hibaib aitih, naatu hitef hirererey anowar, imih rufamih botaitih isan are ana. O kuna aiyafari kumatabir maiye au Egypt.’

7.35 Exo 2.14“Moses i orot ta’imon Israel sabuw hikwahir hiu, ‘O yait rubini aki bainabatani naatu baibatiyi isan?’ Nati orot ta’imon sabuw bainabatanih naatu rufamih botaitih isan God taiyuwin ana tounamatar iyafar na wa’ab toto’abamaim irerereb Moses fair itin.
7.36 Exo 7.3; 14.21; Num 14.33Sabuw nawiyih Egypt hihamiy hitit, naatu ina’inan men hi’i’itah efa’efanin Egyptamaim, Red Sea imaim, naatu kwamur 40 arar yanamaim iwa’an hi’itah.

7.37 Deu 18.15“Iti orot Moses i boun Israel sabuw hai tur eowen, ‘God boro dinab orot kwa wanawananamaim a orot ta niyafar nan, ayu biyafaru na’atube.’
7.38 Exo 19.3Iti orot Moses Israel sabuw bairi kou’ay hibai arar yanamaim hibat naatu ata a’agir bairi Sinai oyawemaim tounamatar tur yawasin bai re itin naatu ya’abun it isat rena. Baise it ata a’agir fanan men hibosiyasiyar, naatu fanan hikwahir hikokok i mi’itube hitamatabir maiye hitan Egypt hitatit.
7.40 Exo 32.1Imih Aaron hiu, ‘Aki akokok god ta kusinaf au nai i’iyon ebonawiyi. Moses Egyptane nawiyi atitit men aso’ob abisa isan matar.’
7.41 Exo 32.2-6Nati ana veya’amaim aibat ta cow natun ana yumatabe hibu’ur. Naatu sibor hibow hina sawar i umahimaim hisinaf mamatar ana sibor hiyai naatu ana hiyuw hibow hiyasisir.
7.42-43 Amo 5.25-27Baise God mafutih, naatu mar ana sawar kwafirih isan ibasit. Dinab orot hai Bukamaim hikikirum na iturobe,

kwamur 40 arar yan kwama’am ana veya Israel sabuw,
book.p: Kwa i god Moloch ana sis kwa’abar kwareremor,

umamaim aibat kwatar kwakwakwafir.
Isan imih ayu boro aniyafari kwanan Babilon ufunane kwanama.’
book.p:
“Ata a’agir God ana sis arar yanamaim hiyai hima’am i God ana itinin nati’imaim bairi hima’am. Nati sis i God mi’itube Moses iu bi’obaiy na’atube naatu God yayakitifuw na’atube hiwowab.
7.45 Jos 3.14-17Nati ufunamaim, ata a’agir sis tamahinah biyahine nan hibai hi’abar Joshua babanamaim bonawiyih bairi hirun sabuw afa hai tafaram God nunih hititit i hai tafaram hibai. Naatu nati sis i ma’am David ana veya’amaim tit.
7.46 2Sa 7.1-16David ana baibais gagamin na’in God biyanane bai, imih ifefeyan bar tawowab. Jacob ana God isan

“Baise Auyomtoro’ot ana God i men orot bar tewowowabimaim ema’ama’amih, dinab orot eo kikirum na’atube.
book.q: 7.49-50 ISa 66.1-2‘Mar i ayu au urama’ama,
naatu kamar i ayu au ana baibiyarir.
Regah eo,
Abi bar boro ayu isou kwanawowab?
Efan i boro menamaim aniyarir? Sawar iti kwanotanot men ayu asinaf himatar?’
book.p:
7.51 Isa 63.10“Kwa i dogor fokarih naatu dogor wanawanan gugumin naatu tain gugurih God ana tur men kwanonowar! Kwa i a’a’agir ah kwabat, mar etei Anun Kakafiyin kwarurukouw!
7.52 Mat 23.31Kwa a’agir dinab orot marasika hima’am etei hirouw hi’a’akirih, nati dinab oro’orot i marasika iti orot gewasin nan isan hikurereb. Baise kwa uwatanah hirouw himorob, naatu boun kwa iti orot gewasin nan baban kwao kwarab morob. Kwa i God ana ofafar tounamatar hiyafar re’er kwabai, baise men kwabobosiyasiyar!”

Kaniser hima Stephen eo hinonowar yah so’ar gagamat bufutih hikarmusiyan himisir
7.55 Psa 110.1Baise Stephen God Anun Kakafiyin biyan etei karatan batabat au mar nuwra’at God ana marakaw itin naatu Jesu sisibin asukwafune batabat itin.
7.56 Col 3.1Basit eo, “Kwanuw ra’at! Ayu mar ana etawan botawiy Orot Natun God ana asukwafune bat ai’itin!”

Fanah aumetawat hiwow tainih higibud, imaibo etei au ta’imon hinunuw hibai hitain hitit bar merar gagamin ufunane hitaiy re kabayamaim hirab, orot iyab baifuwenamaim sif hirurubon, hai faifuw nati orot boubun wabin Saul anamaim hiya. Kabayamaim hibat hirabirab auman Stephen Regah isan ifefeyan eo “Regah Jesu ayubu kubai!”
7.60 Luk 23.34Sun yowen fanan aumetawat erererey auman i wow eo, “Regah abisa ayu isou tisisinaf hai
kakafih kunotawiyen.” Iti na’atube eo basit morob. Stephen hi’asabun momorob isan Saul auman isaito.

Nati ana veya’amaim ekaleisia Jerusalem wanawananamaim isah bai’akir kakafin matar, naatu bai’ufununayah etei nanabin hibihir. Afa au Judea na’at hibihir naatu afa au Samaria na’at hibihir. Baise tur abarayah akisihimo Jerusalem hima. Kwafirenayah sabuw afa Stephen hiyai naatu isan hiyababan rerey gagamin maiyow hima hirererey.
8.3 Act 9.1, 13; 22.4; 26.9-11Naatu Saul ekaleisia gurusin busuruf bar awan awan run tit orot babin bow rouw fatum iteten in dibur baremaim yaririyen.

Iyab hitagey nanabin hititit i God ana tur hibinan auman hinan. Philip re in Samaria bar merar gagaminamaim Keriso ana tur binan in. Philip eo sabuw hinonowar naatu ina’inanen sinaf hi’i’itan etei hina hiyubin ana tur nowar isan. Sabuw moumurih maiyow wanawanahimaim afiy kakafih tarsumih hima’am erefanah auman hititit, naatu ah umah kafikafirih naatu ah umah murumurubih moumurih maiyow auman iyayawasih Imih nati bar meraramaim yasisir gagamin maiyow tafair tit.

Baise nati bar meraramaim i orot ta wabin Simon ma farum eafusar farum Samaria orot babin bibibiruwih, naatu taiyuwin wabin bora’ara’ah orot gagamin rouw eo. Naatu sabuw etei nati bar merar hima’am, orot kikimin yen in orot gagamin etei fanan akisin hinonowar hio, “Iti orot i God ana fair bai, wabin ‘Fair Gagamih.’” Sabuw etei hibi’ufunun anayabin manin maiyow ana farumamaim bibibiruwih. Baise ana maramaim Philip na tur gewasin God ana aiwob isan naatu Jesu Keriso ana fair isan binan hinonowar, orot babin etei hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai. Simon taiyuwin auman itumatum naatu bapataito bai misir Philip mi’itube inan na’atube i’ufunun hairi hin naatu ina’inan gagamih maiyow himamatar i’itah isan ifofofor morob.

Tur Abarayah Jerusalem hima’am Samaria sabuw God ana tur hibasit hibaib tur hinowar, Peter John hairi hiyafarih isah hin. Hin hititit ana veya isah hiyoyoban, saise Anun Kakafiyin hitab. Anayabin Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito hibaib ana veya, Anun Kakafiyin men yait ta tafanamaim yenamih.
8.17 Act 19.6Imaibo Peter John hairi umah tafah hiyara’aten isah hiyoyoban naatu Anun Kakafiyinane hibai.

Sabuw tafah umah hiyara’aten Anun Kakafiyin re hibaib Simon i’itin ana veya, kabay baih tur abarayah itih naatu eo, “Ayu auman akokok nati fair ayu kwanitu, saise sabuw iyabowat tafah ayayara’aten i auman Anun Kakafiyin hinab.” Baise Peter iya’afut eo “O akabay airi mi’itube kwatamorob, anayabin o kunotanot God ana siwar i boro kabayamaim inatubun. O a bowabow ta men aki biyai’imaim ema’am, anayabin o dogor God nanamaim i men mutufurinamih. Iti not kakafihine dogor kwikitabir naatu Regah isan kuyoyoban ta’itin a not kakafin nati dogoromaim ema’am boro nanotawiy. Anayabin ayu ai’iti o dogor wanawanan i bahiy iwansumi mata ebifefek naatu bowabow kakafin ana dibur irun kuma’am.” Imaibo Simon iyafutih eo, “Regah isan kwayoyoban wainu, saise sawar iti na’atube men ta isou namataramih.”
Regah ana yawas hio’orereb naatu ana tur hibibinan ufunamaim, Peter John hairi himatabir maiye au Jerusalem hiyey ana veya, Samaria bar merar ta ta wanawanahimaim tur gewasin hibinan auman hin.

Imaibo God ana tounamatar Philip iu, “A ef asukwafune inab, arar yan ana ef Jerusalemane re in Gaza titit iwat inab inare inan.” Ethiopian eunuch and Philipcn01931B.tifAct 8.26©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Ethiopian orot Philip hairi hitar8.26-30 Imih Philip misir ef nati butitiy inan founamaim Ethiopia orot gagamin hairi hitar. Iti orot i Ethiopia hai queen ana kabay etei ana nutitiyenayan gagamin, aiwob babin ana aiwob wabin i Kandis. Iti orot gagamin yena Jerusalem God kwafir sawar, me yan ana wa bai ana ubar matabir maiye re’er, ef yanamaim dinab orot Isaiah ana buk rusasar ma iyab auman inan. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin Philip iu, “Kwen ni’i wa sisibinamaim kwiyubin.”
Philip imaibo nunuw yen na iyubin, tainin i’abar dinab orot Isaiah ana tur biyab nowar, naatu Philip orot ibatiy, “Nati buk kubiyab anayabin iso’ob?”
Orot iya’afut eo, “Mi’itube boro anaso’ob? Orot ta isou nakubuna boro anaso’ob?” Naatu Philip ifefeyan yen sisibin mare.
8.32-33 ISa 53.7-8Orot gagamin i buk firorow wanawanan ana hanef iti rusasar ma biyab.
book.q: ‘Bobaituw sheep na’atube beyahinamih hibai hin,
sheep natun lamb na’atube bunibunin hi’a’afuw men fanan sib itkwarakwar.
Taiyuwin yare, ma gewas ana baitafen tutur isan men hinuwet gewas,
aurin kek en morob.
Anayabin i ana yawas tafaramamaim i na yomanin tit.’
book.p: Naatu Ethiopia orot Philip ibatiy, “Ku’o anowar, yait isan iti dinab orot eo? I taiyuwin isan, ai orot babin ta isan?” Imaibo Philip Buk ana hanef menamaim busuruf biyab imaim tur gewasin Jesu isan ana tur eowen.

8.36 Act 10.47Ef yan hire hinan auman hina harew soson ta’amaim hitit naatu orot gagamin eo, “Harew iti, tare bapataito kwitu.” Philip iya’afut eo, “O karam boro bapataito inab, dogor tutufin etei inabitumatum na’at.” Iya’afut eo, “Ayu abitumatum Jesu Keriso i God Natun. 8.37 Buk afa’amaim hanef 37 i tafan hiya’abar

Orot gagamin ana wa rowenatan naatu Philip hairi hire hin harew yan hire nati’imaim Philip orot bapataito itin. Harewane hiyeye ana maramaim, Regah Anunin Philip bora’ah. Orot gagamin men itin maiye, baise ereyasisir auman ana ef rura’ah maiye remor in.
8.40 Act 21.8Nati ana veya’amaim Philip i Azotus imaim rouwatait, naatu in Caesarea tit, efamaim inan bar awan, awan run tit tur gewasin binan auman remor in.”

9.1 Act 8.3Baise Saul i Regah ana bai’ufununayah rouw morob isan menan bi’arakok. Imih na firis ukwarih biyah tit, fef tab auman tan Damaskas wanawanan Kou’ay Bar ta ta hai ukwarih hitaso’ob isan ifefeyan, saise sabuw iyab Regah ana efamaim hima’ama orot o babin etei tafatumih tabow tan Jerusalem dibur taya. Nati isan au Damaskas yen inan, na bar merar biyubin auman naniyan meyemeye marakaw marane namanamarabe bow sisibin roun roun etei e’arasib re, naatu me yan re rab, orot fanan nowar wabin su’ub eo “Saul, Saul aisim ayu irabu kubia’akiru?”
Saul ibatiy, “Regah o yait?” Orot fanan tit maiye iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Jesu o irabu kubia’akiru. Baise kumisir kwen bar merar gagamin kutit, nati’imaim boro hinao inanowar abisa boro inasinaf.”

Orot afa Saul bairi hinan hai tur sawar hinutanub hibat orot fanan hinowar, baise men yait ta ana yumat hi’itin. Saul me yan inu’in misir matan nuw, baise matan isukway men abisa ta itin, basit uman hibai hi’unawiy hin Damaskas hitit. Veya tounu na’atube matan ifim ma. Nati ana maramaim men kafa’imo bay ta eaan naatu harew tom.
Baitumatumayan orot ta wabin Ananias Damaskas ma’am matan hibora’ah tainin tayowan Regah isan eafa’af fanan nowar, “Ananias!”
Ananias iya’afut eo “Regah ayu iti.”

Regah eo, “Inabogaigiwas inan ef gagamin wabin mutufor imaim inatit naatu Judas ana baremaim Tarsus orot wabin Saul isan inibatiyih, i ma eyoyoyoban. Naatu Saul matan hibora’ah orot ta wabin Ananias itin narun umanamaim matan butubun nuwanuw maiyen itin.”

Ananias iya’afut eo, “Regah sabuw moumurih na’in nati orot isan hio anowar, sawar kakafih maiyow o a sabuw Jerusalem hima’am isah sinaf. Naatu boun i firis ukwarih biyahine fair bai na iti Damaskas tit sabuw iyab o tekwakwafiri bow fatumen isan.”

9.15 Act 26.2, 6; 27.24; Rom 1.5Baise Regah iu, “O i boro inan anayabin ayu nati orot arubin isou nabowamih, wabu nab natit Ufun Sabuw, aiwob sabuw, naatu Israel sabuw wanawanahimaim nabosemor.
9.16 2Cor 11.23-28Naatu ayu taiyuwu boro ani’obaiy bai’akir gagamin na’in ayu wabu isan ni’akir.”

Basit Ananias misir in bar efan Regah eo’omaim tit naatu bar wanawanan run, uman Saul tafanamaim yara’ah eo, “Saul ayu taiu Regah Keriso efamaim o isa birerereb i ayu iyunu anan o mata nigewasin inanuw maiye, naatu Anun Kakafiyin niwani. Naniyan meyemeye matan siy kanabinin na’atube ma’am hea’obow re, matan kubunai nuw maiye, naatu misir re bapataito bai. Bay eaa ufunamaim ana fair matabir maiye bai.
Veya bai’ab na’atube Saul bai’ufununayah bairi Damaskas hima. Saul misir mutufor in Kou’ay Bar run busuruf Jesu isan binan eo, “Jesu i turobe God Natun.”

9.21 Act 8.3Sabuw etei hinowar hifofofor naatu hibabatiyih hio, “Orotoban iti Jerusalemamaim sabuw iyab Jesu wabinamaim hikwakwafir rouw himorob? Naatu iti’imaim nan ana’an i nati sawar ta’imon isan na, sabuw fatum bow na firis gagamin baitihimih?”
9.22 Act 18.28Baise Saul binan inan ana fair ra’at, Jew sabuw iyab Damaskas hima’am hai not botabir naatu i’obiyih Jesu i anababatun Keriso, 9.22 God Ana Roubinenayan iti na’at eo sabuw tur omih hikasiy.

Fur bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Jew sabuw hiru’ay Saul morob isan hiyakitifuw. Baise abisa sinafumih hiyayakitifuw i hio nowar, fai mar i etawan awan hima’afut hima’am tatitit hita’asabunimih.
9.25 2Cor 11.32-33Baise gugumin ta ana bai’ufununayah Saul kaifet wanawananamaim hiwan fur ana sou ta’amaim hiruru re.

9.26 Gal 1.17-19Saul na Jerusalem tit sinaftobon bai’ufununayah bairi baita’imonin isan. Baise bai’ufununayah i Saul isan hai bir ra’at, anayabin men hibitumatum Saul i turobe baitumatumayan ta matar ai en.
9.27 1Cor 9.1Imaibo Barnabas na ibais bai in Tur Abarayah biyah tit, kubuna mi’itube efamaim Regah itin naatu Regah eo nowar. Ana binan fairin Jesu wabinamaim auman eo hinowar. Naatu hibai bairi hima Jerusalem ana uman men sanet etei remor Regah wabinamaim binan. Jew sabuw iyab Greek tur hio bairi hi’o hibas naatu rabin morob isan hiyakitifuw. Baise baitumatumayah afa tur hinowar basit, Saul hibai hire Caesarea hitit naatu au Tarsus hiyafar in.

Imaibo ekaleisia sabuw Judea, Galilee naatu Samaria wanawanahimaim etei tufuwamaim hima hiyasisir. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin ana baibaisamaim fair hibai naatu hai kou’ay busuruf wowab ra’at yen, Regah nanamaim kakaf auman hima.

Peter efan ta ta etei run tit ana sabuw itih remor inan, veya ta God ana sabuw iyab Lydda bar merar gagamin hima’ama bainanawanihimih in. Nati’imaim orot ta wabin Aeneas, an uman murubin bai’etaw en gem yan inu’in kwamur etei eight sawar. Basit Peter isan eo, “Aeneas Jesu Keriso o ebiyawasi kumisir, a ir kunu ku’abar.” Orot mar ta’imonamo misir. Sabuw etei Lydda naatu Sharon wanawanan hima’am abisa matar hi’i’itin etei hitumatum naatu Regah isan hitatabir.

Joppa bar meraramaim babin ta wabin Tabitha, Greek fanahimaim i Dorcas. Iti babin i baitumatumayan ta mar etei gewasin esisinaf naatu yababan wairafih ebibaisih. Nati ana veya’amaim sawow bai naatu morob biyan hisouw hibai hiyen bar tafantoro’ot hi’inuw. Joppa na Lydda titit i men ef yok, imih bai’ufununayah Joppa hima’am Peter na Lydda’amaim titit ana tur hinowar. Basit orot rou’ab hiyafarih hin hifefeyan hio, “Are Peter akokok saise inan biyai inatit, men inarubir.”

Basit Peter bobuna misir bairi hin, hina hitit hiyen bar awan yate tafan imaim hirun. Naatu kwafukwafur baibin etei hai faifuw Dorcas yawasin ma’am ana veya sakir bitih auman hibow hina hi’obaibiy hirerey auman hirun.

Peter sabuw etei iuwih ufun hitit, i sun yowen yoyoban imaibo eo, “Tabitha kumisir!” Babin matan nuw naatu nura’at Peter i’itin ana maramaim misir mare ma. Peter eof babin bai ibais misir bat, imaibo baitumatumayah naatu kwafukwafur isah eaf hina yawasin batabat i’obaiyih hi’itin. Tur tasasar tit Joppa sabuw etei hinowar naatu moumurih na’in Regah hitumitum. Peter veya moumurih na’in Joppa’amaim orot wabin Simon ana baremaim hairi hima.

Caesarea imaim orot wabin Cornelius Rome baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin baiyow ana kou’ay wabin Italian Regiment. Cornelius i God ana orot ta, i ana nibur tutufin etei God hikwakwafir, baibais gagamin maiyow yababan wairafih bitih, naatu mar etei God isan yoyoyoban. Cornelius prayingcn01943B.tifAct 10.2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Cornelius eyoyoyoban10.2
Veya ta rabirab three korok na’atube matan hibora’ah God ana tounamatar na run wabin su’ub eo, “Cornelius!”
Cornelius matan takiyat itinkikin erebirubir auman eo, “Regah abisa kukokok?”

Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “God ayoyoban naatu a siwar yababan sabuw ibitih Regah nanamaim hitit itin nuhin kusib. Imih boun orot afa iniyafarih hinan Joppa orot Simon, wabin ta Peter, i hinanawiy bairi hinan. Simon bobaituw kanabihimaim sawar yumatah ta ta sakirayan i ana baremaim bairi tema’am, ana bar tor rewan ebatabat.”

Basit tounamatar hairi hio inan ufut, Cornelius ana bowayah orot rou’ab naatu baiyowayah orot ta’imon e’af ayuwih. Iti baiyowayan orot auman i God ana orot, Cornelius biyan ana tafafarayan orot. Sawar etei himamatar na’atube hai tur eowen, basit iyafarih hin Joppa hitit.
book.s: Peter Matan Hibora’ah Marane Sawar Hire’er Itan
book.p:
Mar to orot efamaim hina Joppa hibiyubin auman, Peter auyit yen in bar tafan yoyoban isan. Basit bayumih morob ana kok i bay taa, bay hibogaigiwas bifotamih i matan taratan. Mar botawiy naatu sawar ta rar gagamin na’atube umasusun kwafe’en hikuhamihamiy re me yan titit itin. Nati wanawanan for yumatah ta ta, kok uma’ar, gabunam, naatu kutor mamu. Peter’s visioncn01945B.tifAct 10.12©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Peter matan hibora’ah masanuw kakafih biyah gubagug auman itah10.12 Orot fanan nowar eo, “Peter kumisir iti sawar kurouw ku’aa.”
10.14 Lev 11.1-47; Ezk 4.14Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Men karam Regah, ayu men kafai sawar iti na’atube karitanih eregubagub auman aa’umih.”
10.15 Mak 7.15, 19Orot fanan iban bairou’abin e’af maiye, “Sawar abisa God eorereb gewasin rarouw men o a notamaim kakafin inarouw inao.”
Sawar iti na’atube mar tounu matar, imaibo naniyan meyemeye sawar matabir maiye yen mar run.

Peter matan hibora’ah sawar iti i’itin anayabin so’ob isan kasiy ma binotanot, orot Cornelius iyafarih hinan bar hitita’ur hina fur awan hibat. Hi’afariy hibatiyih hio, “Orot wabin Simon Peter iti a baremaim ema’am?”

Peter matan hibobora’ah isan boro’ika ma binotanot, Anun Kakafiyin iu eo, “Simon, orot nah tounu o tenunuwihi. Imih kumisir kura’iy bar baban, men a inakutan baise bairi kwanan, anayabin ayu aiyafarih hina.” Peter misir ra’iy naatu iuwih eo, “Ayu orotoban iti kwa ayu kwanunuwuhu, kwa a’an aisim kwana?”

Hiya’afut hio, “Aki i baiyowayan orot ukwarin wabin Cornelius iyafari ana. Iti orot ana yawas i gewasin, naatu God ebibiruw, Jew sabuw etei iti orot i tekakakafiy. Tounamatar kakafiyin iu, o tifefeyani itan ana bar, saise o abisa itao’o i tanowar isan.” Basit Peter nah tounu buwih bar hirun bairi fai ta’imon hi’in.
book.s: Peter Na Cornelius Ana Bar Tit
book.p:
Mar to Peter ana orot bairi himisir naatu baitumatumayah afa Joppa’ane auman hiturih bairi hin. Veya baitonin hina Caesarea hitit. Cornelius i ma matan ef i’itin, taintuwan afa e’af ayuwih hina ana baremaim bairi hima Peter hikakaif. Peter na bar rur ana maramaim, Cornelius nanamaim sun yowen kwafir re.
10.26 Act 14.13-15; Rev 19.10Baise Peter imisiruw eo, “Kumisir ayu i orot o na’atube.” Peter tur busuruf auman Cornelius hairi hirun hin bar wanawanan hitit naatu sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in hima’am kouh yen. Iuwih eo, “Kwa etei kwaso’ob Jew hai ofafar men ebibasit boro Ufun Sabuw atinanawani bairi tatitayo’ay. Baise God i’obaiyu aitin ayu men orot ta biyan karitanin o gubagub anarouw anao. Imih ayu isou tur kwabiyafar, ayu men erekwahir auman anamih. Ayu kwa abibatiy, aisim ayu isou tur kwaiyafar ana?”

Cornelius iya’afut eo, “Veya kwafe’en na’atube sawaraka, veya three korok na’atube rabirab au baremaim ayoyoyoban, naniyan meyemeye orot ana faifuw kwes nau’umaim bat eo, ‘Cornelius, ayoyoban God nowar naatu a siwar sabuw yababan wairafih ibitih imaim ana not kusib. ‘Orot ta kwiyafar en Joppa imaim orot wabin Simon wabin ta Peter i Simon bobaituw kanabihimaim sawar ta ta sakirayan ana bar tor rewanamaim ema’am biyan etit.’ Imih o isa tur saisewat aiyafar, naatu gewasin maiyow o ina itit, naatu aki etei God nanamaim Regah sawar etei eo biyuni nowaramih ama akakaif.”

10.34 Deu 10.17; Rom 2.11Imaibo Peter busuruf binan eo, “Ayu bounabo aso’ob, God men orot babin ta’imon itin yan ebaibimih. Baise orot menan ta ta iyab i tibibiruw naatu abisa gewasin tisisinaf. Tur God iyafar na Israel biyah titit i etei kwaso’ob, iti tur gewasin i tufuw Jesu Keriso wanawanamaim ema’am. It etei ata Regah.
10.37 Mat 4.12-17Naatu kwaso’ob sawar abisa Judea wanawanan mamatar, John bapataito isan bibinan ufunamaim iti sawar i Galilee imaim busuruf.
10.38 Mat 3.16; Luk 4.17-21Mi’itube Anun Kakafiyinamaim God Jesu Nazareth matuwan tafan eof nowah naatu fair tafan bisuwai i kwaso’ob. Naatu ana bowabow mi’itube run tit bow yawas gewasin sinaf, sabuw iyab afiy hai fairamaim hima’am etei biyawasih auman i kwaso’ob, anayabin God i hairi hima’am.

Sawar abisa Jew hai me yan naatu Jerusalemamaim sisinaf etei i aki a’itah sif arurubon. Naatu onaf afe’enamaim hikubar momorob auman i aki aso’ob. Baise veya tounu ufunamaim God morobone bora’ah maiye naatu iwa’an tit irerereb sabuw hi’itin.
10.41 Luk 24.42-43; Act 1.8Men sabuw etei hi’itin, baise sabuw iyab God rurubinihiwat, nati i aki iyab morobone mimisir maiye ufunamaim bairi a’aa atomatomawat.
10.42 Act 17.31; 1Pet 4.5Naatu eobaiyuni tur gewasin sabuw etei isah ana binan hai tur ana’owen Jesu i God Rubin sabuw yawayawasih naatu murumurubih baibabatiyih isan.
10.43 Isa 53.5-6; Jer 31.34; Act 2.38Dinab orot etei isan hibinan hio sabuw iyab i wabinamaim hinabitumatum boro hai bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen.”

10.44 Act 11.15; 15.8Peter iti na’atube bat eo inan wanawanan Anun Kakafiyin ra’iy sabuw iyab hima tur hinonowar tar gabuwih. Jew baitumatumayah afa Peter bairi Joppa’ane hinan hifofofor men kafaita. God ana usar Anun Kakafiyin Ufun Sabuw auman tafahimaim isuwai re’ere isan.
10.46 Act 2.4; 19.6Naatu sabuw menah botabir tur ta ta hio God hibora’ara’ah.

Imaibo Peter eo, “Iti sabuw boro yait harewamaim bapataito bain isan na’otanih? Anayabin Anun Kakafiyin it tabaib na’atube i auman hibaika.
10.48 Act 19.5Basit iuwih Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito hibai, naatu Peter veya bai’ab na’atube bairi ma isan hifefeyan nati’imaim bairi hima.
book.s: Peter Jerusalem Baitumatumayah I Ana Bowabow Isan Hai Tur Eowen
book.p:
Tur Abarayah naatu baitumatumayah Judea wanawanan Ufun Sabuw God ana tur hibaib isan tur hinowar. Imih Peter yena Jerusalem titit ana veya baitumatumayah hai ar afu’afuw himisir higam hio,
11.3 Act 10.28; Gal 2.12“O in Ufun Sabuw hai ar mo’oh tutufih bairi kwama kwa’aa kwatomatom iti ina.”

Naatu Peter busuruf aneika abisa mamatar i kubuna hai tur eowen eo.
11.5-15 Act 10.9-48“Veya ta Joppa ama ayoyoyoban ana maramaim matau hibora’ah sawar ta rar gagamin na’atube tainin kwafe’en marane hikuhamihamiy rena sisibu’umaim nutanub. Ayu anunuwariy for yumatah ta ta a’itan, uma’ar, kok, uway naatu mamu aitah, basit orot ta fanan anowar iuwu eo, ‘Peter kumisir sawar iti kurouw ku’aa.’
Baise ayu ao, ‘Regah men karam, anayabin bay kakafih naatu gubagub auman men kafa’imo awau’umaim narunamih.’

Baise orot fanan iban maiye marane eafare eo, ‘Sawar abisa God kurereb gewasin eo, o men kakafin inarouw inao’omih.’ Sawar iti i mar tounu matar, basit yomaninamaim sawar tutufin etei matabir maiye in mar wanawanan run.

Nati ana veya’amaim orot tounu Caesarea’ane ayu isou hiyafarih hina bar ama’ama imaim hitit. Anun Kakafiyin iuwu bairi kwanan men inakwahir, naatu Joppa’ane taitu nah six hituru bairi an Caesarea atit naatu orot wabin Cornelius ana bar arun. Cornelius ana bar wanawanan Tounamatar mi’itube irerereb i’itin i ai tur eowen naatu tounamatar iu, ‘Orot afa iniyunih hinan Joppa orot wabin Simon Peter biyan hinatit.
11.14 Act 16.31Naatu i boro ayawas ana tur nab nan nao kwananowar, naatu nati turamaim o a nibur bairi naatu taituwa afa bairi kwama’am boro yawas kwanab.’

11.15 Act 2.4“Naatu ayu abusuruf ao anan ana maramaim Anun Kakafiyin re targabuwih, anamaim it tatar gabuwit na’atube.
11.16 Act 1.5Imaibo ayu Regah abisa eo i anot, ‘John i harewamaim bapataito it, baise kwa boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito kwanitih.’ Imih iti i bebeyan, God siwar ta’imon Ufun Sabuw itih, it Regah Jesu Keriso tabitumitum ana maramaim bitit na’atube. Imih ayu yait God abisa sisinaf boro ata’otan?”
11.18 Act 13.48; 14.27Iti tur hinonowar ana veya hai gamin sawar, God hibora’ara’ah hio, “Turobe. God Ufun Sabuw auman kakafih baihamiyen yawas bain isan hai ef botawiy itih.”

11.19 Act 8.1‑4Biyababan bai’akir kakafin Stephen hirab momorob ana maramaim matar, baitumatumayah tarbounih hitit nanabin hin. Afa hin Fonisia, Cyprus, naatu Antioch imaim hitit Jew akisihimo isah tur gewasin hifaram. Baise baitumatumayah afa Cyprus naatu Sairini hima’am hin Antioch hitit Ufun Sabuw auman isah hibinan tur gewasin Jesu Keriso isan hai tur hi’owen. Regah ana fair tafah mara’at hibinan sabuw moumurih na’in hitumatum Regah isan hitatabir.

11.22 Act 4.36Abisa hisisinaf ana tur in Jerusalem ekaleisia hinowar, basit Barnabas hiyafar na Antioch tit. Natitit ana maramaim God sabuw mi’itube bigegewasinih itih, basit yan sisir naatu koufair itih eo, dogor tutufin etei kwaniturobe Regah sisibinika kwanama. Barnabas i orot gewasin, Anun Kakafiyin biyan karatan naatu ana baitumatum fairin, imih sabuw moumurih na’in bow hina Regah biyan hitit.

11.25 Act 9.30Imaibo Barnabas Saul nuwihinamih in Tarsus tit. Nuwih inanan baib ana maramaim nawiy hairi hina Antioch hitit, imaim kwamur ta’imon tutufin ekaleisia nati’imaim bairi hima. Naatu sabuw bai’ufununayah boubuh kou’ay gagamin na’in hi’obaibiyih. Imih bai’ufununayah tafaram Antioch imaim wab iti Kirisiyan teo imaim matar.

Nati ana veya’amaim dinab orot afa Jerusalemane hina Antioch hitit.
11.28 Act 21.10Naatu dinab orot ta wabin Agabus Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim misir eo, “Baimar kakafin boro’omo tafaram wanawanan namatar.” Iti baimar i Claudius i’aiwob ma’ama ana veya’amaim matar. Bai’ufununayah hai not hibogaigiwas i hai mour ana fofonin na’atube tuwahinah Judea hima’am baibaisih isan hio,
11.30 Act 12.25naatu hisinaf. Imaibo Barnabas, Saul hairi umahimaim hiyafar hibai hin ai’in Jerusalem hima’am hitih.

Nati ana veya’amaim Herod busuruf sabuw afa hina ekalesia ana kou’ayamaim hima’am bow fatum bai’akir kakafin maiyow itih. Naatu John tuwah James uwih hibai kaiyomaim hiyi morob. Iti na’atube sinaf Jew sabuw hibiyasisir itih, basit, Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw hi’aa ana mar eo Peter hibai hifatum. Peter hibai hifafatum ufunamaim hibai hin dibur hiyari’iy, baiyowayah etei 16 hima’uh hima.
Pilate kokok i Tar Nowaten hiyuw ufunamaim sabuw etei matahimaim tibatiy isan. Imih Peter diburamaim hibotan hima, baise ekaleisia dogoroh tutufin etei God isan hiyoyoban.

Nati gugumin ta’imon Pilate yayakitifuw mar tatot tibatiyimih, Peter baise ma’utenayah orot rou’ab hai founamaim uman rororon chain hi’utan. Naatu au waraunane i ma’utenayah umah hi’utan naatu i matan fot in. Dibur etawan auman ma’utenayah hibat hikakaif. Naniyan meyemeye Regah ana tounamatar run bat naatu marakaw bar wanawanan kusisiar re, tounamatar Peter tuwabun bai ibunibun eo, “Mata enuw kumisir saife.” Mar ta’imonamo Peter uman chain hiha’obow hire. Angel awaking Petercn01953B.tifAct 12.7©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Tounamatar na Peter ebibunibun12.7

Imaibo tounamatar Peter iu, “A faifuw kwiyoun naatu a baibiyon kwiyoun.” Peter na’atube sinaf naatu tounamatar eo, “A faifuw tafan baibiyon naiw kufifin naatu kwi’ufnunu.” Peter i’ufunun hairi hitit dibur bar ufunane hire, baise Peter men kafa’imo so’ob tounamatar abisa sisinaf, i notanot i mimim rouw.
12.10 Act 5.19Hitit ma’utenayah etawan wan hibatabat naatu etawan bairou’abin hibatabat hinatabirih. Naatu hina etawan gagamin in bar merar titit awanamaim hitit, etawan akisin botawiy hitit ef yan hire. Ef nati hibutitiy hin yomaninamaim hitit, basit tounamatar sa’iwa’an.

Peter imaibo matan to iwa’an eo, “Turobe, iti sawar i anababatun ayu isou matar. Regah ana tounamatar iyafar Herod ana fairane naatu Jew sabuw sawar abisa hinotanot mataramih i umahine ayu iyawasu. Peter ana not kukubunai ufunamaim na John Mark hinah Mary ana bar tit. Nati’imaim sabuw moumurih na’in hiru’ay hima hiyoyoyoban. Peter na etawan ufunane bat rukikitar, naatu bowabow babitai wabin Rhoda etawan botawiyinamih na. Baise Peter fanan i’inan ana maramaim yan wanawanan yasisir awan karatan etawan botawiyina’e i matabir nunuw run e’af eo, “Peter na ufun ebatabat.”

Sabuw hi’u, “O anot i kwaris.” Baise i ana yanibebemaim, imih hio, “Nati i Peter ayubin.” Baise Peter bat rurukikitar etawan hibotawiy, naatu hi’i’itin ana veya hifofofor men kafaita. Peter umanamaim iman awah bofot naatu Regah mi’itube diburane bobotait hai tur eowen, “Iti i James ana tur kwana’owen naatu taitu auman hai tur kwana’owen.” Imaibo ihamiyih tit efan ta’amaim in.

12.18 Act 5.22-24Mar auman baiyowayah wanawanahimaim kasiy gagamin na’in matar, taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Peter isan mi’itube’emih iti na’atube matar?” Herod kwararih hin hinuwih, baise men hitita’ur. Basit ma’utenayah orot nah 16 buwih ibabatiyih sawar eo hibow hin hirouw himorob.
Iti ufunamaim imaibo Pilate Judea ihamiy re in Caesarea imaim mar kafai ma.

Herod ana yaso’ar gagamin na’in Taiya naatu Sidon sabuw isah biyaso’aso’ar. Imih sabuw kou’ay hibai Herod itinamih hina. Wantoro’ot aiwob ana orot gagamin wabin Blastus yan hiyi rabon isahine bat imaibo hina Herod biyan hitit tufuw isan hifefeyan. Anayabin hai tafaram ana bay i Herod ana tafaramane nan.

Veya hirurubin na’atube aiwob hai gub ana faifuw bai iyoun ana urama’ama’amaim mare ma sabuw isah binan. Sabuw tur hinonowar hio, “Iti men orot ebibinanumih, baise god.”
12.23 Dan 5.20Mar ta’imon Regah ana tounamatar Herod rab re morob biyan motamot hi’an morob, anayabin sabuw bora’aten hibitin men bai God itinimih. 12.23 You’uyou kamokamon hikarayou morob.

12.24 Isa 55.11Naatu God ana tur ra’at tasasar tit sabuw etei hinowar.
12.25 Act 11.29-30; 15.37Barnabas, Saul hairi hai bowabow hibisawar ufunamaim Jerusalemane himatabir maiye John Mark hibai bairi hin.

Ekaleisia Antioch wanawananamaim orot afa i dinab oro’orot naatu afa i bai’obaiyenayah, naatu orot wabih i iti: Barnabas, Simeon, wabin ta i Niger, Lucius Sairini matuwan, Manaen, Herod hairi bay ta’imon hi’aan hirara’at naatu Saul.
13.2 Act 9.15Veya ta hiyohar Regah hikwakwafir wanawanan, Anun Kakafiyin iuwih eo, “Barnabas, Saul hairi kwayasairih ayu isou, anayabin bowabow ta isan a’afih hinabowamih.”
13.3 Act 6.6Naatu hiyohar hiyoyoyoban ufunamaim, umah tafah hiyara’aten fair hitih imaibo hiyafarih hitit hin.

Barnabas Saul hairi Anun Kakafiyin ana bonawiyenamaim hina Seleucia hitit naatu wa hibai hirabon hin Cyprus imaim hitit mapPAULJR1.tif
13.5 Act 12.12; 15.39Naatu hina Salamis hititit ana maramain Jew hai Kou’ay baremaim God ana tur hibinan, John Mark i iti bowabow wanawananamaim baibaisih isan hibai bairi hin.

Nuw ana fofonin na’atube hiremor hin au waraunane bar merar wabin Pafos hitit, nati’imaim Jew orot kwerayan ma’am koun hiyen, wabin Bar-Jesus, iti i orot taiyuwin isan dinab orot erouw eo’o. Naatu iti orot i gawan orot wabin Sergius Paulus ana of ta. Sergius i orot not wairafin, nati nuw ana gawan orot. Barnabas, Saul hairi e’af hina nanamaim hitit God ana tur nowar isan ifefeyanih. Baise kwerayan wabin Elimas (wabin Greekamain) eotanih men kok gawan orot tur tanowar baitumatum tab. Imaibo Saul wabin ta Paul, Anun Kakafiyin iwanasum ma’am mutufor nuw kwerayan orot itinkikin naatu eo, “O i Demon natun! Sawar gewasih etei hai rakit wairafin i o. O i baifuwen kakafih yumatah ta ta biya awan karatan, o i mar etei Regah ana turobe kubotabiren baifuwen temamatar!
13.11 Act 9.8Imih Regah uman boun boro tafamaim nare mata nifim naatu marakaw boro mar kafai men ina’itin.”

Mar ta’imonamo Elimas matan matakis bai matan gugum naatu misir eof tobotobon sabuw uman bai nawiyin na isan ifefeyanih. Gawan orot abisa matar i’itin i itumatum, anayabin Regah ana bai’obaiyen tur nonowar i ifofofor men kafaita.

13.13 Act 15.38Paul ana ofonah bairi Pafos imaim wa hibai hirabon hina Perga hitit tafaram Pamfilia wanawanan. John Mark nati’imaim ihamiyih, naatu matabir maiye in Jerusalem tit. Baise Barnabas Paul hairi hikofan maiye hin Pisidia Antioch hitit tafaram Pisidia wanawanan. Naatu Baiyarir Ana Veya Kou’ay Bar hirun himare. Buk Atamaninamaim Moses ana ofafar kikirum naatu dinab hai buk hibiyab ufunamaim. Kou’ay Bar ana ukwarih isah tur hiyafar hio, “Taitu kwa aur koufair tur ta nama’am na’at aki akokok iti sabuw kwanao hinanowar.”

Paul misir umanamaim rutanih naatu busuruf eo, “Israel orot baibin naatu kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab iti’imaim kwama God kwakwafir, anao kwananowar!
13.17 Exo 1.7; 6.6; 12.51Israel Sabuw ata God uwatanah rubinih naatu nah toumanih na’atube Egypt hima’am ana veya iwa’an wabih ra’at, naatu ana fairamaim nawiyih hitit.
13.18 Num 14.34; Deu 1.31-32Naatu arar yanamaim kwamur etei 40 na’atube ba’afuwih bairi hima.
13.19 Deu 7.1; Jos 14.1Tafaram seven Canaan wanawanan gurusih naatu me bai ana sabuw nowahimih itih.
13.20 Jdg 2.16; 1Sa 3.20Sawar iti himamatar i kwamur etei 450 na’atube wanawananamaim himatar.

Iti ufunamaim imaibo yamutufurenayan oro’orot gagamih ya hima hikaifih hina dinab orot Samuel ana veya’amaim hitit.
13.21 1Sa 8.5, 19; 10.20-24Naatu sabuw aiwob isan hifefeyan, God Saul bai itih orot Kish natun, Benjamin wawawan, Saul i’aiwob ma kwamur etei 40 na’atube.
13.22 1Sa 13.14; 16.12; Psa 89.20Naatu God Saul bobosair ufunamaim David bai Saul efanin yai. God iti na’atube eo, ‘David o Jesse natun, orot o na’atube isa i ayu au yasisir gagamin na’in, ayu abisa sinafumih akokok etei boro i nasinaf.’

13.23 2Sa 7.12-16Ana’omatanen eo na’atube, orot David ana rara’ane Israel Sabuw hai baiyawasinayan God bai na.
13.24 Mat 3.1-2Jesu nanamaim John mat na bowabow kakafih baihamiyen dogor baikitabiren bapataito bain isan busuruf eorerereb Israel sabuw tutufin etei isah.
13.25 Jn 1.20, 27Naatu John ana bowabow bisawar auman sabuw iuwih eo, ‘Kwa anot ayu isou mi’itube kwanotanot? Kwanotanot ayu’uban i nati orot? En, baise orot ta ayu ufu’umaim enan, ayu men karam boro ana kwafure an ana sumasum anarufam.’

Taitu, Abraham ana niburune kwana warar kwatatain, naatu kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab God kwabiruw kwakakafiy, it isat yawas ana tur i hiyafar na tit. Anayabin Jerusalem bar merar sabuw hai ukwarih bairi Jesu ana bowabow men hi’inan, naatu dinab oro’orot hai tur mar etei Baiyarir Ana Veya hibiyab men naniyan hibaib, imih abisa hisisinaf i tur hio inu’in na iturobe.
13.28 Mat 27.22-23Basit morob isan ana ef men hitita’ur, Pilate asabunin morob isan hifefeyan naatu easabun morob.
13.29 Mat 27.59-60Bukamaim abisa i isan eo na’atube hikirum inu’in hisisinaf ufunamaim, onaf afe’enane hibai hire hub wanawanan hiyai. Baise morobone God bora’ah misir maiye.
13.31 Act 1.3, 8Naatu veya moumurih na’in sabuw iyab Galilee’ine hi’ufunun bairi hina Jerusalem hititit isah irerereb, naatu nati sabuw i boun hitit sabuw afa isah sif tirurubon.

Naatu iti tur gewasin i abisa God ata’a’agir eo’omatanih abai kwa isa anan.
13.33 Psa 2.7Iti tur i bai it isat ebiturobe, it i ata’a’agir natunatuh, Jesu morobone mimisiramaim. Psalm bairu’abin eo na’atube,
book.q: ‘O i ayu natu,
boun ayu ana o Tamat.’
book.p: 13.34 Isa 55.3Naatu ana’an aisim God morobone bora’ah maiye mimisir, naatu boro men nihamiy maiye na’in namasamih. Nati isan ana tur iti na’atube eo,
book.q: ‘Ayu yawas kakafiyin naatu baigegewasin David ao’omatan boro baigegewasin anit.’
book.p: 13.35 Psa 16.10Buk efan ta’ane eo maiye,
book.q: ‘God boro men ana orot kakafiyin nihamiy na’in namas ni’akiramih.’
book.p: Anayabin David ana veya’amaim God ana kok bow bisawar ufunamaim morob uwahinah sisibihimaim hiyai mas i’akir Baise orot yait God morobone iyawas mimisir i men mas i’akir.

Isan imih taitu kwananowar, iti orot Jesu wabinamaim bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan ana tur i ao’orerereb,
13.39 Rom 10.4iti Jesu wabinamaim sabuw iyab tibitumatum hai bowabow kakafihine i rufamih titit anayabin Moses ana ofafaramaim boro men karam narufami. Imih kwanakaifi gewas, saise abisa dinab hio men isa hinamatar.
book.q:
13.41 Hab 1.5
13.41 Septuagent‘Okwanekwaneyah Kwana’itin!
Boro kwana’oror naatu kwanamorob!
Anayabin kwa a veya’amaim ayu boro
bowabow ta ana sisinaf,
kwa boro men kwanitumatum,
basit sabuw afa hina hikurereb hio
kwanonowar auman boro men kwanitumatum!’
book.p: Paul, Banabas hairi Kou’ay Bar hibihamiy auman sabuw hifefeyanih fur ta Baiyarir ana veya’amaim iban hitan maiye iti sawar isah hitidudur hitanowar. Kou’ay Bar ana rou’ay hibihamiy ufunamaim, Jew sabuw maumurih na’in naatu sabuw iyab Jew hai kwafiren ana kakafemaim hima’am, Paul Barnabas hibi’ufununih koufair hitih God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim ma’amih hifefeyanih.

Baiyarir Ana Veya bairou’abin sabuw nati bar merar tutufin etei Regah ana tur nowaramih hina. Baise Jew sabuw rou’ay gagamin hi’i’itin ana veya hibobowen naatu baigigimen tur hibow hitit, Paul abisa eo isan hibas.

13.46 Act 3.26; 18.6Imaibo Paul, Barnabas hairi hiofok hio, “God ana tur i wantoro’ot kwa ao kwanowar, baise kwa tur i kwakwahir, taiyuw kwanunutitiy ma’ama wanatowan kwa isa men karam, isan imih abihamiy aki anan Ufun Sabuw isah.
13.47 Isa 49.6Anayabin Regah ana obaiyunen tur biti iti na’atube eo,
book.q: ‘Ayu kwa ayasairi Ufun Sabuw hai marakaw isan,
saise kwa i boro yawas kwanab kwanatit kwanan
tafaram yomanin kwanatit.’
book.p: Ufun Sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana maramaim hiyasisir Regah ana tur hibora’ara’ah. Naatu sabuw moumurih na’in ma’ama wanatowan isan hirubinih hima’am hina baitumatumayah himatar.

Naatu Regah ana tur ra’at tasasar tit nati bar merar ana fofonin etei hinowar. Baise Jew hai ukwarih himisir bar merar orot gagamih naatu God ana bowayah baibin gagamih yah hi’ora’ah Paul, Barnabas hairi isah hiwosai, naatu hinunih hitit nati bar merar ufunane hire.
13.51 Mat 10.14; Act 18.6Basit Paul Barnabas hairi ah fofob hiru’uh re i hin Ikonium hitit. Naatu bai’ufununayah Antioch hima’am yasisir yah awan karatan naatu Anun Kakafiyin iwansumih.

Matanfufur tisisinaf na’atube Ikonium bar meraramaim Paul, Barnabas hairi hin Kou’ay bar hirun hai tur hio’omaim Jew sabuw naatu Greek sabuw moumurih maiyow hibotabirih hina baitumatumayah himatar. Baise Jew sabuw iyab baitumatum hikwakwahir, himisir Ufun Sabuw yah hiyi hikura’ara’ahih inan himisir baitumatumayah sabuw isah yah so’ar.
14.3 Mak 16.20; Hib 2.4Tur Abarayah nati’imaim manin maiyow hima, Regah ana tur men kafai birumaim hi’omih, baise tur fokarin maiyow hio hibinan. Hai tur baiturobe isan Regah fair itih ina’inan gagamih himamataren, saise sabuw hitaso’ob nati tur i Regah biyanane nan. Sabuw nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan hima’am hikusib rou’ab matar, sabuw turin Jew isah hin, turin Tur Abarayah isah hin.
14.5 Act 14.19Imaibo Ufun Sabuw naatu Jew sabuw hai ukwarih bairi awah ta’imon hibasit Tur Abarayah kabayamaim rouw bai’a’afiyih isan hio. Tur Abarayah tur hinonowar ana veya hibihir hin tafaram Laikonia wanawanan bar merar gagamih rou’ab, Lystra naatu Derbe imaim hitit hima. Naatu bar merar afa nati’imaim hirun hibusuruf Tur Gewasin hibinan hiremor.

Lystra wanawananamaim i orot ta an murubin ma’am. Iti orot i tutufuwaka an kakafin auman tufuw naatu men kafai reremoramih. Paul eo orot nati’imaim ma nonowar, basit Paul orot ana baitumatum itin karam boro nayawas, imih Paul mutufor nuw orot itin naatu fanan aumetawat eaf eo, “Kumisir mutufor a yan kubat!” Orot ma’am fasi’iwa’an misir an yan bat busuruf remor.

14.11 Act 28.6Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hima’am abisa Paul sinaf hi’i’itin basit Laikonia turamaim fanah sib hio, “Anababatun god orotobe himatar isat hina hitit!” Naatu Barnabas wabin Zeus hiwab naatu Paul wabin Hermes hiwab anayabin Paul tur bi’ukwarin. Zeus ana firis, i ana Tafaror Bar gagamin i bar merar ufunane batabat, firis naatu sabuw bairi hikokok i Tur Abarayah hai sibor hitayai. Imih firis cow naatu beran bow na bar merar ana fur awanamaim tit.

Baise Barnabas, Paul hairi sabuw abisa hibiwa’an hi’itih hairi hai faifuw hiseb naatu hinunuw sabuw hai founamaim hirun hio,
14.15 Psa 146.6; Act 10.26“Kwa aisim iti kwasisinaf? aki i orot maiyow orot babin kwa na’atube. Aki iti’imaim anan aiyabin i Tur Gewasin ana binan, sawar iti hai yabin en kwanihamiyen, naatu God ma’ama wanatowan yait iti mar tafaram riy naatu sawar wanawanahimaim tema’am bimataren isan kwanamatabir.
14.16 Act 17.30Marasika tafaram ta ta sabuw hai kok abisa hisisinaf i men rufutih,
14.17 Jer 5.24baise mar etei sawar gewasih esisinaf imaim ekukubuna i turobe. Anayabin gagub marane iwa’an ere bay ana veya’amaim ematar bay ebit naatu dogor wanawanan yasisir awan ekakaratan.” Paul, Barnabas hairi iti turamaim hisinaftobon sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hai siwar siboromih hibow hinan hio’otanih towa rufufurih.

14.19 Act 17.13; 2Cor 11.25Imaibo Jew sabuw hai ukwarih afa Antioch naatu Ikoniumane hinan sabuw hiora’ahih himisir Paul higam hiu, naatu kabayamaim hirab hitain hitit hin bar merar ufunane hihamiy, hinotanot i morob hirouw. Baise bai’ufununayah hiru’ay hi’ar bebera’uh hibatabat inu’in misir matabir in bar merar tit, mar to i Barnabas hairi hin Derbe hitit.
book.s: Paul, Barnabas Himatabir Maiye Au Antioch
book.p:
Paul, Barnabas hairi Tur Gewasin Derbe wanawanan hibinan naatu bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in hibow. Imaibo himatabir maiye hin Lystra, Ikonium naatu Antioch hitit Syria wanawanan.
14.22 Act 15.32; 1Th 3.3Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah hibaisih naatu koufair hitih hi’uwih hio. “A baitumatum kwabaib imaim kwaniturobe kwanama, yababan moumurih maiyow boro tanabow, imaibo tanan God ana aiwobomaim tanarun.” Ekaleisia hai kou’ay tata wanawanahimaim Paul Barnabas hairi orot ukwarih hirubinih, hibow naatu hiyohar isah hiyoyoban sawar, imaibo Regah i hai baitumatum ana’an umanamaim hiya. Tafaram Pisidia wanawanan hi’afuw hirabon rounane hire’er ufunamaim hina Pamfilia hitit. Naatu Perga imaim hibibinan ufunamaim hire hina Atalia hitit.

14.26 Act 13.1-2Wa imaim hibai himatabir maiye hin Antioch hitit, efan nati’imaim God ana tafafar naatu ana manaw ana kabeber hibai bowabow hibusuruf hibowabow yomanin himatabir hina nati’imaim hi’asa’ub.
14.27 Act 15.4, 12Imih hina Antioch hititit ana maramaim ekaleisia sabuw etei hi’af ayuwih hai tur hiowen mi’itube God i wanawanahimaim sinaf baitumatum ana etawan botawiy Ufun Sabuw auman isah. Naatu bai’ufununayah bairi nati Antioch imaim bairi manin maiyow hima.

15.1 Gal 5.2Orot afa Judea’ane hire hina Antioch hitit baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am hi’obaibiyih hio, “Kwa i Moses ana ofafar eo na’atube a’ar mo’oh hina’afuw kwa boro yawas kwanab.”
15.2 Gal 2.1Paul, Barnabas hairi iti bai’obaiyen isan nati orot bairi higam tur manin maiyow hio, basit Paul Barnabas hairi naatu Antioch orot afa na Jerusalem tur abarayah naatu regaregah ai’in bairi iti tur yamutufurin isan hirubinih. Ekaleisia ana kou’ay wanawananamaim iti sabuw hiyafarih hin. Naatu hiremor hina Fonisia naatu Samaria’amaim hi’afuwabon hirabon. Ufun Sabuw mi’itube God hibai hibitumatum isan hai tur hi’owen, naatu baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am iti tur hinowar yasisir dogoroh awan karatan.
15.4 Act 14.27Hina Jerusalem hititit ana veya’amaim, God ana ekaleisia, Tur Abarayah, naatu regaregah ai’in etei nati’imaim hima’am hai merar hiyi. Naatu Paul Barnabas hairi hibinanawan ana veya God isah mi’itube sisinaf hai tur hio’owen.
Baise baitumatumayah afa Pharisee hai kou’ayane himisir hio, “Nati sabuw i boro hai ar kanabih hina’afuw naatu tana’uwih Moses ana ofafar hini’ufunun.”

Tur Abarayah regaregah bairi hina hiku’ay iti baibat nutitiyin isan
15.7 Act 10.1-43Manin maiyow hibas inan ufunamaim Peter misir eo, “Taitu baitumatumayah kwa kwaso’ob marasika God ayu kwa wanawanamaim rubinu iti Tur Gewasin Ufun Sabuw isah binan isan, saise i auman iti tur hitanowar naatu hititumatum.”
15.8 Act 10.44; 11.15God orot etei dogoroh i so’ob, imih Anun Kakafiyin it bitit na’atube Ufun Sabuw auman itih, nati’imaim ebi’obaiyit God nati sabuw auman ibasit ebowabow. God it isat esisinaf na’atube i auman isah ef ta’imon esisinaf, anayabin i hai baitumatumamaim dogoroh eyayafur.
15.10 Mat 11.30; Gal 3.10Naatu boun aisim bit gagamin it uwatanah naatu it men karam tata’abar i kwabai bai’ufununayah tuwabuh kwayara’ah God routobon kwabitin.
15.11 Gal 2.16; Eph 2.5-8En! Baise, manaw kabeber ata Regah Jesu’umaim nan it ta’ita’imon taitumatum tabai biyawasit na’atube ibo hitumatum hibai yawas itih.”

Kou’ay nati etei awah fot hima Paul Barnabas hairi God ina’inan fokarih naatu baifofofor mi’itube i wanawanahimaim Ufun Sabuw isah sisinaf i hai tur hiowen hima hinowar.
15.13 Gal 2.9Hio in sasawar ufunamaim, James misir eo, “Taitu naatu tuwai’inah anao kwananowar! Simon iti boun mi’itube God ana naniyan wantoro’ot Ufun Sabuw wanawanahimaim bow i ana sabuw nowan himatar kakaifih isan iti kubuna tanowar. Dinab oro’orot hai tur etei iti tur isan i tibasit. Bukamaim iti na’atube eo.
15.16-18 Amo 9.11-12‘Iti ufunamaim ayu boro ana matabir, Regah eo,
book.q: naatu David ana bar ufar re’er ana wowab maiye.
Ana bar huhurir ana bobunai,
naatu ana itinin anan bobaun maiye.
Saise sabuw afa boro ayu hinanuwuhu hinan,
Ufun Sabuw iyab ayu nowau arouw a’afih.
Imih Regah eo, iti i marasika eo hinowaraka.’
book.p:
“Iti i ayu au not,” James ikofan eo maiye, “Ufun Sabuw God isan temamatabir men tana’otanih.
15.20 Exo 34.15-17; Lev 17.10-16Baise nati efanin fef tanakirum hai tur tana’owen, bay sibor hiya’ay biyah eregubagub auman men hinaa, men hina’in tabitabir hiniwa’an kwanekwan, masanuw sikah birabir naatu wanawanah rara auman men hinaa. Anayabin Moses ana ofafar i kwamur moumurin maiyow Kou’ay Baremaim Baiyarir Ana Veya mar etei hibiyab hibinan hinonowar.”
book.s: Kaniser Ufun Sabuw Isah Hai Fef Hikirum
book.p: Imaibo tur abarayah, Regaregah ai’in naatu kirisiyan sabuw bairi hita’imon hai not hibogaigiwas orot afa kou’ayomaim roubinih Paul Barnabas bairi au Antioch baiyafarih isan hio. Basit Judas wabin ta Barsabas, Silas hairi hirubinih, iti orot rou’ab i baitumatumayah hai bonawiyenayah orot gagamih. Naatu fef i iti na’atube hikirum hitih hibai hin.
“Aki kwa tuwatanah Tur Abarayah, regaregah ai’in. Kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab baitumatumayah nati Antioch, Syria naatu Silisia wanawanahimaim kwama’am etei a merar ayiy.”

“Aki tur anowar orot afa aki ai kou’ayane hitit hina hai turamaim abisa hio i kwa anot hikwaris. Naatu nati orot i men kafai aki biyai’ine fair aitih nati tur hibai hinamih. Isan imih aki aru’ay ao aibasit tur abarayah afa arubinih kwa isa abiyafarih. Iti orot i boro ata ofonah Barnabas Paul bairi hinan. Iti orot rou’ab ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabin isan hai yawas etei hikwahir tebowabow. Imih Judas Silas hairi kwa isa abiyafarih, i boro hinao kwanowar sawar ta’imon iti fefemaim akikirum na’atube.
15.28 Mat 23.4Aki Anun Kakafiyin bairi aibasit men bit gagamin atit kwatab, ofafar iti bai’ufnunin isan aibasit abit sisibinamaim. Bay wagaburisah hisisibor men kwanaa, for rara auman men kwanaaf for sikah hibir himomorob men kwanaa, naatu in baisesebar kwanekwan i kwanahaiw. Sawar iti ao na’atube kwanasisinaf kwa a ef etei boro namutufor. Gewasinamaim aotuturi, kwanama.”
