Orot hiyafarih tur hibai hin Antioch hitit, nati’imaim ekaleisia tutufin etei hi’af ayuwih rou’ay gagamin hibai naatu fef hitih. Fef hibai hibiyab ana maramaim dogor wanawanan yasisir awan karatan koufair tur hinonowar isan. Judas Silas hairi i God ana dinab oro’orot, imih i tur manih maiyow hima hidudur, baitumatumayah koufair hitih naatu tafah fair hiyai. Fur bai’ab na’atube hima’am ufunamaim himisir taih tuwah tufuwamaim hio tuturih naatu sabuw iyab hibiyafarih isah himatabir maiye hin. Baise Silas nati’imaim ana not bogaigiwas iban ma maiye. 13.34 buk afa hanef 34 i hiya’abar. Naatu Paul Barnabas hairi Antioch imaim mar kafai hima, naatu baitumatumayah afa nati’imaim bairi sabuw afa hi’obaibiyih naatu Regah ana tur gewasin hibinan hiremor.

Veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Paul ana not bogaigiwas Barnabas isan eo, “It boro tanamatabir maiye bar merar etei taituwat tema’ama’amaim tanarun tanatit taninanawanih, Regah ana tur nati’imaim tabibinan tana’itin sabuw basit tema’am.
15.37 Act 12.12, 25Nati ana veya Barnabas i kok John Mark tab bairi hitan.
15.38 Act 13.13; Col 4.10Baise Paul i men kok boro John Mark hitab bairi hitan, anayabin i men bairi hima hai bowabow hibow in yomanin hisawarimih, baise i Pamfilia imaim ihamiyih matabir maiye. Nati’imaim Barnabas Paul hairi higam tur fokarih hio, naatu hairi hikusib Barnabas Mark bai hairi wa hibai au Cyprus hin. Paul Silas rubin bai naatu tafaram bihamiy ana veya, baitumatumayah orot rou’ab hibuwih higegewasinih Regah ana manaw ana kabeber wanawanan hiyari’iyih takaifih isan. Basit Paul misir Syria naatu Silisia wanawanahimaim run remor ekaleisia koufair itih.
book.s: Timothy, Paul Naatu Silas Bairi Hin
book.p:
16.1 Act 14.6; 2Tim 1.5Paul remor na Derbe tit imaibo ikofan maiye na Lystra tit, nati’imaim baitumatumayan wabin Timothy ma’am biyan tit, Timothy hinah i Jew babin, baitumatumayan ta, baise tamah i Greek orot.
16.2 Php 2.19-22Lystra naatu Ikonium wanawanan baitumatumayah etei Timothy i hibifai. Paul kok i Timothy tab bairi hitan, imih ana’ar kanabin e’afuw, iti na’atube sinaf anayabin Jew etei nati’imaim hima’am hiso’ob Timothy tamah i Greek orot.
16.4 Act 15.23-29Bar merar tata hirun hitit roube’aten tur abisa tur abarayah naatu regaregah ai’in Jerusalemamaim bai’ufnunin isan hio hibibasit, baitumatumayah hai tur hi’owen auman hin. Ekaleisia sabuw fair hitih hai baitumatum ra’at naatu sabuw boubuh hirun hai kou’ay ra’at.

16.6 Act 18.23Paul ana ofonah bairi Firigia naatu Galasia wanawanahimaim hiremor naatu Anun Kakafiyin Asia wanawanan hireremor men ibasit boro imaim hitabinan. Hiremor hina Maisia ana yoyowamaim hitit, hisinaftobon hitan Bitiniya wanawanan hitarun isan baise Jesu Anunin men ibasit boro hitan. Imih hina Maisia hihamiy hirabon hire hina Troas hitit. Nati gugumin Paul mim, Masedonia orot bat fefeyan eo, “Kwanarabon Masedonia imaim aki kwaibaisi!” Paul iti mim i’itin ufunamaim aki abobuna au Masedonia arabon, anayabin aki ai not abogaigiwas God ea’afi nati’imaim God ana tur binan isan.

Aki Troas imaim wa abai mutufor arabon an Samoteres atit naatu mar to aikofan maiye an Neapolis atit. Nati’imaim wa ai’hamiy ai’iwat arun an Philipi atit, Masedonia wanawanan ana bar merar gagamin ta, naatu iti bar merar i Rome gawan wowab. Aki nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ama. Baiyarir Ana Veya atit bar merar ana fur aihamiy ana harew sisibinamaim atit, nati’imaim anotanot boro yoyoban ana efan atatita’ur. Nati’imaim amare baibin iyab hinan i ai obaibiyih. Naatu babin ta iti tur ao nonowar i wabin Lydia ana tafaram Taiyatira, iti babin i sawar biyah namar iwa’an sabuw tetotobon naatu i God kwafirinayan babin ta, nati ana veya’amaim God dogoron botawiy. Paul tur abisa eo etei nowar. Naatu nati babin taintuwan bairi nati baremaim hima’am etei bapataito hibai, imaibo ifefeyani eo, “Kwananotanot ayu Regah ana bitumitum na’at, basit kwana tan au baremaim bairit tama.” Iti na’at aki eokikini bairi an.
book.s: Paul Silas Hairi Philipi’imaim Dibur Hirun
book.p:
Veya ta aki yoyoban ana efan isan anan akir babitai ta bairi aitar. Iti babitai i afiy kakafin hitarasum ma sawar abisa temamatar isah i eo, naatu sawar iti na’atube sisinaf ana sabuw kabay gagamin maiyow hibaib.
16.17 Mak 1.24Iti babitai Paul aki bairi i’ufnuni iwow eo, “Iti orot i God auyomtoro’ot ana’akir wairafih, kwa mi’itube na yawas bain isan teo’orereb.” slave girlcn01983B.tifAct 16.17©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Peter ana ofonah bairi yawas hibai hinan isan Babitai eo’orereb16.17-18 Babitei iti na’atube mar moumurih maiyow sinaf inan yomaninamaim, Paul yan so’ar naatu tatabir afiy nati babitai tar gabuw ma’am isan eo, “Jesu Keriso wabinamaim o abi’a’ari babitai kwaihamiy kutit!” Naatu mar ta’imon afiy babitai ihamiy tit.

Babitei ana matuwan sabuw hai kabay imaim hima hibaib ana ef sasawar hi’i’itin ana maramaim, Paul Silas hairi hirout hibow hitainih hitit ahar ana efanamaim hiya baibatiyenayah baibatiyih isan.
16.20 Mak 13.9Hibuwih hina Rome tur nowarayah nahimaim hitit hio, “Iti Orot rou’ab i Jew sabuw, hairi iti ata bar meraramaim ma kakaf hibai hitit. It Rome sabuw ata ofafar men ebibasit i sinafumih teo, naatu aki men karam boro nati bai’obaiyen anibasit anab ani’a’it.”

16.22 2Cor 11.25; 1Th 2.2Sabuw moumurih na’in hina hirun kou’ay ra’at orot rou’ab bow rouw isan. Tur nowarayan orot iuwih Paul Silas hairi hai faifuw hiseb hibosaisiren naatu hiwabirih. Hiwawabirih ufunamaim hibow hin dibur hiyariyih, naatu dibur kaifenayan orot matan tobaiwa’an ma kaifih isan hiu. Iti obaiyunen tur nonowar ufunamaim, dibur kaifenayan bow hirun dibur wanawanantoro’ot imaim ah ai gagamih rou’ab areh ya kiktanen hima.

Fainaiwan Paul Silas hairi God isan hiyoyoban hima ew hitatabor dibur sabuw afa hima hinonowar, naniyan meyemeye iriyoy gagamin na dibur bar iyuwiyuw re an ana wabat etei bora’ah. Naatu mar ta’imon etawan botawiy chain dibur sabuw ah umah hifatum hima’am etei hihururuw hire.
16.27 Act 12.18-19Dibur kaifenayan matan nuw misir naatu Dibur etawan bobotawiyen itin, basit taiyuwin sikan afuwinamih ana kaiy bora’ah, anayabin not dibur sabuw etei hibihir rouw. Baise Paul fanan aumetawat na’in e’af eo, “Taiyuw bi’asabuni! Aki etei iti ama’am!”

Dibur kaifayan hinow isan e’af naatu nunuw run, an uman hi’oror auman Paul Silas hairi nahimaim ra’iy.
16.30 Act 2.37Imaibo nawiyih bairi hitit naatu ibatiyih eo, “Regaregah abisa ana sinaf boro yawas anab?”

Hiya’afut hio, “Regah Jesu initumitum boro yawas inab, o a nibur bairi.” Imaibo Regah ana tur nati bar wanawanan hibinan dibur kaifenayan ana sabuw bairi hinowar. Nati veya ta’imon gugumin wanawanan dibur kaifenayan buwih hai feher souwen naatu i ana nibur bairi bapataito hibai. Jailer and PaulCN01990B.TIFAct 16.33©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Dibur kaifenayan Paul koun esasouw16.33 Naatu Paul Silas buwih ana bar wanawanan hirun bay itih hi’aa. Nati orot ana nibur bairi dogoroh yasisir awan karatan, anayabin i hina God ana baitumatumayah himatar.

Mar to tur nowarayah hai orot gagamih naatu ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih hiyafarih hio, “Kwan dibur kaifenayan kwau! Nati orot ebotaitih ten.” Basit dibur kaifenayan Paul ana tur eowen eo, “Tur nowarayah orot gagamih tur hiyafar hio, O Silas airi i abobotaiti, airi kwatit tufuwamaim kwan!”

Baise Paul ma’utenayah hai oro’orot isah eo, “Aki men abisa kakafin ta asinaf naatu men hibatiyi, baise bebeyanamaim hirabi hi’afiyi naatu dibur hiyariyi, kwanaso’ob aki i Rome ana fef abai ama’am! Naatu boun tekokok i wa’iwa’iramaim hiniyafari’imih. Men karam, aki akokok kwana’uwih i taiyuwih hinan hinabotaiti.”

Ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih himatabir baibatiyih orot gagamih hai tur hi’owen, naatu Paul Silas hairi Rome ana fef hibai hima’am isan, ana tur hinonowar ana maramaim hibir. Basit hina abis kakafin isah hisisinaf isan hairi matahimaim hi’e’en naatu diburane hibotaitih, naatu bar merar baihamiyin isan hi’uwih. Paul, Silas hairi dibur bar hihamiy hina Lydia ana bar hitit, nati’imaim baitumatumayah hi’itih kaufair ana tur hitih naatu hihamiyih.

Hiremor hina Amfipolos naatu Apolonia bar merar hihamiy naatu hina Thessalonica hitit, nati’imaim i Jew hai kou’ay bar ta batabat. Paul ana yawas mar etei esisinaf na’atube in kou’ay bar run, Baiyarir veya tounu wanawanahimaim buk rusasar tur hai yabih sabuw bairi hima hidudur. Buk wanawanan dinab hikikirum kubuna hai tur eowen eo, “Keriso i biyan nababan namorob naatu morobone namisir maiye.” Naatu Jesu isan iti aorereb kwanonowar, God ana Roubinen Orot. Keriso’oban i nati. Sabuw afa Paul yah ikitabir naatu Paul Silas hairi hikofanih. Na’atube Greek sabuw rou’ay gagamin God hikwakwafir auman hirun, naatu bar merar baibin ukwarih auman hirun. mapPauljr2.tif

Baise Jew sabuw hibobowen sabuw ef yan rimurih hibow kou’ay gagamin himatar. Naatu nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan hibuyuw hinunuw hin Jason ana bar hiyi hirab. Hikokok Paul Silas tibunuwih hitama’am na’at tabotaitih sabuw titih. Baise hirun hinunuwet ana veya’amaim men hititourih. Basit Jason hibai hifatum baitumatumayah bairi hitainih hina bar merar hai orot gagamih biyah hitit hiwow hio, “Iti orot tafaram wanawanan sabuw hai ma hi’a’afiy hinan boun hina iti ata bar ata merar hitit.
17.7 Luk 23.2; Jn 19.12Jason hai merar yi buwih ana baremaim hima aiwob orot Caesar ana ofafar hi’astu’ub teo, Aiwob orot ta i ema’am wabin Jesu.” Tur iti na’atube hio hinonowar sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in naatu bar merar hai orot gagamih hai not hikwaris. Basit bar merar orot gagamih Jason naatu orot afa bairi kabay hi’uwih hibaiyan, imaibo hibotaitih hin.

Hima in mar fo, basit baitumatumayah Paul Silas hairi hiyafarih au Berea hin, naatu hina nati’imaim hititit ana veya mutufor hin Jew hai Kou’ay Bar hirun. Nati sabuw i dogoroh hibotawiy men Thessalonica sabuw na’atube’emih. Tur hinonowar i yah bai kwanekwan hima hinowar veya matan hiyi hai buk hiyab hikok hitaso’ob Paul abisa eo i turobe Buk eo’omaim eo ai en? Naatu sabuw moumurih maiyow hitumatum, Greek baibin gagamih afa naatu orot moumurih na’in auman hitumatum.

Baise Jew Thessalonica hima’am Paul Berea bibinan ana tur hinonowar ana maramaim hirabon hina yare baimatarin isan hikukeraker. Naatu baitumatumayah marta’imon Paul hibai hiyafar autor re. Baise Silas Timothy hairi Berea hima. Orot afa Paul hinawiy bairi hina Athens ana fofoninamaim hihamiy, imaibo i himatabir. Paul iuwih eo, “Kwanan Silas Timothy hairi kwana’uwih saisewat hinan bairi anita’imon.”

Paul Athens imaim Silas Timothy hairi ma kakaifih wanawanan, nati bar merar hai totob awan karatan hima’am i’itih isan men iyasisir.
17.17 Act 18.19Basit in Kou’ay Bar run Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw iyab God hibitumitum bairi hio, naatu mar etei ahar efanamaim sabuw iyab nati’imaim hinan iti sawar isah i hai tur eo’owen. Naatu orot afa Epikuria 17.18 Epicureans. Sabuw orot wabin Epicurus ana bai’obaiyen hibi’ufunun anayabin i ana bai’obaiyenamaim eo tafaram ana yawas i yawas gewasin. kirum efanane hititit naatu orot afa Sitoik 17.18 Stoic. Iti sabuw i orot wabin Zeno tur hikokok anayabin i ana bai’obaiyenamaim eo i, yawas roumutufuren naatu not gewas sinaf i yawas gewasin. kirumane hititit Paul bairi hibas, so’obayah afa hio, “Iti orot rarik kartatanenayan abisa eo’oweh?” Afa hio, “I ana itinin nanawan hai god isah eo.” Iti na’atube hio anayabin Paul i Jesu morobone mimisir maiye isan bibinan. Basit Paul hibai hinawiy hina kaniser Areopagus kou’ay nahimaim hitit naatu hio, “Aki akokok iti bai’obaiyen boubun sabuw kubi’obaibiyih inao ana nowar gewas.” Sawar afa i’o aki anonowar i tur afa boubun aki isai, imih akokok o inakubunabuna gewas inao ananowar.” Athens tafaram matuwan naatu nahtoumanih iyab makwaniyih hai bowabow mar etei tur boubun menamaim tenonowar i boro hinab nati ef yanamaim hinao hinareremor aurih bowabow en.

Paul kaniser hai kou’ay Areopagus nahimaim misir eo, “Athens orot! Ayu kwa ai’iti kwa etei i a yawas yayasairenamaim kwama’am. Anayabin iti bar merar abat areremor akwafiren efan etei aitah, na’atube sibor ana gem ta aitin tafanamaim iti na’atube kwakirum. ‘God wa’iwa’irin takwakwafir.’ God nati wa’iwa’irin kwakwakwafir, baise men kwaso’ob nati God i yait, imih boun akokok nati isan anaorereb kwananowar.

17.24-25 1Ki 8.27; Act 7.48God iti tafaram sinaf naatu tafaram wanawanan sawar etei auman sinaf himatar. I mar tafaram ana Regah baise i men orot umahimaim Tafaror Bar hiwowowab imaim ema’amamih.
17.25 Psa 50.12Naatu orot umahimaim abisa mamatar i men ekokok nab, anayabin yawas naatu yourabad naatu sawar tutufin etei i akisin biyanane na sabuw yawas tebaib. Orot ta’imon biyanane sabuw menan ta ta tafaram tutufin etei karatan, nowanowah hibai tema’am. Naatu marasika yakitifuw hai veya anababatun yai, sabuw iyab tafaram menatan hinab nowanowah namatar hinama’am i so’ob hai veya yai.
17.27 Psa 145.18; Jer 23.23God iti na’atube sinaf, saise sabuw hitatit hitanuwih naatu umah hitaruteteyan hitanan boro hitatita’ur. Baise i men ef yok na’in ema’am, it ta’ita’imon sisibitamaim ema’am. Anayabin ’i ana fairamaim it yawasit tama taremor biyat ebi’e’etaw. Kirumamaim tur kabumih kwakikirum 17.28 poem, sabuw tur kabumih tikikirum baise hai yabih i manih. na’atube, ‘It i natunatun.’

17.29 Isa 40.18-20; 44.10-17; Act 19.26Isan imih it i God natunatun ai’in, men tananot God ana itinin i gold o silver o kabay ta sabuw tar so’obayah i hai yumatabe hitar hirouwen ebatabatamih. Marasika God it ata kasiy ata tengogor i’itah etei was tanen, baise boun sabuw tutufin etei dogorot baikitabir isan ebiyunit tanasinaf.
17.31 Psa 96.13Anayabin veya ta yayakitifuw i ema’ama, nati’imaim orot ta tafaram tutufin etei ef gewasinamaim baibatiyin isan i rubinika, naatu nati orot it itinin baiturobe isan i morobone bora’ah maiye.”

Morobone misir maiye isan Paul eo hinonowar ana maramaim hi’iyab himarib. Baise afa hikok veya ta na maiye baidudur nowar isan hifefeyan. Nati’imaim Paul kaniser hai kou’ay ihamiyih misir in. Orot afa hitumatum Paul hi’ufunun, naatu Areopagus ana kou’ay wanawananamaim orot wabin Dionysius auman itumatum naatu babin wabin Damaris naatu baibin afa auman hitumatum.

Iti ufunamaim Paul Athens ihamiy naatu na Corinth tit.
18.2 Rom 16.3Nati’imaim Jew orot wabin Aquila hairi hitar, Aquila i Pontus imaim tufuw baise aawan Priscilla hairi Italy hihamiy hitit, anayabin Caesar Claudius Jew sabuw etei Rome hima’am ia’arih iuwih hitit. Imih Paul na Corinth titit i na Aquila Priscilla hairi inanawanih.
18.3 Act 20.34Naatu anayabin i auman i kanawas sakirayan ta, imih ma bairi kanawas hisasakir. Baiyarir Ana Veya mar etei Kou’ay Baremaim tur binan gewasin Jew naatu Greek sabuw yah baikitabirih isan tur yayare.

18.5 Act 17.14-15Silas Timothy hairi Masedonia’ane hina hititit ana veya’amaim, Paul ana veya tutufin etei binanumaim eorereb, Jew hai tur eowen, Jesu i God ana Roubinenayan orot. 18.5 God orot tafan eo’of ra’at i Jesu iti natit.
18.6 Act 13.46, 51; 20.26Baise Jew sabuw Paul ana tur hikwahir tur kakafih isan hio ana veya, Paul ana faifuw tafan baibiyon bai fofob rutatab i’uwih eo, “Umamaim rara nama’ama na’at, ana ubar i kwa akis kwanab, ayu au bit i aikisisir. Veya boun ayu i boro Ufun Sabuw isah aninanawanih.”

Naatu ihamiyih in Ufun orot ta wabin Titius Justus ana baremaim ma. Iti orot ibo kwafirenayan orot ta, i ana bar i Kou’ay Bar sisibin ma’am. Orot wabin Krisipas Kou’ay Bar ana orot ukwarin aawan natunatun ana nibur bairi Regah ana tur hinowar hitumatum, na’atube Corinth sabuw moumurih auman hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai.

Fai ta Paul ana mimumaim Regah eo, “Paul men inabir baise inabinan, men awa nafot binan inihamiy inama’amih.
18.10 Jos 1.9; Isa 41.10Anayabin ayu airit tama’am, naatu orot babin ta boro men karam o narab ni’afiy, yabin sabuw maumurih iti bar meraramaim tema’am i ayu au sabuw.” Basit Paul kwamur ta’imon sumar six nati’imaim ma God ana tur sabuw i’obaibiyih.

Baise Galio tafaram Akaiya isan bigawan ana veya, Jew etei hita’imon Paul hifatum hibai hin baibatiyenamaim hiyai hio. “Iti orot i esisinaftobon sabuw yah nikitabir aki ai ef naatu ai ofafar hina’astu’ub i hai kokomaim God hinakwafirimih.”

Paul tur omih biwa’an ana veya Galio Jew sabuw isah eo, “Kwa iti orot sawar kakafin tasinaf kwata’itin isan kwatagamigam na’at, ayu boro ata ma a tur atanowar. Baise kwa a gamin ai’itin i tur, wab naatu kwa a ofafar isah kwagamigam, imih nati sawar i kwabai kwan kwa akis kwayabunai, ayu iti sawar i boro men ana butubun.” Naatu baibatiyen bar wanawanan nunih ufun hitit. Basit Sosthenes Kou’ay Bar ana ukwarin hirouh hibai hirab baibatiyen bar merar yan. Baise nati hisisinaf Galio men kafa’imo i yababanamih.
book.s: Priscilla, Aquila, Apollos Himatabir Maiye Antioch
book.p: 18.18 Num 6.18; Act 21.24Paul Corinthimaim veya moumurihika baitumatumayah bairi hima, imaibo eo tuturih Priscilla, Aquila hairi buwih bairi wa hibai hina Syria hitit. Namih ana veya Sensera imaim aribun mafur anayabin i omatanen ta biwa’an isan. Naatu hina Ephesus hitit imaim Priscilla Aquila hairi ihamiyih. Paul na Kou’ay Bar run Jew bairi baidudur isan. Naatu hifefeyan hikokok i nati’imaim veya maninaka bairi hitama, baise i aurin veya en imih kwahir. Naatu bihamiyih auman iuwih eo, “God nakokok na’at boro ana matabir isa anan.” Naatu wa bai Ephesus ihamiy in.

Na Caesarea titit ana veya na Jerusalem tit, ekaleisia sabuw nati hima’am hai merar yi, imaibo in Antioch tit. Nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ma’am ufunamaim ihamiyih, i na Galasia, Firigia imaim run tit bai’ufununayah 18.23 baitumatumayah kaufair itih.

Jew orot ta wabin Apollos, ana tafaram Alexandria imaim tufuw, basit nati ana veya’amaim i na Ephesus tit. Iti orot binan isan i ana siwar bai, naatu Buk wanawanan etei i so’ob kwanekwan. Regah ana ef isan i hio’baiy gewas naatu sabuw afa Jesu isan bi’obaiyih, ana itinin i orot so’obayan sawar etei so’ob eo na’atube. Naatu tur abisa eo i men ta sa’ir, baise i ana so’ob i John ana bapataito akisin so’ob. Kou’ay Bar wanawanan itafofor binan. Baise Priscilla Aquila hairi nati’imaim hima’am tur hinonowar ufunamaim hibai bairi hin hai bar God ana ef anababatun hikubunabuna gewas nowar.

Apollos ana not bogaigiwas Akaiya namih binotanot ana veya, tuwahinah koufair hitin naatu fef hikirum auman hitin bai na Akaiya tit, saise bai’ufununayah nati’imaim hima’am ana merar hitay. Na titit ana veya sabuw iyab God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim hina bai’ufununayah himamatar baibais gagamin maiyow itih.
18.28 Act 9.22Anayabin Jew sabuw hibifufuwen isan bebeyanamaim tur fokarin gam iuwih naatu God ana turamaim kubunabuna hai tur eowen eo, “Turobe Jesu i Roubininenayan.”

19.1 1Cor 3.6Apollos Corinth ma’am ana veya Paul tafaram ta ta oyaw wanane run tit remor na Ephesus tit. Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah sabuw afa titaurih.
19.2 Act 8.16Naatu bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Kwabitumatum ana maramaim Anun kakafiyin re iwani?” Hiya’afut hio, “Aki nati Anun Kakafiyin ana tur men kafa’imo hio anowar.” mapPauljr3.tif

Basit Paul ibatiyih, “Bo kwa bapataito i menatan kwabai?” Hiya’afut hio, “John Baptist nowan.”
19.4 Mat 3.11Paul iuwih eo, “John ana bapataito i dogor baikitabiren kakafih hibihamiyen isan. Naatu orot ta wabin Jesu i ufunamaim nan baitutumin isan iuwih. Tur iti na’atube eo hinonowar ufunamaim etei Regah Jesu wabinamaim bapataito hibai.
19.6 Act 8.17; 10.44, 46Naatu Paul uman tafah yara’aten yoyoban ana veya Anun Kakafiyin re iwanih menah botabir tur ta ta hio naatu tur Godane nan hi’orerereb. Orot nah etei i 12 iti kou’ay wanawanan.

Paul Kou’ay Bar run itafofor sumar tounu wanawanan sabuw bairi hio, God ana aiwob isan sabuw iuwih dogoroh rouw tafofofor. Baise sabuw afa dogoroh fokar, men kafa’imo hikok boro hititumatum naatu bebeyanamaim Regah ana ef gewasin isan tur kakafih maiyow hi’o. Basit Paul ihamiyih naatu bai’ufununayah buwih bairi hin. Veya matan yimo Tyrannus ana bai’obaiyen efanamaim ma bi’obaibiyih. Iti na’atube ma sinaf kwamur rou’ab sawar, naatu sabuw etei nati Asia wanawanan Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw etei Regah ana tur hinowar.

19.11 Act 14.3Paul wanawananamaim God ina’inan fokarih maiyow sisinaf.
19.12 Act 5.15Paul ana agesaf naatu ana faifuw i biyan gubamin hibai hin sawusawuwih biyah hiyayanowahih i hiyayawas naatu afiy kakafih auman i hibibihir.

Jew sabuw afa bar merar ta ta hirun hitit sabuw iyab biyahimaim afiy kakafih hitar sumih hima’am Regah Jesu wabinamaim hinununih. Naatu hai tur i iti na’atube hio, “Demon kakafih hinununih seven Paul ana orot wabin Jesu isan ebibinan i wabinamaim kwa abi’a’ari kwatit!” Naatu Jew hai Firis Gagamin wabin Skeva natunatun etei seven i iti na’atube auman hisisinaf. Baise afiy kakafin iuwih eo, “Jesu i ayu aso’ob naatu Paul auman i ayu aso’ob, bo kwa iyab?” 19.15 Baise ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab Naatu orot nati afiy kakafih hiwan ma’am misir bow yow tar, hai faifuw seb nunih ufun hitit segar biyah ererara ana bar hihamiy hibihir.

19.17 Act 5.11Jew sabuw etei naatu Ufun Sabuw etei iyab nati Ephesus wanawanan hima’am iti tur hinonowar ana veya, etei yah birubir fafar, naatu Regah Jesu Keriso wabin bora’ara’aten gagamin maiyow hitin. Sabuw moumurih na’in iyab hina bai’ufununayah himamatar bebeyanamaim hitit abisa kakafin hisisinaf isan etei hi’e’en. Sabuw moumurih na’in iyab hikwerakwer hai buk hibow hina hibutuw naatu sabuw etei matahimaim hi’afusar. Naatu buk ta’ita’imon hai baiyan hibiyab i 50,000 drachma ana fofonin. 19.19 Drachma ta’imon i orot veya ta’imon nabowabow i ana baiyan. Paul watching Ephesians burn bookscn02003B.tifAct 19.19©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Paul Efasis hai kwerakwer buk hi’afusar bat i’itah19.19 Sinaf fairih iti himamataramaim Regah ana tur tasasar tit naatu busuruf ra’at ana fair bai yen.
19.21 Act 23.11; Rom 1.13Sawar iti himamatar ufunamaim Paul ana not bogaigiwas Akaiya naatu Masedonia tafaram hairi wanawanahiwat remor na. Naatu na Jerusalem titamih ana not bogaigiwas eo, “Iti tafaram anabinanawan ufunamaim ayu boro anan Rome ana’itin.” Basit ana baibais orot rou’ab Timothy, Erastus hairi iyafarih hin Masedonia wanawanan hima, i baise veya au gagaminaka Asia wanawanan imaim ma.

19.23 2Cor 1.8Nati ana veya’amaim yare kakafin anababatun Ephesus wanawanan matar, anayabin Regah ana Ef isan. Orot wabin Demetrius silver imaim sawar ebu’ur temamatar i nati’imaim ma’am. Iti orot i god babin wabin Artemis ana kwafiren gagamin ana yumatabe, silver amaim bu’ur sabuw hitotobon. Naatu nati bowabowamaim kabay gagamin maiyow bai ana sabuw isah rur. Basit ana bowayah etei e’af ayuwih naatu sabuw afa i bairi hai bowabow ta’imon auman e’af hiru’ay iuwih eo “Au sabuw kwanaso’ob, ata bowabow iti’imaim kabay gagamin tatain erur. Naatu boun iti orot Paul abisa esisinaf i kwa taiyuw matamaim kwa’itin naatu tainimaim kwanonowar, god orot umahimaim tibiwa’an i men kafa’imo godamih.” Tur iti na’atube eo i orot babin moumurih maiyow yah ikitabir. Iti sawar i men Ephesus wanawanan akisin emamatar, baise Asia wanawanan etei kafa’imo nisawar. Iti ata bowabow i kakafin wanawanan run naatu ata bowabow wabin boro na’af, men wabit akisin na’af, baise god babin Artemis ana kwafiren bar gagamin auman boro yabin en namatar. Naatu sabuw nati Asia wanawanan, naatu tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei iti god babin hikakafiy hikwakwafir boro nuhih nabur.”

Sabuw hiru’ay hima iti tur hinonowar higagamat himisir hiwow hio, “Ephesus ana god Artemis akisinamo i turobe gagamin.”
19.29 Act 20.4; 27.2; Col 4.10; Phm 24Basit nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan uruw ra’at, na hibuyuw ne hibuyuw hinunuw. Masedonia orot rou’ab Gaius Aristakus hairi Paul bairi hinanawan hinan hibuwih hinunuw hin sabuw hai rou’ay efan gagaminamaim hitit. Paul akisin i kok sabuw nahimaim tatit, baise bai’ufununayah hi’otan. Nati tafaram wanawanan hai orot gagamih, iyab Paul ana ofonah auman tur hiyafar hifefeyan men hikok boro tan kou’ay ana efan gagaminamaim yumatan ta’ototait.

Nati ana veya’amaim kou’ay ana efanamaim uruw i na’at, sabuw afa nati’imaim i tur ta hiwow hio, sabuw afa ni’imaim ibo tur ta hiwow hio. Naatu sabuw au moumurihika i men kafai hiso’ob aisim hina iti kou’ayamaim hitit. Naatu Jew sabuw afa Alexander hibonawiy hitit nahine bat, naatu sabuw afa roube’aten tur hitin, imaibo Alexander umanamaim sabuw rutanih awah fot naatu i taiyuwin wasfafarin isan ana tur eo. Baise nati veya’amaim i hi’inan Alexander i Jew orot, imih sabuw etei au ta’imon hiwow sawar ta’imon isan hio inan hours rou’ab sawar. “Ephesus ana god Artemis akisinamo i turobe Gagamin!”

Inan yomaninamaim bar merar ana kirumayan sabuw rou’ay gagamin eotatanih inan nuwarob e’afuw basit eo, “Ephesus ana orot ana babin! Sabuw etei hiso’ob Ephesus bar merar i god gagamin Artemis ma’uh ema’am. Iti kabay kakafiyin marane hea’obow re’er boun iti inu’in auman ma’uh ema’am. Iti sawar i boro men yait ta nayaubamih, isan imih kwa yate enub kwamare naatu men abisa ta nota’e mata nakabiy kwanasinafumih. Kwa iti orot kwabow kwana ai’itih i men Tafaror Bar ana sawar ta hi’afiy o ata god babin isan tur kakafih hi’omih. Baise Demetrius ana bowayah orot bairi orot babin isan hai gamin tur afa hinama’am na’at, ata orot gagamih tur nowarayah i tema’am. Naatu tur nowar yababan yabaituturin isan ana efan i bobotawiyin inu’in boro hinan imaim hiyabaitutur. Baise yababan tur gagaminaka omih na’at i kwanan Kou’ay Bar gagaminamaim orot tur nowarayah matahimaim a yababan kwanaorereb tur nowarayah boro hinayabunei. Naatu boun hibubuyuw isan hina’af tanarun hinabibatiy boro tanao kwanekwan, anayabin tur ana’an it men taso’ob naatu it men karam boro asir tanao tanifufuwen.” Iti eo ufunamaim, sabuw iuwih hai ubar hin.
book.s: Paul Ana Nanawan Masedonia Naatu Greek Wanawanahimaim
book.p: Sabuw hibuyuw in sawar nuwarob ea’afuw ufunamaim, Paul bai’ufununayah 20.1 baitumatumayah etei e’af ayuwih koufair tur itih naatu eo tuturih. Imaibo ihamiyih au Masedonia na’at in. Naatu Masedonia ana uman men sanet imaim bar merar ta ta run tit baitumatumayah isah binan koufair itih remor na Greek tit. Nati’imaim sumar tounu ma, naatu au Syria na’at na isan bobobuna Jew sabuw rabinamih hiyayakitufuw tur nowar. Imih i ana not bogaigiwas matabir maiye Masedonia awat na. Orot iti na’atube i hitur bairi hin, Berea bar merarane i orot Fairahus natun Sopater, Thessalonica’ane i Aristakus, Secundus hairi, Derbe’ine i Gaius, naatu Asia’ane i Tychicus, Trofimus hairi, naatu Timothy. Iti oro’orot i wa ta hibai wan hirabon Troas imaim hima aki hikaifi. Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw sasawar ufunamaim Philipi imaim wa abai, veya umat roun ufunamaim Troas imaim ai ta’imon, nati’imaim fur ta’imon ama.

Fur antoro’ot ebubusurufimaim, bai’ufununayah etei rafiy kakafiyin baimasibin isan abita’ay ana veya, Paul binan sabuw iuwih naatu mar natot boro nan, imih kutuw binan in fainaiwan tit. Naatu bar tafan aki ama’amamaim i ramef moumurih na’in hitoto’ab. Bar ana sou awanamaim i orot boubun wabin Eutikas ma Paul ana binan nonowar. Baise Paul kutuw binan ma nowar inan busuruf matan fot taf koukuw. Naatu naniyan meyemeye matan anababatun fot ikitabir bar noyate tafan ana tet tounu imaim hima’am raiy rab easabun, hire murubin hibai hibora’ah. Baise Paul raiy orot isnowah kwafure rouh eo, “Men kwaniyababan, yawasin inu’in.” Imaibo matabir maiye yen bar tafan rafiy bai imasib eaan. Naatu fai manin ma binan in mar tot basit ihamiyih. Orot yawasin hibai hin au bar dogoroh ereyasisir auman.
book.s: Paul Tafaram Ephesus Regaregah Ai’in Hai Merar Yi Eotuturih
book.p: Wa abai arabon an Asos atit naatu Paul iu’uwi na’atube baiwaninamih arun, anayabin i ababawat boro ufui rarabon. Tafaram Asos imaim bairi abitar ana veya na wa afe’en yen bairi ana Mitilin atit. Mar to wa ainatit ana Kios nuw aihamiy, veya bairou’abin ufunamaim Samos nuw a’afuwabon, naatu veya baitounin ana Miletus atit. Paul Ephesus baihamiyin mutufor yan rabon isan ana not bogaigiwas, men kok boro veya gagamin Asia wanawananamaim tama, anayabin bimatkabiy ana kok i Jerusalem natitabo Pentecost ana veya nab.

20.17 Act 18.21Miletus imaim Paul Ephesus ekaleisia orot ukwarih na bairi o isan isah tur iyafar.
20.18 Act 18.19–19.10Naatu hina hititit ana veya iuwih eo “Ayu boubuntoro’ot ana Asia wanawanan atit bairi mi’itube tama’am i kwa kwaso’ob. Taiyuwu ayara’iyu Regah ana akir wairafin na’atube yawas fokarin wanawanan wainabu abow eremamaturu auman, Jew sabuw asabunu isan hiyakitifuw men anot. Kwa kwaso’ob ayu kwa isa abibinan ana veya men kafa’imo abir, a baibais ana tur ta abotanimih, en baise etei bebeyanamaim bar arun atit a binan kwanowar. Jew sabuw naatu Ufun Sabuw isah i bebeyan hai kakafih baihamiyen God isan tatabir naatu Regah Jesu baitutumin isan auwih.

Naatu boun Anun kakafiyin fatumu, i ana kokomaim au Jerusalem anan, men aso’ob nati’imaim boro abisa isou namatar.
20.23 Act 9.16; 21.11Ta’imonamo Anun Kakafiyin bimatnuwu i aso’ob, bar merar ta ta anarun anatitit dibur naatu biyababan i nati’imaim hima tekakaifu.
20.24 Act 21.13; 2Tim 4.7Baise ayu taiyuw au yawas ai’itin i men sawar gagamin ta. Ayu au kok i bowabow Regah Jesu bitu i ana bow yomanin ana’asa’ub, naatu nati bowabow i tur gewasin God ana manaw ana kabeber isan anao rerereb.

Naatu boun kwa iyab wanawanamaim ama aremor God ana aiwob isan a binan kwanonowar aso’ob boro men kwana’itu maiye. Isan imih boun kwa etei matamaim akukurereb, o yait ef inasa’ir inan inamomorob 20.26 inakakasiy ana bit men ayu anab. Anayabin God abisa not yayakitifuw etei akurereb kwanowar sawar men ta abotan au’uf abatamih.
20.28 1Tim 4.16; 1Pet 5.2-4Taiyuw mata toniwa’an kwanakaifi, naatu bobaituw Anun Kakafiyin kwa babamaim ya’aya kwanakaifih. God ana ekaleisia kwaninabatan gewas, anayabin i taiyuwin Natun momorobomaim sinaf nati sabuw hina nowan himatar.
20.29 Mat 7.15; Jn 10.12Ayu aso’ob kwa ana bihamiy ufunamaim haru kakafih boro hinan wanawan hinarun bobaituw hinatar giyigiyih. Kwa taiyuw a kou’ay wanawananamaim auman orot afa boro hinamisir turobe hinabotabir hinifufuwen, saise bai’ufununayah boro i hini’ufnunih.
20.31 1Th 2.11Imih mata toniwa’an! Kwamur tounu bairi tama fai mar erematuru abimatnuwih i kwananot.

Naatu boun kwa i God ana tafafarenamaim ayayariyi naatu i ana manaw ana kabeber turamaim nawowabi kwanayen abisa ana sabuw baitihimih eo kwa auman nowamih nit.
20.33-34 1Cor 9.11-12Ayu men kafai orot babin ta ana gold o ana silver isan abahiy o ana ar ana faifuw isan abahiyamih.
20.34 Act 18.3; 1Th 2.9Kwa etei kwaso’ob, ayu taiyuwu umau’umaim sawar abisa isah abiyababan asinaf himatar abow, naatu bow turou’unah hibiyababan afaram hibow karam. Ayu ef etei ai’obaiyi, kwanabow raro nababan, saise nati’imaim boro sabuw aurih fair en kwanibaisih. Ata Regah Jesu taiyuwin awanamaim iti tur eo i kwananot ’Baitinin ana baigegewasin i ra’at men tabaib na’atube.” Paul eo sasawar ufunamaim sun yowen bairi hiyoyoban. Sabuw etei erererey auman hirouh himamay naatu hio tutur. Etei hai yababan ra’at anayabin tur iti na’atube eo isan, ayu boro men ana’iti maiye naatu hinawiy bairi hin wa biyan hitit.

Nati’imaim aotuturih naatu aihamiyih hima aki wa abai mutufor arabon ana tafaram Kos atit; mar to ana Rodes atit, nati’imaim aikofan ana Patara atit. Wa ta au Fonisia inan atita’ur aitafabon abai atit are arabon. Yan ararabon anuwariy Cyprus a’itin naatu ai beyaw na’atune bat aki au Syria arabon ana Taiya imaim arun wa aiyut sawar hitarsuwai.
21.4 Act 20.23Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah afa atita’ourih fur ta’imon bairi ama. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin sabuw hai tur eowen Paul hitimatanuw, saise au Jerusalem men tayen. Baise bairi ama na fur yomanin tit, ai veya baib ufunamaim, ai hamiyih aki ai ef arura’ah maiye. Bai’ufununayah a’aawah natunatuh etei bairi hinawiy bar merar ai tumar ana tor dones yan are imaim sui ayowen ayoyoban. Imaibo bairi abi’otututuren ufunamaim, wa afe’en ayen, naatu i hai ubar himatabir maiye hin.

Taiya’ane wa abai anan i Polemais imaim wa aiyut, nati’imaim taiti baitumatumayah hai merar ayi bairi veya ta’imon ama.
21.8 Act 6.5; 8.40Marto ai hamiyih hima aki ana Seseria atit, binanuyan orot Philip ana baremaim bairi ama. Philip i Jerusalemamaim orot 7 hirurubinih i orot ta. I natunatun baibitar etei kwafe’en biyah numih God ana tur orerereb isan ana usar hibai hima’am.

21.10 Act 11.28Seseria imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ama’am ufunamaim dinab orot wabin Agabus Judea’ane natit.
21.11 Act 20.23; 21.33Na aki biyai tit basit Paul ana kikir bai i taiyuwin an uman iutatanen naatu eo, “God Anun Kakafiyin iti na’atube eo, Orot iti kikir matuwan Jerusalemamaim Jew sabuw boro iti na’atube isan hinasinaf hinab Eteni Sabuw hinitih.”

Aki iti tur anonowar ana maramaim sabuw 21.12 baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am bairi ai fefeyan ayai Paul au Jerusalem na isan a’otan.
21.13 Act 20.24Baise Paul iyafuti eo, “Kwa aisim iti na’atube kwao kwarerey ayu dogorou ana babanin kwabitin? Ayu i men buwu fatumu akisin isan abogaigiwasomih, baise Jerusalemamaim Regah Jesu wabinamaim morob isan auman abogaigiwas.” Yan baikitabirin isan asinaf, baise men karam. Imih aibagun naatu ao, “Regah ana kok na’atube namatar.”

Veya bai’ab na’atube nati’imaim ama’am ufunamaim ai sawar abobuna au Jerusalem amisir. Seseria’amaim bai’ufununayah afa hinawiyi bairi ana orot Mason ana baremaim atit, iti orot ana tafaram i Cyprus, naatu i auman marasika baitumatumayan matar ma’am.

Ayen ana Jerusalem atitit ana veya baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am hiyasisir ai merar hiyi. Marto Paul bairi ana James a’itin naatu nati ana veya’amaim regaregah ai’in etei nati’imaim hiru’ay.
21.19 Act 15.12Paul hai merar yi naatu i ana bowabow etei Ufun Sabuw wanawanahimaim God mi’itube ibais bowabow ana tur etei aneika busuruf idudur in yomanin easa’ub.

21.20 Act 15.1, 5Eo hinonowar ufunamaim etei’imak God ana merar hiy hibora’ara’ah. Imaibo Paul isan hio, “Taiu inaso’ob Jew moumurih na’in thousand ana fofonin hina baitumatumayah himatar. Baise etei’imak tekokok i ofafar hinabukikin hinabosiyasiyar. Baise iti’imaim tur i iti na’atube hinowar, O i Jew sabuw iyab nati Ufun Sabuw hai tafaramamaim tema’am kubi’obaiyih Moses ana ofafar i hinihamiy, naatu hai kek hai ar men hina’afuw naatu Jew hai binanakwar men hini’ufunun. Aki boro abisa ana sinaf, anayabin o ina ititit a tur i sabuw hinowaraka.
21.23-24 Num 6.1-20; Act 18.18Imih abisa anao na’atube inasinaf? Orot etei kwafe’en i hai omatanen ta God isan hio baifaro. Imih o i boro inikofanih bairi kwanan kouksouwen ana yohar wanawanan kwanarun naatu aribuh mafur o inibaiyanih aribuh hinamafur, saise o isa iti’imaim hibifufuwen sabuw boro hinaso’ob nati tur i baifuwen, anayabin i hiso’ob o i ofafar kubi’ufunun.
21.25 Act 15.29Baise Ufunane sabuw baitumatumayah isah, aki fef ta ai yafar in hai tur a’owen bay uma matamatar isah hisisibor men hinaa, masanuw rara auman men hinaa, o for sikah birabir men hinaa naatu men hina’in hinisesebar kwanekwan.”

21.26 1Cor 9.20Marto Paul orot buwih bairi hai binanakwar eo na’atube kousouwih isan hirun, orot kwafe’en hikukusouwih i auman kusouw. Imaibo i na Tafaror Bar hai tur eowen veya biy boro kouksouwen ana yomanin nasawar naatu siwar orot ta’ita’imon isah hinasibor.

Kousouwen in fur ta’imon yomanin tit baisawarinamih auman Jew sabuw afa Asia wanawanane hina hima’am Paul Tafaror Baremaim hi’itin. Sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in hikura’ara’ahih himisir Paul bain bai’a’afiyin isan hinunuw, hitar koukuw hi’af hio, “Israel Oro’orot kwana kwaibaisi! Iti orot efan etei remor ana bai’obaiyenamaim it ata sabuw isah tur kakafin maiyow eo, naatu ata ofafar baihamiyin isan eo’o, naatu iti Tafaror Bar wabin ebi’afiy. Naatu kakafin gagamin anababatun sisinaf i kwana’itin, Ufunane Sabuw buwih hina hirun ata Bar Gagamin gubagub tibitin.
21.29 Act 20.4(Iti na’atube hio anayabin Trofimus, Ephesusine nan hairi nati bar merar gagaminamaim Paul bairi hima hireremor hi’itih, naatu hinot i hibuwih bairi Tafaror Bar ana efanamaim hirun.) Nati bar merar gagamin ana sabuw etei kura’ara’ahih nan ufun hinunuw hitit Paul hibai hitain kwekwekwetar hitit Tafaror Bar gagamin ufunane hire. Naatu marta’imon etawan hihir. Paul hita’asabunimih hibiwa’an, baise tur marta’imon nunuw Rome baiyowayah hai ukwarin nowar Jerusalem wanawanan i uruw giririf mamatar. Matan kabiy baiyowayah orot afa hai ukwarih bairi buwih hinunuw hire kou’ay wanawanah hirun, sabuw kakafih baiyowayah hai orot ukwarih bairi hinan hi’itih Paul hirabirab hihamiy.

Baiyowayah hai ukwarin na Paul biyan tit bai ana orot uwih chain rou’ab hibow hifatum, imaibo ibatiyih, “Iti orot i yait naatu abisa sinaf?” Sabuw kou’ay wanawanan hibatabat asir hi’af hi’o kwanekwan, baiyowayan ukwarin sawar yabin abisa isan mamatar nowar gewasomih biwa’an men karam, anayabin uruwane ra’at imih baiyowayah iuwih Paul hibai hirun baiyowayah hai bar hiyari’y. Paul hibai hirun wawanamaim hitit rakit sabuw hiturafef hi’itin, basit baiyowayah Paul hibora’ah hi’abar.
21.36 Luk 23.18Sabuw ufuh hitarkoukuw hina hio, “Kwa’asabun emorob!”

Paul hibai baiyowayah hai bar hirur auman baiyowayah hai ukwarin isan eo, “Karam boro tur ta atao itanowar?” Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin Paul ibatiy, “O Greek tur iso’ob?
21.38 Act 5.36-37O men Egypt orot iti boro’omo sabuw 4,000 baiyow kwanekwaneyah ibow arar yan itit gawan isan ibirakit wari’en?” Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Jew orot, Tarsus imaim atufuw Silisia wanawanan, bar merar gagamin ayu i ana matuwan ama’am imih akokok o baibasit ititu sabuw isah atao.” Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin baibasit Paul itin yen wawan afe’en bat umanamaim sabuw etei rutanih etei awah fot, imaibo Paul Hebrew turamaim eo hinowar.
“Tamai’inah, naatu taitu tuwai’inah au wasfafaren ana tur anao kwananowar.” Hebrew turamaim eo hinonowar ana veya etei surur binon tar.

Imaibo Paul eo,
22.3 Act 5.34“Ayu i Jew orot Tarsus imaim atufuw tafaram Silisia wanawanan, baise Jerusalemamaim ama ara’at. Gamaliel ana bai’obaiyen babanamaim ama, uwatanah hai ofafar etei ayu i’obaiyu, naatu ayu i baibobowenayan orot ta God ana ofafar tur isan, kwa boun iti kwama’am na’atube.
22.4 Act 8.3Sabuw iyab ef iti hibi’ufun abow ai’a’akirih arouw asbunubunuwen naatu afa abow ana dibur aya. Firis Gagamin naatu Kaniser tutufin etei abisa ao i hiso’ob turobe. Anayabin i fef hikirum hitu abai an Damaskas wanawanan, sabuw baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am fatumih bow na Jerusalem tit isan ayen an.”
book.s: Paul Dogoron Baikitabir Baib Isan Idudur
book.p: “Ana Damaskas abiyubin auman i’ouyit, naniyan meyemeye marakaw namanamarabe bow marane ra’iy sisibu etei marakaw. Ayu me yan ara’iy rabu naatu orot ta fanan anowar eo, ‘Saul! Saul! O aisim ayu kubi’a’akiru?’
Ayu aibatiy ao ‘Regah o yait? Iyafutu eo,
‘Ayu i Jesu Nazareth mowan, o irabu kubi’a’akiru!’ Sabuw bairi anan marakaw hi’itin, baise orot ayu isou eo fanan men hinowar. Ayu aibatiy, ‘Regah ayu boro abisa anasinaf?’

Naatu Regah iuwu eo, ‘Kumisir kwen Damaskas kutit naatu nati’imaim God ana bowabow abisa o bowamih bit boro hinao inanowar.’ Naatu au sabuw bairi anan umou hibai hinawiyu an Damaskas atit, anayabin marakaw ana bonamanamarin re ayu matou yi ifim.

Nati bar meraramaim i orot wabin Ananias God, ana orot ta ma’am, ofafar etei i bobosiyasiyar naatu Jew sabuw nati’imaim hima’am etei i hikakakafiy. Na biyou tit sisibu’umaim bat naatu eo, ‘Taiu Saul, mata ekubunai kunuw maiye!’ Mar ta’imon matau kubunai anuw Ananaias a’itin.

Imaibo iuwu eo, ‘Uwatanah hai God o rubini i ana kok o so’ob isan, saise Orot ana Yawas Mutufurin 22.14 Kakafiyin boro ina’itin naatu abisa nao’o o taiyuw tainika fanan inanowar. Anayabin o boro i isan inakubuna, abisa i’itin naatu inonowar sabuw etei hai tur ina’owen. Imih boun abisa ao inonowar aisim boro inama inakaif? Kumisir bapataito kubai, naatu kuyoyoban a bowabow kakafih ekusouwen.’

“Ayu amatabir maiye ana Jerusalem atit naatu ayoyoyoban ana maramaim matou bora’ah ina’inanen ta aitin.
22.18 Act 9.29-30Nati matou bobora’ah ana maramaim Regah aitin naatu isou eo, ‘Mata nakabiy Jerusalem saisewat inihamiy, anayabin iti’imaim ayu isou inaorereb sabuw boro men hinitumatum.’
22.19 Act 8.3; 26.9-11Ayu ai ya’afut ao, ‘Regah sabuw etei hiso’ob ayu Kou’ay Bar 22.19 Kou’ay efan ta ta arun atit sabuw iyab o hibitutumi abow arow afatum dibur aya’ay.
22.20 Act 8.1Naatu Stephen orot wantoro’ot iti ef isan hirab ana rara re’er ana veya ayu i nati’imaim.’ Ayu auman aisaito hirab morob naatu sabuw iyab hi’a’asabun hai faifuw i ayu abotanen abat.
22.21 Act 9.15Imaibo Regah ayu iuwu eo, ‘O abiyafari inan ef yok Ufun Sabuw isah.’”
book.s: Rome Tafaram Bimatuwan Ana Fef Paul Bai
book.p: Sabuw hibat Paul eo hinowar in ana tur sawar. Baise iban maiye sabuw hibusuruf hitar koukuw hio? Sa’ab kwabai kwan! Kwa’asabun! Men karam boro nama!”

Hitar koukuw fah sib hai faifuw hibow hirudab, naatu fofob hibow asir hirouw kwanekwan. Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin iuwih Paul hibai baiyowayah hai bar wanawanan hirun naatu wabirin isan iuwih, saise biyan tababan tao hitanowar ana’an aisim Jew sabuw iti na’atube isan fanah sibisib.
22.25 Act 16.37Baise wabirinamih hibai hifafatum ana veya Paul baiyowayan hai bonawiyenayan orot ukwarin ta i nati sisibinamaim batabat itin naatu ibatiy, “Orot Rome tafaram bai matuwan isan ana fef bai ema’am, baibatiyinae asir kwanarabirab boro ofafar kwana’astu’ub ai en?”
Baiyowayah hai bonawiyenayan orot ukwarin iti tur nonowar ana veya in baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin ibatiy, “O abisa inasinafumih? Iti orot i Rome ana fef bai ema’am.”
Naatu baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin na Paul ibatiy eo, “Kuo anowar, o i Rome ana fef ibai kuma’am?”
Paul rufut eo “Ayu i Rome orot anababatun ana fef abai ama’am.”
Imaibo baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin eo, “Ayu iti tafaram bai matuwan isan kabay gagamin na’in au fef atubun.” Baise Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Rome wanawanan atufuw.”
22.29 Act 16.38Sabuw iyab baibatiyinamih hinan marta’imon au’uf hibat. Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin ana bir ra’at, anayabin Paul Rome ana fef bai ma’am so’oba’e bai fatum.

Marto mar auman baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin kok taso’ob gewas, aisim Jew sabuw Paul hibubuw hi’u’u kwanikwaniy, Paul hifatum ma’am hirufamen, naatu firis ukwarih Kaniser tutufin etei iuwih hiru’ay. Imaibo Paul bai na nahimaim bat.

Paul nuw Kaniser itihkikin naatu eo, “Taituwau ayu au yawas tutufin etei God matanamaim men kafa’imo erekasiy auman ama na iti boun titamih.” Paul speaking to council in Jerusalemcn01975B.tifAct 23.1©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Paul Jerusalem kanisel nahimaimbat tibibabatiy23.1-6
23.2 Jn 18.22-23Iti na’at eo basit Firis Gagamin wabin Ananias orot iyab Paul sisibinamaim hibatabat awan roufoforamih iuwih.
23.3 Mat 23.27Baise Paul iu, “God o awa boro narufofoforen, yumat rah ana sis! O baibabatiyenayan orot wai, aisim o taiyuw ofafar ibai awau roufoforenamih sabuw kubiyunih!”
Orot Paul sisibin hibatabat hio, “O God ana Firis Gagamin isan men tur kakafih inao’omih!”
23.5 Exo 22.28Paul iyafutih eo, “Teutuwau ayu men aso’ob i Firis Gagamin. Buk Atamaninamaim eo, ‘O men tur kakafin a sabuw hai bonawiyenayan isan inao’omih.’”

23.6 Act 26.5Imaibo nati ana maramain Kaniser sabuw Paul inanih, sabuw nati’imaim hiruru’ay afa i Sadducee afa i Pharisee, naatu Paul Kaniser sabuw isah fanan aumetawat eaf eo, “Teituwou! Ayu i Pharisee, naatu Pharisee orot natun. Ayu iti baibatiyen efanamaim abatabat anayabin abitumatum morobone misir maiye ana nuhufot abai ama’am isan!” Iti na’atube eo ana maramaim, Pharisee naatu Sadducee bairi hitarayouw higam naatu kou’ay hikusib.
23.8 Mat 22.23Anayabin Sadducee tibitumatum sabuw moroboyah boro men hinamisir maiye, naatu tounamatar men tema’am naatu afiy auman en. Baise Pharisee it sawar tounu etei isah tibitumatum.

Naatu gamin gagamin na’in matar, Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah iyab Pharisee ana kou’ay himisir fanah sib higam hio, “Paul i men abisa ta kakafin sinafumih, men taso’ob afiy o tounamatar ta na hairi hio.” Gamin ra’at sasa, naatu baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin bir eo, Paul boro hinarab hinatensisib, naatu baiyowayah iuwih hire hin kou’ay wanawanan hirun Paul umahine hiba’aruwih hibai hina hai bar hiyari’ay.
23.11 Act 27.24; 28.16, 23Nati gugumin Regah na Paul sisibinamaim bat eo “Koufair inab! Jerusalemamaim ayu isou i’orereb na’atube inan Rome imaim ef ta’imon inasinaf inaorerereb.”

Marto, marauman Jew sabuw afa hina hita’imon hiyakitifuw naatu omatanen hiwa’an harew o bay men hinaa hinatom hinama’am Paul hinarab namorobabo. Sabuw iyab Paul asabunin isan hiyayakitifuw nah etei i 40 na’atube tafanamaim auman. Imaibo hin firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in biyah hitit hio, “Aki etei omatanen fokarin a’obaifaro bay boro men anaa anama nan Paul ana’asabun imaibo boro bay anaa.
23.15 Act 25.3Isan imih boun aki akokok kwa naatu Kaniser bairi tur kwaniyafar Rome Baiyowayan isan Paul nab kwa isa nare nan. Kwanifuw taiyuwin biyanamaim nuwet gewas kwanarouw kwanao nare nan. Baise aki boro efamaim anawa’ir anama’am nanan ana’asabun.”

Baise Paul rubin babin natun hiyayanuw nowar basit na barik bar tit run Paul ana tur eowen. Naatu Paul sorodiy orot ta isan eaf na iu, “Iti monokai kwabai kwan baiyowayan ukwarin biyan, i tur ta boro ana tur na’owen.” Baiyowayah hai orot gagamin monokai bai in baiyowayan ukwarin biyan tit eo, “Dibur orot Paul eaf arun orot iti abai o isa anan anayabin i boro tur ta nao inanowar.”
Baiyow hai ukwarin orot uman bai nawiy nabin akisihimo hin naatu ibatiy, “O abisa kukokok boro inao ananowar?”

Orot iya’afut eo, “Jew orot gagagamih etei hibasit maras boro o hinifefeyani Paul inab inare Kaniser hai kou’ayomaim ana yare hinanuwetamih, baise nati i hai baifuwen. Imih hai tur men inanowar, anayabin orot etei 40 tafanamaim auman boro efamaim hinawa’ir hinama hinakaif. Iti oro’orot i omatanen fokarin hio baifaro bay harew hairi boro men hinaa, hinama’am Paul hina’asabunibo bay hinaa harew hinatom. Etei i sinafumih hiyabuna sawar o anot abisa inao’o i hima tekakaif.”
Baiyowayan ukwarin eo, “Men yait ta ana tur ina’owen abisa io anonowar.” Naatu orot iyafar tit in.

Baiyowayah hai orot gagamih rou’ab eafih hina iuwih eo, “Baiyowayah 200 kwanabow, horse ana orot etei 70, naatu 200 ahay bowayah, kwanabobuna boun gugumin nine korok iti tafaram kwanihamiy kwanan Caesarea kwanatit.
Horse ta Paul kwanitin afe’en namare naatu kwanatafafar gewas kwanab kwanan Gawan Felix biyan kwanatit kwanitubar.”
Imaibo baiyowayah hai ukwarin mare fef kirum eo.
book.q: “Ayu Claudius Lysias, O Felix gawan orot gewas

a merar ayiy.
23.27 Act 21.30-33; 22.25-27Iti orot i Jew sabuw hibai kafa’imo
hitarab tamorob, baise ayu au baiyowayah bairi ana
aiyawas. Anayabin ayu hio anowar iti orot i Rome

ana fef bai ema’am.
23.28 Act 22.30Ayu akok i ataso’ob yabin
abisa isan hiu hibiwa’wa’an, imih abai an hai Kaniser
biyah atit. Anunuwet men abisa kakafin iwa’an
boro hitarab tamorob o dibur tarun, iti i Jew sabuw

hai baitumatum naatu hai ofafar isan.
23.30 Act 23.16-23; 24.1-9Naatu
asabuninamih hiyayanuw hiofa’ar anowar, imih
saisewat au not abogaigiwas o isa iti abiyafar,
sabuw iyabowat i isan higam teo i auwih boro
hinan o namaim bairi ana tur kwananowar
kwanayabunei.”
book.p: Baiyowayah hai bowabow hibitih na’atube hisinaf, Paul hibai gugumin wanawanan hinawiy hin kakafih hai wawa’ir ana sou Antipatris imaim hitubar. Naatu marto baiyowayah ahiwat himatabir maiye hina yarir bar hitit, baise horse hai orot i Paul hinawiy bairi hin. Hinawiy hina Caesarea hitit fef gawan hitin naatu Paul auman hibai hirun umanamaim hiyai. Gawan fef iyab naatu Paul ibatiy ana tafaram menane na, naatu Paul ana tafaram Silisia’ane rouw eo nonowar ana maramaim eo, “Ayu boro a kamabiy sabuw hinanabo inao anowar.” Imaibo iuwih hibai hin gawan ana bar gagaminamaim dibur bar hiyari’y.
book.s: Paul, Felix Nanamaim Bat Baibatiyen Bai
book.p:
Veya etei umat roun sasawar ufunamaim firis gagamin Ananias regaregah ai’in afa naatu ofafar so’obayan orot wabin Tertulus bairi hire hin Caesarea hitit. Naatu Paul ana kakafih hibow hitit gawan Felix nanamaim ubar hitin. Imaibo Paul hibai hina hirun naatu Tertulus busuruf ubar itin eo, “Felix o i gawan orot gewas so’ob wairaf, o a aiwob i gewasin bonawiyi manin maiyow tufuwamaim tama. Naatu sawar hi’afe’af iwowab maiye ata tafaram ana gewasin isan. Efan tata’amaim naatu ef tata’ane, o a merar ayiy asinaf gewasin iti isan, abiyasisir gagamin maiyow o isa. Ayu men akokok boro a veya gagamin anab, baise abifefeyani mar kafai tain inarub au tur ukwarihiwat anao inanowar.
24.5 Act 17.6Iti orot i kou’obo’obowanayan, naatu wow atubob i iti orot ebimamataren, Jew sabuw hai tafaram wanawanan iti orot i ku’obo’obow kakafih temamatar, naatu kou’ay wabin Nazareth Kou’ay i’ukwarin sabuw etei ebobonawiyih.
24.6 Act 21.28-30Naatu Tafaror Bar gagamin bisnowanowah atita’ur, imih afatum ai ofafar eo na’atube boro atibatiy. Baise Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin wabin Lisias fokarin maiyow narun e’abar giyi orot umai’imaim bosair, naatu sabuw iyab ubar hibitin iyunih baina o namaim baibatiyin isan iuwih. Imih o taiyuw iti orot inabibatiy boro inaso’ob sawar abisa isan aki ubar abitin boro inatita’ur.” Jew sabuw hirun hikofan ubar hitin hio, “Abisa iti orot eo i turobe.”

Gawan orot Paul isan umanamaim iman tur tao isan, naatu Paul eo, “Ayu aso’ob kwamur moumurih maiyow o Jew sabuw hai tur ikaif. Isan imih ayu abiyasisir o namaim ayu taiyuwu ana wasfafaru’umih. O taiyuw itita’ur kusoso’ob veya 12 na’atube i sawaraka, ayu ayen an Jerusalem atitit i God kwafirin isan. Naatu men kafa’imo Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan Jew sabuw bairi agamigam hi’itu’imih, na’atube men kafa’imo Kou’ay Baremaim naatu nati bar merar gagamin wanawanamaim kakafin baimatarin isan aku’obo’obowamih. Naatu abisa ayu kakafin sinaf hirouw ubar hitu teo boro men anayabin gewasin ta hinao inanowaramih. Ayu iti bebeyan aorereb inanowar. Ayu i God uwai’inah hikwakwafir i boun akwakwafir naatu Ef nati i abi’ufunun isan ayu yawas boubun baimatarin hirouw teo. Naatu ayu i sawar tutufin etei Moses ana ofafaramaim naatu dinab hai Bukamaim hikikirum etei abitumatum.
24.15 Jn 5.28-29Naatu iti sabuw God isan nuhih fot hima tekakaif na’atube ayu auman nati not ta’imon abai ama akakaif, sabuw kakafih naatu gewasih etei boro morobone hinamisir maiye. Imih ayu mar etei asisinaftobon God matanamaim naatu sabuw matahimaim au not etei roumutufurinamaim nama anabow.

Kwamur moumurih maiyow ayu Jerusalem ai hamiy ufunamaim abow aremor, imih amatabir maiye anan i kabay abai sabuw yababan wairafih baibaisih isan naatu sibor auman ya’inamih ana.
24.18 Act 21.17-28Ayu iti asisinaf ana maramaim Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana sebosebomaim hitita’uru, ofafar eo na’atube kouksouwen abai yomanin a’asa’ub ufunamaim, nati’imaim sabuw rou’ay en naatu uruw auman en. Baise Jew sabuw afa Asia’ane hinan i nati’imaim, igewasin nati sabuw i mi’itube hitan o namaim, saise au kakafih afa hitasoso’ob na’at ubar hititu hitao. O sabuw iti tebatabat kwibatiyih ayu abisa kakafin hai kaniser (Sanhedrin) hinunuwet biyau’umaim hititita’ur boro hinao inanowar.
24.21 Act 23.6Baise sawar ta’imon nahimaim asinaf i kakafin hirouw teo i iti. Morobone misir maiye isan abibinan hibuwu ana o namaim abat kubibabatiyu.

24.22 Act 23.26Imaibo Felix iti Ef isan nonowar gewas ufunamaim, tur rufut au’uf nawiy. Naatu Paul iu, “Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin Lisias nan natitabo a tur anonowar boro ana fufufun anao inanowar.” Naatu Felix baiyowayan orot gagamin babanamaim iu, “Paul inakif, baise baibasit initin nama naremor naatu tain tuwan baibasit initih abis nakokok na’at hinibais nama.”

Veya bai’ab na’atube ufunamaim Felix aawan Drusila hairi hina. Drusila i Jew babin, Paul isan tur iyafar na tit naatu baitumatum Jesu Keriso wanawananamaim ema’ama isan idudur hima hinowar. Naatu Paul ma gewasin, yawas kaifin ma gewas, yawas mutufurin ma naatu baibabatiyen gagamin God boro sabuw nabibatiyih isan bidudur Felix bir naatu eo, “O i boro inihamiyu, veya gewasin ta anab maiye boro isa tur aniyafar.” Felix ana notamaim Paul boro kabay ta titin imaim ana tur tatubun isan mar etei eaf ena hairi tema tibidudur.
Kwamur rou’ab sasawar ufunamaim Posias Festus yen Felix ana efan bai igawan. Naatu Felix Jew sabuw baiyasisir i wabin bora’ahin isan Paul diburamaim ihamiy ma.

Festus na Judea wanawanan gawan ana efan bai ma veya tounu ufunamaim Caesarea ihamiy yen na Jerusalem tit.
25.2 Act 24.1Nati’imaim firis ukwarih naatu Jew hai orot ukwarih hina Paul ana kakafih isan ubar hitin Festus hifefeyan.
25.3 Act 23.15Hikokok i mi’itube hai kokomaim tasinaf Paul tiyafar au Jerusalem tayen. Iti na’atube hisisinaf anayabin i Paul tayen tanan efamaim hita’asabun isan hiyakitifuw. Baise Festus iyafutih eo, “Paul i Caesarea imaim dibur ema’am, naatu ayu taiyuwu iti boro’omo nati’imaim anan. Imih a orot ukwarih i boro ayu bairi anan Caesarea anatit abis kakafin sisinaf na’at boro imaim ana kakafih isan ubar hinitin.”

Festus veya etei eight o ten na’atube nati’imaim bairi hima, imaibo au Seseria matabir maiye re. Naatu in marto basit Festus baibatiyen ana efanamaim mare naatu iuwih Paul hibai hina hirun.
25.7 Act 24.5-6Paul hibai hina hirur ana maramaim Jew sabuw iyab Jerusalemane hire hinan etei hina sisibin roun roun hi’a’ar bebera’uh baifuwen tur kakafih moumurih maiyow hibow hitit ubar hitin hio, baise hai tur hio i men kafaita biturobe’emih.

Imaibo Paul taiyuwin wasfafar eo, “Ayu i men kafai abisa ta kakafin asinaf. Jew hai ofafar ai gigim, na’atube Tafaror Bar ai gigim, o Rome ana Aiwob 25.8 Emperor ai gigimimih. Baise Festus i kok mi’itube Jew sabuw tiyasisirih, imih ibatiy eo, “O kukokok inayen Jerusalem imaim iti ubar tibit isan a baibatiyen imaim ananowar?” Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Rome Aiwob ana baibatiyen efan nanamaim abatabat, imih ayu i boro iti imaim ana baibatiyen anab. O iso’ob ayu i men kafai abisa kakafin asinaf Jew sabuw isah. Ayu ofafar ana’astu’ub imaim nabonawiyu morob ana baibasit anabaib i boro men morob ana haiw. Baise baifuwenamaim ubar hinabitu na’at, orot babin men ta ana fair ema’am boro ayu nabuw umahimaim nitihimih, ayu i boro kwaniyafaru anan Caesar nanaimaim au tur nanowar.”
Imaibo Festus ana kou’ay orot gagamih not wairafih bairi hio ufunamaim tatabir Paul iya’afut eo, “O Caesar a tur nowar isan io, imih o boro Caesar isan inan.”
book.s: Paul, Agripa Naatu Bernis Hairi Nahimaim
book.p:
Veya afa ufunamaim aiwob orot Agripa, Bernis hairi hina Caesarea hitit, Festus ana bowabow baib isan ana merar yinamih.
25.14 Act 24.27Hina nati’imaim hima veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Paul ana tur eowen eo, “Paul mi’itube wawasfafar isan Festus aiwob orot ihamiy ema’am. Naatu ayu au Jerusalem anan ana veya’amaim Jew hai firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in, orot ukwarih ubar hitin ayu asabunin morob isan hi’uwu. Baise ayu auwih, aki Rome ai ofafaramaim orot asir bai na baibatiyen isan ana ef men ema’am, baise wantoro’ot i boro sabuw iyab ubar tibin bairi roun roun hinabat hina’o, saise i ana ef nama’am na’at taiyuwin boro nahimaim nabat nawasfafar. Naatu nati sabuw ayu bairi ana atitit ana veya, ayu veya men au’uf atain, faiwat a’in marto baibatiyen ana efanamaim amare, orot auwih hibai hina hirun. Sabuw ubar hibitin ana kakafih hibow hititit i men kafa’imo sawar kakafih ayu anotanotamaim hibow hitit ubar hitinimih. En baise, gamin afa ibo taiyuwih hai kwafiren isan. Naatu orot wabin Jesu momorob Paul yawasin ma rouw eo isan hibow hitit. Au kasiy ra’at, iti tur boro mi’itube ata bow gewas, imih ayu Paul au i takokok na’at tayen tan Jerusalem imaim iti ubar isan hitibatiy. Baise Paul ifefeyanu kok i Caesar baibatiyen titin, imih ayu auwih dibur baremaim hihirafut hima’uh hima, ayu ef atanuwet imaibo atiyafar tan Aiwob Caesar biyan.”
Basit Agripa Festus iu, “Ayu akokok iti orot nao ayu taiyuwu ananowar.” Festus iya’afut eo, “Marasibo nao inanowar.”

Hi’in marto Agripa, Bernis hairi hirutaburih auman hinawiyih rou’ay bar gagamin wanawanan hirun, baiyowayah hai orot gagamih naatu bar merar hai orot gagamih bairi. Naatu Festus iyunih Paul hibai hina hirun. Festus eo, “Aiwob Agripa naatu kwa iyab boun iti’imaim bairi tabita’imon, orot iti kwa’itin! Jew sabuw iyab iti’imaim tema’am naatu Jerusalemamaim iti orot isan ubar gagamin maiyow hitin ayu matou’umaim, fanah aumatawat na’in hiwow men hikokok iti orot boro yawasin tama. Naatu ayu anunuwet men kakafin ta sinaf boro imaim tabonawiy tan tamorob. Baise anayabin ayu ifefeyanu ana kok i boro Rome ana Aiwob nahimaim tabat ana tur hitanowar. Ayu au ef men ta ema’am boro atarufut, imih ayu au Rome baiyafarin isan abogaigiwas. Baise fef kiruminamih ayu akasiy, tur abisa boro Aiwob Caesar isan anakirum. Anayabin ubar hibitin men ta yabin auman. Imih ayu abai atit kwa etei namaim, o Aiwob Agripa inibabatiy inanuwet gewas tur yabin anababatun inab naatu fef ana kirum. Anayabin ayu ai’itin ayu isou men gewasin iti dibur orot ana ubar en asir taniyafar nanan ana itinin i men basit.”

Agripa iu, “O i baibasit abit taiyuw isa inao.” Paul uman bora’ah naatu taiyuwin wasfafar eo, “Aiwob Agripa, ayu i abiyasisir anayabin boun o namaim Jew sabuw abisa isan ayu ubar hibitu i boro ana wasfafaru anao inanowar. Paul speaking to crowdcn01993b.tifAct 26.2©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Paul aiwob Agripa isah ibibinan26.1-2 Iti ao i turobe, anayabin o i Jew sabuw hai binanakwar naatu hai ofafar iso’ob kwanekwan, imih o abifefeyani yatenanub inama ana’o inanowar. Jew sabuw etei ayu kek ana veya mi’itube ama’am i hiso’ob, ayu au yawas no aneika au tafaramamaim mi’itube ama’am ana Jerusalem atit ama’ama etei i hiso’ob.
26.5 Php 3.5-6Ayu i manin maiyow bairi ama, imih ayu i hisu’ubu kwanekwan. Hinakokok na’at hina’orereb. Anaika ayu i Pharisee orot, kwafiren ana ofafar fokarin wanawanan i ayu ama, naatu men kafa’imo ofafar ta astu’ub.
26.6-7 Act 23.6; 28.20Naatu boun ayu iti ubar tibitu anayabin God ana’omatanen ai a’agir bitih imaim ayu nuhufot ama’am isan, ubar hitu bairi tao. Iti omatanen i aki ai big etei 12 hibitumitum mi’itube hita’itin titurobe, imih fai mar dogoroh tutufin etei God hikwakwafir, naatu anayabin iti baitumatum isan. Aiwobomon, Jew sabuw ayu ubar hitu iti tao. Kwa Jew sabuw iyab iti kwabatabat aisim God sabuw murumurubih ibiyawasih baitutumin isan kwa isa efofokar?

26.9 Act 8.3Ayu auman mat i na’atube anot, sawar moumurih na’in ata sinaf Jesu Nazareth mowan wabin ati’ib isan. Naatu nati na’atube Jerusalemamaim asinaf. Firis ukwarih biyahine fair abai God ana sabuw moumurih maiyow abow dibur aya. Naatu rouw morobomih teo ana veya ayu auman aibasit terouw temomorob. Mar moumurih maiyow Kou’ay Bar efan tata’amaim abow biyababan aitih, naatu hai baitumatum baihamiyin isan a’okikimih. Na’atube hai baitumatum baigigimin isan a’okimih, naatu atit an menah tatabirih hai bar hai meraramaim bai akir kakafin maiyow aitih.
book.s: Paul Dogor Baikitabir Baib Ana Tur
book.p: Ana’an iti isan ayu firis ukwarih biyahine fair hitu hiyunu an Damaskas atit. Baise efamaim anan bi’auyit auman, Aiwobomon, marakaw no marane, mamarakaw men veya na’atube, marakaw kwanekwan re ayu au sabuw bairi anan tarbebera’uhi. Aki etei’imak me yan are, naatu ayu orot fanan anowar Hebrew turamaim iuwu eo, ‘Saul! Saul! aisim ayu irabu kubia’akiru? Ayu kubi’a’akiru i o taiyuw biya irab kubi’a’afiy.’

Ayu aibatiy ao, ‘O yait Regah?’ Naatu Regah eo, ‘Ayu i Jesu, o irabu kubia’akiru. Baise kumisir kubat, ayu o isa abirerereb ana rubini isou inabow naatu boun abisa isa mamatar sabuw afa hai tur ina’owen. Naatu abisa isa namamatar boro ani’obaiyi. Ayu o a sabuw Jew umahine naatu Ufun Sabuw umahine boro anatafafari. Ayu abiyafari nati sabuw wanawanahimaim inan,
26.18 Isa 42.16; Eph 2.2; Col 1.13matah inabotawiy naatu guguminane inanawiyih hinatit marakawamaim hinarun. Naatu Satan umane inabow God initin, saise bowabow kakafihine notawiyen hinab, naatu God ana rourubin sabuw wanawanahimaim hai efan hinab hinamare.’

Nati isan Aiwobomon Agripa, ayu abisa marane re ai’itin men ai fanasair. Bowabow wantoro’ot i Damaskas imaim abusuruf naatu ana sabuw iyab Jerusalem hima’am isah atit, Judea wanawanan etei abinan naatu Eteni Sabuw wanawanahimaim auman a binan. Abibinan anayabin sabuw bowabow kakafihine God isan hitatatabir naatu hai bowabowamaim titurobe i dogor baikitabir hibai. Ana’an nati isan Jew sabuw ayu Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana sebosebomaim hibuwu hifatumu rabu morobomih hiwa’an. Baise God tafafaru yawasu ama ana it boun atit, imih o namaim abat orot babin kikimin yen in orot babin gagamin etei matahimaim abisa isou mamatar i ao’orerereb. Ayu au tur ao i dinab oro’orot naatu Moses sawar abisa mataramih hi’o inu’in mamatar imaim ao.
26.23 Luk 24.44-47; 1Cor 15.20Roubininenayan boro biyan nababan ni’akir naatu morobone, moroboyah wanawanahimaim i boro wan namisir marakaw ana yawas Jew sabuw naatu Ufun Sabuw isah nakurereb.”
Paul iti na’atube taiyuwin wasfafar eo inan auman Festus Paul isan iwow eo, “O i kubikoko’aw so’obamaim nawiyi in kubikoko’aw!”

Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i men abikoko’aw, au Aiwobomon! Tur abisa ao i turobe hai yabih auman. Aiwob Agripa, ayu o namaim men erebir auman ao’omih, anayabin iti sawar etei o iso’ob, naatu sawar iti himamatar boro men karam nuhinaburumih. Anayabin iti sawar men ta umasusunamaim mataramih. Aiwob Agripa o dinab orot kubitutumih? Ayu aso’ob o kubitumatum!”
Aiwob Agripa Paul iya’afut eo, “O kunotanot iti veya ta’imon o boro ayu dogorou inikitabir anan Kirisiyan anamatar?”

Paul iya’afut eo, “Veya kabumin o veya manin ayu au yoyoban God isan i men o akis baise kwa iyab iti boun ao kwanonowar i mi’itube kwatan ayu ama’am na’atube kwatamatar. Baise men akokok hinafatum dibur hinayariyi kwanama.”

Naatu Aiwob orot, gawan orot Bernis, naatu sabuw afa hima’am etei himisir. Efan hima tur hinonowar hihamiy hitit, naatu taiyuwih turahinah bairi hibidudur hio, “Iti orot i men abisa ta kakafin sinaf boro namorob o dibur narun.” Naatu Aiwob Agripa Festus isan eo, “Iti orot Caesar isan baifefeyanina’e tama’am, iti boun boro ata botait.”

Aki au Italy na’at na isan hinot hiyayabuna ufunamaim Paul naatu dibur sabuw afa bairi hibuwih Rome baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin babanamaim wabin Julius umanamaim hiya’i. Caesar baiyowayah orot hai kou’ay wabin Aiwob ana Baiyowayah. mapPaulrome.tif
27.2 Act 19.29Aki wa tafaram Adaramitiamane na batabat abai, iti wa i Asia wanawanan awar etei run titamih nununuw abai. Masedonia orot wabin Aristakus ana tafaram Thessalonica i auman is ra’at bairi an.

Anan marto Sidon arun, Julius, Paul isan i igewasin, baibasit itin ana ofonah bainanawanihimih itih ana kokok abisa baibaisin isan iu. Nati’imaim atit maiye ana, baise yabat kufuti, imih aki wa abai ai kewakew Cyprus nuw sisibinamaim isinfafari anunuw an. Anunuw anan i atit are Silisia naatu Pamfilia hai riy yan foun autubun arabon ana Maira arun Laisia wanawanan. Nati’imaim Julius orot ukwarin Alexandria hai wa ta au Italy nununuw tita’ur, basit aki imaim yara’ahi. Veya moumurih maiyow efamaim aremor, yabat rabi auman awani ayey ana bar merar Sinidus anatabir. Baise yabat i ra’at men karam boro mutufor atanunuw, imih aki Kurit nuw isinfafari anunuw Samone sisibin rounane. Kufuti auman awani tor rewarewan anunuw ana efan wabin Umabibin imaim atit, bar merar Lasea sisibinamaim Umabibin imaim arun.

Nati’imaim veya manin maiyow ama naatu busurufin maiye na isan yabat i ra’at re sakirafut. Anayabin gagar ana veya i mar etei notawiyen ana hiyuw ufunamaim ebubusuruf. Imih Paul imatnuwih eo, “Oro’orot ayu ai’itin it tanatit tananan i boro kakafin wan tanamara’at, wa boro nataseb, sawar etei boro tanisaroun naatu it auman boro tanamorob.” Baise baiyowayan hai orot gagamih Julius, Paul ana tur men nowar, baise wa ana kaifenayan, naatu wa matuwan abisa hio hai tur i’ufunun. Naatu nati awar wa rouwin rarab siba’u imaim ma isan men igewasin, imih orot etei hai kok i boro wa hitimtawiy takakaram na’at atarabon Phoenix imaim rarab siba’u atama. Phoenix awar i tafaram Kurit wanawanan naatu nati awar i gewasin anayabin umabibin oyaw na’atune veya ere’er boro ina’itin nare.

Waruw kikimin gurufune tarsisin, orot hinotanot abisa hio i mamatar, imih aumor hitain hiyen naatu rarar hibora’aten Kurit dones sisibin akutitiy. Baise men yok yabat gagamin wabin wowog oyawane babin re. Wa rab, aki bai kewakew run maiye isan abiwa’an men karam basit yabat wan amara’at atit are. Baise anunuw ana nuw kikimin wabin Kauda guruf na’atune bat aki sisibin umabibin isinfafari, naatu hifafair wa kikimin uranane atain yen, murab hibow hikiktatan gaigiwas, wa afe’en baginayah yabat buwih run Libia dones yen yara’ahih hirouw hibir, basit rar hitaiyen hire wa bat earuw. Yabat i wan fus kubar rouw in marto, naatu wa afe’en sabuw sawar hibow hisrouruwen riy yan hire. Naatu veya baitaunin i wa ana sawar afa: rar, murab, koutataren, naatu boy i hibow taiyan hitaiyen hire. Tafaram etei gugum aki sumar, daman men a’itah veya manin maiyow yabat kutuw rouw inan aki etei akasiy yawas isan anotanot ai not etei sawar.

Orot nati wa afe’en veya bai’ab ama yabat rarabi bay men yait ta eaan, Paul misir nah yan foun bat eo, “Oro’orot kwa gewasin ayu fanau kwatanowar Kurit tatama’am iti sawar boro men hita’af naatu boro men ta yababan tab. Baise boun i kwa abifefeyani koufair kwanab, anayabin kwa orot etei boro men ta inamorobomih. Wa akisinamo boro natafofor na’unun. Fai gugumin God ayu aru, naatu God ayu akwakwafir i ana tounamatar iyafar ayu sisibu’umaim bat,
27.24 Act 23.11naatu iuwu, ‘Paul men inabir, o i boro Caesar nanamaim ubar hibit hinibabatiyi. God i ana kabeberamaim sabuw iti bairi wa afe’en kwanan hai yawas etei o umamaim ya, imih boro men yait ta namorob.’ Imih oro’orot koufair kwanab! Anayabin ayu God abitumitum abisa eo anonowar na’atube boro nasinaf.
27.26 Act 28.1Baise it i boro narabit tanan nuw ta ana donesamaim boro nayara’ahit.”

Yabat rabi Mediterenean tor yan areremor fur rou’ab sawar veya 14 baib ana veya nati ana gugumin imaim wa afe’en baginayah naniyah hibaib aki i ana tafaram abiyubin. Basit murab hibai aumor hi’utan hitaiy re taiy hifufufum ana fofonin i 40 metres naatu hima kafai naatu hifufun maiye hi’tin i 30 metres. Naatu hai bir i ra’at yabin yabat boro wa nab anan ar afe’en nayara’ah, imih aumor etei kwafe’en wa uranane hitaiyen hire naatu mar saise to isan hima hiyoyoban. Imaibo wa afe’en bowayah wa baihamiyin bihiramih hima hiyakitifuw. Naatu wa kafai hirufam harew yan hitaiy re, hitifuwen wa nanane aumor baitaiyin hitarouw hitanan i aunah hitanamih. Baise Paul baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin bobonawiyih naatu baiyowayah iuwih eo, “Iti wa afe’en bowayah wa afe’en men hinama’am na’at, kwa etei i men karam boro yawas kwanab.” Basit baiyowayah kaiy hibow wa kafai ana murab hi’afuw naatu hitumar e’aruw in.

Mar sibisib auman, Paul orot etei iuwih eo, “Kwa i bay kwanaa, anayabin bay en kwama’am boun fur rou’ab sawar naatu ya wanawanan i men abisa ta ema’am. Imih abifefeyani bay kwanaa fair kwanab, arib boro men ta nata’uy nare nakasiyomih.” Paul iti eo ufunamaim rafiy bai orot etei nahimaim God ana merar yi, imasib naatu busuruf eaan. Etei hi’itin koufair hibai naatu etei’imak bay afa hibow yah hirutan. Naatu aki nati wa afe’en anan nai etei i 276. Orot etei bay hi’aa yah biw ufunamaim, wheat nati wa afe’en hi’iuin hibow harew yan hitaiyen hire wa kerer.

Mar totoririb ana veya wa afe’en baginayah dones men hi’inan, baise umabibin ana dones hi’itin naatu wa hibai hisinaftobon nati dones yen baitet ra’ahin isan hinunuw. Wa ana aumor hi’afuw tai yan hi’in naatu gunig ana murab au ta’imon hirufam, imaibo rar hibora’ah wa bai aki au dones anunuw arun. Baise wa nunuw rur yabat rab mamay yan yen naatu yara’ah nanane re tatab bai’etaw isan men karam, naatu uranane yabat rab tagurugurus. Baiyowayah dibur etei rouw morob isan hiyakitifuw, men hikok boro hitataiy dones hitayen hitabihir. Baise baiyowayah hai orot gagamin i Paul tiyawas imih baiyowayah abisa hinot hio i eotanih, naatu iuwih eo, “O yait itaiy isoso’ob wan kukununuw kure kutaiy kwen dones kuyen. Naatu afa i boro uf hinare wa rab tatagurugurus rebarebah afe’eh hinayen hinataiy hinarun.” Aki iti na’atube asinaf etei yawasi ataiy an dones yan ayen men yait ta morob. shipwrecked people making for shorecn02045B.tifAct 27.44©1978 David C. Cook Publishing Co.Wa tafofor hire au dones tetataiy27.44

Ataiy ana dones ayey men yait ta aboyouw, naatu nuw imaibo ai’inan, aki i ana Malta nuw ayen.
28.2 2Cor 11.27Nuw sabuw merarayow gewasin maiyow hiti, ai merar hiyi wairaf hi’asir rari, anayabin toun i yarayar naatu tutuban ea’ani. Paul ai heaf na wairaf wan yayara’aten, naatu kok wairaf wabuburin bai kayam tit, Paul uman yub fifin. Nuw sabuw Paul umanamaim kok fifin inu’in hi’itin basit taiyuwih hio, iti orot i uman rara. Riy yan yawasin taiy na yen, baise koubaitotorayan ana god men ekokok boro yawasin nama.
28.5 Mak 16.18Baise Paul uman ta’asiy kok wairaf wan yen earah naatu men abisa ta isan matar.
28.6 Act 14.11Sabuw hima hi’itin hinotanot i boro uman tadaw o an ta’uy tare tamorob. Baise manin maiyow hima hikakaif men abisa ta isan matar, imih hai not hibotabir hio, “Iti orot i god wari’en!”

Nati dones inan sisibin turin i orot wabin Publius ana bar merar. Publius i nati nuw hai orot gagamin. Ai merar yi, veya tounu ana nanawan na’atube bairi ama ituwi. Publius tamah sawow biyan ana fora’abin ra’at, naatu yan yub ana gem yan inu’in. Paul na ana bar run isan yoyoban, biyan butubun naatu yawas. Sawar iti mamatar ana tur hinowar, sabuw iyab nati nuwamaim hisawow hi’inu’in hinan etei hiyawas. Naatu hai kakaf gagamin na’in aki hiti, wa afe’en ayey ana veya ai remor isan abisa akokok etei hibaisi.

Sumar tounu ama’ama ufunamaim wa ta Alexandria’ane nan abai. Iti wa wabin, “God Kikifu” anayabin iti wa nanamaim i Kastor naatu Folux hairi hai yumat hikirum hi’inu’in. Rarab siba’u aki nati nuwamaim wa tafan ama in rarab siba’u sawar. Wa abai atit an tafaram wabin Sarakus imaim arun veya tounu imaim ama. Naatu nati’imaim atit anunuw ana Rhegium bar merar gagamin arun imaim a’in. Mar to waruw gurufune 28.13 South busuruf babin, naatu aki atit anunuw veya bairu’abin Puteoli arun. Nati’imaim baitumatumayah afa hima’am atitourih naatu hifefeyani bairi fur ta’imon ama. Imaibo aremor ana Rome atit. Baitumatumayah Rome hima’am aki anan bigai hinowar basit hina Apius ahar ana efan hitit, naatu afa hina Nanawan Bar Tounu hibatabat imaim hi’iti ai merar hiyi, Paul iti sabuw i’itih ana veya God ana merar yi naatu i koufair gagamin maiyow bai. Ana Rome atitit ana veya, Paul akisin ma isan ana baibasit hitin, naatu baiyowayah orot ta hiyai kaif hairi hima.

Veya tounu ufunamaim Jew orot ukwarih etei Paul eaf hiru’ay. Eaf hiruru’ay ana veya’amaim iuwih eo, “Taitu ayu i men kafa’imo ata sabuw isah asinaf kakaf, naatu uwatanah hai binanakwar abisa hibitit aigigimimih, baise Jerusalem imaim ayu hifatumu naatu hibuwu Rome gawan umanamaim hiya’u.
28.18 Act 26.31Ayu ubar hitu bairi ao hinunutitiy au kakafin men ta hitita’ur boro ata morob, imih hikok boro hitabotaitu.
28.19 Act 25.11Baise Jew sabuw men hikok ayu hitabotaitu, imih ayu Caesar isan ai fefeyan. Iti asisinaf i men ata sabuw ubar baitih na’atube abiwa’an.
28.20 Act 26.6-7Ana’an iti isan ayu kwa aifefeyan kwatan kwata’itu bairit tatao isan. Ayu hifatumu dibur ama’am anayabin i Israel sabuw orot nati biyanamaim nuhih fot tema’am isan.”

Hiya’afut hio, “Aki Judea’ane men fef ta o isa abaimih, na’atube taituwat nati’ine men o asinaf isan naatu abisa isisinaf kakaf ana tur men ta na eo anowar.
28.22 Act 24.14Baise aki akokok o anot i ku’o anowar, anayabin efan ta ta etei sabuw iti o a kou’ay boubun isan hio tegamigam anonowar.”

Basit Paul bairi veya hiyai naatu nati veya’amaim sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hiru’ay. Paul ma’am ana efanamaim. Mar auman Paul busuruf God ana aiwob isan kubuna naatu eorerereb etei hinowar. Sinaftobon Moses ana ofafaramaim naatu dinab oro’orot hai turamaim sabuw botabirih Jesu dogoroh baitinin isan ma iuwih in veya re. Sabuw afa abisa eo i hitumatum, baise sabuw afa i men hitumatum. Taiyuwih wanawanahimaim Paul ana tur yomanin eo isan hibusuruf hibibas ufunamaim himisir hitit hin. Paul eo, “Anun Kakafiyin i turobe uwatanah isah dinab orot Isaiah iwan eo,
book.q: 28.26-27 ISa 6.9-10‘Kwen sabuw iti isah kuo,
Kwa i boro tain kwanarub tur kwananowar, baise boro men naniyan kwanab.
Mata boro natakiyat kwananuw baise yabin boro men kwana’itin.
Anayabin nati sabuw fudirih i fokar.
Tainih higibud tur men karam hinanowar,
naatu matah hibofafaren.
Asire matahimaim boro hita’itin
tainihimaim tur boro hitanowar,
fudirih boro tarerekab hitaso’ob,
naatu isou boro hitamatabir, ayu atiyawasih.’
book.p: Isan imih ayu akokok kwa kwanaso’ob, God ana yawas i Ufun Sabuw isah ebiyafar naatu i boro tur hinanowar!” Tur iti eo ufunamaim Jew hihamiy taiyuwih higam auman hin. Kwamur rou’ab tutufin Paul bar ta tutubun imaim ma naatu sabuw iyab itinamih hinan i mar etei hai merar yiy. Nati’imaim ma’am men kafa’imo bir naatu men abisa ta ana ef ya’afutimih, baise God ana aiwob isan ma binan, naatu Jesu Keriso isan sabuw i’obaibiyih.

book.id: - Miniafia NT; David and Fran Wakefield; Stanley Oyabua; Josiah; 29-Jul-2010 (web edition -2012 bd)
book.p: Rome
Paul Ana Fef Rome Isah
Roube’aten Ana Tur

Paul ana fef Rome sabuw isah kirum, saise hita’itin naatu i ana nanawan isan hitayabuna. Anayabin yakitifuw Rome ekaleisia bainanawanih isan. Ana nanawan yayakitifuw i boro Kirisiyan wanawanahimaim bairi mar kafai hitama isah tabow, saise hitibais au Spain tan isan. Paul ana fef kikirum anayabin i kok takubuna ekaleisia ana yawas naatu ana baitumatum i hitaso’ob gewas isan. Paul ana fef kikirum wanawanan i ana tur ana binan tutufin etei ana’an gagamih auman kubuna hinowar.

Paul sabuw hai merar yiy ana yoyoban isan hai tur eo’owen ufunamaim ana fefemaim tur ukwarih eorereb. Tur gewasinamaim God mi’itube ana sabuw eyayamutufurih, naatu baitumatumamaim ebubusuruf naatu ebisawar (1.17)

Paul ana tur ukwarin wowab bunai maiye eo, “Orot babin etei, Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw etei i boro hinayamutufurih God bairi hinama. Anayabin etei i bowabow kakafin ana fair babanamaim hima’am.” Sabuw hai baitumatumamaim God yamutufurih hina bairi ta’imon himatar Jesu Keriso wabinamaim. Paul iban maiye yawas boubun ana itinin mi’itube eo hinowar, hai baita’ay boubun God bairi hibita’ay imaim hina Keriso bairi hituwbonen. Yait bitumatum i tufuw Godamaim bai naatu bowabow kakafih morob hairi hai fairane God Anunin Kakafiyin botait tit. Teten 5‑6 wanawananamaim Paul iban maiye God ana ofafar naatu God Anunin kakafiyin ana fair baitumatumayah hai yawasamaim ema’am isan idudur hinowar.

Imaibo tur abarayah Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw yabin en baise God ana yakitifuwenamaim buwih hirun. Tur yomanin asa’ubin isan eo, Jew hai routawiyen Jesu isan i God ana yakitifuwen turin i ana manaw ana kabeber Jesu Keriso’omaim sabuw etei buwih hina i ana yawas wanawanan hirun. Naatu i ebitumatum Jew boro men mar etei Jesu hinakwahirimih.
Tur baisawarin isan i ana tur naatu God bora’ara’ahin ana tur auman yari’iy kirum sawar.
Fef wanawanan tur iti na’atube hi’a’asgidigd
Roube’aten naatu tur ukwarin (1.1-17)
Orot ana kok yawas (1.18–3.20)
God orot yawas baitin isan ana ef (3.21–4.25)
Yawas boubun Keriso wanawananamaim (5.1–8.39)
Israel sabuw i God ana yakitifuwenamaim ema’am (9.1–11.36)
Kirisiyan ana bonawiyen (12.1–15.13)
Tur yomanin naatu merarayow (15.14–16.27)

1.1 Act 9.15Ayu Paul, Jesu Keriso ana akir wairafin, tur abarin isan rubinu, naatu Tur Gewasin binan isan God eafu atit.
1.2 Rom 16.25-26Iti Tur Gewasin i marasika God ana dinab hai veya’amaim eomatanih, dinab oro’orot Buk Kakafiyinamaim hikirum. Iti tur ana an gagamin i Natun it ata Regah Jesu Keriso isan. Biyanane ana tufuw i David ana rara’ane tufuw. Baise i Ayubin ana kakafiyinamaim morobone mimisir ana veya, bebeyan ebi’obaiyit turobe i, i God Natun fairin.
1.5 Act 26.16-18; Gal 2.7-9I wanawananamaim naatu i wabin isan ayu manaw kabeber itu ana tur abarayan amatar, 1.5 it manaw kabeber itit tur abarayah tamatar saise tafaram wanawanan Ufun Sabuw anabuwih hinan tur hinitumatum naatu hinabosiyasiyar. Naatu kwa auman i nati sabuw wanawanahimaim Jesu Keriso nowan matar isan God eafi.

1.7 Num 6.25-26Naatu Rome wanawanan kwa iyab God iyabuwi naatu rubini i ana sabuwamih kwamatar kwama’am etei, isa ayoyoyoban manaw kabeber, tufuw Tamat Godane naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso’one mar etei kwa isa nama.

Wantoro’ot Jesu Keriso wabinamaim ayu au God ana merar ayiy kwa etei isa, anayabin kwa a baitumatum i tuw ra’at tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei tenonowar. God isan dogorou tutufin etei abow i Natun ana tur gewasin abibinan, i so’ob, ayu mar etei kwa anunuhi.
1.10 Act 19.21; Rom 15.23Matanfufur isa ayoyoyoban, naatu au yoyobanamaim God abifefeyan nakokok na’at boun ana veya ef nabotawiy isou naham anan kwa aninanawani.

Au kok gagamin i mi’itube kwa ayumat ata itin, saise ayubit ana usar kwa atit imaim a fair kwatab. Iti tur i men ayu akisu kwa fair bait isan ao’omih, baise kwa auman ayu koufair kwanitu bairi tanibaibaisbonen ata baitumatum nakwat isan ao’o.
1.13 Act 19.21Taitu tuwa’inah ayu akokok tain anayai kwanaso’ob, mar moumurih na’in abogaigiwas atan kwa ata’iti, saise kwa wanawanamaim Ufun Sabuw afa atabow hitan baitumatum wanawanan hitarun, nati’imaim abow hina baitumatum wanawanan hirur na’atube. Baise sawar moumurih maiyow ayu au ef hirufutifut tama tanan iti boun tatit. Ayu i sabuw etei’imak isah bai’akiramih atit, Greek sabuw naatu sabuw iyab men Greek, na’atube sabuw so’ob wairafih naatu men so’ob wairafih etei’imak isah anabow anibaisih. Ana’an nati isan ayu akokok kwanekwan tur gewasin kwa iyab nati Rome kwama’ama auman isa anabinan.

1.16 Mak 8.38; Act 13.46; 1Cor 1.18-24Ayu Tur Gewasin ao’orereb isan men biyou eo’ohow, anayabin God ana fair i ef iti’imaim tit sabuw iyab tibitumatum ebiyawasih. Iti yawas i wantoro’ot Jew sabuw isah, baise Ufun Sabuw auman.
1.17 Hab 2.4; Rom 3.21-22Anayabin yawas mutufurin Godane i tur gewasinamaim orot babin eyayamutufurih, baitumatumamaim ebubusuruf naatu boro baitumatumamaim nasawar. Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo,
book.q: “Orot ana yawas mutufurin boro baitumatumamaim nama.”
book.s: Sabuw Kakafin Sinafuyah God Ana Baimakiy Boro Hinab
book.p:
Sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah naatu sabuw tafa’asarih, i hai kakafinamaim turobe ana gewasin esumisum, imih maramaim God ana ya so’ar tit ibirerereb nati sabuw isah.
1.19 Act 14.15-17; 17.24-28Sawar tutufin etei i rereb yah hi’itah tesoso’ob, anayabin God etei bebeyanamaim sinaf tibirerereb.
1.20 Job 12.7-9; Psa 19.1Anamaim God tafaram sinaf mamatar ana veya, God ana yawas wa’iwa’irin, ana fair wanatowanin naatu i ana itinin etei i sawar sinaf himamataramaim bebeyah hi’itan hiso’ob, imih boro men yait ta God su’ubina’e nao nifufuwenamih.

1.21 Eph 4.17-18Nati sabuw i God hisu’ub, baise men kafa’imo God hirouw tebora’ara’ah, o merarayow tibitinimih. Nati efanin i hai not bonawiyih kwarikwarisen wanawanan hirun dogoroh eowarar naatu gugumafut.
1.22 Jer 10.14; 1Cor 1.20Basit i not wairafih hirouw teo, baise hai not botabir hina koko’aw na’atube himatar,
1.23 Deu 4.15-19; Psa 106.20God morob atin bonamanamarin kwafirina’e i hitatabir orot hai yumatabe o mamu, o harufor, uma’ar, kok, i hai yumatabe hitar hima tekwakwafirih.

Isan imih God nati sabuw ihamiyih hitit bowabow kakafih ta ta wanawanan hirun. Dogoroh ana kok na’atube tisisinaf, orot baibin hai faifuw hikwahir naatu baibin ibo orot hai ar hikwahir taiyuwih hi’in hisesebar biyah tebobokarikarit. Turobe God nowan i hibotabir efanin baifuwen hiyari’iy, naatu God Sawar Sinafuyan kwafirina’e, hitatabir sawar i sinaf himamatar hai fair babahimaim hirun hikwafirih isah tebowabow. Baise ana gewasin sabuw i God akisinamo hitakwafir hitabora’ara’ah wanatowan, wanatowan, Amen.

Ana an iti isan God ihamiyih insesebar naniyan kakafin 1.26 1, 26 baiwa’an isan iuwiwiwirih anababatun hibai tisisinaf. Baibin oro’orot hai ar hikwahir, i taiyuwih hi’in tibisesebar kwanekwan.
1.27 Lev 18.22; 20.13; 1Cor 6.9Ef nati ta’imon oro’orot auman baibin hai faifuw hikwahir i taiyuwih baisesebar isan tibifi’afi. Naatu oro’orot taiyuwih hi’in tibisesebar kwanekwan. Ana an nati isan i taiyuwih hai kakafinamaim baimakiy tebaib.
Anayabin sabuw God ana so’ob anababatun bain isan hai not kowarar naatu hirutawiy, imih God ihamiyih hitit not kwarikwarisen hibai hima kakafih men hitasisinaf i hima tisisinaf.
